name: H10 Casa Mimosa 4* Sup
description:
Housed in a 19th- century modernist building, just behind La Pedrera, H10 Casa Mimosa offers an impressive chill-out terrace with a plunge pool and a sun lounger area with privileged views of Casa Milà’s terrace.

All rooms are outward-facing, with both views over Pau Claris Street or over the courtyard garden which has Gaudí’s chimneys in the background. All have smart temperature control and high-quality amenities including a Nespresso Coffee Machine and a digital safe box. Some rooms also have spacious terraces.

The on-site El Til•ler Restaurant serves a delicious breakfast with a buffet consisting of natural products and a selection of à la carte dishes. The Lobby Bar also offers light meals and is also an excellent meeting point for a drink.

The beautiful garden retains some former cabins which are located in a courtyard that is typical of the Eixample district; and has a large variety of Mediterranean greenery such as a century-old palm tree, an impressive lime tree and mimosas, which give the hotel’s name. In the garden there is also an elevated swimming pool and a sun lounger area.

From here, there is access to the Las Cocheras meeting room, a former garage with high-ceilings and a capacity up to 100 people.

Ideally located, H10 Casa Mimosa is 10 minutes’ walk from Casa Battló; Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas can be reached within 15 minutes’ walk. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout.

name: Sonder Casa Luz
description:
Set in Barcelona, Sonder Casa Luz offers a terrace, breakfast and complimentary housekeeping. Guests can enjoy the near contemporary art museum MACBA, La Boqueria market and Rambla del Raval.

An on-site restaurant is also available.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Passeig de Gracia, Casa Batllo and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Sonder l Casa Luz.

name: Barnapartments Basic Gracia
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
Located 5 minutes’ walk from Paseo de Gracia of a historic district of Barcelona, Barnapartments Basic Gracia features a balcony with a city view. Free WiFi is available in all areas.

This air-conditioned 2-bedroom apartment offers includes a double sofa bed, flat-screen TV and dining table in the living room. The kitchen features a toaster, microwave and washing machine.

Various bars and restaurants are 5 minutes’ walk from the property and Casa Batlló is a 10-minute walk away.

Diagonal Metro Station is within a 10-minute walk of the property. Airport shuttle can be organized upon request.

name: Sallés Hotel Pere IV
description:
Pere IV is situated in the Poble Nou District, 10 minutes’ walk from the lively Port Olimpic area and Barcelona's beaches. This hotel features a free spa, free Wi-Fi and 24-hour reception.

Each of the spacious rooms comes with a minibar, and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The à la carte Garum Restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine. The hotel serves a daily, buffet breakfast.

Guests enjoy free access to the Pere IV's spa, which includes a Finnish sauna, a hammam, indoor pool and sensation showers.

The Pere IV is a short walk from the beach and the new marina. Nearby Bogatell Metro Station offers easy access to the beach and the city centre, which can both be reached within 15 minutes.

name: The Streets Apartments Rambla
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
The Streets Apartments Rambla provides accommodation within less than 1 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster. Featuring a lift, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. When staying at the apartment, guests can use private entrance.

At the apartment complex, all units have a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units are air conditioned and include a seating and/or dining area. The units include a wardrobe.

Sightseeing tours are available near the property.

Popular points of interest near The Streets Apartments Rambla include Sant Sebastian Beach, Sant Miquel Beach and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: NH Sants Barcelona
description:
Located 400 metres from Sants Station in Barcelona, NH Sants Barcelona offers modern, air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, flat-screen TV and private bathroom.

The hotel has a restaurant, serving fresh Mediterranean cuisine. There is also a relaxing café-bar. It also offers a healthy breakfast. The restaurant is closed during summer months.

The NH Sants Barcelona is set in a quiet area of Barcelona's Les Corts Financial District, but Barcelona city centre is within 15 minutes by Metro. Guests can reach FC Barcelona Football Stadium from Plaça del Centre Metro Station, which is 300 metres away.

name: Hotel Concordia Barcelona
description:
Hotel Concordia Barcelona is situated 800 metres from Plaza España and the Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Centre. It features a sun terrace with an outdoor swimming pool, hot tub, cocktail bar and solarium.

The Hotel Concordia Barcelona’s bright, spacious rooms feature contemporary décor and air conditioning.  Each room includes free WiFi, a flat-screen TV, safe, minibar and a private bathroom with a range of amenities.

The Concordia Barcelona’s modern, elegant  Bistro Triple Sec Restaurant serves typical Mediterranean cuisine. The varied breakfast buffet includes healthy options. There is also a café and cocktail bar open daily. Private parking is available on site for an extra cost and electrical cars charging station is available.

Located next to Poble Sec Station, the hotel is a 5-minute Metro journey from Barcelona Port and La Rambla. You can also walk to the Rambla in 15 minutes. Direct airport buses stop in Plaza España, a 15-minute walk away.

Private parking is available on site for an extra cost.

name: Vincci Maritimo
description:
Vincci Marítimo is located 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre and the CCIB Convention Centre. It offers bright, stylish rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi throughout.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Marítimo feature modern décor, with parquet floors and relaxing images of the sea. They come with a pillow menu and the private bathrooms contain a hairdryer. Rooms offer views of the charming Japanese Zen garden or Diagonal Mar Park.

The hotel’s Jardí de Mar Restaurant serves Mediterranean food using fresh ingredients. The hotel's breakfast includes products for celiacs. The Ikebana Lounge Bar offers snacks, tapas and cocktails which can be enjoyed on the terrace.

The hotel’s reception is open 24 hours a day, allowing you greater flexibility during your stay. Laundry and car rental services are also available from the front desk.

The Vincci Marítimo is just 500 metres from Mar Bella Beach. Selva de Mar Metro Station is 2 minutes’ walk from the hotel, connecting you with the city centre in 15 minutes.

name: The White Flats Les Corts
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Welcome to The White Flats Les Corts, an exceptional accommodation in the heart of the charming Les Corts neighborhood in Barcelona!

These exclusive 2 or 3-bedroom apartments have been meticulously designed to offer you an experience of maximum comfort and style. Every corner has been carefully decorated with a modern and sophisticated touch, creating a cozy atmosphere that will make you feel at home. Additionally, its spaces are fully equipped with all the necessary amenities to provide you with an ideal stay. From the fully equipped kitchen to the extremely comfortable beds to offer you an optimal experience.

Despite not being in the city center, its location is unbeatable. Just a 5-minute walk away, you will find the Les Corts metro stop, allowing you to easily explore all the wonders that Barcelona has to offer. And if you're a football enthusiast, you'll be delighted to know that we are very close to the iconic Camp Nou stadium, home of the legendary FC Barcelona. In the surroundings, you will discover a wide range of services and amenities that will enrich your experience. From supermarkets where you can stock up to high-quality restaurants, charming cafes, and many shops.

The White Flats Les Corts goal's is to provide you with a truly memorable experience during your visit to Barcelona. An attentive team will always be ready to assist you with anything you need, ensuring that every moment of your stay is exceptional. You are invited to enjoy this accommodation, where they will welcome you with open arms. The White Flats Les Corts look forward to hosting you!

name: The Hoxton, Poblenou
description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.7 km from Bogatell, The Hoxton, Poblenou provides accommodation with a restaurant, private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a bar. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests.

Guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. The units will provide guests with a desk and a kettle.

Guests at The Hoxton, Poblenou can enjoy a à la carte breakfast.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Nova Icaria, Mar Bella and Sagrada Familia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from The Hoxton, Poblenou.

name: Hotel Market
description:
Hotel Market is located next to Barcelona’s San Antonio Market, 10 minutes' walk from MACBA Gallery. Its chic rooms have rain showers and free Wi-Fi, and there is a popular restaurant.

The Market Hotel’s modern rooms have dark wood beams, white walls and large windows. Each one has a private bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony or terrace.

The hotel is 15 minutes’ walk from both Plaza Espanya and Plaza Catalunya. Sant Antoni Metro Station is about 200 metres away, and an airport shuttle bus stop can be found 2 minutes’ away.

The Market Hotel’s elegant restaurant offers a range of modern Catalan dishes, and specializes in rice.

name: Pestana Arena Barcelona
description:
Pestana Arena Barcelona is less than 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Plaza Espanya and Fira Exhibition Centre. It offers a gym, sauna and modern, air-conditioned rooms with free wired internet access.

Some rooms offers free use of the Maritimo Meeting Room, up to 12 people, for private meetings.

Pestana Arena Barcelona is just 3 minutes’ walk from Las Arenas Shopping Centre and you can walk to Sants Station in 8 minutes. You can get to the Rambla in 5 minutes from Plaza Espanya Metro.

Rooms feature parquet floors and stylish décor. Each one has work desk, a pillow menu and an LCD TV with satellite channels.

The hotel’s restaurant serves Mediterranean food and has a terrace. There is also a bar where you can get a snack or a drink. The hotel's breakfast includes products for celiacs.

name: You Stylish Diagonal Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 77m²
description:
Set in a Modernist building on Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue, You Stylish Diagonal Apartments is located just 120 metres from Francesc Macià Square. These modern apartments offer free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV.

The air-conditioned, soundproofed apartments feature stylish décor with design furniture and parquet floors. Each one has a lounge-diner with a sofa, and the kitchens include a hob, oven, microwave and coffee maker. The bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

A swimming pool and small gym are located nearby, and surcharges are applicable.

A cleaning or babysitting service, as well as breakfast and other catering, are available for an extra charge. There are many shops, bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of You Stylish Diagonal Apartments.

You can walk to the top of the prestigious Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard in 13 minutes from You Stylish Diagonal Apartments. Located 10 minutes’ walk away, Hospital Clinic Metro Station connects you with Sants Station in 2 stops and Barcelona FC’s Camp Nou Stadium in 4 stops.

name: Catalonia Atenas
description:
Set 3 metro stops from central Barcelona, the Atenas Catalonia has a rooftop swimming pool, offering views of the nearby Torre Agbar and Sagrada Familia. It also features free WiFi, a gym and a spa with a Turkish bath.

The bright rooms of Hotel Atenas Barcelona have simple décor with wooden flooring. Each has air conditioning, a mini fridge with complimentary water, and satellite TV.

The hotel's buffet breakfast features a show kitchen. There is a snack bar and guests can enjoy stunning city views from the pool, set on the 11th floor.

The Sagrada Familia is just over one kilometre from the hotel, while Glòries shopping centre can be reached in 15 minutes by foot.

The Catalonia Atenas has a convenient left luggage service, on-site parking, and is 2 minutes’ walk from Clot Metro Station; and 200 metres from Clot Train Station; here you can take a direct train to Barcelona Airport.

name: Occidental Atenea Mar - Adults Only
description:
Situated 150 metres from Barcelona’s Nova Mar Bella Beach, Occidental Atenea Mar - Adults Only offers sauna and gym, and a free WiFi zone. Each air-conditioned room features international satellite TV.

The hotel features a terrace with sea views and a seasonal infinity pool with hydromassage beds and seats. You can rent Balinese beds and sun loungers. There is also a seasonal snack bar, which is open from June to September.

Occidental Atenea Mar - Adults Only offers bright, functional rooms, many with views of the city or sea. They include a minibar, a free safe and a private bathroom with amenities.

The hotel’s Canela restaurant serves à la carte Mediterranean meals, and a varied breakfast buffet is available each morning. There are also many bars and restaurants on the nearby seafront promenade.

Regular bus services to central Barcelona stop outside the Occidental Atenea Mar - Adults Only, while Poble Nou Metro Station is a 10-minute walk away. The CCIB Conference Centre and Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre are just 1 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Lloret Ramblas
description:
Hotel Lloret Ramblas is situated on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, just outside Plaza Catalunya Square. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

Each functional room at the Lloret Ramblas Hotel features a work desk and a private bathroom with amenities. Some rooms also have a private balcony.

Breakfast is served in Hotel Lloret Ramblas’s beautiful lounge-dining room, which dates from the early 20th century. The reception area has a free PC with internet and a free safe.

Barcelona Cathedral and the MACBA Modern Art Museum are both around 500 metres from Hotel Lloret. Catalunya Metro Station is a 1-minute walk away, and direct airport buses stop within 100 metres.

name: Casa Lit Barcelona by Ona
description:
Situated 400 metres from Las Ramblas, Casa Lit Barcelona by Ona offers a rooftop terrace with city and sea views. The rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

The hotel has a courtyard, where you can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Each open-plan room has air conditioning.

Casa Lit Barcelona by Ona have a 24-hour reception, where staff can arrange restaurant bookings, tickets for shows or guided tours of Barcelona. Free city maps are also available.

The hotel is located at the bottom of the lively Raval district, just 700 metres from Barcelona Port. Drassanes and Paral•lel Metro Stations are both within 300 metres.

name: Hotel Boutique Mirlo Barcelona
description:
Hotel Boutique Mirlo Barcelona features a garden, shared lounge, a restaurant and bar in Barcelona. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. A spa and wellness centre comprising a sauna, an outdoor swimming pool, a hot tub, as well as a terrace can be used by all guests.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. The rooms are fitted with a kettle, while selected rooms will provide you with a patio and others also have city views. At Hotel Boutique Mirlo Barcelona all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Park Güell is 2 km from the accommodation, while La Pedrera is 3.6 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Hotel Boutique Mirlo Barcelona.

name: Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel
description:
Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and restaurant in Barcelona. This 4-star hotel features free WiFi and a bar. Certain units at the property feature a balcony with a city view.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel every room includes bed linen and towels.

Breakfast is available every morning, and includes buffet, à la carte and continental options.

Speaking German, English, Spanish and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the reception.

Nova Mar Bella Beach is 1.9 km from the accommodation, while Llevant is 2.1 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel.

name: Hotel America Barcelona
description:
Situated in the charming Enric Granados Boulevard, 500 metres from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia, this stylish hotel offers a gym, sauna and rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool and city views.

America Barcelona’s rooms are bright and airy, decorated with soft colours and wooden flooring. Each one has a flat-screen TV and a Nespresso Coffee Machine, and some courtesy capsules are provided on arrival. The private bathroom comes with a rain shower, bathrobes and slippers.

Hotel America Barcelona serves a daily buffet breakfast including fresh pastries and fruit and offers a relaxed café-bar in the lobby. A range of drinks and cocktails can be enjoyed on the seasonal terrace, overlooking the city.

Guests are welcome to enjoy free 24-hour access to the modern gym equipped with sauna as well as a free welcome drink including cava, sparkling water or natural juice.

Plaça Catalunya and the Gothic Quarter are just a 15-minute walk from the America Barcelona. Diagonal Metro station is only 400 metres away.

name: NH Barcelona Diagonal Center
description:
This design hotel is situated 15 minutes’ from the beach, in the 22@ business area of Barcelona’s Poble Nou district. Bogatell Metro Station, 350 metres away, connects with central Barcelona in 25 minutes.

The modern rooms at NH Barcelona Diagonal Center feature a flat-screen satellite TV, desk, minibar and safe. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast.

You will find cafés and restaurants on Poblenou Rambla, 10 minutes’ walk away. Glòries Shopping Centre is also within a 10-minute walk.

This NH hotel features a 24-hour reception desk and a business centre. Rooms and facilities are adapted for disabled guests. There is free Wi-Fi throughout.

Barcelona Airport is about 18 km away, while CCIB Convention Centre is 3km away. Car rental is available at the hotel and private parking is available at an additional cost.

name: Lodging Apartments City Center-Eixample
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Set in a same building in the Eixample District, Lodging Apartments Eixample offers air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi. Sagrada Familia Cathedral is a 4-minute walking away.

Each apartment features a living room with a flat-screen cable TV; and a fully equipped kitchen or kitchenette. There is a washing machine, and cleaning products are also provided.

There are plenty of bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of the apartments; and you can find fresh produces at a market located 600 metres away.

Lodging Apartments Eixample is well connected by public transport; the closest metro stations are Tetuan and Verdaguer, both 500 metres from apartments. Barcelona North Bus Station is within 10 minutes’ walk of Lodging Apartments Eixample.

The pictures at the top of this page are a selection of the different apartments located in a same building. Please select a date and click on the apartments to see the pictures of the individual apartments.

name: Hotel Rialto
description:
Situated just off famous La Rambla Boulevard in central Barcelona, Hotel Rialto occupies a historic building where the artist Joan Miró was born. It offers air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TV.

Each room at the Rialto Hotel Barcelona has wooden floors and a simple, functional design. The modern bathrooms include basic toiletries. Safes are available to rent.

Guests can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast and delicious Mediterranean meals at the Rialto’s Miró restaurant. There are also many restaurants and lively bars in the surrounding streets. 

Hotel Rialto’s 24-hour reception offers information about the city. The Boquería Market and Barcelona Cathedral are both within 400 metres. Liceu Metro Station is only 300 metres away, and Plaza Catalunya is a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Hostel New York
description:
Hostel New York is a youth hostel located in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, 5 minutes’ walk from Las Ramblas. It offers 24-hour reception and free WiFi, 500 metres from Jaume and Drassanes Metro Stations.

The hostel’s simple dormitory rooms feature modest décor, bunk beds and individual lockers. They include access to a shared bathroom; and free bed linen are provided.

There is a kitchen available for guests in the evenings and a TV lounge with vending machines selling drinks and snacks. There are also 2 computers.

New York is ideally located for visiting many of Barcelona’s sights by foot. Ciutadella Park is a 10-minute walk away and Barceloneta Beach is 15 minutes's walk away.

The ferry port bus is a 10-minute walk from the hostel and you can catch a bus to the airport from Plaza Catalunya Square, 20 minutes’ walk away.

name: TWO Hotel Barcelona by Axel 4* Sup- Adults Only
description:
Offering a rooftop pool with a large sun terrace, TWO Hotel Barcelona by Axel is located in the heart of the gay district of Barcelona, 2 km from Barceloneta Beach.

The hetero-friendly hotel offers on-site private parking. There is also a  24-hour reception and guests can get information on the gay scene and the city at the on-site tour desk. On the rooftop guests will also find the Sky bar, gym, steam bath and a massage room.

Each room here will provide you with air conditioning and a minibar. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer. A safety deposit box and a universal phone charger are also provided.

Guests can sample a drink at the rooftop bar, whilst taking in stunning city views or enjoy the delicious cocktails served in the Lounge Bar. A buffet breakfast is available and free high-speed WiFi access is provided throughout.

Staff can give information about the surrounding area, which is known as "Gayxample" because of its lively gay nightlife.

The hotel is 2 minutes' walk from Rocafort Metro Station and Plaça d'Espanya, with direct buses to Barcelona Airport, is a 10-minute walk away. Paral·lel, with bars, restaurants, clubs and theatres is 1.3 km from TWO Hotel Barcelona by Axel.

name: NH Barcelona Les Corts
description:
Located 5 minutes’ walk from Les Corts Metro Station, this hotel offers modern accommodation in Barcelona. It has good access to the city's main attractions, such as the Nou Camp Football Stadium.

The air-conditioned rooms at the NH Barcelona Les Corts feature contemporary décor, free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a private balcony or terrace. The private bathroom has a hairdryer and toiletries.

The hotel operates a tour desk and a 24-hour reception. Helpful staff can organise bicycle and car rental, as well as provide information on Barcelona.

NH Les Corts is less than 10 minutes’ walk from Sants Train Station, providing access to Barcelona Airport. L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre is just 300 metres away. Barcelona Airport is 15 km from the property.

name: Hotel Ronda Lesseps
description:
The Hotel Ronda Lesseps is a quiet and familiar establishment, with two beautiful interior terraces full of plants that allow our guests to relax during their stay in our city.

The Hotel is located in the metropolitan heart of Barcelona, with very good communication by public transport, very close to the historic district of Gràcia and just at a ten minutes’ walk from Antoni Gaudí's Park Güell.

License number: HB-004338

name: Vincci Bit
description:
Vincci Bit is located just 10 minutes walk from Mar Bella beach. Situated a 7-minute walk from El Maresme Forum Metro Station, it features a sauna, a gym and a rooftop swimming pool with city views.

The restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and à la carte meals, including gluten-free products. There is also a lounge, bar and room service available.

The air-conditioned rooms at Vincci Bit are bright and comfortable and feature a flat-screen TV, a pillow menu and a minibar. The private bathrooms include a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Free Wi-Fi is also available.

There are a number of bars, restaurants and shops within a few minutes walk from the hotel. Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre is just 300 metres away.

The International Convention Centre (CCIB) is a 9-minute walk from Vincci Bit. The historic centre of Barcelona can be reached in just 15-minutes by metro or tram.

name: Hotel Cantón
description:
Hotel Cantón is situated in central Barcelona, less than 300 metres from Las Ramblas and the city’s Old Port. It offers 24-hour reception and rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access throughout.

The Cantón has brightly decorated rooms with private bathrooms. Each has a fridge, air conditioning and heating.

The Cantón serves a daily breakfast and has a vending machine selling hot drinks. Guests can make use of the hotel’s TV room, where there is also computer.

The Cantón has easy access to many of Barcelona’s tourist attractions and has a tour desk. Plaza Reial is less than 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel and there are several bars and restaurants within walking distance.

Drassanes Metro Station is under 500 metres from the Cantón and Sants Train Station is 5 stops away.

name: Acta CITY47
description:
Acta CITY47 is 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Sants Train Station and 15 minutes from the Fira Exhibition Centre. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi.

The rooms at Acta CITY47 feature simple, modern décor and a private bathroom. Each one comes with a TV, free safe, and a work desk. Guests have free access to an ironing room open 24 hours.

The hotel’s modern Nass City restaurant serves international food and a gluten-free breakfast is available on prior request. There is also a bar where you can get a snack or a drink.

The Acta CITY47 is 20 minutes’ walk from Barcelona FC’s Camp Nou Stadium. Sants Metro Station connects you with the centre of Barcelona in 15 minutes.

name: Suites Avenue
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 53m²
description:
Set in a striking, contemporary building on Passeig de Gràcia and facing Gaudí’s La Pedrera, Suites Avenue offers stylish accommodation. It features an outdoor swimming pool, a gym and sauna.

Each of the Avenue’s apartments has simple, chic décor with parquet floors and leather sofas. All apartments have a large kitchen with an oven, fridge and dishwasher. Free Wi-Fi is available.

The property has a concierge service, which guests can use to arrange excursions, beauty treatments and babysitting.

The apartments are a 5-minute walk from a selection of upmarket shops and close to a range of cafés and restaurants.

Casa Batlló is 5 minutes’ walk from the apartments, while Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are just over 1 km away. Diagonal Metro Station is a 2-minute walk from the Suites.

name: Laramond Barcelona Rooms
description:
Located in Barcelona, 3.7 km from Sagrada Familia, Laramond Barcelona Rooms provides air-conditioned rooms. Located around 4.2 km from Park Güell, the guest house with free WiFi is also 5 km away from La Pedrera. The guest house features family rooms.

At the guest house, rooms are fitted with a wardrobe. At Laramond Barcelona Rooms every room has a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Passeig de Gracia is 5 km from the accommodation, while Casa Batllo is 6 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 20 km from Laramond Barcelona Rooms.

name: ibis Styles Barcelona City Bogatell
description:
Located in Barcelona, 900 metres from Port Olympic, ibis Styles Barcelona City Bogatell features private parking and free WiFi access. The hotel has an outdoor pool and children's playground, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar.

A TV is available.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

You can play table tennis at the hotel. The hotel also offers bike hire. Picasso Museum is 1.5 km from ibis Styles Barcelona City Bogatell, while La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 1.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from ibis Styles Barcelona City Bogatell.

name: HG City Suites Barcelona
description:
HG City Suites Barcelona is situated on the edge of Barcelona’s popular Gràcia district, 300 metres from Fontana Metro Station. Its spacious, modern rooms feature climate control, minibar and flat-screen satellite TV.

All accommodation at HG City Suites Barcelona includes a safe and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi in all rooms and public areas.

Gràcia FGC Train Station is just 200 metres from the HG City Suites Barcelona and the number 24 bus also stops nearby. Both connect guests to Plaza de Catalunya in less than 20 minutes. Passeig de Gràcia is within a 15-minute walk of the HG City Suites Barcelona.

Public parking is available near the hotel, with special discounts available for guests.

name: Catalonia Sagrada Familia
description:
A 15-minute walk from Gaudí's Sagrada Família, Catalonia Sagrada Familia is just 300 metres from Clot Metro and Train Station. It features a restaurant, a seasonal outdoor pool and a gym.

The Catalonia Sagrada Familia features traditional, bright décor and its rooms are have a desk, a mini fridge with complimentary water and a safety deposit box. Free Wi-Fi access is available.
All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.

The restaurant serves a range of Catalan and Mediterranean cuisine, as well as a buffet breakfast. The café-bar offers a selection of drinks and snacks throughout the day and there is also a bar.

Car hire is available on site, and staff at the Catalonia Sagrada Familia’s 24-hour reception can provide information on Barcelona and its many attractions. The hotel is 200 metres from the Torre Agbar Tower.

Clot Metro Station connects guests to the city centre in 4 stops and the airport train also stops here.

name: Hotel del Mar
description:
Hotel del Mar is set in a listed building just 800 metres from the seafront and Barceloneta Metro Station. It is a 5-minute walk from the trendy Born neighbourhood and Ciutadella Park.

The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel del Mar have flat-screen satellite TV. There is a private bathroom with a hairdryer and amenities, and some rooms have a private balcony. A safe is also available with a surcharge.

Hotel del Mar has a 24-hour front desk. Barcelona’s França Train Station is a 5-minute walk away, and you can walk to Barcelona Cathedral and Maremagnum Shopping Centre in 10 minutes. Parking is available 5 minutes' walk from the property.

name: Hotel Barcelona Center
description:
Barcelona Center is 400 metres from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia Avenue, and a 15-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya. Guests have free access to the small gym and rooftop hydromassage tub.

The modern rooms at the Barcelona Center Hotel have satellite TV and free WiFi. There is a minibar and safe, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

The Center Hotel has a traditional Spanish restaurant. There is also a bar and a terrace.

There is a 24-hour front desk. Parking is available nearby for an additional charge.

name: Hesperia Barcelona Presidente
description:
Set on Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue, the Hesperia Barcelona Presidente offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs. There is a gym and a terrace offering city views.

This hotel has views of the city.

The Hesperia Barcelona Presidente is close to a shopping area, and the main sightseeing bus stops just 50 metres from the hotel. The popular Illa shopping centre is 15 minutes’ walk away.

Diagonal Metro Station is 10 minutes’ walk away, and offers a direct link to Plaza Catalunya. Gaudi’s La Pedrera and fashionable Passeig de Gracia can be reached in about 15 minutes on foot.

name: Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Gran Via
description:
This spacious and modern hotel is located in Eixample district, built in 2004, the Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Gran Via, features wide-open public spaces covered in marble.

Rooms include flat-screen TV, Wifi, safebox, desk, minibar, private bathrooms with toiletries.

A good location for tourism, you can easily walk to the Gothic Quarter and Ramblas, or up to the attractions of Montjuic. The city’s major business districts are also nearby.

Rooms include satellite TV, free Wi-Fi access, air conditioning and a bathroom with free toiletries.

Parking is available on site at an additional cost.

name: Four Points by Sheraton Barcelona Diagonal
description:
Four Points by Sheraton Barcelona Diagonal is situated 350 metres from Glòries Shopping Centre, in the modern 22@ district of Barcelona. It offers an elegant restaurant and soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi and TV.

Rooms at the Four Points Barcelona Diagonal are bright and spacious, with wooden flooring. Each room has a stylish bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. Rooms on higher floors offer great views, some of the Sagrada Familia.

La Avenida Restaurant serves traditional Spanish cuisine. A varied buffet breakfast is offered daily, and free coffee is available from 05:00 until 07:00. Taste local crafted beers, snacks and enjoy the best sports projections at 4Taps Bar.

The Four Points Diagonal is 600 metres from the colourful Agbar Tower, designed by Jean Nouvel. There are many bars and restaurants on nearby Rambla del Poblenou, and Bogatell Beach is within a 15-minute walk. Poblenou Metro Station is only 500 metres away.

name: Apartaments Independencia
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Suites Independencia offers stylish apartments set just 10 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia and 150 metres from Encants Metro Station. It features apartments with cable TV.

The Indepencia’s bright, air-conditioned accommodation has simple, modern décor. Each apartment has a spacious seating area and a well-equipped kitchenette with an oven. Some apartments have a balcony.

The area surrounding the apartments has a varied selection of shops, cafés and restaurants. Sagrada Familia Market is a 10-minute walk away.

Barcelona’s old town and Las Ramblas are just 4 Metro stops from Encants. The beaches at Poblenou are less than 2 km from the Suites Independencia.

name: Hostal Boqueria
description:
Situated on Barcelona’s Las Ramblas, this guest house is less than 200 metres from Liceu Metro Station. It offers simple, comfortable rooms and has free Wi-Fi access available throughout.

The Hostal Boquería’s functional rooms feature air conditioning and cable TV, as well as heating and a safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Rooms with views of the Ramblas are subject to availability.

The Boquería has a 24-hour reception. Guests can also make use of its luggage storage.

The central location makes visiting Barcelona’s sights easy. The Boquería Market is just across the Ramblas. Barcelona Cathedral and the surrounding Gothic Quarter are within 5 minutes’ walk of Hostal Boqueria.

name: Alos Apartments Paseo de Gracia-Diagonal
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
Alos Apartments Paseo de Gracia-Diagonal is located in Barcelona’s Gràcia district, just 350 metres from Diagonal Avenue. It offers modern, air-conditioned studios and apartments with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi.

All guests are given a bottle of Cava as a welcome gift.

The accommodation at Alos Apartments Paseo de gracia-Diagonal features parquet floors and light wood décor. Each one has a kitchen or kitchenette with a microwave and toaster, and many apartments have a balcony, terrace or spa bath.

There are many bars, restaurants and charming cafes in the Bohemian Gràcia district. Gaudí’s La Pedrera is a 10-minute walk away, and you can walk to Casa Batlló in 15 minutes.

The apartments are just 5 minutes’ walk from Diagonal Metro Station, and FCG Gràcia Train Station is also 5 minutes away. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, located just 2 stops from Diagonal.

name: Leevin Student Barcelona
description:
Leevin Student Barcelona in Barcelona provides adults-only accommodation with a garden, a shared lounge and a terrace. The property is around 2.8 km from Camp Nou, 3.1 km from Sants Railway Station and 3.3 km from La Pedrera. The accommodation features a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property.

At the hostel, rooms are equipped with a desk. At Leevin Student Barcelona the rooms have air conditioning and a private bathroom.

Casa Batllo is 3.6 km from the accommodation, while Passeig de Gracia is 4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Leevin Student Barcelona.

name: Fisa Rentals Gran Via Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Fisa Rentals Gran Via Apartments are stylish apartments set 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas. They have free Wi-Fi access and a flat-screen TV.

Each spacious Fisa Rentals apartment offers contemporary décor and chic wooden floors. All apartments are air conditioned, but there is one bedroom that doesn't have air conditioning. All the apartments have a spacious seating area with satellite TV. The well-equipped kitchens also have a washing machine.

The apartments have easy access to the centre of Barcelona and are within 10 minutes’ walk of a selection of shops, bars and restaurants.

Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard is 300 metres away and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera can be reached in 15 minutes, by foot. Passeig de Gràcia and Urquinaona Metro Stations are around 200 metres away.

name: Leonardo Boutique Hotel Barcelona Sagrada Familia
description:
Leonardo Boutique Hotel Barcelona Sagrada Familia is located just 15 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s famous Sagrada Familia. It has a rooftop sun terrace with panoramic views of Barcelona and rooms with free Wi-Fi.

All modern, outward-facing rooms at theLeonardo Boutique Hotel Barcelona Sagrada Familia are equipped with air conditioning and heating. They have a flat-screen TV and the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

Leonardo Boutique Hotel Barcelona Sagrada Familia serves a daily buffet breakfast, and gluten-free meals are available on prior request. In summer, breakfast can be enjoyed on the terrace. There are also vending machines with snacks and drinks.

Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. Clot Metro Station is 200 metres away, allowing you to reach the city centre in 10 minutes.

name: Hostal Barcelona Travel
description:
Barcelona Travel is located in a Modernist building from the XIX century in the centre of Barcelona, a little over 5 minutes' walk from Gran Vía Avenue and Plaça Universitat Square. Free WiFi access is available.

Each modern, air-conditioned room features parquet floors and a 40-inch flat-screen TV. Featuring a bath or shower, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Bed linen and towels are provided.

Tourist information can be provided at the reception, and bikes and car rental are also available. Transportation to Barcelona El Prat Airport, located 20 minutes away by car, can be arranged.

The guest house is 850 metres from Passeig de Gracia Station, and Plaça Catalunya is 10 minutes away on foot.

name: NH Barcelona Stadium
description:
Overlooking Camp Nou Stadium and Diagonal Avenue, the modern NH Barcelona Stadium offers free WiFi, a gym and seasonal rooftop pool. The air-conditioned rooms have flat-screen satellite TV, minibar and a pillow menu.

NH Barcelona Stadium Hotel’s seasonal sun terrace offers wonderful views across Barcelona to Montjuic. It also has sun loungers.

The hotel’s restaurant, Acanto, offers a varied buffet breakfast, as well as an á la carte lunch menu. The lobby café is open until midnight every day. The restaurant is closed during summer months.

Les Corts Metro Station is just 5 minutes’ walk away and offers a direct link to Barcelona’s historic centre. Diagonal Avenue can be reached in 10 minutes on foot, and Sants Station is 1.5 km away.

Barcelona's Fira Congress Centre is a 10-minute drive from the hotel. Barcelona El Prat Airport can also be reached in 10 minutes by car.

name: Zenit Barcelona
description:
Zenit Barcelona is 250 metres from Plaza Francesc Macià on Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue. This modern hotel offers stylish air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms, with free Wi-Fi and a pillow menu.

The Zenit is a 15-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, where Gaudí’s famous La Pedrera and Casa Batlló can be found. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are a further 15 minutes’ walk away.

Rooms at the Zenit Barcelona feature satellite TV and a safe and minibar. There is a work desk and a kettle with free tea and coffee set; the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

Zenit Hotel’s restaurant offers gourmet Spanish and international cuisine. A special gluten-free breakfast and children's menus are available, and packed lunches and room service can be requested.

There is a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. A laundry, dry cleaning and ironing service is offered. Parking is available 10 minutes' walk away, for an extra cost.

name: Apartamentos Calvet
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 30m²
description:
Less than 15 minutes on foot from Hospital Clinic Metro Station and a 20-minute metro ride to Barcelona city centre, Apartamentos Calvet features free WiFi, air conditioning, and heating. The building has a new lift, installed in February 2015.

All apartments have a seating area with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a sofa, and a dining table. The kitchen is equipped with a washing machine, hob, and microwave.

The apartments have a private bathroom with a bath tub or a shower, and towels and bed linen are provided. Some apartments include a furnished terrace with city views.

Sants Estación Train Station, where you can catch a train to El Prat Airport, is 2 km from the property.

name: Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpica Suites
description:
This minimalist hotel is situated in the Poble Nou district of Barcelona, 15 minutes’ by foot from Bogatell Beach. It offers a seasonal outdoor pool surrounded by wooden decking and loungers.

The suites at Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpica Suites feature monochrome decoration and a flat-screen TV. They also include air conditioning and a modern bathroom.

The Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpica Suites complex offers a stylish café-bar and restaurant. Guests can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine from the á la carte and daily menus. In summer meals can be enjoyed on the terrace by the pool.

Guests have access to the hotel's large spa for an additional cost. It includes an indoor treatment pool, Finnish sauna, Turkish baths, jacuzzis, hot tubs, several types of shower and an ice fountain. There is also a gym.

Barcelona Port is 15 minutes' walk away and Bogatell Metro Station is 100 metres from the hotel. Guests can walk to the lively Villa Olimpica area in 5 minutes.

All rooms include 1 complimentary access per person per stay to the hotel spa (subject to availability and upon reservation).

name: Aparthotel Napols - Abapart
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Aparthotel Napols is centrally located, 350 metres from Barcelona’s Arc de Triomf Metro Station. Air-conditioned rooms feature a well-equipped kitchen, and a living room with sofa and TV.

Estació de Nord Bus Station is 5 minutes’ walk away, and has direct connections to Girona Airport. You can walk to Plaza Catalunya and the Rambla in 15 minutes. There is free WiFi in the apartments.

Soundproofed rooms at the Napols have a safe and minibar. The private bathroom comes with amenities.

The modern kitchen has a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. There is a dishwasher and dining area.

The complex has a 24-hour reception and a shared terrace. You can hire a car, and Napols offers a laundry service and luggage storage.

name: BarcelonaForRent The Central Place
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Offering views of Casa Batlló, BarcelonaForRent The Central Places is located centrally, in between Paseo de Gracia and La Rambla. A balcony and free WiFi are available at the air-conditioned apartments.

Living rooms feature simple décor and a bright interior, as well as a flat-screen TV with Netflix, sofa bed and iPod dock. Complete with a dishwasher, kitchens come with an oven and a coffee machine.

BarcelonaForRent The Central Places offers modern bedrooms with parquet floors and single beds. Each private bathroom has a shower, and towels and linen are provided.

The apartments are surrounded by shops and restaurants. Passeig de Gràcia Metro Station is 250 metres away and offers transport to Sagrada Familia and La Barceloneta Beach in under 20 minutes. Barcelona-El Prat Airport is a 15-minute drive.

name: Casa Gracia
description:
Casa Gràcia is a modern hostel at the top of Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia, 300 metres from Gaudí’s La Pedrera. It offers air-conditioned rooms and free Wi-Fi in all areas.

Shared and private rooms are available, as well as apartments. Facilities at Casa Gràcia include a communal terrace, lounge, kitchen, dining area and a 24-hour front desk.

The hostel arranges daily walking tours of the city.

Casa Gràcia is situated just metres from Avinguda Diagonal and within 300 metres of Diagonal Metro Station, which offers access to the Sagrada Familia.

Passeig de Gràcia is full of exclusive shops, restaurants and bars. Gaudí’s Casa Batlló is within a 10-minute walk,  as well as the popular Gràcia neighbourhood. There are a number of beautiful Modernist buildings in the area.

name: Lugaris Beach Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 48m²
description:
Lugaris Beach Apartments is situated less than 200 metres from Bogatell Beach in the quiet neighbourhood of Poble Nou.

The Lugaris Beach Apartments apartments feature contemporary design, floor-to-ceiling windows and free high-speed internet access. The private kitchen is equipped with an oven, Nespresso machine, and fridge. Each apartment also has a living room, flat-screen TV with international channels and washer-dryer. A welcome pack with basics such as coffee, tea, milk, sugar, salt and oil is included.

Facilities at the Lugaris Beach Apartments include a tour desk, babysitting and shuttle service, which is available upon request and for an additional cost. Bed linen and towels are provided and guests can make use of car and bike rental.

Parking is available at an extra charge and beach towels can also be rented.

The apartments are a 5-minute walk from Poblenou Metro Station and 2 minutes’ walk from Poblenou Park. The area offers plenty of bars, restaurants, and a shopping centre. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas in central Barcelona can be reached in around 20 minutes by metro.

name: Golden Hotel Barcelona
description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Sagrada Familia, Golden Hotel Barcelona is a sustainable property with the Biosphere certificate. It provides a rooftop terrace with outdoor swimming pool, jacuzzi and bar. 1.5 km from Port Olympic, the property is also 1.7 km from Sagarda Familia and 1.9 km away from Picasso Museum. There is a gym, a restaurant and a shared lounge.

 All guests staying at the Golden Hotel Barcelona get 1 free entry for person and stay to the spa at Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpic@ Suites complex (subject to availability and with prior reservation), located 450 meters away.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the property.

Speaking Spanish, Catalan, German and English at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock.

Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

name: AC Hotel Irla by Marriott
description:
The AC Hotel Irla is located 200 metres from Diagonal and Francesc Macià Square. The hotel has stylish and comfortable rooms, a fitness centre and 24-hour reception.

Rooms at this hotel are spacious and feature contemporary décor. All rooms have air conditioning, minibar and private bathroom.

Facilities at the Irla include Turkish baths, café-bar and free Wi-Fi access in public areas.

Guests can enjoy breakfast in the Irla’s restaurant. There are also bars, cafes and restaurants in the area surrounding Francesc Macià.

Attractions such as Casa Batlló, Casa Mila and Plaça de Catalunya are within 30 minutes’ walk of the AC Hotel Irla. The hotel is close to bus and tram connections and is a 20-minute walk from the Metro station, Diagonal.

name: Sercotel Caspe
description:
This design hotel is a 5-minute walk from Barcelona’s Arc de Triomf Metro Station and Estació del Nord Bus Station.  It has a gym, and offers free Wi-Fi and free bottled water.

Rooms at the Sercotel Caspe are air-conditioned and soundproofed. They feature satellite TV, a minibar and safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

The Sercotel Caspe has an outdoor terrace, an attractive restaurant and a café-bar. Room service is also available.

The hotel is a short walk from Gaudí's buildings on Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. Plaza Catalunya is approximately 20 minutes' walk away.

There is a tour desk and 24-hour reception. Car hire is available and there is on-site parking for an extra charge.

name: The Conica Deluxe Bed&Breakfast
description:
Set in the Eixample district in Barcelona, 500 metres from La Pedrera, The Conica Deluxe Bed&Breakfast features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi throughout the property.

Flat-screen satellite TV, as well as an iPod docking station are offered. Some rooms have a seating area where you can relax, while others include views of the garden or city. All rooms come with a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

You will find concierge service at the property.

Plaça Catalunya is 1.4 km from The Conica Deluxe Bed&Breakfast, while Sagrada Familia is 1.7 km away. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 13 km from the property.

name: Upper Diagonal
description:
Situated in Barcelona’s Pedralbes neighbourhood, Upper Diagonal offers modern accommodation with free WiFi and a gym just 1 km from the Camp Nou football stadium.

All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. All rooms have ironing facilities.

The hotel has an on-site restaurant serving seasonal food, and you can find more restaurants and shops on Diagonal Avenue, just 600 metres away, and in the L’Illa Diagonal shopping centre.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property and the hotel also offers car hire.

La Pedrera is 3.3 km from Upper Diagonal, while Tibidabo is 3.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Upper Diagonal.

name: Hilton Barcelona
description:
Featuring an impressive lobby, the stylish Hilton Barcelona offers free WiFi, access to its 24-hour gym and rooms with city views and plasma TV. The hotel is a 15-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium.

Each stylish, soundproofed room at the Barcelona Hilton features air conditioning, iPod docking stations and tea and coffee-making facilities.

Hotel Hilton Barcelona is just 100 metres from L’Illa Shopping Centre and 300 metres from María Cristina Metro Station. Plaça Catalunya and the historic city centre are 15 minutes away by Metro. You can drive to Sants Station in 5 minutes, and El Prat Airport is a 15-minute drive away.

Hilton Barcelona’s Mosaic restaurant offers Catalan and Mediterranean cuisine prepared using seasonal, local products. The Vibe Bar & Restaurant serves tapas and cocktails. Guests can enjoy live sport on the bar’s large TV.

name: Apartments Sata Park Guell Area
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
These spacious, contemporary-style apartments are set in a peaceful area of Barcelona, 2 minutes' walk from Lesseps Metro Station, and 4 stops from Plaza Catalunya.

The Apartaments Sata Park Guell Area are named after the nearby weird and wonderful park, designed by the world-famous Modernist architect Antoni Gaudí. From here, an excellent Metro service runs to the vibrant city centre in just 10 minutes.

Each apartment comes with a sunny, open lounge-diner and kitchen unit, allowing you to prepare meals as and when you choose. Also included are one or 2 bedrooms, and the whole space is decorated with fresh, minimalist style.

The pictures at the top of this page are a selection of the different types of apartments in the building. Please select a date and click on the apartments to see the pictures of the individual apartments.

name: Eric Vökel Boutique Apartments - Gran Vía Suites
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
Eric Vökel Gran Via Suites are boutique apartments set in central Barcelona, 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza de Espanya Square. These chic apartments offer free WiFi access.

Each air-conditioned apartment at Eric Vökel has attractive, contemporary décor. All accommodation has a well-equipped kitchenette and a spacious living area with a flat-screen TV.

There are several bars and cafés within 100 metres of the Suites. Set on Gran Via Avenue, the apartments have easy access to a range of supermarkets and shops.

The Vökel is just 20 minutes’ walk from Montjuïc Mountain and Catalunya’s National Art Museum. The famous Las Ramblas and the surrounding Gothic Quarter can be reached in 10 minutes, by Metro.

name: Barcelonaforrent Urban Town Suites
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 74m²
description:
Set in Barcelona's Gracia District, Barcelonaforrent Urban Town Suites offers air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Lesseps Metro Station is a 10-minute walk from the apartment.

The bright apartments feature modern décor and includes a seating area with a sofa bed, DVD player and iPod dock. The kitchen is equipped with an oven, dishwasher and microwave. A washing machine is also available.

There is a double room, a twin room and a bathroom with a shower. Bed linen and towels are provided.

The apartment offers bicycle and car rental and there is shuttle service to the airport for a surcharge.

Guests will find a variety of restaurants and bars within 5 minutes' walk from the apartment. Paseo de Gracia, with high-end shops and Gaudi's La Pedrera, is 15 minutes away by metro. Sagrada Familia Cathedral is 3.5 km away.

name: Silken Sant Gervasi
description:
Located in the quiet San Gervasi district of Barcelona, this elegant hotel offers modern rooms with free internet connection. The Silken is just 8 minutes by train from Plaza Catalunya.

The restaurant at Silken San Gervasi offers traditional cuisine with modern influences. A breakfast buffet is served in the cafeteria, and drinks and snacks are also available throughout the day.

Functional rooms include a free safe and central heating and air conditioning. The marble bathroom is complete with a hairdryer.

Silken St. Gervasi is a 15-minute walk from Park Guell, with impressive structures, mosaics and architecture by Antoni Gaudí. El Putxet Station can be found 50 metres from the hotel with direct access to the city centre.

name: Motel One Barcelona-Ciutadella
description:
Set in Barcelona’s Born District, right beside Ciutadella Park, Motel One Barcelona-Ciutadella offers modern, air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and an interactive TV.

Motel One Barcelona-Ciutadella features a 24-hour lounge bar and a continental breakfast is available each morning at the property. The hotel also has a rooftop terrace with views of Ciutadella Park, the sea and the Barcelona skyline.

Plaça Catalunya and the Ramblas can be reached in a 20-minute walk, as can Barcelona’s Olympic Port. The Sagrada Familia is 30 minutes’ walk away.

Arc de Triomf metro and train station is just 400 metres away. Motel One is only 20 minutes from the International Convention Center – CCIB FORUM and 30 minutes from the Fira Barcelona Exhibition Centre in public transport.

name: Hotel BESTPRICE Gracia
description:
Located in Barcelona’s Gracia District, Hotel BESTPRICE Gracia is located 450 metres from Joanic Metro Station. It offers modern, air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi.

All rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property where staff can help with tourist information and luggage storage.

You will find many restaurants, bars and shops in the surrounding area. You can also reach Parc Güell in a 20-minute walk from the property. Central Barcelona is a 20-minute metro ride away.

name: Hotel SB Diagonal Zero 4 Sup
description:
Hotel SB Diagonal Zero Barcelona is opposite Barcelona’s International Convention Centre and Barcelona's Forum Auditorium. It has a spa, a gym, a seasonal panoramic pool and a solarium on the hotel rooftop.

There is free access to the hotel gym. The spa is only for guests over 14, and includes a Turkish bath and Finnish sauna. Beauty and massage treatments are available at a surcharge.

All air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel SB Diagonal Zero Barcelona have flat-screen satellite TV, free WiFi and a laptop safe. The soundproofed rooms have facilities to connect iPods.

All rooms have ironing facilities, tea and coffee making facilities, and a kettle. There is a touch-screen control for lights and temperature. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer, and bathrobes and slippers can be provided upon request.

name: Gran Hotel La Florida G.L Monumento
description:
Set on Tibidabo Hill, the 5-star Gran Hotel La Florida G.L Monumento offers views over Barcelona and the Mediterranean Sea. Guests enjoy free access to the Spa.

Rooms at La Florida feature free Wi-Fi access and 37-inch interactive plasma TVs. The bathrooms come with l’Occitane amenities, a bathtub and shower. Some also have a private balcony.

Guests can admire the views from the La Florida’s panoramic terraces and gardens. The Spa by L'Occitane includes a stainless steel swimming pool, both indoor and outdoor. A hot tub, sauna, pressure showers and a range of fitness equipment are also available.

The hotel’s restaurant serves gourmet Catalan, Spanish and Mediterranean dishes. There are also 2 bars.

name: Habitat Apartments Blanca
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 57m²
description:
Habitat Apartments Blanca offers bright, modern apartments situated a 10-minute walk from Parc de la Torrassa in Barcelona. The property features free WiFi and views of the city.

Each apartment here is air-conditioned and includes a full kitchen with an oven, kettle, microwave and dishwasher. They also boast a spacious seating area with a sofa and flat-screen TV.

Restaurants and bars are available within a 5-minute walk of the property. The popular Sants Estacio stadium is just 2 km away.

Bareclona’s “Ciutat Vella” historic centre can be reached in 15 minutes by car, while El Prat-Barcelona Airport is 10 km from Habitat Apartments Blanca.

name: Generator Barcelona
description:
Generator Barcelona is located 500 metres from the fashionable Passeig de Gracia Avenue. The hostel offers a 24-hour reception, free private lockers in shared dormitories and free Wi-Fi in public areas.

Diagonal and Verdaguer metro stations are within 5 minutes’ walk from Generator Barcelona. The Gràcia district, which has plenty of boutique shops and bars, is only 200 metres away.

Both private rooms and dormitories have air conditioning and heating, as well as individual power sockets and reading lamps for each bed. Female-only dormitories include hairdryers and other amenities.

They also feature an en suite bathroom, a sink and a mirror. Bed linen is included, while towels can be rented at the reception. Dormitories are available for guests over 18 years old.

Guests can have a daily breakfast for an extra cost. Generator Barcelona also has a communal lounge and a luggage storage service.

name: Barnapartments Raval
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
Barnapartments Raval features accommodation within less than 1 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster. This property is situated a short distance from attractions such as Cathedral of Barcelona, Plaça Reial, and Passeig de Gracia. The apartment has family rooms.

Fitted with a terrace, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A fridge and kitchenware are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. All units have a wardrobe.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Barnapartments Raval.

name: Pensión Villanueva
description:
Centrally located in one of the most charming areas of the historic center of  Barcelona, Pension Villanueva is located 100 metres from la Rambla. It offers comfortable accommodation with city views and free WiFi.

All rooms Pension Villanueva are soundproofed, and guests have access to either a shared bathroom or a private bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony and some have views of the Rambla or of Plaça Reial Square.

Other facilities offered include luggage storage.

Pension Villanueva is 900 metres  from Plaça Catalunya is surrounded by shops, restaurants, and café bars. Camp Nou is 4.5 km away and the beaches of Barceloneta are a 5-minute drive from the property. Barcelona Airport is at a distance of 12 km.

name: Travelodge Barcelona Poblenou
description:
This modern hotel has 250 spacious and fully equipped rooms, a Snack-Bar open 24 hours where clients can enjoy a buffet breakfast, as well as light meals for lunch and dinner. It also has vending machines and private paid parking. All its facilities are perfectly adapted and accessible for people with reduced mobility.
It is a hotel with free and unlimited high-speed Wi-Fi in the common areas. Wi-Fi internet is available in the rooms at an extra cost.
Travelodge Barcelona Poblenou is a pet-friendly hotel that will be happy to offer you and your pet the best experience.
It is located in the traditional Poblenou neighborhood, within streets full of restaurants, bars and shops. One of the most charming neighborhoods in the city, and 600 meters from the Bogatell beach. Barcelona city center can be reached in 10 minutes by metro and Barcelona’s Port Olímpic, with its vibrant night life, is just a 20-minute walk away.
This is considered the most innovative neighborhood in the city. It´s in the heart of the 22@ District and concentrates a multitude of technology and R+D companies. Therefore, thanks to its location and facilities, it is also a perfect accommodation for business trips.
Travelodge Barcelona Poblenou offers all you need to have the best experience in Barcelona city.

name: NH Barcelona Entenza
description:
NH Barcelona Entenza is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Sants Station and high-speed AVE Station. La Fira Exhibition Centre is 1.5 km away. All air-conditioned rooms are spacious, soundproofed and offer free Wi-Fi.

Rooms in the NH Barcelona Entenza Hotel are bright and modern with wooden floors. They feature satellite TV, minibar and a fully equipped bathroom with hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel and breakfast in the room is available. One of Barcelona’s main streets, Diagonal Avenue, is a 10-minute walk from the hotel, with many restaurants and shops.

The NH Barcelona Entenza is in a quiet area but is well-connected to the city centre by Metro. Entença Metro Station is 200 metres away. FC Barcelona's Camp Nou Stadium is 3 stops away by Metro.

name: Suitur apartamento floridablanca barcelona
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 68m²
description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.6 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Suitur apartamento floridablanca barcelona offers air conditioning. The property is close to Casa Batllo, Portal de l'Angel and Cathedral of Barcelona. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 1.5 km away.

The spacious apartment has 1 bedroom, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Magic Fountain of Montjuic and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Suitur apartamento floridablanca barcelona.

name: Stay Barcelona Charming Gracia
description:
Situated within the Gràcia district in Barcelona, Stay Barcelona Charming Gracia has air conditioning, a balcony, and quiet street views. The property is located 2.4 km from Casa Batllo, 1.2 km from Park Güell and 1.9 km from Sagrada Familia. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.7 km from La Pedrera.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment features a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and microwave. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.8 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Stay Barcelona Charming Gracia.

name: Sunotel Central
description:
Featuring a rooftop swimming pool and hot tub with views of Barcelona, Sunotel Central is set in the centre of Barcelona, just 10 minutes' walk from Plaza Catalunya.

Modern rooms at Sunotel Central include free high-speed WiFi, satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and amenities.

Universitat Metro Station is just 200 metres from the hotel. The Ramblas, famous for its street performers, can be reached in 10 minutes by foot.

In the morning guests can enjoy a varied, fresh and healthy full buffet breakfast.

The hotel’s 24-hour reception offers a ticket booking service and luggage storage. There are computers in the lobby which guests can use for free. Meeting rooms are also available.

name: ITC Barcelona By Soho Boutique
description:
ITC Barcelona By Soho Boutique is set in an impressive historic building, next to Barcelona’s Universitat Metro Station. It offers free Wi-Fi and bright, air-conditioned rooms, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and La Rambla.

Rooms feature wooden floors and have a safe and minibar. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer.

ITC Barcelona By Soho Boutique offers a buffet breakfast each morning. A gluten-free breakfast is available upon request. Due to its central location, there are many bars and restaurants within a short walk.

ITC Barcelona By Soho Boutique has a 24-hour front desk, and a public parking is available nearby for an additional charge. The Airport Bus stops opposite in Plaza Universitat.

name: Sunotel Club Central
description:
Featuring an outdoor swimming pool and hot tub on its terrace, Sunotel Club Central is set in Barcelona’s elegant Eixample neighbourhood.

Each modern air-conditioned room has free, high-speed WiFi, a TV and a minibar. The private bathroom includes a bath, shower and hairdryer.

Sunotel Club Central features a cosy bar, serving snacks and drinks. There is also room service available. The hotel has a 24-hour reception, and free bicycles are available upon request and subject to availability.

Passeig de Gracia, with its Gaudi monuments and designer shops, is a 10-minute walk from Sunotel Club Central. The famous Las Ramblas Boulevard and Plaza Catalunya are a 15-minute walk from the hotel. Barcelona Airport is 15 km away, and you can catch an airport bus in Plaza Catalunya.

name: Parque güell
description:
Set in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, Parque güell has a terrace and sea views. The property features garden and city views, and is 2.2 km from La Pedrera. The accommodation provides a shared kitchen and a shared lounge for guests.

With free WiFi, this homestay offers a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and kitchenware. This homestay also features a balcony that doubles up as an outdoor dining area.

Park Güell is 800 metres from the homestay, while Casa Batllo is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Parque güell.

name: Torre Melina, a Gran Meliá Hotel
description:
Set in 25,000 square metres of beautiful gardens and offering fantastic views of Barcelona, Torre Melina, a Gran Meliá Hotel is a luxury hotel set on Diagonal Avenue.

With unique experiences that will make this accommodation a benchmark in the Catalan capital, with access to the Palau de Congressos de Catalunya, the gardens of Torre Melina, and signature restaurants such as Erre Errechu and a cocktail bar by Erik Lorincz.

Spacious, air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with hairdryer and free toiletries.

The Torre Melina, a Gran Meliá Hotel is 15 minutes walk from FC Barcelona Camp Nou stadium. Zona Universitaria Metro Stop is 450 metres away, connecting you with the city centre in under 20 minutes.

name: Vincci Mae
description:
Set beside Barcelona's Francesc Macià Square, Vincci Mae features a terrace with a plunge pool and fantastic views of Diagonal Avenue and Tibidabo Mountain.

Vincci Mae boasts an on-site restaurant and bar, it also has a 24-hour front desk and offers free WiFi throughout the property.  An assorted buffet breakfast is offered everyday.

Stylish rooms feature a simple and bright décor, air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, kettle, and minibar. The fancy private bathroom includes a shower, free toiletries ,and a hairdryer.

Casa Batlló is 1.6 km from Vincci Mae, while La Pedrera is 1.3 km away. You can reach Plaza Catalunya in 20 minutes in public transport.

name: Arcelon Hotel! New Opening! Nueva apertura 2023!
description:
Set in Barcelona, 2.8 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach, Arcelon Hotel! New Opening! Nueva apertura 2023! offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers a concierge service, a tour desk and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.9 km from Mar Bella Beach.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Arcelon Hotel! New Opening! Nueva apertura 2023! all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Staff at the 24-hour front desk speak Catalan, German, English and Spanish.

Llevant is 3 km from the accommodation, while Sagrada Familia is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Arcelon Hotel! New Opening! Nueva apertura 2023!.

name: Hotel Nouvel
description:
Offering air-conditioned rooms, free WiFi and an on-site restaurant, Hotel Nouvel is located on a pedestrianised street just 100 metres from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya Square and the Ramblas.

The hotel features ornate ceilings, cast bronze and crystal lamps, and marble floors, in the style of its 19th-century building.

All rooms come with a flat-screen TV, double-glazed windows and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. A safe is available to rent.

The hotel’s La Lluna Restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine. Vending machines with snacks, ice, and drinks, are also available.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can help you arrange car hire, a laundry service and tickets for shows. You will also find luggage storage and a reading room with two computers.

Portal de Angel shopping street is just 2 minutes’ walk away, while Barcelona Cathedral and the Gothic Quarter are a 10-minute walk from Hotel Nouvel.

name: Capri by Fraser Barcelona
description:
This motorcycle-friendly hotel is 3 Metro stops from Plaza Catalunya and 15 minutes’ walk from the Barcelona’s beaches. There is free WiFi available throughout.

Capri by Fraser Barcelona offers chic air-conditioned and spacious suites and apartments with a flat-screen cable TV and a seating area. There is a fully-equipped kitchenette, a work desk and a safe, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

The property has a free self-service laundry room open 24 hours a day and a gym.

For guests coming by motorcycle, Capri by Fraser offers free indoor parking with direct elevator to the rooms and a “pit stop” service including complete toolkit for small repairs and chain lubricant, free suede, helmet visor cleaner, battery charger and compressor to check the pressure level of tyres.

Capri by Fraser Barcelona offers a buffet breakfast every day and a set menu at lunch time during week days. Room service is also available.

The hotel has a 24-hour front desk.

name: Allegro Barcelona
description:
Allegro Barcelona is a futuristic design hotel, situated 100 metres from Barcelona’s Diagonal Metro Station. Its stylish rooms include free Wi-Fi, digital radio and LCD TV with satellite channels.

Each room at Allegro Barcelona features elegant white décor with colourful touches. Rooms are air-conditioned and come with an electronic safe. Bathrooms include a hairdryer and toiletries.

A continental breakfast buffet is served until 10:30 each day at Allegro Barcelona. Numerous tapas bars and pavement cafés can be found on Rambla de Catalunya, a 5-minute walk away.

Other facilities include portable WiFi for no charge.

The famous Gaudi buildings and designer shops of Passeig de Gracia are just 500 metres from the hotel, while Plaza Catalunya is a 15-minute walk away. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about Barcelona, recommend excursions and arrange airport transfers.

name: Diagonal House Hostel
description:
Set in Barcelona centre, Diagonal House Hostel features free WiFi and air conditioning. This hostel is just 300 metres from Passeig de Gracia and Gaudi's La Pedrera.

Fitted with parquet flooring, the property offers a shared lounge and games room. Guests can make use of the shared kitchen as well.

The shared bathrooms have a shower. Bed linen and towels are provided.

The area offers an array of shops, bars, restaurants and clubs. Diagonal Metro Station is a 3-minute walk from the bed and breakfast. Plaza Catalunya Square is 10 minutes' away by metro.

name: Hotel Nuevo Triunfo
description:
Located beside Barcelona’s Montjuic Hill, Nuevo Triunfo is a 3-minute walk from Parallel Metro Station and 10 minutes from the Rambla. It offers a free Wi-Fi zone and 24-hour reception.

Featuring tiled floors and flat-screen satellite TV, air-conditioned rooms come with a seating area and work desk. The private bathroom is equipped with amenities.

A continental breakfast is available in the Hotel Nuevo Triunfo. There are vending machines for drinks.

Luggage storage is offered and you can hire a car from the tour desk.

Maremagnum Shopping Centre and the Marina are 15 minutes’ walk away. Barceloneta Beach is 10 minutes away by bus.

name: Sant Antoni Market
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
The stylish apartments at San Antoni Market are less than 5 minutes’ walk from Sant Antoni Metro station in central Barcelona. They offer smart accommodation with free Wi-Fi, just 200 metres from the market.

The spacious apartments at Sant Antoni Market combine modern décor with original features such as beamed ceilings or French doors. The living room has a sofa and a flat-screen TV, while the kitchen comes with a microwave, fridge, oven, a toaster and a coffee maker.

There is a range of shops, bakeries, bars and cafés in the streets surrounding the apartments. The famous Las Ramblas and Plaza de Catalunya are within 20 minutes’ walk.

The MACBA Museum is less than 1 km from the apartments. Sant Antoni Metro Station is just 5 stops from the Sagrada Família. The airport bus stops on Comte d’Urgell and at Plaza Universitat, both within 15 minutes’ walk.

name: Fewdays Barcelona Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Located at different locations near Plaza Catalunya, Fewdays Barcelona Apartments offers stylish, air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi. They feature a fully equipped kitchen.

The bright apartments feature a modern, minimalistic décor and parquet floors. Each one has a lounge area with a TV and CD player, and a kitchen equipped with an oven, microwave and coffee machine. The bathrooms include a washer-dryer.

Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia is around 5 minutes’ walk away and offers a range of designer shops, as well as Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera houses. Central Barcelona offers a wide selection of restaurants and bars.

Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, which is also connected via many metro and bus lines to the rest of the city. Parking is available nearby for an extra cost.

name: Jardinets De Gràcia by The 5ve Soul
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
Surrounded by views of the quiet street, Jardinets De Gràcia by The 5ve Soul is a sustainable apartment in Barcelona, offering guests an environmentally friendly accommodation close to La Pedrera. It is situated 1.3 km from Casa Batllo and features a lift. Rooms are equipped with a terrace with city views and free WiFi.
