At the apartment complex, each unit has air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, slippers and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available within a reachable distance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Jardinets De Gràcia by The 5ve Soul.

name: Feelathome Plaza Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
Feelathome Plaza Apartments offers apartments with free Wi-Fi and heating. The apartments are 100 metres from Hostafrancs Metro Station and 650 metres from Plaza Espanya and Barcelona Fira Congress Centre.

Featuring stylish décor, all the apartments include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a DVD player. Most of the apartments have a balcony or terrace. Every apartment has access to a communal rooftop terrace with views of the area.

Each apartment has a dining area and a kitchen equipped with a washing machine, oven and coffee machine. The bathrooms come with a shower and bed linen and towels are provided.

Guests will find restaurants and shops within 3 minutes' walk from the property. The apartments are 3 km from Plaza Catalunya Square and Barcelona city centre. Sants Train Station is a 10-minute walk from the property.

name: Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira
description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.5 km from Palau Sant Jordi, Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira features air-conditioned accommodation and a bar. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and an outdoor pool. Camp Nou is 2.9 km away and Boqueria Market is 4 km from the hotel.

At Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira offers a terrace.

Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 2 km from the hotel, while Montjuïc is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 8 km from Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira.

name: BBarcelona Clot Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom
description:
Located in Barcelona, BBarcelona Clot Apartments is a recently renovated accommodation, 3 km from Mar Bella Beach and 1.4 km from Sagrada Familia. The air-conditioned accommodation is 2.8 km from La Pedrera. The apartment features family rooms.

With a private bathroom, units at the apartment complex also offer free WiFi, while some rooms are equipped with a balcony.

Casa Batllo is 3.1 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 16 km from BBarcelona Clot Apartments, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Aparthotel Bertrán
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Aparthotel Bertrán is located in a quiet part of Barcelona, 5 minutes’ walk from Avinguda Tibidabo FGC Station and Vallcarca Metro. It offers spacious accommodation, a gym and an outdoor pool.

Each air-conditioned Bertrán apartment has a living room with satellite TV and a sofa. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer, and there is a kitchenette with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker.

Some apartments have a private balcony with table and chairs. All apartments have free Wi-Fi.

A continental breakfast is available at the Bertrán, and you can have breakfast in your apartment. There is a supermarket 2 minutes’ walk away.

There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. On-site parking is available for an extra charge.

You can reach Barcelona city centre in 15 minutes by train, Metro or bus, and there is a night bus stop nearby. Parc Güell is just over 1 km away.

name: Habitat Apartments Cool Jazz
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 44m²
description:
Featuring air conditioning, Habitat Apartments Cool Jazz is set in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Sagrada Familia. Park Güell is 2.1 km away.

The accommodation is fitted with a flat-screen TV. There is also a kitchenette, fitted with an oven and microwave. A toaster and refrigerator are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. There is a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer in each unit. Towels are featured.

La Pedrera is 2.2 km from Habitat Apartments Cool Jazz, while Plaça Catalunya is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 15 km from the property.

name: MH Apartments Liceo
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
MH Apartments Liceo is located in central Barcelona, just 130 metres from the Ramblas and next to the Gran Liceu Theatre. Each stylish, air-conditioned apartment features free Wi-Fi and international TV.

The modern MH apartments have a spacious lounge with a sofa. Each one has a kitchen with an oven, microwave and washing machine. There is also a safe and a hairdryer. Bed linen and towels are provided. DVD players are available on request.

The property's 24-hour customer service can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. You can walk to Plaza Catalunya and the MACBA Modern Art Museum in 10 minutes.

name: Hostal Conde Güell
description:
Hostal Conde Güell is located next to Barcelona’s famous Camp Nou Football Stadium. It offers basic rooms with a sink and free WiFi. All rooms have shared bathroom facilities.

Rooms at the Conde Güell come with a fan and heating. They include a TV, and guests can use the communal microwave. All rooms and apartments include air conditioning.

The 24-hour reception allows guests flexibility during their stay. The tour desk can offer information on the surrounding area.

Collblanc Metro Station is 200 metres away and guests can reach the city centre in 3 stops. There are many bars, restaurants and shops on Diagonal Avenue, a 15-minute walk from the guest house.

name: Bonanova Suite
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 20m²
description:
These apartments are located in the residential neighbourhood of Sarrià-Sant Gervasi, only 10 minutes from Plaça Catalunya.

The aparthotel boasts attractive and spacious studios that make your stay a more comfortable and pleasant one. It also has excellent public transport connections with the centre of Barcelona.

Bonanova Suite offers 24-hour reception, a tour desk and shuttle service at an extra cost.

El Putxet Train Station is 4 minutes' walk away and Gaudi's Park Güell is a 30-minute walk away.

name: Catalonia Park Putxet
description:
Featuring a sunroof terrace with a pool and views over Barcelona, Catalonia Park Putxet offers tranquil rooms and a modern fitness centre onsite. There is free WiFi available throughout.

The Park Putxet has simple, bright décor. Each air-conditioned room comes with a mini fridge with complimentary water, a satellite TV and a fully equipped bathroom with a hairdryer.

You can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast with Show Cooking. Light meals are prepared at the hotel snack bar; and room service, including sushi room service, is available.

The hotel is located in a residential area. There is a wide selection of cafés, bars and restaurants in the neighbouring district of Gràcia, which is just 15 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Gaudi's famous Park Guell is just 600 metres away. The closest metro station is Lesseps, 600 metres away.

name: Acacia Suite
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Acacia Suite is located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, just 50 metres from Hospital Clinic Metro Station. It offers air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi and a shared roof terrace.

The modern apartments feature a lounge with carpeted floors, sofas and a TV. The kitchenette includes an electric hob and a microwave. Bed linen and towels are changed daily.

The Acacia serves a daily continental breakfast directly at the apartments. The aparthotel also has a free business centre. Board games are also available for guests’ use.

The Acacia offers discounts on Barcelona’s popular tourist bus. The city’s financial district is 800 metres away, and you can reach Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard in 3 minutes by metro.

name: Quartprimera Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Quartprimera Apartments  is located just 80 metres from the emblematic Passeig de Gracia. It offers bright, air-conditioned apartments with flat-screen TV and free WiFi and private bathroom.

Set in a reformed, century-old building, apartments at Quartprimera feature elegant modern décor and have terraces, balconies or views to Gaudi´s La Pedrera, 2 minutes' walk away.

Bohemian Gracia is 5 minutes’ walk away and the Sagrada Familia and Plaza Catalunya are both 15 minutes’ walk away. Quartprimera is located 2 minutes’ walk from Diagonal Metro station.

name: Aparthotel Bcn Montjuic
description:
Set at the foot of Montjuic Hill, this design aparthotel is a 10-minute walk from Plaza Espanya Metro Station and the Airport Bus Stop. It offers free WiFi and a rooftop terrace with a solarium and a seasonal swimming pool.

The BCN Montjuic is a 5-minute walk from Las Arenas Shopping Centre and a short walk from the Olympic Stadium. Barcelona city centre can be reached in 15 minutes by bus or Metro.

All modern rooms at the Montjuic have air conditioning and heating. They include a flat-screen TV, a seating area and a kitchen with a fridge and microwave.

The apartments also include a living area with a sofa bed, a private bathroom and an equipped kitchen with a washing machine. Bed linen and towels are provided.

The Aparthotel Bcn Montjuic has a TV room, as well as a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk, where guests can arrange to visit local attractions. Laundry service is also available.

name: NH Barcelona Eixample
description:
This modern hotel offers free WiFi and spacious, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV. NH Barcelona Eixample is 400 metres from Hospital Clínic Metro Station, in the Eixample district.

The NH Barcelona Eixample is a 15-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard and Plaza Catalunya Square. Barcelona Sants Train Station is within 2 Metro stops, and Gaudí’s Sagrada Família Church is 3 stops away.

Rooms at the NH Barcelona Eixample feature simple, functional décor and wooden floors. They all include a minibar and a selection of pillows. The marble bathrooms come with a hairdryer and a range of toiletries.

The hotel’s breakfast buffet includes typical pastries, fresh fruit and Spanish cured ham.

name: Cosmo Apartments Passeig de Gràcia
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Cosmo Apartments Passeig de Gràcia is located in central Barcelona, 50 metres from the well-know Passeig de Gràcia Avenue. Casa Batlló and La Pedrera Modernist buildings are 5 minutes’ walk away.

The stylish and bright apartments at Cosmo Apartments Passeig de Gràcia can have 1 to 3 bedrooms, and duplex apartments with terrace are also available.

Featuring modern décor, all air-conditioned apartments are equipped with an open-plan kitchen with ceramic hob, microwave, dishwasher and kitchenware. There is also a living room with a 32-inch flat-screen TV and sofa bed.

Cosmo Apartments Passeig de Gràcia is well communicated to the city’s main tourist places, having the metro station 300 metres away.  Passeig de Gràcia is known for being the most important shopping street in Barcelona. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, located just 10 minutes' walk away.

name: Hotel Glòries
description:
This modern hotel is located 200 metres from Barcelona’s Monumental Bull Ring and 12 minutes from the Sagrada Familia. The rooms all have air conditioning and heating, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

Monumental Metro Station is just 3 minutes’ walk away from Hotel Glòries, and offers a direct service to Plaza Catalunya in around 5 minutes.

The hotel is well located for the 22@ high-tech area, as well as the Agbar Tower. The National Theatre of Catalunya and the Auditori Concert Hall are just 400 metres away.

The Hotel Glòries’s 24-hour front desk offers car and bike hire. They can also exchange currency and reserve tickets.

name: Gallery Hotel
description:
Located just off Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia, Gallery Hotel offers a free sauna and gym, and a seasonal rooftop terrace with a pool and city views. Rooms include free Wi-Fi and free water on arrival.

This elegant hotel offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV. The modern bathrooms include amenities, a hairdryer and a bathrobe.

The Gallery’s restaurant has an attractive garden terrace where you can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine. The hotel also has a bar and a café.

Gallery Hotel is situated next to the gardens of Palau Robert, a gallery and tourist information centre. Gaudí’s La Pedrera is a 3-minute walk away, while nearby Diagonal Metro Station provides direct access to the Sagrada Familia. Regular airport trains stop 600 metres away at Passeig de Gracia Station.

name: Barcelona Apartment Republica
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Located 150 metres from Llacuna Metro Station, Derby Republica offers modern loft-style apartments featuring exposed brick walls. Guests have access to a rooftop pool and sun terrace with views over Barcelona.

The air-conditioned apartments at Derby include a kitchen equipped with a microwave, hob, fridge and dishwasher. There is also a washing machine, and bedding and towels are provided.

The Republica has a concierge service that can help organise activities such as tours and water sports. Guests can also enjoy free entry to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum.

Glories Shopping Centre is a 10-minute walk away from Derby Republica. The beach and Poble Nou Park are also just 15 minutes’ walk away.

name: Inside Barcelona Apartments Sants
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 42m²
description:
Inside Barcelona Apartments Sants offers modern, great-value accommodation. These apartments are conveniently located on a quiet street near Barcelona Sants station.

These stylish apartments have a full kitchen, a bathroom and comfortable living rooms. They all have free wired internet access.

Plaça Espanya and Montjuïc are just a short walk from the apartments. The famous Camp Nou football stadium is also nearby.

The Inside Barcelona Apartments Sants have excellent public transport links to travel around the city. The airport train stops at Sants station, just 400 metres away.

The apartments are 12 minutes' walk from Plaza Espanya and the Fira Exhibition Centre. Just beyond is Montjuïc Hill, where you can find the MNAC Modern Art Museum and Miró Foundation.

name: Lodging Apartments Liceu G2
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Situated in Barcelona, 2.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach, 2.5 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.5 km from Barceloneta Beach, Lodging Apartments Liceu G2 features accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as Cathedral of Barcelona, Plaça Reial, and Passeig de Gracia. The property is less than 1 km from the city centre and 2.4 km from Sant Sebastian Beach.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. A TV is available. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Lodging Apartments Liceu G2.

name: Stylish Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Stylish Apartments is a self-catering accommodation located in various places within a small area in central Barcelona. Free WiFi access is available. The property is a short walk from La Pedrera and Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard.

The modern apartments will provide you with air conditioning and a seating area. There is a full a kitchenette with a dishwasher and a microwave. Featuring a bath or shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer. You can enjoy city view from the rooms.

name: Casa Lirio
description:
Situated in the Ciutat Vella district in Barcelona, Casa Lirio offers 2-star rooms with free WiFi. The property is set 1 km from Picasso Museum, less than 1 km from Cathedral of Barcelona and a 4-minute walk from Plaça Reial. The property is 1.8 km from Sant Miquel Beach, and within 1 km of the city centre.

At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at Casa Lirio have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms have a terrace. At the accommodation rooms include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near Casa Lirio include Sant Sebastian Beach, Barceloneta Beach and Santa Maria del Mar. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 12 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Ola Living Vidreria
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 33m²
description:
These apartments can be found in Barcelona's Born area, close to the Picasso Museum. They have free Wi-Fi.

The apartments have heating and air conditioning.

Bedrooms have an en-suite bathroom with a shower. The kitchen has a fridge, microwave and hob. There's a terrace.

Bicycle rental is available.

Staff at reception can organise your trip to Barcelona. Barceloneta with its seafront bars and restaurants is just a 10-minute away from the property. The Ramblas is also nearby.

name: Hostal Radio Barcelona
description:
Hostal Radio Barcelona is in central Barcelona, just 3 minutes’ walk from the MACBA and CCCB Modern Art Museums. It offers a 24-hour reception and rooms with a flat-screen TV. Free WiFi is provided.

The rooms at the Radio feature heating and each one has a private bathroom.

Guests at Hostal Radio Barcelona are welcome to enjoy a free walking tour service, available on request.

Hostal Radio Barcelona offers coffee, capuccino, chocolate and cold drinks for sale at their waiting room. There are numerous bars, restaurants and shops within 2 minutes’ walk and both Universitat square and Catalunya square are just 5 minutes away.

Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya and paid parking near the hotel is offered to our guests.

name: Aparthotel Senator Barcelona
description:
The Aparthotel Senator Barcelona is situated on Via Augusta, in a pleasant residential area, a 2-minute walk from Muntaner Train Station. It includes air conditioning, heating, and free Wi-Fi in hotel rooms.

All rooms and apartments have a TV, telephone, and a private bathroom with a bathtub or a shower. The apartments also include an equipped with kitchenette.

A 6-minute train ride will take you to Plaza Cataluña and Barcelona city centre. Sagrada Familia Cathedral is 3.3 km away.

name: Catalonia Rigoletto
description:
The stylish Catalonia Rigoletto is set 500 metres from FC Barça’s Camp Nou stadium and 5 minutes’ walk from Maria Cristina Metro Station. It offers an outdoor pool and rooms with free WiFi and flat-screen TVs.

The Rigoletto’s spacious rooms are air conditioned and decorated with dark woods and luxurious fabrics. All rooms have satellite TV, free smartphone, a minibar and safety deposit box.

A buffet breakfast is on offer in the dining room and Mediterranean cuisine is served in the stylish La Traviata restaurant. There is also a bar in the hotel featuring attractive art work.

Sights including Las Ramblas and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló can be reached in 15 minutes, by Metro. Sants Railway Station, where there is an airport train connection, is just 1.5 km from the Rigoletto.

name: Apart-Suites Hostemplo
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 32m²
description:
Apart-Suites Hostemplo offers stylish apartments and suites set in 2 beautiful Modernist buildings, 250 metres from Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia. This soundproofed accommodation features free Wi-Fi and a DVD player.

The property offers contemporary décor with wooden floors. The apartments come with air conditioning and heating, as well as a private balcony. Most have views of Sagrada Família. Most of the apartments have a washing machine.

A buffet breakfast with homemade pastries, local produce and freshly squeezed natural orange juice is served daily at Hotel Hostemplo, located 150 meters from the property.

The junior suite features a fridge, microwave and kettle, and it has a TV. Located on the 5th floor, it offers views of Sagrada Família.

In 5 minutes you can walk to Sagrada Família Market, as well as Gaudí Avenue, where there are many restaurants, bars and shops. Barcelona's open-top bus tour route also stops just 3 minutes' walk from the property.

Apart-Suites Hostemplo is situated just metres from Avinguda Diagonal and just 3 minutes' walk from Sagrada Família Metro Station. Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are a 10-minute walk away on Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, in the city centre.

name: Aspasios Rambla Catalunya Suites
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
These chic apartments are set on Barcelona’s stylish Rambla de Catalunya, 150 metres from Passeig de Gracia Boulevard. There is free WiFi available throughout.

Apartments at Aspasios Rambla Catalunya Suites feature contemporary decor, a sofa bed, and plasma TV while kitchens have a dishwasher, washing machine, tumble drier and Nespresso coffee maker.

There are several bars, restaurants and shops within 5 minutes’ walk and Plaza Catalunya is 400 metres away.

Las Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter are 10 minutes’ walk away and Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batllo are within 5 minutes’ walk.

The Aspasios Rambla Catalunya apartments are 3 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gracia Metro and Train Station, with direct trains to Barcelona El Prat Airport.

The pictures at the top of this page are a selection of the different apartments located in the Eixample area. Please select a date and click on the apartments to see the pictures of the individual apartments.

name: Inside Barcelona Apartments Esparteria
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
These stylish apartments are located in Barcelona’s El Born district, 3 minutes' walk from the Picasso Museum. Each apartment offers free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

Inside Barcelona Apartments Esparteria are bright and air-conditioned. They all have a spacious seating area and a modern kitchenette with an oven, hob and fridge.

Inside Barcelona Apartments Esparteria has a communal terrace (open during office hours), where guests can enjoy views of nearby Santa María del Mar Church.

Staff at reception can help organise your trip to Barcelona. Bicycle rental and a ticket service are also available.

The Esparteria is within 100 metres of the popular Passeig del Born. Barceloneta Beach is a 15-minute walk away, and Ciutadella Park is 400 metres away. There are various restaurants, bars and supermarkets within a short walk.

name: Feelathome Poblenou Beach Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
These modern apartments are in the Poblenou area of Barcelona, 500 metres from the beach. Free Wi-Fi is available in rooms and in public areas. The CCIB Convention Centre is within walking distance.

Poblenou Metro is 200 metres away and a 20-minute ride takes you to the city centre. There is easy access to the Gaudí buildings on Passeig de Gracia.

The apartments located in 2 separate buildings, 210 metres apart. All of them have a private kitchen complete with a washing machine, dishwasher, and oven. There is also a living room with a flat-screen TV.  Some apartments have a private terrace or balcony, and a communal terrace is available on the top floor.

Private parking is available at an extra cost. Non-smoking and family apartments are available.

The pictures at the top of this page are a selection of the different apartments located in the Poble Nou area in Barcelona. Please select a date and click on the apartments to see the pictures of the individual apartments.

name: Nice apartment BCN two rooms wifi
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom
description:
Nice apartment BCN two rooms wifi has a balcony and is situated in Barcelona, within just 1.5 km of Casa Batllo and 1.9 km of Passeig de Gracia. The property is around 1.8 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 2.3 km from Plaça Catalunya and 2.7 km from Park Güell. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and La Pedrera is 1.1 km away.

The apartment is composed of 1 separate bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is available. The property offers garden views.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 2.8 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Nice apartment BCN two rooms wifi.

name: Catalonia Park Güell
description:
Free Wi-Fi and a rooftop swimming pool are offered at Catalonia Park Güell. It is set in a residential area just outside Barcelona’s historic centre, 600 metres from Parc Güell.

Rooms at the hotel are simple and comfortable, with air conditioning or heated and satellite TV. There is also a restaurant, bar.

The Catalonia Park Güell is just 300 metres from Vallcarca Metro Station. This gives access to the city centre within 10 minutes. Stops for buses V19 and 22 are nearby. The sun terrace offers views over the city.

The hotel is close to some of Barcelona’s most famous medical centres. These include the Delfos and Quiron Clinics.

There are many sports clubs and parks around the hotel. The popular Gràcia district is also a short walk away. It has lively squares with bars and restaurants.

name: Vincci Gala
description:
Located in the heart of Barcelona, Vincci Gala hotel offers luxurious rooms in a protected 19th-century palace. Free Wi-Fi is available.

The orginal façade, floor and central staircase of this unique hotel have all been preserved, creating a balance of traditional arquitecture and modern design.

The air-conditioned rooms include a private bathroom with hairdryer, free toiletries, and bath or shower. The rooms also come with a free laptop safe, extra large beds, satellite TV with pay-per-view channels, and a minibar.

A restaurant and snack bar are available on-site, and the hotel offers a breakfast buffet. Laundry and car rental services are available at a surcharge, and the property can provide tourist information.

Vincci Gala hotel is located opposite Urquinaona Metro Station, 2 minutes' walk from Plaça Catalunya Square.  There are many bars, restaurants and shops in the surroundings, and you can reach Gaudi's La Sagrada Familia in 15 minutes by metro.

name: Inside Barcelona Apartments Princep
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 65m²
description:
Vivo Barcelona Apartments Jordi offers modern and good value for money accommodation. The apartments are located in a quiet street, close to Plaza España.

It offers well-appointed apartments with full kitchens and air conditioning. There is free WiFi, Smart TV, washing machine and dishwasher. The building has been completely renovated in September 2021.

The accommodations are spacious and have a kitchen, bathroom and living-dining area. Here you can relax after a long day of sightseeing and prepare your own meals.

The apartments are located in a well-connected area of ​​the city, Plaza España and the Fira fairgrounds are between 2 and 10 minutes' walk away. A little further afield, you can find the Montjuïc mountain, which houses the National Art Museum of Catalonia and the Miró Foundation.

Our clients say that this part of Barcelona is their favourite, based on independent reviews.

Vivo Barcelona Apartments Jordi has been receiving Booking.com clients since 14 Oct 2008.

name: La Mare by The Streets
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Set within a 10-minute walk of La Pedrera in Barcelona, No 23 - The Streets Apartments Barcelona offers apartments in a same building with free WiFi.

Every unit has a well-equipped kitchen or kitchenette completed with an oven; while the bathroom has a shower. There is a washing machine, and bed linen and towels are provided.

Fresh produces can be found at the market located 700 metres away; and trendy bars, restaurants and shops are on the many surrounding public squares.

A 10-minute metro ride will take you to Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas.

name: Isabella's House
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 52m²
description:
Featuring a bar and views of city, Isabella's House is a sustainable aparthotel set in Barcelona, 3 km from La Pedrera. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The aparthotel features family rooms.

The aparthotel will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a microwave, a toaster, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a a bath or shower. There is also a dining area and a fully equipped kitchen equipped with a fridge, a stovetop, and kitchenware. At the aparthotel, the units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the neighbourhood.

Sants Railway Station is 3 km from the aparthotel, while Camp Nou is 3.1 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Isabella's House.

name: NH Collection Barcelona Constanza
description:
Offering a rooftop pool and terrace,  NH Collection Barcelona Constanza has modern rooms with satellite TV. It is located next to L’Illa Shopping Centre on Diagonal Avenue, 15 minutes' walk from Sants Train Station.

The elegant, modern rooms at the Constanza feature a Nespresso machine, flat-screen TV, and pillow menu, while the bathroom includes a rain shower and a professional hairdryer. Free WiFi is included.

Guests can use the spa for an extra cost. The gym is available free of charge. Room service is available 24 hours.

The hotel's Antiox healthy buffet breakfast features antioxidant dishes made with ecological produce.

The hotel is 15 minutes’ walk from Barcelona FC’s Camp Nou Stadium. María Cristina Metro Station is 10 minutes’ walk away, connecting you with the Fira Exhibition Centre in under 10 minutes.

name: AC Hotel Diagonal L'Illa by Marriott
description:
AC Hotel Diagonal L´Illa offers accommodation in Barcelona, 1.8 km from Camp Nou. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurants,  paid parking located at commercial center.

Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel.

Every room at this hotel has plush bedding, a flat-screen TV and a spacious work desk. Every room includes a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Surrounded by lush gardens, the property is near many upscale boutiques and restaurants.

The Suite Bar is a modern, welcoming space on the hotel’s second floor. Its contemporary décor and lighting make it an ideal spot to enjoy a drink.

The Picasso Museum is 3.8 km from AC Hotel Diagonal L´Illa, while La Pedrera is 2.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 11 km away.

name: Happy People Gaudi Sant Pau Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Happy People Sagrada Familia Apartments offers air-conditioned apartments and studios with free WiFi. Accommodation is 5 minutes’ walk from Camp de l’Arpa Metro Station.

Both studios and apartments feature a living-dining room with air conditioning, a sofa, and a flat-screen TV, and a kitchenette including a microwave, dishwasher and fridge. Some rooms have ceiling fans. The modern bathroom has a hairdryer, and towels and bed linen are provided.

Several bars, restaurants and supermarkets can be found within 5 minutes’ walk. The property offers tours around the city, and airport shuttle service, available on request and for a surcharge.

Located in a residential area of the Eixample District, the property is 15 minutes’ walk from Sagrada Familia. You can reach Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas in 30 minutes by public transport. Sant Pau Hospital, a spectacular example of modernist architecture, can be reached in 5 minutes on foot.

name: Hilton Diagonal Mar Barcelona
description:
This hotel is next to Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre and just 400 metres from Nova Mar Bella Beach. It offers a seasonal outdoor pool, a fitness centre and air-conditioned rooms with a LED TV.

Hilton Diagonal Mar Barcelona's terrace, Purobeach Barcelona, has an outdoor pool and paddling pool available from April to October. All services on the Purobeach terrace, including Balinese beds, sunbeds and massages are available for an extra charge.

Purobeach Restaurant offers a diverse menu, as well as a variety of classic cocktails and international spirits. Aürt Restaurant serves Catalan food cooked in front of you. Guests can also enjoy tapas, snacks or drinks at Ma'i.

The hotel has 22 meeting rooms. Barcelona’s CCIB Convention Centre is located next door to the hotel. El Maresme-Forum Metro Station is 2 minutes’ walk away, and from here you can get to central Barcelona in around 15 minutes. Barcelona's El Prat Airport is 25 minutes' drive away.

name: Catalonia Avinyo
description:
Situated 200 metres from Las Ramblas in central Barcelona, Catalonia Avinyo features a rooftop pool and gym. It offers chic, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms are decorated in a modern, minimalist style with large wall photos. They include a minibar, safe and telephone. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app. The modern bathrooms have a shower and a hairdryer.

Barceloneta Beach is a 15-minute walk from Hotel Catalonia Avinyo. The Liceu and Jaume I Metro Stations are just 300 metres away and Barcelona Cathedral is 4 minutes' walk away.

The Avinyo’s central location means there are many shops, bars and restaurants close to the hotel. Bicycle and car hire can be arranged at the tour desk.

name: Wilson Boutique Hotel
description:
Wilson Boutique Hotel is situated on Barcelona’s Avinguda Diagonal, 12 minutes’ walk from La Pedrera in Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers free Wi-Fi, stylish décor and a rooftop terrace with impressive city views.

The Wilson Boutique Hotel has soundproofed rooms with chic, contemporary design. All rooms are bright with large windows. Each has a flat-screen TV and air conditioning.

The hotel is within walking distance of Plaza de Catalunya which features a range of shops and restaurants.

The Wilson Boutique has excellent transport links. Many buses, including the sightseeing bus, stop opposite the hotel.

The hotel offers free use of the PC and printer in the lobby. There is also a tour desk, where guests can receive information on Barcelona’s tourist attractions, including Gaudí’s Casa Batlló which is around 20 minutes’ walk from the Wilson. Diagonal Metro Station is 750 metres away.

name: Bonavista Apartments - Virreina
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
These elegant, fully-equipped apartments are located in a new building just 4 minutes’ walk from Fontana metro station. They have a roof terrace with views over the Gracia neighbourhood and free Wi-fi.

Bonavista’s air-conditioned apartments have floor-to-ceiling windows and a modern décor with stone flooring and a neutral colour scheme. The kitchen features a vitroceramic hob, oven, dishwasher and toaster. The bathroom has a shower and includes a heated towel rail and hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are provided.

There are 2 food markets within less than 10 minutes’ walk of Bonavista Apartments. Visitors will also find many shops, bars, cafés and restaurants in Gracia.

Gaudí’s famous creations, such as Parc Güell, Sagrada Família, and La Pedrera are all within less than 20 minutes’ walk of the apartments. The number 39 bus to Barceloneta beach stops on Gran de Gracia, about 5 minutes’ walk away. Private parking is available upon request and at an additional cost.

name: Suite Gracia Barcelona
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Suite Gracia Barcelona features a balcony and is located in Barcelona, within just 1.3 km of Casa Batllo and 1.6 km of Passeig de Gracia. Featuring a terrace, the apartment is close to several noted attractions, around 1.6 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 1.4 km from Sagrada Familia and 1.7 km from Tivoli Theatre. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and La Pedrera is 800 metres away.

The apartment comes with 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer and free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 2.1 km from Suite Gracia Barcelona, while Portal de l'Angel is 2.2 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel El Call
description:
Hotel Call Barcelona is located right in the centre of Barcelona’s historic Barri Gótic, 10 minutes' walk from Las Ramblas. It is close to Plaça Sant Jaume and not far from the Cathedral.

The rooms in the Hotel Call are spacious and practical. It offers air conditioned or heated accommodation, depending on the season. There is free Wi-Fi and a safe. The bathrooms have a shower.

The nearest Metro stops are Jaume I and Liceu, both about 10 minutes’ away. The famous Ramblas are also about 10 minutes’ walk away.

Hotel Call is also close to central Barcelona’s main shopping areas such as Portaferrisa and Portal de L'Àngel. The trendy Born area is also close by – here you will find plenty of restaurants and bars.

name: BARCELONA GOTIC Guesthouse
description:
Set in a 19-th century building, right in Barcelona’s old town, BARCELONA GOTIC Guesthouse is just 2 minutes’ walk from the Ramblas and 15 minutes’ walk from Barceloneta beach.

Rooms have private or shared bathroom. This guest house also features a communal lounge with TV and a 24-hour reception. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas and Wi-Fi is available in rooms at an extra cost.

GuestHouse Barelona Gotic is situated in the charming Gothic District. The surrounding area is full of restaurants, lively bars and cafés. The main shopping District is within walking distance of the property.

Plaza Cataluña Square is 10 minutes’ walk away. Liceu or Jaume I Metro Stations are 5 minutes’ walk from the guest house.

name: Hotel BESTPRICE Diagonal
description:
Located 5 minutes’ walk from Diagonal Park and 100 metres from Selva de Mar Metro Station, Hotel BESTPRICE Diagonal is a new hotel with modern décor. Free Wi-Fi is available in all areas.

Each room is air conditioned and offers a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The modern private bathroom offers a shower and free toiletries. A safe is available for an extra cost.

There are various bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of the property. Barcelona’s Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre and the CCIB Convention Centre are both 200 metres away.

Breakfast is offered in the café beside the hotel, with discounted prices for guests.


Plaza Catalunya is 10 minutes away by metro and Mar Bella Beach can be reached in 10 minutes on foot.

BestPrice Diagonal has a tour desk and a ticket service. Bicycle and car rental are also available.

name: Suite Place Barcelona Còrsega
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
Suite Place Barcelona Còrsega features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, 500 metres from Sagrada Familia, 1.7 km from La Pedrera and 2.1 km from Casa Batllo. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

Some of the units feature a satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and a private bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer. At the apartment complex, some units are allergy-free.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

Sightseeing tours are available close by.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.5 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Suite Place Barcelona Còrsega.

name: Chi
description:
Located in Barcelona’s Eixample District, beside Rocafort Metro Station and 15 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya,  Chi Hotel offers rooms with air-conditioning and heating (depending on the season) and free WiFi.

The modern rooms include a flat-screen TV, minibar, safe and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Staff can help with tourist information and car hire.

You will find many shops, restaurants and bars in the surrounding area.

name: Mercedes Heritage Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
Set in l’Eixample, Mercedes Heritage Apartments offers self-catering apartments in the centre of Barcelona, 2 km from Plaça de Catalunya. The Metro Stop Hospital Clinic is a 2-minute walk away.

Offering free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom with a bath or shower, apartments are spacious and modernly furnished. A fully equipped kitchenette with dishwasher and microwave is available, while superior apartments feature air conditioning.

La Rambla is a 25-minute bus ride from Mercedes Heritage Apartments, while Sagrada Familia is 4 Metro stops away.

name: Ofelias Hotel 4Sup by Bondia Hotel Group
description:
Set just off Gran Vía and a 2-minute walk from Plaza Espanya Metro Station and the Fira Exhibition Centre, Ofelias Hotel offers stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi. It features a roof terrace with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool.

Each bright, air-conditioned room at Ofelias Hotel has a flat-screen TV. Each one comes with a private bathroom. A free bottle of water is provided upon arrival.

The hotel has an on-site bar where you can get a drink. There is a range of cafes and bars around Plaza Espanya. Restaurants can be found on Las Ramblas and in the Gothic Quarter, just 4 Metro stops away.

Staff at the reception can give you information about different Slow Travel activities .These include free bicycles on request, allowing you to discover hidden places and enjoy local cultures. .

The Magic Fountains and Montjuïc Park are less than 1 km from the Ofelias, and Las Arenas Shopping centre is just opposite the hotel. The airport bus stops just 200 metres from the hotel. Bicycle rental is available on request from reception.

name: Hotel Best Front Maritim
description:
Set 100 metres from Barcelona’s Nova Mar Bella Beach, Front Maritim offers free WiFi and a gym with sauna. The Fòrum and CCIB Convention Centre are within a 15-minute walk.

All rooms at Hotel Front Maritim are modern and functional. There is a flat-screen TV and a work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a shower and free toiletries.

The Front Maritim’s restaurant serves a wide range of modern Mediterranean cuisine.

Hotel Front Maritim is 700 metres from the shops and restaurants of Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre. Selva de Mar Metro Station is within a 10-minute walk, and nearby bus stops offer regular links to Barcelona City Centre.

name: Catalonia La Maquinista
description:
Catalonia La Maquinista is ideally located next to the La Maquinista Shopping Centre in Barcelona’s Sant Andreu District. Plaza de Catalunya is just a 15-minute Metro journey away.

The Maquinista’s bright rooms have air conditioning and flat-screen smart TV equipped with Chromecast app. All rooms have a work desk and safe. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.

The hotel restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and Mediterranean cuisine for lunch and dinner. The neighbouring Maquinista Shopping Centre has a selection of cinemas, a bowling alley, as well as cafés and bars.

Catalonia La Maquinista is 500 metres from Barcelona’s ring road, the B10 Ronda del Litoral, connecting guests to the beach in 10 minutes.

Sant Andreu Metro and Railway Station is just a 10-minute walk from Catalonia La Maquinista and has direct trains to Passeig de Gràcia and to El Prat Airport. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are 8 Metro stops away.

As with reservations of more than 4 rooms, special conditions and supplements will apply to those of more than 8 nights.

name: Ilunion Les Corts Spa
description:
Ilunion Les Corts Spa features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and bar in Barcelona. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation provides a concierge service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Ilunion Les Corts Spa every room comes with bed linen and towels.

A gluten-free breakfast is available daily at the accommodation.

Camp Nou is less than 1 km from Ilunion Les Corts Spa, while Sants Railway Station is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from the hotel.

The hotel is a 15-minute drive from Plaza España, from where the shuttles leave to the Montjuic field.

name: Hotel SB Glow Sup
description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.8 km from Bogatell Beach, Hotel SB Glow Sup features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. Featuring a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can use the sauna and the hammam, or enjoy city views.

The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. At Hotel SB Glow Sup rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean and Grill Bbq cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested.

The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at Hotel SB Glow Sup.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock.

Nova Icaria Beach is 1.8 km from the hotel, while Mar Bella Beach is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Hotel SB Glow Sup.

name: numa I Seda Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
numa I Seda Apartments is located in Barcelona’s trendy Born district, just 250 metres from Ciutadella Park. It offers stylish apartments with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TV.

The apartments at numa I Seda Apartments feature modern décor with traditional elements such as original vaulted ceilings. Each one has an open-plan lounge area and views of Rec Street.

The apartments have a well-equipped kitchen with a vitroceramic hob, microwave and coffee maker, as well as a washing machine. The stylish bathroom features tiles in a mosaic. Bed linen, towels and ironing equipment are provided. Guests have access to a shared terrace.

There are many bars, restaurants and boutique shops in the streets around numa I Seda Apartments, and the Chocolate and Picasso Museums are within 250 metres. França Station is 3 minutes’ walk away, and you can walk to the beach at Barceloneta in 15 minutes.

name: Piquer con Terraza
description:
Situated within the Sants-Montjuïc district in Barcelona, Piquer con Terraza has air conditioning, a terrace, and city views. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a patio. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.9 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

With free WiFi, this 3-bedroom apartment features a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Santa Maria del Mar and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Piquer con Terraza.

name: Pol & Grace Hotel
description:
Pol & Grace Hotel is located just 100 metres from Barcelona’s Plaça Molina and Sant Gervasi Train Stations. It offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access.

This modern hotel features a library and an area displaying works by local artists, as well as a free work area. A free coffee and tea service is offered from mid-morning onwards.

Each soundproofed room at Pol & Grace Hotel has functional, modern décor and includes a small fridge, a free safe and a welcome gift. The fully equipped bathrooms come with toiletries.

A varied buffet breakfast is served every morning. Room service is also available. The hotel has a 24-hour reception with car rental service and a tour desk. Private parking is available on site.

Fontana Metro Station is 600 metres away, and offers direct access to Plaza Catalunya, Las Ramblas and Parc Güell. The popular Gràcia district is within a 2-minute walk of the property and has a range of shops, restaurants and lively bars.

name: Ako Suites Hotel
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Ako Suites Hotel offers stylish apartments with free Wi-Fi and modern kitchenettes. It is located a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya Square.

The Ako Suites have a sleek minimalist design and are decorated in light colours. A flat-screen TV and a double sofa bed can be found in each air-conditioned apartment.

Kitchenettes include a ceramic hob and a microwave. The elegant bathrooms have a bath or shower. Towels and amenities are also provided.

Ako Suites Hotel is located just 300 metres from Universitat Metro Station and a 5-minute walk from an airport bus stop. Staff at the 24-hour reception is happy to provide information about the city.

name: Hotel Medicis
description:
Hotel Medicis is 5 minutes’ walk from Sant Pau Metro Station, allowing you to reach central Barcelona in around 10 minutes. There is Wi-Fi access and a rooftop sun terrace.

The Medicis Hotel is chic and functional, and offers reasonably priced accommodation in a good location. All air-conditioned rooms have satellite TV and a safe. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer.

Just next to the hotel is one of Barcelona’s emblematic Art Nouveau buildings, the Sant Pau Hospital, designed by Domènech i Montaner. From here it is a 10-minute walk down Avinguda de Gaudí to The Sagrada Família. You can stop for a coffee, or a meal, in one of the many café-restaurants that line this avenue.

The hotel has a tour desk, and you can hire a bicycle or car. There is a 24-hour front desk.

name: Sunny 2-Bedroom Apartment City Beach
description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.6 km from Llevant and 1.6 km from Forum Beach, Sunny 2-Bedroom Apartment City Beach offers spacious air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. With city views, this accommodation features a patio. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.1 km from Platja del Litoral.

This apartment comes with 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom equipped with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Sagrada Familia is 4.9 km from the apartment, while Port Olimpic is 4.9 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 18 km from Sunny 2-Bedroom Apartment City Beach.

name: Gran Hotel Havana 4Sup by Escampa Hotels
description:
This elegant, design hotel is set in Barcelona’s city centre, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya. It features a sauna and a seasonal rooftop pool with a terrace.

The Gran Hotel Havana is located in Casa Fradera, a historic building dating from 1882. Rooms are decorated in a classic style and feature a marble bathroom. They come with a flat-screen TV and free WiFi.

The Grand Place restaurant serves traditional cuisine, and in summer guests can enjoy light meals on the hotel’s rooftop bar-terrace.

Please note that the rooftop bar-terrace may be closed to the public at certain times due to private events.

Girona Metro Station is 200 metres away while the stylish Paseo de Gracia is just 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel, with many shops, bars and restaurants.

name: Colom Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Colom Apartments features accommodation within less than 1 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a toaster, a fridge and a stovetop. It is situated 2.1 km from Sant Sebastian Beach and provides a lift. Guests can enjoy city views.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, an oven, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The apartment complex offers some units that have a balcony, and every unit includes a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Plaça Catalunya, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Colom Apartments.

name: Casa Elliot by Bondia Hotel Group
description:
The Casa Elliot by Bondia Hotel Group is located in the centre of Barcelona, less than 10 minutes’ walk from Plaça de Catalunya and Las Ramblas. This stylish hotel features free Wi-Fi access.

Rooms at the Casa Elliot by Bondia Hotel Group feature contemporary décor and balconies or windows, while some also have large private terraces. Each room has a flat-screen TV and air conditioning.

Breakfast is served in the hotel’s buffet-style restaurant. Guests can make use of the Casa Elliot by Bondia Hotel Group’s library, lounge and tour desk.

The Casa Elliot by Bondia Hotel Group is under 200 metres from Universitat Metro Station and is a 10-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia. El Prat Airport can be reached in 30 minutes, by bus.

name: B Hotel
description:
This design hotel is just 150 metres from Plaça Espanya and opposite Las Arenas Shopping Centre. It has an 8th-floor swimming pool and sun terrace with spectacular views of Montjuic.

The air-conditioned rooms at B Hotel are spacious and soundproofed. All rooms have free WiFi, and are decorated with contemporary art. Each room comes with an electric kettle and a pillow-menu.

The room service menu is also available at the bar and by the swimming pool.

Plaza Espanya Metro Station is within 200 metres of the hotel, while Barcelona Fira Exhibition Centre is just 250 metres away. The Magic Fountains of Montjuic are about 5 minutes’ walk away.

name: Barcelona Apartment Gran de Gràcia
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 44m²
description:
Situated in the charming Gràcia district, these elegant design apartments offer a balcony and a stylish kitchen with a ceramic hob, dishwasher and washing machine. Fontana Metro Station is just 200 metres away.

The air-conditioned Gran de Gracia apartments feature sleek contemporary décor. Each one has a lounge with a flat-screen TV and 2 sofa beds. The modern bathrooms include a shower.

A variety of supermarkets, cafés and restaurants can be found within a 5-minute walk of the Gran de Gracia apartments. The surrounding streets are full of quirky boutiques and lively bars.

Gaudí’s Casa Vicenç is just 150 metres from the apartments, while Parc Güell is a 20-minute walk away. You can walk to Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard in around 15 minutes.

name: Hotel Arts Barcelona
description:
Overlooking Barceloneta Beach and Barcelona city centre, this design hotel has 2 outdoor pools and luxury spa with city views. Hotel Arts offers art collection and a restaurant with 2 Michelin stars.

The Arts is situated next to Barcelona’s Olympic Port and surrounded by shops and lively bars. Barceloneta Beach is 250 metres away, while Ciutadella Park is 300 metres away.

The Arts Hotel’s rooms include a flat-screen TV and sound system. The bathrooms have a separate bath and a shower.

The hotel’s Enoteca restaurant, awarded 2 Michelin stars, serves fine Mediterranean cuisine. The property includes a number of other bars and restaurants, including a pool-side bar serving light meals in the summer.

Hotel Arts has a hair salon and various luxury fashion boutiques. The hotel also offers a multilingual concierge team and a fully equipped business centre.

name: Hotel Barcelona Universal
description:
Barcelona Universal offers free Wi-Fi, a gym and a rooftop pool with city ciews. Situated next to next to Parallel Metro Station, the hotel is just 600 metres from Las Ramblas.

The spacious, functional rooms at the Barcelona Universal Hotel feature wooden floors and air conditioning. Bathrooms include toiletries and heated towel rails.

The Barcelona Universal’s Medea serves a hot and cold buffet breakfast, including plenty of healthy options.

The hotel is situated a 20-minute walk from the Magic Fountain and MNAC Art Museum, in Montjuïc. Plaça Catalunya is just 3 Metro stops away, and the lively bars of the Raval district are just 500 metres away.

name: Mesón Castilla Atiram Hotels
description:
Mesón Castilla is set just 100 metres from Las Ramblas and Plaça Catalunya Square in central Barcelona. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi and an attractive garden terrace where guests can enjoy breakfast.

Rooms at the Mesón Castilla include ornate beds, and some have a private balcony. They come with air conditioning and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

The hotel operates a 24-hour reception, allowing guests flexibility during their stay. The tour desk can organise excursions and car rental. There are safes available at the reception for an extra charge.

Barcelona’s Modern Art Museum is a 5-minute walk from the hotel. The historic Gothic Quarter, with its cathedral and many bars, can be reached in 10 minutes’ by foot.

name: Ola Living MACBA
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 38m²
description:
Centrally located in Barcelona’s Raval District, just 300 metres from Universitat Metro Station, Ola Living MACBA offers modern accommodation with free WiFi and a balcony. Plaza Catalunya is 8 minutes’ walk away.

These apartments feature exposed brick walls and some come with vaulted ceilings or exposed wooden beams. They come with a kitchenette equipped with a dishwasher, oven and coffee machine. Their living areas include a flat-screen TV with cable channels, DVD player and sofa.

You will find bars, restaurants and supermarkets in the surrounding streets.

Sant Antoni is a 5-minute walk away and Barceloneta Beach is 2.5 km from the property. Sagrada Familia is 10 minutes’ metro ride from Ola Living MACBA and Barcelona Airport is 15 km away.

name: The Social Hub Barcelona Poblenou
description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Llevant, The Social Hub Barcelona Poblenou features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities at this property are a shared lounge and a business centre, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel has a terrace and city views, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar.

All rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at The Social Hub Barcelona Poblenou have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms are fitted with a seating area. At the accommodation rooms have bed linen and towels.

Speaking Catalan, Czech, English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock.

Nova Mar Bella Beach is 1.6 km from The Social Hub Barcelona Poblenou, while Mar Bella Beach is 1.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from the hotel.

name: Ola Living Hostal Diagonal
description:
Featuring free WiFi, Ola Living Hostal Diagonal is located in Barcelona. Set 800 metres from Passeig de Gracia, famous for its luxury shops, this hotel offers modern rooms with air conditioning.

Each heated room at this hotel has modern décor and includes 1 double or 2 single beds, a flat-screen TV and wardrobe. The private bathroom comes with a shower and hairdryer. Some rooms have a spa bath. All are on the ground floor.

The hotel offers a lounge area.

You can find several restaurants, bars, and grocery shops within a 5-minute walk of Ola Living Hostal Diagonal Exclusive rooms. Diagonal Metro Station is 850 metres from the property, and Plaza Catalunya is 2 stops away.

Our reception is located at 228 Aribau Street. The opening hours are from 09:00 to 20:00, Monday to Sunday.

Check in time is 3:00 PM. If you arrive earlier we can store your luggage at reception until your apartment is ready. Also after your check out (11.00 AM).  You can leave your luggage at the reception.

The apartment has opening through a smartphone. If you need a face-to-face check-in later than 9:00 PM.  There is a surcharge of €30.

name: Aparthotel Augusta
description:
Aparthotel Augusta offers good-value accommodation with free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour reception. It is set in Barcelona’s Sant Gervasi district and just 100 metres from Plaza Molina FGC Railway Station.

Rooms at the Aparthotel Augusta are simple and comfortable. They have a kitchenette with an oven, hob and a fridge. There is also a living area with a TV.

There are shops and supermarkets nearby. The Libertad Market also sells fresh, local food and is just 500 metres from the hotel.

The popular Gràcia district, which features a range of cafés, bars and restaurants, is just 10 minutes’ walk away.

Plaza de Catalunya can be reached in less than 15 minutes from Plaza Molina FGC Station, or from Fontana Metro, which is approximately 300 metres from the Augusta.

name: Apartments Sata Sagrada Familia Area
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
These apartments are located in a quiet area of Barcelona’s Gràcia district, just 10 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s impressive Sagrada Família Basilica. They feature free Wi-Fi and a washing machine.

The air-conditioned apartments at Apartaments Sata Sagrada Familia Area feature tiled floors and modern décor. The lounge has a TV and a sofa, and the kitchen includes a microwave, hob and toaster.

Apartamentos Sata Sagrada Familia Area are within 15 minutes walk of Parc Güell and the amazing Hospital Sant Pau. Located 5 minutes’ walk away, Joanic Metro Station connects you with Passeig de Gràcia in just 3 minutes.

The pictures at the top of this page are a selection of the different apartments located in the same building. Please select a date and click on the apartments to see the pictures of the individual apartments.

name: ClassBedroom Barcelona Beach Apartments
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 30m²
description:
These apartments without elevator access are located in the district of Barceloneta, surrounded by seafood restaurants and set beside the city’s sandy beaches.

ClassBedroom Barcelona Beach Apartments can accommodate 2 people per apartment.  They allow families and groups of friends to enjoy independent accommodation in the heart of The Catalan capital.

The apartment's location is near to train, metro and bus services, meaning that you can easily visit the many cultural sights of this inspiring city. Las Ramblas and the lively district of El Born are only a few minutes walk away.

This historic fishing district is also a short distance from the Olympic Port.

name: 2 BDR EIXAMPLE APARTMENT
description:
2 BDR EIXAMPLE APARTMENT features a balcony and is situated in Barcelona, within just 1.8 km of Casa Batllo and 1.7 km of Sants Railway Station. It is set 2.3 km from Passeig de Gracia and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.4 km from La Pedrera.

With free WiFi, this 2-bedroom apartment provides a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and toaster. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Plaça Catalunya is 2.3 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from 2 BDR EIXAMPLE APARTMENT.

name: Eurohotel Diagonal Port
description:
Just 350 metres from Mar Bella Beach, Eurohotel Diagonal Port offers Mediterranean Sea views from its setting in Barcelona’s Poble Nou district.

Rooms at this hotel are spacious and feature contemporary design. All come with air conditioning, satellite TV. Free wired internet access is also available.

Facilities at Eurohotel Diagonal Port include a continental breakfast.

Eurohotel Diagonal Port is located 7 minutes’ walk from Poblenou Metro Station, which is just 5 stops from central Barcelona. The hotel is just over 2 km from Ciutadella Park and the Forum venue is a 20-minute walk away.

The hotel offers easy access to the 22@ financial district, close to Barcelona International Convention Centre and shops. There is a Metro station and buses stop within 5 minutes' walk of the hotel.

name: Hostal Las Flores Ramblas
description:
This central guest house is on Barcelona’s Las Ramblas, beside Liceu Metro Station, and 50 metres from La Boqueria Market. It offers air-conditioned rooms, with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs.

Public parking is available near the Hostal Las Flores Ramblas, but the great location means the city’s main tourist sites can be visited on foot.

Barcelona Cathedral is a 5-minute walk away, and Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia can be reached in 10 minutes by Metro or bus.

Las Flores has a 24-hour front desk, allowing you to make the most of central Barcelona’s lively night life. There is also a tour desk, and luggage storage is possible.

name: El Avenida Palace
description:
El Avenida Palace Hotel is set on Barcelona’s Gran Via, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya, La Rambla and Paseo de Gracia. Its grand interior features an impressive staircase and marble columns.

Many famous guests have stayed at the Hotel Avenida Palace, including the Beatles in 1965.

The elegant air-conditioned rooms feature satellite TV and carpeted or parquet floors. Rooms are soundproofed and have a minibar, work desk and a safe.

The hotel's panoramic rooftop terrace offers views over the city, a sun deck and a swimming pool. There is also a lounge bar, a 24-hour front desk and both free WiFi and room service are available.

name: CIUDADELA PARK 1
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 59m²
description:
Located 1.5 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 1.6 km from Somorrostro Beach, CIUDADELA PARK 1 in Barcelona provides air-conditioned accommodation with views of the city and free WiFi. It is set 1.9 km from Barceloneta Beach and offers a lift. When staying at the apartment, guests can use private entrance.

Each unit comes with a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units have bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near CIUDADELA PARK 1 include Picasso Museum, Santa Maria del Mar and Port Olimpic. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Andante Hotel
description:
With a small rooftop pool offering great views over Barcelona, Andante Hotel is centrally located 350 metres from Drassanes Metro Station and La Rambla. It offers free Wi-Fi and a gym.

Modern air-conditioned rooms feature parquet floors, a laptop safe and flat-screen satellite TV. The bathroom comes with a full-length mirror and a high-powered hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast with show cooking is available. A gluten-free breakfast is available upon request. There is a self-service area with a microwave and vending machines for drinks, sandwiches and snacks, as well as a large terrace.

You can hire a car from the tour desk and a private shuttle from and to Barcelona El Prat Airport is available on prior request at an extra cost. There is a luggage storage room and a laundry and ironing service are offered.

The rooftop terrace will be closed for maintenance from January 15, 2024, to January 25, 2024.

name: Axel Hotel Barcelona & Urban Spa- Adults Only
description:
The area around the Hotel Axel Barcelona is known as the Gay-xample because of its lively gay scene. The staff has knowledge of the local gay scene, and the hotel is hetero-friendly too.

Offering free Wi-Fi throughout, this design hotel is close to Passeig de Gràcia's exclusive boutiques. The Axel Hotel’s 500m² Spa Centre includes a hydromassage pool and saunas, and the modern rooms have flat-screen satellite TVs.

The Axel’s Sky Bar features a large swimming pool, a terrace with a hot tub and a cocktail bar. Here you will find parties, art exhibitions and shows.

The Axel Hotel Barcelona & Urban Spa offers easy access to the Ramblas, the Picasso Museum and Gothic Quarter. The hotel occupies an attractive 19th-century building.

name: Occidental Barcelona 1929
description:
Occidental Barcelona 1929 features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and bar in Barcelona. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has city views and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 600 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Occidental Barcelona 1929 all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help.

Sants Railway Station is less than 1 km from Occidental Barcelona 1929, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from the hotel.

name: Alcam Baro SA
description:
Located in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, Alcam Baro SA features a terrace. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 2 km away.

The spacious apartment is equipped with 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a stovetop. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Park Güell is 1.3 km from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Alcam Baro SA.

name: Barceló Raval
description:
Set in Barcelona’s vibrant Raval district, this design hotel offers free Wi-Fi, a gym and a roof terrace with pool and panoramic views. Some rooms include a Nespresso coffee machine.

Each bright, air-conditioned room at the Barceló Raval features a large plasma-screen TV with more than 70 channels. Rooms have a minibar and a modern bathroom.

Hotel Barceló Raval’s B-Lounge serves creative Mediterranean food, tapas and cocktails in stylish surroundings. You can also enjoy a drink on the outdoor terrace.

The Raval Barceló is only a 5-minute walk from the MACBA Modern Art Gallery. Liceu Metro Station, Las Ramblas and the famous Boqueria Market are all just 400 metres away.

name: Express by gaiarooms
description:
Set in a renovated classical building, Express by gaiarooms is centrally located in Barcelona’s Gracia district. It is 5 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gracia Boulevard and offers free Wi-Fi throughout.

Featuring minimalist, elegant design, rooms at the Express by gaiarooms have central air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. They are also heated and have a safe. Most feature a private bathroom and some have shared bathroom facilities.

Many bars and restaurants in the trendy Gracia district are within a 5-minute walk of the Express guest house.

Express by gaiarooms is just 150 metres from Gracia FGC Train Station, while Fontana Metro Station is 500 metres away. You can reach La Rambla in 5 minutes by train.

name: Hotel Casa Fuster G.L Monumento
description:
This iconic, Modernist building is located at the head of Barcelona’s chic Passeig de Gracia Avenue. It has a sauna and gym, and a roof terrace with a pool and excellent views.

The luxurious Casa Fuster is a monument in itself, built in 1908 by the Modernist architect, Lluis Domènech i Montaner, and has the status of Speciality Monument. His work, including the hotel, is a designated UNESCO World Heritage Site.

The elegant air-conditioned rooms at Casa Fuster G.L Monumento feature satellite TV and a minibar. There is a private bathroom with a hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. Some rooms have a hydro-massage bath.

The Casa Fuster Hotel has a stylish restaurant, which serves Mediterranean cuisine. Room service is available, and there is a jazz bar and rooftop chill-out bar.

There is a concierge service and 24-hour front desk. You can hire a car from the tour desk, and parking is available nearby for an additional charge.

name: Hostal Balkonis
description:
Located in central Barcelona, Hostal Balkonis guest house offers a terrace, free Wi-Fi throughout. Sant Antoni Metro Station is just 80 metres away.

This property offers functional and modern rooms with a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries each. They all feature heating, air conditioning, flat-screen TV and a radio. Some have a balcony with garden and city views.

You can hire bicycles on site, allowing you to explore more of the city.

You will find bars and restaurants in the surrounding streets and the closest supermarket is just 30 metres away.

A 12-minute walk will take you to Barcelona’s La Rambla and Barceloneta Beach is 3 km away. Plaza de España, with direct buses to Barcelona Airport is 20 minutes’ walk from Hostal Balkonis.

name: Green House Hotel
description:
This modern hotel is located directly across from the Auditori and 50 metres from the National Theatre. It offers bright, air-conditioned rooms, 250 metres from Monumental Bull Ring.

Rooms at Green House Hotel Diagonal feature stylish, contemporary décor. Each includes a smart TV, safe box, desk and private bathroom with hairdryer.

Glories Shopping Centre is 500 metres away and Ciutadella Park and the Born district are 10 minutes’ walk away.

Other facilities include Airport Shuttle at an extra charge.

Green House Hotel is close to the Barcelona Encants Market and only 10 minutes’ walk from the iconic Sagrada Familia Basilica. Marina Metro Station is 400 metres away, 3 stops from Plaza Catalunya. Estacio del Nord Bus Station is 5 minutes’ walk away.

name: Happy People Ramblas Harbour Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Happy People Ramblas Harbour Apartments is just 5 minutes’ walk from Parallel Metro Station. It offers stylish air-conditioned apartments in the Poble Sec neighbourhood, close to cafés, bars and restaurants.

Each bright, spacious, open-plan apartment at Happy People Ramblas Harbour has high ceilings with exposed wooden beams, tiled floors and stylish décor. The living area has a sofa and a kitchen area with microwave and fridge. Free Wi-Fi is included.

On the last floor of the buiding there is a rooftop with the views to the city and where you can also enjoy  the swimming pool.

You can walk to Las Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter in just 15 minutes.

Barcelona’s port and cruise terminal are within 15 minutes’ walk of the apartments. Buses to Barceloneta’s beaches stop nearby.

name: Durlet Beach Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 54m²
description:
Located 200 metres from Bogatell and Mar Bella Beaches, Durlet Beach Apartments is set in Barcelona’s Poblenou district. It offers free high-speed WiFi and access to the shared roof terrace and pool.

Featuring modern décor and floor-to-ceiling windows, the air-conditioned apartments include a living-dining area with a sofa bed, a flat-screen TV and DVD player. There are international TV channels. The kitchenette is equipped with an oven, microwave, dishwasher and washing machine.

There are many restaurants, bars and shops in the area surrounding Durlet Beach Apartments. The buzzing, tree-lined street Rambla de Poblenou is just round the corner.

The Port Olimpic is a 15-minute walk away and offers elegant beach bars and popular night clubs. Poblenou Metro Station is 10 minutes’ walk from the apartments and connects you with the city centre in around 20 minutes.

name: Home to Home Barcelona
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Set just 500 metres from Plaza Espanya, Home to Home Barcelona offers modern, air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi. There is a shared terrace with a chill out zone and views of Montjuic.

Decorated in a minimalistic style, each apartment includes a living-dining area with a sofa bed and flat-screen satellite TV. Their kitchens are equipped with a microwave, electric hob, dishwasher and washer-dryer.

A wide range of shops, restaurants and bars can be found in the area. Arenas Shopping Centre is a 10-minute walk from the apartments and offers great views of the city from its rooftop.

Fira de Barcelona Convention Centre can also be reached in 10 minutes’ walk. Espanya Metro Station is 500 metres away and connects with Plaza Catalunya. Airport buses also stop in Plaza Espanya.

name: Aspasios Las Ramblas Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Aspasios Las Ramblas Apartments is located in central Barcelona, next to Palau Güell and 100 metres from the Rambla. It offers stylish, air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi, and some have a private terrace.
