The modern apartments feature a spacious, open-plan lounge-diner with a sofa and TV. The kitchenette includes a hob, microwave and Nespresso machine, as well as a dishwasher and washing machine. There is free Wi-Fi, and bed linen and towels are provided.

The apartments are 7 minutes’ walk from the seafront and the Boqueria Market. Located 250 metres away, Drassanes Metro Station connects you with the rest of the city with ease. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, located 10 minutes’ walk away.

name: Hotel Santa Marta
description:
Hotel Santa Marta is located just 100 metres from Barcelona’s fashionable Born area and França Railway Station. It offers simple, air-conditioned rooms with TV, tiled floors and private bathrooms.

Barceloneta Metro station is about 200 metres away, while the bars of Barceloneta can be reached in 5 minutes’ walk. The Gothic Quarter is also within 500 metres.

Hotel Santa Marta offers vending machines of drinks and snacks. There is a car park 5 minutes' walk from the property.

name: Hotel Villa Emilia
description:
This stylish design hotel is located 150 metres from Rocafort Metro Station in Barcelona. It offers a trendy rooftop bar and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and plasma satellite TV.

The soundproofed rooms at Hotel Villa Emilia feature parquet floors and modern décor. Each one has a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

Hotel Villa Emilia Barcelona’s restaurant serves creative Catalan food, and there is a weekly barbecue. The Villa Emilia Bistrot offers live music.

Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. There are also car and bicycle rental services at the front desk.

Hotel Villa Emilia is just 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza Espanya, where you can find the Fira Convention Centre. Sants Station is 15 minutes’ walk away.

name: Caledonian
description:
The Caledonian has an ideal setting on Barcelona's Gran Vía, just 5 minutes' walk from Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas. Its rooms include free Wi-Fi internet access.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Caledonian feature simple, attractive décor with wooden floors. Each has a minibar and some rooms offer views of Gran Vía.

The hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast in its dining room. There is a good selection of restaurants within 10 minutes’ walk of the Caledonian.

Universitat Metro Station is just 100 metres from the hotel and connects guests to sights such as Gaudí’s La Perdrera and the Sagrada Familia within 15 minutes.

Guests can make use of services such as the 24-hour front desk and express check-in and check-out. The hotel also has luggage storage.

name: Aparthotel Arai 4* Superior
description:
Set in the heart of Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, Aparthotel Arai 4* Superior features an outdoor swimming pool, a gym with a sauna, and a rooftop terrace with city views. from its two terraces with jacuzzi.

The Arai is set in an 18th-century building and features stunning frescos on the façades, which are part of the architectural Heritage, historical and artistic of Barcelona, which gives it the Speciality Monument status.

Rooms feature a stylish, rustic décor with exposed stone walls and large windows. The air-conditioned rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. They have a sofa and a small kitchenette with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. Private bathrooms include free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Aparthotel Arai features Restaurant Palosanto, a classic tavern offering  tapas and Kokka, the first Peruvian bar in Barcelona.

Las Ramblas Avenue and Liceu Metro Station are just 5 minutes’ walk away. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, 950 metres away. Barcelona’s Port Vell is 10 minutes’ walk from Aparthotel Arai 4* Superior.

name: Ola Living Born
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 24m²
description:
Ola Living Born offers accommodation within less than 1 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster. It is set 1.4 km from Somorrostro Beach and features a lift. The property is close to popular attractions like Santa Maria del Mar, Plaça Reial and Picasso Museum.

The units in the apartment complex are equipped with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, all units at the apartment complex have a TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms also feature a terrace. At the apartment complex, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Barceloneta Beach, Sant Miquel Beach and Cathedral of Barcelona. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Ola Living Born.

name: Hotel Lyon
description:
Set in the traditional, fishing district of Barceloneta, next to the central city beach. This hotel provides value and practical accommodation, ideal for those travelling on a budget.

After a hearty breakfast, head out along the impressive Barcelona beachfront. Stop for a morning coffee or a bite to eat, next to the waterfront. Here you can spend the day strolling around this charming neighbourhood, or you can walk into the Gothic Quarter, or the popular Born neighbourhood – 5 minutes’ walk away.

This hotel has a small social lounge, where you can sit and read, or chat with friends or fellow guests.

name: 08028 Apartments
description:
08028 Apartments are situated next to Les Corts Metro Station and 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Camp Nou Football Stadium. The modern apartments share a rooftop pool with views of Barcelona.

Apartments and suites at the 08028 feature contemporary design and free Wi-Fi. Apartments include a balcony, lounge area and a fitted kitchen.

The Taberna Lizarran at the 08028 Apartments serves traditional Spanish cuisine, including tapas.

The 08028 Apartments are a 15-minute walk from Sants Train Station. Plaza Catalunya and the famous Las Ramblas can be reached in around 20 minutes, by Metro.

name: INNSiDE by Meliá Barcelona Apolo
description:
INNSiDE by Meliá Barcelona Apolo is located at the foot of Montjuïc, 7 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Ramblas. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with WiFi.

Refurbished in 2017, the rooms at INNSiDE by Meliá Barcelona Apolo feature smart décor and wooden floors. Each one has a flat-screen TV, minibar, work desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

The hotel serves a varied buffet breakfast every morning. There is also a snack bar serving light meals in the evenings.

Parallel Metro Station is next to the hotel, connecting you with the Fira Convention Centre in 2 stops.

name: Cami Gallery Barcelona
description:
Set in the heart of Barcelona, Cami Gallery Barcelona is located 3 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya, the air-conditioned property has free Wi-Fi.

The stylish rooms feature a bathroom with free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are included.

Located on the first floor of the building, Cami Gallery Barcelona has a shared kitchen available for guests and a daily maid service. Offering a tour desk, the design property is within a 5-minute walk of a wide range of boutiques, bars and Catalan restaurants.

Urquinaona and Catalunya metro stations are 3 minutes’ walk away, while La Barceloneta Beach is 2 stops away by metro. The old town is a 10-minute walk away and Barcelona Airport is 15 km from the property.

name: Hostal La Terrassa
description:
Situated within 1.9 km of Somorrostro Beach and 180 meters of Boqueria Market, Hostal La Terrassa features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. Boasting a terrace, this property is set a short distance from Cathedral of Barcelona, Passeig de Gracia and Plaça Catalunya. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a tour desk and ticket service for guests.

At the guest house, rooms come with a wardrobe.

Plaça Reial is 500 meters from Hostal La Terrassa, while Portal de l'Angel is 950 meters from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

name: Estudio para parejas
description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.6 km from Palau Sant Jordi and 3 km from Montjuïc, Estudio para parejas offers air conditioning. The property is around 4.5 km from Camp Nou, 4.7 km from Sants Railway Station and 5.5 km from Plaça Catalunya. The property is non-smoking and is located 3 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment features a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and fridge. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Boqueria Market is 5.8 km from the apartment, while Portal de l'Angel is 5.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from Estudio para parejas.

name: Good-Home Paseo de Gracia
description:
Good-Home Paseo de Gracia is located in Barcelona. Free WiFi access is available. Each room here will provide you with a TV, air conditioning and a balcony or terrace.

All air-conditioned rooms have a flat-screen TV, safe, and seating area. The private bathroom includes a shower and hairdryer.

This bed and breakfast offers a simple self-service breakfast, including toasts, pastries, and cereals. Complete with a microwave, the dining area also has a refrigerator and an electric kettle. There is a coffee and tea machine, available from 8:00 to 12:00. Other facilities offered at the property include a tour desk.

The bed and breakfast is 200 metres from Diagonal, 200 metres from La Pedrera and 1 km from Passeig de Gracia Station. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

name: EasySleep Eixample
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Situated just 5 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia in the stylish Eixample District, EasySleep Eixample offers air conditioning and free WiFi.

EasySleep Eixample´s apartments include a kitchen equipped with a microwave, fridge and washing machine. There is also a tea and coffee maker.

The chic lounge in the Sicilia features a dining table and chairs as well as a large sofa. Each apartment also includes a private bathroom complete with a hairdryer.

Monumental Metro Station is just 200 metres from the apartments. Barcelona’s famous Diagonal Avenue is less than 5 minutes’ walk away with many shops, restaurants and bars.

name: Suite Home Sagrada Familia
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 90m²
description:
Situated on tree-lined Gaudí Avenue, Suite Home Barcelona is just 250 m from the Sagrada Familia cathedral. Some apartments offer views of Barcelona’s famous monument. Some apartments offer views of Barcelona’s famous monument. All apartments are fully-equipped and air-conditioned. Free Wi-fi is available.

The stylish apartments have parquet flooring and contemporary furniture. The spacious living and dining area is equipped with a flat-screen TV, and CD player. A free safe is also provided.

The kitchen features an electric hob, oven, dishwasher and microwave. A washing machine and ironing facilities are also included.

Suite Home’s luxury apartments are within walking distance of several cafés, restaurants and supermarkets.

name: Youth Hostel - Central and Basic Universitat
description:
Set in the lively Ciutat Vella District, next to the MACBA Museum, it is 5 minutes’ walk from Plaça Universitat Square.

Decorated with bright colours, all the rooms come with single beds which can be joined together and some have a private bathroom with shower. Free toiletries are also provided.

Central & Basic Universitat is surrounded by a wide range of shops and supermarkets. You can find some of the trendiest restaurants and bars of the city in a 5-minute walk.

The Ramblas and Boquería Market are 800 metres away and you can walk to Plaça Catalunya Square in about 10 minutes’ walk. El Prat Barcelona Airport is 30 minutes by public transport. Regular buses leave from a bus stop located just 800 metres away.

name: Catalonia Passeig de Gràcia 4* Sup
description:
Located next to Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia Boulevard, Catalonia Passeig de Gràcia 4* Sup offers an outdoor pool, a free gym, a terrace, free Wi-Fi and paid private parking.

All the rooms at Catalonia Passeig de Gràcia 4* Sup has a smart TV with Chromecast app.

The restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine with a selection of dishes from the "Gourmet Corner" menu. Gluten-free menus are available on request.

There is also a gastrobar and a bar with a cocktail menu. An electric vehicle charging station is available.

The property is 500 metres from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló, 200 metres from Passeig de Gràcia Metro Station, 13-minute walk from La Pedrera and 7-minute walk from Palau de la Música Catalana. Airport buses can be reached within 350 metres.

Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, located 350 metres away.

name: Ilunion Almirante
description:
Located between the Gothic Quarter and the fashionable Born district, this stylish hotel has a fitness centre and free WiFi in all areas.

Barcelona Cathedral is just 200 metres from the Ilunion Almirante, and guests can walk to the famous Las Ramblas in less than 10 minutes. Jaume I Metro Station is 300 metres from the hotel.

Rooms feature wooden furniture and an en suite bathroom with marble finishes. They all include a large flat-screen TV with satellite channels, safe and minibar.

This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment.

The Ilunion Almirante features a stylish breakfast room where an à-la-carte breakfast is served daily. Room service is available during limited hours.

This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

name: Sagrada Familia
description:
Sagrada Familia is located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 600 metres from Sagrada Familia, 1.3 km from La Pedrera and 1.4 km from Casa Batllo. The property is situated 2.6 km from Picasso Museum, 1.7 km from Tivoli Theatre and 2.8 km from Portal de l'Angel. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.9 km away.

Leading onto a terrace, this air-conditioned apartment comes with 1 separate bedroom and a fully equipped kitchen. A flat-screen TV is provided. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Sagrada Familia.

name: BcnStop Parc Güell
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Set 350 metres from Park Güell in Barcelona's quiet Gracia district, BcnStop Parc Güell apartments have air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. Vallcarca Metro Station is just 220 metres away.

The BcnStop Parc Güell apartments are heated and have a fully equipped kitchen, TV and either one or two bathrooms. Apartments with a private balcony or terrace available for a small surcharge.

Towels, bed linen and soap are included at BcnStop Parc Güell.
At reception you can request a laundry service and tourist information.

You can reach Plaça Catalunya and the Ramblas, the heart of Barcelona, in just 10 minutes by metro. There is a bus stop opposite the apartments, and there is private parking just 40 metres away that can also be reserved in advance for a small surcharge.

name: Fira Apartments by gaiarooms
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Located next to the Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Centre, these bright modern apartments offer free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Plaza Espanya Square is just 50 metres away.

Each stylish Ding Dong Fira Apartment is decorated in light colours, with smart wooden floors. Apartments have a lounge with a sofa bed, and air conditioning and heating is available in the lounge only.

There is a well-equipped open-plan kitchenette with a washing machine, microwave, toaster, Nespresso coffee machine and utensils. Towels and bed linen are provided and there is a hairdryer.

A range of bars, restaurants and shops can be found within a 5-minute walk of the Fira Apartments by gaiarooms. The famous Magic Fountain and Las Arenas Shopping Centre are both within 100 metres.

Espanya Metro Station, 250 metres away, offers direct metro services within 10 minutes to Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas. Sants International Train Station is within a 500 metre walk of the apartments or can be reached by direct metro line. Buses to and from the airport, as well as city tour buses, stop 3 minutes' walk from the apartments.

name: Mosaic Barcelona by Ona
description_short: Private suite
description:
Located in a historic building in the heart of Rambla Catalunya, Mosaic Barcelona by Ona is situated in Barcelona, 10 minutes' walk from Plaça Catalunya and 5 minutes' walk from Casa Batllo and La Pedrera. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property

Every room at this hotel is air conditioned, and features a flat-screen TV and modern décor. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. The rooms include a private bathroom fitted with a shower.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. The hotel also offers car hire.

Due to its central location, several bars and restaurants can be found nearby.

The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Mosaic Barcelona by Ona.

name: Aspasios Garden Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
800 metres from Casa Batllo, Aspasios Garden Apartments is a sustainable apartment set in Barcelona and has a garden, free WiFi and outdoor swimming pool. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. The property is 1.3 km from the city centre and 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Aspasios Garden Apartments.

name: AC Hotel Barcelona Fórum by Marriott
description:
AC Hotel Barcelona Forum is located opposite Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre, at the end of Avenida Diagonal. It offers a rooftop pool and modern rooms with Mediterranean Sea views. Free WiFi is available in all areas.

All stylish rooms come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and minibar. The private bathrooms have a hairdryer.

The Suite Bar offers healthy Mediterranean food, including tapas and bluefin tuna. Room service is available 24 hours a day, and there is a safe in reception.

AC Hotel Barcelona Forum is 500 metres from Maresme Metro Station. From here you can reach Passeig de Gràcia in central Barcelona in 15 minutes. Barcelona Airport is 19 km away.

name: Habitat Apartments Hot Jazz
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 62m²
description:
Featuring a terrace and views of quiet street, Habitat Apartments Hot Jazz is a sustainable aparthotel located in Barcelona, 3 km from La Pedrera. It is set 3.5 km from Casa Batllo and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 1.1 km away.

The aparthotel will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. There is also a dining area and a fully equipped kitchen equipped with a microwave, a toaster, and a fridge. At the aparthotel, all units have bed linen and towels.

Dining options are available close to the aparthotel.

Park Güell is 3.9 km from Habitat Apartments Hot Jazz, while Passeig de Gracia is 3.9 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Rec Barcelona - Adults Only
description:
Conveniently set in the centre of Barcelona, Hotel Rec Barcelona - Adults Only provides air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a shared lounge. 2 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2 km from Barceloneta Beach, the property offers a terrace and a bar. Private parking is available on site.

At the hotel, each room is equipped with a desk. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, certain rooms at Hotel Rec Barcelona - Adults Only also offer a city view. At the accommodation each room includes bed linen and towels.

A continental, vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area.

Popular points of interest near Hotel Rec Barcelona - Adults Only include Picasso Museum, Santa Maria del Mar and Cathedral of Barcelona. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

name: Abba Garden
description:
This modern hotel is situated on the northern edge of the city of Barcelona, near Avinguda Diagonal and Barcelona FC's famous stadium, Camp Nou. Guests have free access to the seasonal outdoor pool, the gym, and the wellness area that is equipped with sauna, hot tub and Turkish bath. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.

The exterior facing rooms feature a flat-screen TV, minibar, and a safe. The bathroom comes with free toiletries, bath, and hairdryer.

Stroll around the gardens of the Abba Garden Hotel. There is also a paddle court, so you can play a quick game.

Grab a bite to eat in the snack bar in the evening - complete with terrace.

Zona Universitaria Metro Station that takes you to the Barcelona city centre is a 10-minute walk away. Metro Line 9 is a 13-minute walk away and it takes you to the airport within 15 minutes and to La Fira within 30 minutes.

name: Flor Parks
description:
Featuring a roof terrace and free Wi-Fi, Flor Parks is set on Barcelona’s Las Ramblas, beside Liceu Metro Station. Located 200 metres from La Boqueria Market, it offers soundproofed rooms.

The Flor Parks' air-conditioned rooms have a balcony, satellite TV and a minibar. Their private bathrooms have hairdryers and some have hydromassage baths.

Set menu and à la carte dishes are served at the Hotel Flor’s restaurant. A continental breakfast is available. There is also a snack bar and café.

The hotel’s central location makes it perfect for exploring the city’s Gothic Quarter and Barcelona Cathedral is just 10 minutes’ walk away. The Port and Maremagnum Shopping Centre are less than 1 km from the Flor Parks.

name: Minutes to the beach, near Convention Centre and free parking
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Llevant and 1.2 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach, Minutes to the beach, near Convention Centre and free parking offers a terrace and air conditioning. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Outdoor dining is also possible at the apartment.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and city views has 3 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Mar Bella Beach is 1.6 km from Minutes to the beach, near Convention Centre and free parking, while Sagrada Familia is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

name: Lodging Apartments Forum 15 - Barcelona Forum apartment with sea view
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 98m²
description:
Offering a garden and sea view, Lodging Apartments Forum 15 - Barcelona Forum apartment with sea view is located in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Forum Beach and 1.3 km from Llevant. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.7 km from Platja del Litoral.

Featuring a Blu-ray player, the spacious apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, a living room with a seating area and a dining area, 3 bedrooms, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and a bidet. The unit is air conditioned and includes a terrace with an outdoor dining area as well as a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The property offers city views.

Port Olimpic is 4.5 km from the apartment, while Sagrada Familia is 4.7 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from Lodging Apartments Forum 15 - Barcelona Forum apartment with sea view.

name: Casa Gracia Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²
description:
Casa Gracia Apartments features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, 300 metres from La Pedrera, less than 1 km from Casa Batllo and a 14-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. When staying at the apartment, guests can use private entrance.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom, while some feature a terrace or a balcony. At the apartment complex, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near Casa Gracia Apartments include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Barrio Gotico Apartments Ferran
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 30m²
description:
Set within 2 km of Sant Sebastian Beach and 2 km of Sant Miquel Beach in the centre of Barcelona, Barrio Gotico Apartments Ferran offers accommodation with free WiFi, seating area and a kitchen. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment has family rooms.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a microwave, a toaster, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. There is also a fridge, kitchenware and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units have bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Plaça Reial, Plaça Catalunya and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Barrio Gotico Apartments Ferran.

name: Fantastic views apartment Forum/Diagonal Mar
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 120m²
description:
Located in Barcelona and only 1.2 km from Llevant, Fantastic views apartment Forum/Diagonal Mar provides accommodation with mountain views, free WiFi and free private parking. This apartment offers air-conditioned accommodation with a patio. The apartment features an outdoor swimming pool and a lift.

The spacious apartment with a terrace and sea views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Guests can also relax in the garden.

Forum Beach is 1.2 km from the apartment, while Platja del Litoral is 1.7 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 17 km from Fantastic views apartment Forum/Diagonal Mar, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: My Space Barcelona Executive Apartments Center
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 65m²
description:
These functional apartments are set in the Sarria district. They offer a spacious furnished balcony and free Wi-Fi, 5 minutes’ walk from Muntaner FGC Train Station.

These apartments feature modern décor and 1 double and 2 twin bedrooms. Lounge-diners have a spacious sofa and TV, while modern kitchens include a washing machine, dishwasher, oven and hob.

There are several bars, restaurants and shops within 5 minutes’ walk and the Galvany Market is 700 metres away. There are also a number of exclusive medical clinics within 5 minutes’ walk.

My Space Barcelona Executive Apartments have private parking for a fee and are 2 km from Park Guell. The historic centre is 3.5 km and you can catch a bus 100 metres away.  Muntaner FGC Train Station is 3 stops from Plaza Catalunya.

name: Barcelona Hotel Colonial
description:
This elegant hotel is set in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, in an impressive, colonial, stone building with a clock tower. It is a 10-minute walk from Barcelona Cathedral and Barceloneta Beach.

Hotel Colonial’s bright, air-conditioned rooms feature wooden floors. They are soundproofed and have a flat-screen TV and minibar. You can hire the safe, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

A buffet breakfast is served in the Colonial Hotel café. Guests can relax with a free newspaper in the stylish lounge, with its white leather sofas, where Wi-Fi is free of charge.

Barcelona Hotel Colonial has a tour desk. Barcelona Marina and the boutiques of the trendy Born district are 5 minutes’ walk away. Parking is also available within a 5-minute walk of the property.

name: Pierre & Vacances Barcelona Sants
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Pierre & Vacances Barcelona Sants offers stylish air-conditioned accommodation, just a 5-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium. Free high-speed WiFi is available.

Each bright apartment and studio has a well-equipped kitchenette and flat-screen satellite TV.

All the Pierre & Vacances apartments and studios have functional modern décor and street views. Kitchen facilities include a fridge, microwave and dishwasher. A safe is available at an extra cost.

Pierre & Vacances Barcelona Sants is situated in the lively Sants neighbourhood, home to a wide range of shops, bars and cafés.

Just 200 metres away, Badal Metro Station connects with Sants Train Station in under 10 minutes. Collblanc metro station with direct trains to Barcelona Airport and Europa Fira is 500 metres away.

name: SPACIOUS YACHT HOTEL BARCELONA CITY CENTER 5 CABINs
description:
Boasting a terrace and barbecue facilities, SPACIOUS YACHT HOTEL BARCELONA CITY CENTER 5 CABINs features accommodation in Barcelona with free WiFi and sea views. The accommodation offers a shared kitchen and a minimarket for guests.

Some accommodation includes a flat-screen TV, as well as air conditioning and an outdoor dining area.

The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from the boat.

name: Central and Basic Solarium HOSTEL
description:
A 5-minute walk from Las Ramblas and Drassanes Metro Station, Pensión Solárium is set in Barcelona’s Ciutat Vella district. It has a lounge and a small terrace, where free Wi-Fi is available.

Pensión Solárium has simple, modern décor. Its rooms have either private or shared bathroom facilities.

The Pensión is within 10 minutes’ walk of a range of cafes and bars. The Raval and nearby Gothic Quarter offer a selection of popular restaurants.

Barcelona’s old Port is 500 metres away, while the beaches around Barceloneta are a 20-minute bus journey from the Solárium. Airport buses leave from Plaza de Catalunya, 2 Metro stops from Drassanes Station.

name: Hotel Serhs del Port
description:
Set on Paral-lel Avenue, this modern design hotel is just a 5-minute walk from the famous Las Ramblas and Barcelona Port. Its stylish, air-conditioned rooms feature free WiFi and a satellite TV.

Hotel Serhs del Port´s modern rooms offer a safe. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Montjuïc Hill is within a 10-minute walk of Hotel Serhs del Port. A funicular train connects Montjuïc with Paral-lel Metro Station, located 500 metres from the hotel.

Direct Metro services also connect Paral-lel to Plaça Catalunya Square, Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard and Gaudí’s famous Parc Guëll. Hotel Serhs del Port´s tour desk can provide information about the city.

name: Hotel Best Aranea
description:
The modern Hotel Aranea is a 5-minute walk from Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia. It offers free Wi-Fi, and a roof terrace with sun loungers and Barcelona city centre views.

Monumental Metro Station and Bullring are just 400 metres from Hotel Aranea. You can reach Plaça Catalunya and La Rambla in 10 minutes by bus or Metro.

Modern, air-conditioned rooms feature parquet floors and satellite TV. Windows are double-glazed, and there is a safe and minibar. The bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities, as well as a bath or shower.

The Aranea restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and Mediterranean buffet lunch. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona.

name: Be Barcelona Eixample Urquinaona II
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Offering free Wi-Fi, Be Barcelona Eixample Urquinaona II is located in Barcelona’s Eixample District, 600 metres from Plaça Catalunya. The property offers air-conditioned apartments with modern décor and private balcony.

Each 2-bedroom apartment has a living room with a sofa, flat-screen TV and DVD player. A ceramic hob, oven and washing machine are included in the kitchen. The bathroom comes with a bathtub and bidet.

A wide variety of bars, restaurants and supermarkets can be found in the area. The Mercat de Born food market is 10 minutes’ walk away.

The Ciutadella Park and the Gothic District can be reached within a 10-minute walk. Urquinaona Metro Station, 300 metres from the apartments, offers connection to La Barceloneta Beach and Barcelona Forum.

name: Sunotel Aston
description:
Featuring a rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool and hot tub, as well as panoramic views of Barcelona, Sunotel Aston is a 3-minute walk from Hospital Clinic Metro Station.

Air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV, soundproofed windows and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Free, high-speed WiFi is available.

An extensive buffet breakfast is served at the hotel. The hotel’s Pa'l Caldero Restaurant offers a wide selection of dishes from around the world. There are also many eating options in the area.

Sunotel Aston has a 24-hour reception and offers services such as luggage storage, free pool towels and free bikes.

Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas can be reached in around 15 minutes by public transport; while Barcelona’s famous Sagrada Familia Cathedral is around 10 minutes away.

name: H10 Casa Mimosa 4* Sup
description:
Housed in a 19th- century modernist building, just behind La Pedrera, H10 Casa Mimosa offers an impressive chill-out terrace with a plunge pool and a sun lounger area with privileged views of Casa Milà’s terrace.

All rooms are outward-facing, with both views over Pau Claris Street or over the courtyard garden which has Gaudí’s chimneys in the background. All have smart temperature control and high-quality amenities including a Nespresso Coffee Machine and a digital safe box. Some rooms also have spacious terraces.

The on-site El Til•ler Restaurant serves a delicious breakfast with a buffet consisting of natural products and a selection of à la carte dishes. The Lobby Bar also offers light meals and is also an excellent meeting point for a drink.

The beautiful garden retains some former cabins which are located in a courtyard that is typical of the Eixample district; and has a large variety of Mediterranean greenery such as a century-old palm tree, an impressive lime tree and mimosas, which give the hotel’s name. In the garden there is also an elevated swimming pool and a sun lounger area.

From here, there is access to the Las Cocheras meeting room, a former garage with high-ceilings and a capacity up to 100 people.

Ideally located, H10 Casa Mimosa is 10 minutes’ walk from Casa Battló; Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas can be reached within 15 minutes’ walk. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout.

name: Suites Center Barcelona
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 58m²
description:
These stylish apartments are on Barcelona’s famous Passeig de Gràcia, in the heart of the Eixample. Each comes with free Wi-Fi, plasma-screen satellite TVs and a modern kitchen.

Suites Center Barcelona offers apartments with DVD and CD player, washing machine and a kettle. They feature full heating and air conditioning, soundproofing and a bathroom with shower.

Private parking is available at Suites Center Barcelona. There is also 24-hour reception.

The Suites are only 20 metres from the Modernist Casa Fuster, a short walk from the popular Gràcia neighbourhood. Diagonal Metro Station is 200 metres away and offers direct access to Plaça Catalunya and the Rambla.

name: Hotel Vilamarí
description:
Hotel Vilamarí is set 250 metres from Plaza de Espanya Metro Station and the Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Centre. This hotel features a terrace and a small gym with Turkish Bath.

The Vilamarí’s rooms have simple, elegant décor and dark wood furniture. Each room includes flat-screen satellite TV. The stylish bathrooms come with amenities and a hairdryer. The hotel features centrally controlled air conditioned or heating depending on the season.

Barcelona’s MNAC Art Museum and the Magic Fountains are within a 10-minute walk of the hotel. Las Arenas Shopping Centre is just 200 metres away. Barcelona Port is a 15-minute metro ride away and Barcelona Beach can be reached in 35 minutes.

name: BYPILLOW House
description:
BYPILLOW House offers air-conditioned rooms with balcony and free WiFi and private parking. The property is 300 metres from Maragall Metro Station connected to famous Sagrada Familia and o the popular sandy Barceloneta Beach in Barcelona.

Fitted with wooden floor, bright rooms have an en suite bathroom with free toiletries and bath or shower. Suites come with 2 separate areas with 2 double beds.

Buses to the city centre leave from a bus station located 200 metres away. Plaza Catalunya is 30 minutes by public transports and you can reach fashionable Passeig de Gracia in 20 minutes by metro.

name: Exe Cristal Palace
description:
The Exe Cristal Palace is very well located next to the prestigious Passeig de Gràcia, the main shopping area and most important places of interest in Barcelona. All rooms at the Exe Cristal Palace have air conditioning, a safe, satellite TV, a minibar, a desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries.

Exe Cristal Palace rooms have a safe and a minibar and feature wooden floors. There is a work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

Exe Cristal Palace has a 24-hour front desk. You can hire a car from the tour desk, and on-site parking is available for an additional charge. The hotel serves a varied buffet breakfast, including a healthy corner option.

The buffet breakfast includes a wide variety of dishes and an area with juices and coffees.

The hotel is a 5-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and Casa Batlló.

name: Cosmopolitan Boutique Rambla
description:
Located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, Cosmopolitan Boutique Rambla is only 200 metres from Gaudi’s famous La Pedrera. This guest house offers rooms with free WiFi.

Rooms at the Cosmopolitan Boutique Rambla have typical tiled floors and high ceilings. All rooms have heating, TV, and private bathroom. Some have a balcony with city views.

Cosmopolitan Boutique Rambla is set on Rambla Catalunya, a tree-lined avenue full of shops, cafés and tapas bars.

Passeig de Gracia is 100 metres away, and Diagonal Metro Station is within 50 metres. Las Ramblas, Sagrada Familia and Camp Nou Stadium are all just a few stops away by Metro.

name: Sixtytwo Hotel
description:
Situated next to Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia Station, this boutique hotel offers a stylish lounge. Rooms include a flat-screen TV and free WiFi.

The Sixtytwo Hotel is set in a typical 19th-century building. Each elegant room comes with a Nespresso coffee machine and a minibar. Some overlook Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, while others overlook the hotel´s charming Japanese-style garden.

A continental breakfast is served daily at a cafe nearby. Staff at the 24-hour reception can help arrange car hire.

This boutique hotel offers 45 spacious and stylish rooms. It is situated in Barcelona's famous Passeig de Gràcia, next to Diagonal Avenue, the city’s best shopping area, where you can also find a wide variety of restaurants and tapas bars.

Hotel Sixtytwo is across the road from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló, and La Pedrera is just 3 minutes' walk away. It is just a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya. Nearby Passeig de Gràcia Station offers Metro services and direct airport trains.

name: Apartments Sixtyfour
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
Apartments Sixtyfour are situated on Passeig de Gracia Boulevard, opposite the famous Gaudi building, Casa Batlló. These design apartments have air conditioning and a flat-screen TV.

Apartments Sixtyfour are a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya Square and Las Ramblas. The apartments are next to Passeig de Gracia Station. This Metro and train station offers direct links to Barcelona Airport. The property offers information on other touristic options in the city.

Each apartment has wooden floors and elegant modern décor. Living areas come with a double sofa bed. The stylish kitchens include an oven, ceramic hob and dishwasher.

A continental breakfast is served in a cafeteria nearby.

Bed linen and towels are included in all apartments. Basic cleaning products and cooking items are also provided. Several supermarkets can be found within 800 metres of the apartments.

name: Vi l'Art Wine Lodge
description:
With mountain views, Vi l'Art Wine Lodge is situated in Barcelona and has a restaurant, a tour desk, bar, garden, seasonal outdoor pool and terrace. Both WiFi and private parking are accessible at the lodge free of charge.

A patio with garden views is offered in all units.

Guests at Vi l'Art Wine Lodge can enjoy a continental breakfast.

A bicycle rental service is available at the accommodation.

Camp Nou is 43 km from Vi l'Art Wine Lodge, while Tibidabo Amusement Park is 44 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 49 km from the lodge.

name: Som Nit Port Vell
description:
Set in the centre of Barcelona, Som Nit Port Vell is a sustainable accommodation, which offers soundproof rooms. Among the facilities at this property are full-day security and a housekeeping service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The guest house will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At the guest house, units come with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available within easy reach of the property.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Sant Miquel Beach, Barceloneta Beach and Santa Maria del Mar. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Som Nit Port Vell.

name: Hotel Ciutadella Barcelona
description:
Offering beautiful, stylish rooms Hotel Ciutadella Barcelona has an ideal central setting within 300 metres of Santa María del Mar Church, Ciutadella Park and Barceloneta Metro Station. It offers easy access to the historic Born and Gothic districts.

Each air-conditioned room at Hotel Ciutadella Barcelona has contemporary décor. All rooms have a TV and a private bathroom.

Bars and cafés can be found along Passeig del Born, 200 metres away. There are several seafood restaurants along the seaside Passeig de Joan de Borbó, a 5-minute walk from the Hotel Ciutadella.

The nearest beaches can be reached in 15 minutes by foot. Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are within 2 km of the hotel.

name: Oriente Atiram
description:
The Atiram Oriente is located on Las Ramblas, between the Liceu Theatre and the Columbus Monument. Set in a 19th-century building, this hotel features a restaurant, terrace and free Wi-Fi.

All rooms have satellite TV and an en suite bathroom with a hairdryer. Each has simple, contemporary décor with heating and air conditioning.

The hotel’s pretty restaurant serves buffet cuisine and a daily continental breakfast. There is a 24-hour reception and a tour desk. The Atiram Oriente Barcelona also has a café on the Ramblas, close to many shops and restaurants.

The famous Boquería Market and Gothic Quarter are just a few minutes’ walk from the Hotel Atiram Oriente. Barcelona’s Port Vell is less than 500 metres away and Liceu Metro Station is 1 minute walk from the hotel.

name: EasySleep Gaudi Terrace
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
EasySleep Gaudi Terrace is located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 5 minutes’ walk from Verdaguer Metro Station. These apartments feature balconies, free Wi-Fi access and well-equipped kitchens.

Each apartment at EasySleep Gaudi Terrace features contemporary décor and wooden floors. Each has a seating area with TV, bathroom and kitchen with microwave, hob and coffee maker. Bed linen and towels are included.

The apartments are within walking distance of many restaurants and shops. Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia and Passeig de Gràcia boulevard are both a 10-minute walk from the apartments.

Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are just over 1 km from the apartments. Sants Train Station can be reached in around 25 minutes, by Metro.

name: Petit Palace Boqueria Garden
description:
The Petit Palace Boqueria Garden is set in a historic 19th-century building by La Boqueria Market, 10 meters from Las Ramblas, and offers free high-speed WiFi and free bicycle use (subject to availability).

Each room at the Petit Palace Boqueria Garden includes a flat-screen TV and laptop safe, and a private bathroom. The hotel also offers an electric scooter hire service, subject to availability.

The hotel's bar is set by a private courtyard and garden with hundred-year-old trees, a listed site of architectural heritage in Barcelona.

Petit Palace Boqueria Garden is located in Barcelona's Gothic Quarter, just a 1-minute walk from Liceu Metro Station, offering convenient transport around the city. Plaça Catalunya Square is 800 meters away, and you can walk to Barcelona Port in 8 minutes.

name: Sixties Ramblas
description:
Offering a 1960’s vibe and rooms with vintage décor, this hotel is set in the heart of Barcelona, only 2 minutes’ walk from the famous Ramblas.  Free Wi-Fi is available throughout.

Each air-conditioned room at Sixties Ramblas features a TV and a private bathroom. Most rooms have a balcony.

Sixties Ramblas has a bar and a restaurant. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide tourist information about the area. Bike rental services are also available, and there is also a stylish white billiards table.

The nearest Metro Station is Drassanes, only 2 minutes’ walk from the hotel. You can also walk to the harbour or Plaza Catalunya Square in less than 10 minutes.

Sixties Ramblas is close to the Born district, with numerous trendy bars and restaurants serving local and international food.

name: RAMBLAS HOTEL powered by Vincci Hoteles
description:
RAMBLAS HOTEL powered by Vincci Hoteles is set in the centre of Barcelona’s old town, a few metres from Las Ramblas. This stylish hotel offers free WiFi and rooms with satellite TV.

 RAMBLAS HOTEL powered by Vincci Hoteles features contemporary design and modern rooms decorated elegantly. Each room has air conditioning, a minibar and a desk.

 RAMBLAS HOTEL powered by Vincci Hoteles is ideally situated for visiting Barcelona’s main attractions. There are several restaurants, bars and cafés in the nearby Gothic Quarter and the famous Boquería Market is less than 100 metres away.

Barcelona Port is a 10-minute walk from the hotel and the city’s cathedral is one kilometre away. Liceu Metro Station and Liceu Theatre are a 1-minute walk from the  RAMBLAS HOTEL powered by Vincci Hoteles.

name: Rooms in Gothic
description:
Ideally set in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, Rooms in Gothic is set 1.5 km from Sant Sebastian Beach, 1.6 km from Barceloneta Beach and 500 metres from Cathedral of Barcelona. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 1.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach, and within less than 1 km of the city centre.

All guest rooms feature a shared bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen.

Popular points of interest near the hostel include Plaça Reial, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Rooms in Gothic.

name: Barcelonaforrent The Claris Suites
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
Barcelonaforrent The Claris Suites offers apartments with air conditioning and free WiFi in central Barcelona, 300 metres from Gaudi's La Pedrera.

Offering a balcony, each modern apartment combines chic and modernist decoration and has a flat-screen TV, speakers with Bluetooth connectivity, iPod dock. There is a full kitchen with a dishwasher, microwave and Nespresso coffee machine. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are included. You can enjoy a city view from the apartment.

There are plenty of shops, bars and restaurants in the surroundings, and Diagonal Metro is 550 metres away.

You can walk to Plaça Catalunya Square in 12 minutes, and Gaudi's La Sagrada Familia is 1.5 km away.

name: BBarcelona Còrsega Flats
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 90m²
description:
BBarcelona Còrsega Flats offers 3 elegant, minimalist apartments within 10 minutes´ walking distance to the central Boulevards, Rambla de Cataluña and Paseo de Gracia. Free WiFi and air conditioning are available.

All apartments come with a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and coffee machine. 2 of the apartments offer a small balcony with city views, and another features a furnished terrace.

Many restaurants, bars and shops can be found in the surrounding streets. The nearest supermarket is less than 100 metres from the apartment.

You can reach Sagrada Familia in a 15-minute metro ride. Sants Train Station is just 10 minutes’ walk away and trains to Barcelona Airport leave from there.

name: Grums Hotel & Spa
description:
The modern Hotel Grums is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes' walk from Barcelona’s port, ferry terminal and cruise terminal. The Ramblas are 600 metres away, and Parallel Metro Station 300 metres away.

Hotel Grums Barcelona offers elegant, bright and spacious rooms with themed design décor and panoramic floor-to-ceiling windows. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout.

All our rooms have free RITUALS Cosmetics amenities.

The Hotel Grums Barcelona features a wellness spa which is not included in the room rate and can be accessed for a small surcharge. Guests can relax in the hot tub, Finnish sauna or steam bath. A selection of massage and treatments are also available at an extra cost.

name: Via Sants Hotel Barcelona, Tapestry Collection By Hilton
description:
Via Sants Hotel Barcelona, Tapestry Collection By Hilton features a garden, shared lounge, a terrace and bar in Barcelona. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is allergy-free and is located 500 metres from Sants Railway Station.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Via Sants Hotel Barcelona, Tapestry Collection By Hilton every room is equipped with bed linen and towels.

At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving American, Mediterranean and Spanish cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested.

Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.5 km from Via Sants Hotel Barcelona, Tapestry Collection By Hilton, while La Pedrera is 3 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from the hotel.

name: Atlantis by Atbcn
description:
Hotel Atlantis can be found less than 100 metres from Plaza Catalunya and Universitat Metro Station in Barcelona. It offers attractive rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

The hotel features lounge areas with sofas where guests can relax. Car rental can be arranged at the 24-hour reception.

A hot and cold breakfast buffet is served in the hotel dining room.

The air-conditioned rooms at Atlantis include a spacious marble bathroom complete with a hairdryer. There is also a laptop safe.

The Gothic Quarter is less than 10 minutes’ walk from Atlantis Hotel. The Picasso Museum and El Born district are also within a short walk.

name: Sweet Inn - Avenida Roma
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
Sweet Inn - Avenida Roma has air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, 1.6 km from Sants Railway Station, 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.6 km from Plaça Catalunya. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Casa Batllo is 1.2 km away.

Each unit features a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with bidet and free toiletries. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, La Pedrera and Boqueria Market. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Sweet Inn - Avenida Roma.

name: Hotel Best 4 Barcelona
description:
This stylish hotel offers a gym and free Wi-Fi. It is set on a quiet street just 6 minutes’ walk from Bogatell Beach and 300 metres from Llacuna Metro Station.

The bright, air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel 4 Barcelona hotel are modern and elegant, with wooden floors. All have flat-screen satellite TV, and some have views of the sea or city.

The Hotel 4 Barcelona’s restaurant offers Mediterranean dishes, and there is also a stylish bar. The surrounding area has several popular restaurants and bars.

The hotel offers a sauna and steam baths, available for an extra cost. The gym is available for an extra cost, and massage can be arranged. It also has a 24-hour reception with bicycle rental

Hotel 4 is set in the 22@ Technological District, 1 km from Ciutadella Park and 600 metres from the Olympic Port.

name: limehome Barcelona Carrer de Besalú 82
description:
3.5 km from La Pedrera, limehome Barcelona Carrer de Besalú 82 is set in Barcelona and provides free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. The property is around 3.6 km from Casa Batllo, 4 km from Passeig de Gracia and 4.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.8 km from Sagrada Familia.

All units in the hotel are fitted with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, guest rooms at limehome Barcelona Carrer de Besalú 82 have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms include a balcony. At the accommodation each room comes with bed linen and towels.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 4.4 km from limehome Barcelona Carrer de Besalú 82, while Tivoli Theatre is 4.4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from the hotel.

name: Ilunion Auditori
description:
Situated 10 minutes' walk from the Arc de Triomf Metro and Train Station, the Ilunion Auditori features a rooftop swimming pool 3 m wide by 5 m long and gym. Free WiFi is available throughout.

All modern rooms at the Auditori have wooden floors, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a safe. The private bathrooms include a hairdryer and free toiletries.

This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment.

The Ilunion Auditori serves a daily breakfast and offers à- la-carte dishes made with seasonal products. There is also a special menu for celiac and food intolerant guests. Room service is available during limited hours, and a snack bar is open during the evening. A range of restaurants and bars can be found in the nearby areas of the Eixample, Born and Gothic Quarter.

Guests can enjoy a work out at the gym, which is equipped with cardiovascular equipment. The seasonal rooftop pool, which is surrounded by sun loungers, offers the ideal place for relaxation with stunning views over the city.

Free internet access is available at the computers in the reception area. The famous Barcelona Auditorium is a 5-minute walk away, while the the Sagrada Familia and the Ciutadella Park are 1.5 km away. Underground private parking is available on site for an additional charge.

This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

name: BcnStop Sant Pau Suites
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²
description:
Boasting a terrace and views of quiet street, BcnStop Sant Pau Suites is a recently renovated apartment situated in Barcelona, 3 km from Nova Icaria Beach. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment has family rooms.

All units in the apartment complex are fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a shower. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while some rooms also boast a balcony. At the apartment complex, units have bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the vicinity of the property.

Sagrada Familia is less than 1 km from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from BcnStop Sant Pau Suites.

name: Alma Barcelona GL
description:
Alma Barcelona is set in an attractive building just off Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia. It offers a spa, a stylish restaurant with a terrace, and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Alma Barcelona rooms feature smart, modern décor and leather armchairs. They are equipped with a flat-screen Loewe TV, Punkt phone, and the private bathrooms come with a bathrobe and slippers.

The Alma’s spa features an indoor pool, a Hammam and a sauna. There is a gym, and massage is also available.

Staff at the Alma’s 24-hour reception can provide information on Barcelona’s many attractions. On request, the hotel offers an airport shuttle service to Barcelona El Prat Airport, a 25-minute drive away.

The hotel is just one block from Gaudí’s La Pedrera and a 5-minute walk from Casa Batlló. You can walk to Diagonal Metro Station in 5 minutes, while Plaza de Catalunya is just over 1 km away.

name: Catalonia Square 4* Sup
description:
Featuring an outdoor pool and a fitness centre, Catalonia Square is located in Barcelona’s historic centre. The 4-star hotel is only 100 metres from Plaça Catalunya and offers free Wi-Fi

Each air-conditioned room has wooden floors and modern décor and comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, minibar and a battery charger for iPhone/iPad. Featuring a hairdryer, private bathrooms also include free toiletries and towels. Private pool and terrace are available in some rooms. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.

Guests can enjoy drinks, snacks and traditional tapas at Catalonia Square Bar. The breakfast is served until 12:00. Room service is also available.

La Rambla and the Gothic District are only 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Within 300 metres, guests can find the metro stations of Passeig de Gracia, Plaça Catalunya and Urquinaona, offering connection to most parts of Barcelona.

name: Sercotel Amister Art Hotel Barcelona
description:
Offering a roof terrace with a swimming pool and bar, Sercotel Amister Art Hotel Barcelona is located just 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s fashionable Paseo de Gracia Boulevard. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel.

Each floor of the hotel is dedicated to a different artist and rooms feature contemporary art work. The stylish rooms come with a flat-screen TV, safe and air conditioning,

Located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Sercotel Amister Art Hotel Barcelona is approximately 400 metres from Entença and Hospital Clinic Metro Stations. It is also 15 minutes’ walk from Gaudís Casa Batllò, and La Pedrera.

Parking can be arranged at the hotel. Across the hotel there is a bus stop and taxi service.

name: DIAGONAL/PASEO DE GRACIA 4 PAX
description:
Boasting air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, DIAGONAL/PASEO DE GRACIA 4 PAX is situated in Barcelona. It is located 700 metres from Casa Batllo and provides a lift. The property is 1.3 km from the city centre and 200 metres from La Pedrera.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment features a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and microwave. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Sightseeing tours are available in the surrounding area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from DIAGONAL/PASEO DE GRACIA 4 PAX.

name: Hotel Continental Barcelona
description:
Set on Las Ramblas and next to Plaza Catalunya, the Hotel Continental offers charming rooms with free high-speed Wi-Fi and a fridge. A free continental buffet is available 24 hours a day.

Decorated in pink, the Continental's air-conditioned rooms include a private bathroom and flat-screen TV with satellite channels. A microwave and crockery set are provided, and guests are welcome to fill the in-room fridge with food from the buffet.

Hotel Continental Barcelona operates a 24-hour reception, allowing guests flexibility during their stay. Currency exchange and car rental can be arranged at the hotel’s tour desk.

The hotel is a 1-minute walk from Catalunya Metro Station. The Raval and the Gothic districts are a 10-minute walk from the Continental Hotel. Barcelona’s Museum of Contemporary Art is 300 metres away.

name: Hotel Casa Sagnier
description:
Attractively located in Barcelona, Hotel Casa Sagnier features air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as a sauna. The accommodation provides room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests.

At the hotel, the rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Rooms include a safety deposit box, while some rooms have a balcony and others also feature city views. All rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or continental options.

Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish, staff are willing to help at any time of the day at the reception.

Popular points of interest near Hotel Casa Sagnier include La Pedrera, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 13 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: limehome Barcelona Rector Triadó
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
limehome Barcelona Rector Triadó is located just 300 metres from Sants Train Station, in a commercial district of Barcelona. This modern air-conditioned apartment complex offers spacious accommodation with free WiFi access.

The complex has stylish apartments, with minimalist design. They all offer an en-suite bathroom and well-equipped kitchen. Both the living area and bedroom have LCD TV with satellite channels. You can make use of a communal laundry room.

limehome Barcelona Rector Triadó are a short walk from the Fira Exhibition Centre. Montjuïc Hill is also nearby. Attractions include the Olympic stadium, the Catalan National Gallery and the Magic Fountain.

The apartments are well-placed for transport connections, only 3 stops from Camp Nou. Plaça Espanya Metro Station is 300 metres away. Direct airport buses also stop in the square.

name: The Moods Oasis
description:
Boasting a terrace, The Moods Oasis is situated in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, 1.1 km from La Pedrera and 1.5 km from Casa Batllo. Featuring a fitness centre, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia.

At the hotel, the rooms include a desk and a flat-screen TV. At The Moods Oasis the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast.

The Moods Oasis provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.8 km from the hotel, while Plaça Catalunya is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from The Moods Oasis.

name: Hostal Benidorm
description:
Situated on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, Hostal Benidorm offers free Wi-Fi, 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. Liceu Metro Station is just 200 metres away.

Each room at the Benidorm Hostal features simple décor and tiled floors. All rooms have central heating and a private bathroom.

Drinks and snacks are available from vending machines in the Benidorm’s reception area. Staff at the front desk can provide information about the city and arrange car or bicycle rental.

Hostal Benidorm is located just outside the historic Gothic Quarter. Gaudi’s Palau Güell is 100 metres away, while the Boqueria Market is within 400 metres. Barceloneta Beach can be reached in 25 minutes’ walk or a 10-minute bus.

name: Acevi Villarroel
description:
Acevi Villarroel offers free high-speed Wi-Fi, a spa and a rooftop pool, open in summer. Located 400 metres from Urgell Metro Station, it is a 15-minute walk from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya.

Rooms at the Acevi have elegant décor and hardwood floors. All have a satellite TV.

Hotel Acevi Villarroel’s spa is available for an extra charge. It includes a steam bath, sauna, Hammam and gym. Massages are available on request. You can also relax on a lounger on the sun terrace.

Acevi Villarroel is within a 10-minute walk of Barcelona University and the lively Raval district. Hospital Clinic Metro Station is 600 metres away, and offers direct access to the Sagrada Familia and FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium.

name: Picasso Suites
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Featuring a shared roof terrace with furniture and city views, Picasso Suites is located in Barcelona’s Eixample District. The property offers apartments with free Wi-Fi and air conditioning.

Each apartment has a living room with a sofa, satellite flat-screen TV and DVD player. An oven, microwave and coffee machine are included in the kitchen. The bathroom comes with a hairdryer.

La Concepción Market is located next to the apartments. Guests can also find a large variety of supermarkets, bars and restaurants in the area. The property offers various services at an extra cost, including babysitting, car rental, private parking and airport shuttle.

Plaça Catalunya and Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia are located within 15 minutes’ walk from the property. Girona Metro Station, with connection to the Gothic District and La Barceloneta Beach, is 300 metres away.

name: Hotel Balmoral
description:
Hotel Balmoral is within 5 minutes' walk of Barcelona’s Diagonal Metro Station and Passeig de Gràcia boulevard. This boutique hotel offers free access to its wellness area and free Wi-Fi.

Each modern, air-conditioned room at the Balmoral Hotel Barcelona features elegant, functional design. All rooms come with a flat-screen TV and a minibar.

The hotel has a small wellness area with a sauna, experience shower and fitness machines. It also includes massage cabins and a sun terrace.

Guests receive a free welcome drink between 12:00 and 18:00. You can enjoy a drink in the hotel’s bar, or try bars and restaurants in the popular Gràcia district, a 5-minute walk away. In the morning, a breakfast buffet is served in the hotel.

Hotel Balmoral Barcelona has a TV lounge where you can enjoy sports events on the big screen. There are also 2 computers with internet access.

Gaudí's famous La Pedrera is just a 5-minute walk from the hotel, and the iconic Sagrada Família is 2 km away. Nearby bus and metro connections offer direct access to Plaça Catalunya, the historic city centre and to FC Barcelona's Camp Nou Stadium. Private parking is available in the hotel at an extra cost.

name: Hotel Soho
description:
Located on Gran Via, in central Barcelona, the stylish Hotel Soho features a rooftop seasonal pool and sun terrace with panoramic views. It is a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia Boulevard.

The chic, air-conditioned rooms at the Soho are soundproof and offer flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. They also have an ambient lighting system and include modern bathrooms with hairdryers.

Guests can enjoy a rich breakfast on the spacious terrace, weather permitting. The front desk is available 24-hours a day and offers a ticket service.

The Soho is a 5-minute walk from the airport bus stop in Plaza Universitat, and Urgell Metro Station is just 130 metres away.

name: Guitart Grand Passage
description:
This modern hotel offers spacious, air-conditioned suites with a separate seating area, private balcony, free WiFi and 2 TVs. The hotel is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard.

There are several restaurants within a 5-minute walk from Guitard Grand Passage. Also, the hotel is only 500 metres from Hospital Clinic Metro Station.

There are good transport connections to Barcelona El Prat Airport from Passeig de Gràcia Metro Station, located around 15 minutes’ walk away.

name: Barcelona - Eixample Entresuelo
description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 1.4 km from Casa Batllo, Barcelona - Eixample Entresuelo offers air conditioning. It is situated 1.3 km from Plaça Catalunya and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 1.2 km away.

The spacious apartment is equipped with 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with an oven, a microwave, a washing machine, a fridge and a stovetop. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Magic Fountain of Montjuic and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Barcelona - Eixample Entresuelo.

name: Blue Barcelona
description:
Featuring free WiFi, Blue Barcelona is located in the Gracia district of Barcelona. Set next to Gracia FGC Station, this bed and breakfast offers a shared lounge and tour desk.

Each air-conditioned room at the property has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, desk, and hardwood floors. Some rooms have a private bathroom with a bath or shower and free toiletries, and others have access to shared bathroom facilities.

You can find several restaurants, bars, and shops within a 5-minute walk of Blue Barcelona. There are vending machines available.

Fontana Metro Station is 300 metres from the property, Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas Boulevard are 2 metro stops away, and Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia is 2.3 km from the property.

name: B-Garden BCN
description:
Housed in a Art Nouveau building, B-Garden BCN is placed in one of the best locations in Barcelona for travelers: 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s famous
Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, Plaça Catalunya, Las Ramblas and Arc de Triumf. You can find all kind of shops, restaurants and bars nearby.
As you were in a typical Spanish 1900’s house with authentical vitreaux and high ceilings, B-Garden BCN offers rooms with private balcony and most of them have
private and renovated bathrooms.
All the rooms at B-Garden BCN feature tiled floors and stylish dècor, with a mix of antique and modern mobiliary. We offer flat-screen Smart T.V, free Wi-Fi connection
and a varied buffet breakfast.
Barcelona’s charming Born district is just 7 minutes’ walk from B-Garden BCN. Here you can find the Palau de la Música Catalana and a Modernist Auditorium.
Tetuán metro station is only 100 metres away and it connects you with the rest of the city.

name: Apartaments Marina - Abapart
description:
Set 300 metres from Sagrada Familia and 1.7 km from La Pedrera, Apartaments Marina - Abapart features free WiFi and units equipped with a kitchen, balcony and seating area. It is located 2.3 km from Casa Batllo and provides a concierge service. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a lift and luggage storage for guests.

The aparthotel will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a desk, a coffee machine, an oven, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. At the aparthotel, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available close by.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.7 km from the aparthotel, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Apartaments Marina - Abapart.

name: Private Room Gothic Quarter
description:
Located in the centre of Barcelona, 1.3 km from Sant Miquel Beach, Private Room Gothic Quarter provides air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. This property is situated a short distance from attractions such as Plaça Reial, Santa Maria del Mar, and Picasso Museum. Certain rooms at the property include a balcony with a city view.

At the hostel each room is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near Private Room Gothic Quarter include Sant Sebastian Beach, Barceloneta Beach and Cathedral of Barcelona. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

name: Ibis Barcelona Meridiana
description:
Located next to Fabra i Puig Station, Ibis Barcelona Meridiana is a 10-minute Metro journey from Plaza Catalunya. It offers a 24-hour bar and air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV.

Barcelona Meridiana’s bar serves a wide range of snacks and drinks.

Hotel Ibis Barcelona Meridiana is set next to the Heron City Shopping Centre, where you can find restaurants, cinemas and a gym. Indoor public parking is available at an extra cost.

name: Catalonia Gran Via BCN
description:
Catalonia Gran Via BCN is set on Gran Vía and within 5 minutes’ walk of Urgell and Universitat Metro Stations, and beside the airport bus stop. It features an outdoor swimming pool, a gym and free Wi-Fi.

Each of the modern rooms at Catalonia Gran Via BCN is themed around a different city and air travel. All rooms have flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and an iPod docking station.

You can enjoy breakfast in Catalonia Gran Via BCN, while à la carte options are offered in the Gourmet Corner.

You can walk to both Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas in 10 minutes. Plaza de España, the Magic Fountains and the FIRA are just 2 stops from Urgell Station.

name: Fantastic apartment near Plaça Francesc Macia in L'Eixample Esquerra
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 85m²
description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.5 km from Sants Railway Station and 1.7 km from La Pedrera, Fantastic apartment near Plaça Francesc Macia in L'Eixample Esquerra provides air-conditioned accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. It is set 2.6 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.4 km from Casa Batllo.

The spacious apartment comes with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Camp Nou is 2.7 km from Fantastic apartment near Plaça Francesc Macia in L'Eixample Esquerra, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Cortes Rambla
description:
Situated in Barcelona, 2.4 km from Somorrostro Beach, Hotel Cortes Rambla features views of the city. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is 100 metres from the city centre and 2.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at the hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms are fitted with a terrace. At Hotel Cortes Rambla rooms include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Plaça Catalunya, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Hotel Cortes Rambla.

name: BCN Rambla Catalunya Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 50m²
description:
Address: Rambla Catalunya, 101-103/ Carrer Aragó, 250.
Air-conditioned apartment with a double bedroom, a twin room and free Wi-Fi. It has a living room with a sofa bed and flat-screen TV. There is a private bathroom, dishwasher and washing machine. The well-equipped kitchen includes a fridge and microwave. Please note that the photos are of a selection of different apartments, all with similar characteristics. The apartments will be allocated according to availability

name: Hotel Well and Come
description:
Featuring a rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool and city views, Well and Come Hotel is located right beside Verdaguer Metro Station and 10 minutes’ walk from Sagrada Familia.

This boutique hotel offers soundproofed rooms with free WiFi, a flat-screen TV and laptop safe. There is also a Nespresso coffee machine, kettle and minibar with free water in all rooms.

Rooms have individually controlled air conditioning and heating. They also come with a private bathroom which includes a rain shower, free toiletries, hairdryer and vanity mirror.

Some rooms come with a balcony, terrace or city views.
