Hotel Well and Come features a 24-hour reception, a lounge area with a fireplace, an on-site bar and a fitness area.

The famous Passeig de Gracia Boulevard is 5 minutes’ walk from Well and Come hotel. Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló houses can be reached within a 15-minute walk.

name: Charming Flats by Aspasios
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 30m²
description:
Charming Flats by Aspasios offers accommodation in Barcelona. Montjuïc is 900 metres from the property. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.

All units are air conditioned and have a seating and dining area. Some units feature a terrace and/or balcony. There is also a kitchen, equipped with a dishwasher and oven. A microwave is also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. There is a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer in every unit. Towels and bed linen are available.

Plaza Reial is 1.4 km from Charming Flats by Aspasios, while Plaça Catalunya is 1.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Charming Flats by Aspasios.

name: Ciudad Condal Hostal - Paseo de Gracia
description:
Ciudad Condal Hostal - Paseo de Gracia provides accommodation located in the neighbourhood of the city of Barcelona. The rooms are distributed on the main floor of an architectural house, catalogued by City Heritage Casa Àngel Batlló on Calle Mallorca 255, between the famous Passeig de Gràcia and the vibrant Rambla de Catalunya.

All rooms are equipped with air conditioning, heating, private bathroom, window, flat screen TV, desk, safe, trunk, hair dryer, basic amenities and free Wi-Fi. Due to the architectural characteristics of the building, all the rooms are different, each one of them designed in a clean and functional way, adapting to each space.

The property offers single, double, superior double, triple, and suite/family rooms for up to 4 pax, some of them with a view of the street with a balcony or to the famous interior gardens of the architectural plan of the Ensanche district of Barcelona Plà Cerdà and others are interior rooms.

There is a range of cafés and restaurants on Passeig de Gràcia and in the nearby area of Gràcia.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are within 200 metres of the property. Diagonal Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away and is just 2 stops from Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas.

name: Ilunion Barcelona
description:
Located 10 minutes away from Bogatell Beach in the 22 district, the modern Ilunion Barcelona features a rooftop swimming pool, sun terrace, and a gym. The CCIB Conference Centre is 2 km away. Free WiFi is available.

Rooms at Ilunion Barcelona feature air conditioning, a desk and a TV. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. A safe and minibar are provided. Superior rooms also feature a furnished terrace with sea or city views.

This hotel is officially adapted for disabled guests. It has rooms adapted for people with reduced mobility or hearing/visual impairment, available upon request.

Ilunion Barcelona's restaurant serves breakfast and also offers an à la carte menu. The hotel has a bar and provides room service. A menu for guests with specific dietary requirements is also available.

Just a few minutes walk from the hotel is Rambla de Poblenou and Bogatell Beach, which are home to a wide variety of shops, bars and restaurants. The shopping centre is a 4-minute drive away and the Diagonal Mar shopping centre is an 8-minute drive away.

Ilunion Barcelona has pleasant, renovated common areas and free internet access. Private underground parking is available for an extra cost.

Llacuna and Poble Nou Metro Station is located less than 300 metres from the hotel. The bus stop of the line number 6 is located 50 metres from the hotel.

Gran Via is 15 minutes away by bus. There is a tourist bus stop near the hotel. Barcelona-El Prat airport is located 20 km away, with quick access to the Ronda Litoral.

name: Blanc Guest House
description:
Blanc Guest House is 8 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s famous Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers an attractive terrace and smart rooms with free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV.

The rooms at Blanc Guest House are decorated in white, with parquet floors and white furniture. Each one comes with air conditioning, heating and a fan, and some have a private bathroom.

Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. Car rental is also available from the front desk.

The Blanc is 8 minutes’ walk from Diagonal Metro Station, connecting you with the rest of the city with ease. Plaza Catalunya is just 2 stops away.

name: Chic & Basic Velvet
description:
Boasting 1950s décor, this modern hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and flat-screen satellite TV. Barcelona’s Plaza Espanya is 8 minutes’ walk away.

The rooms at the Chic & Basic Velvet have parquet floors and smart décor. Each one has a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

The hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast in the dining room; and guests can enjoy a drink at the honesty bar which has direct access to terrace.

There is a variety of restaurants within 10 minutes’ walk.

Chic & Basic Velvet is just 10 minutes’ walk from the Fira Convention Centre and the airport bus stop. Montjüic, with the Joan Miró Museum and Magic Fountain, is also a 10-minute walk away

name: BYPILLOW Ramblas
description:
BYPILLOW Ramblas is a modern guest house conveniently located in the famous Ramblas in Barcelona, 15 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and the port.

The Wax Museum and the airport bus stop are next to this guest house. The nearest metro station is Drassanes, located only 100 metres away. There is a wide range of monuments, bars and shops within walking distance.

The air-conditioned rooms at BYPILLOW Ramblas come with a TV and private bathroom with shower.

The multilingual staff will be happy to provide tourist information and free local maps. Free WiFi and luggage storage are also offered.

name: Room Mate Carla
description:
Room Mate Carla is set 200 metres from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, and 5-minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s La Pedrera in Barcelona’s Eixample District. It features free WiFi and colourful, stylish rooms.

Decorated with lively prints, the air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV, minibar, safe and a private bathroom.

Room Mate Carla features a modern bar offering a range of cocktails. You will also find a terrace and meeting rooms on site.

The hotel is a 15-minute walk from the Sagrada Familia Cathedral. Verdaguer and Diagonal Metro Stations are 500 metres away and offer easy access to Las Ramblas and Sants Train Station.

name: Hotel Ramblas Internacional
description:
Hotel Ramblas Internacional is set right on the famous Las Ramblas, 50 metres from Liceu Metro Station and close to La Boquería Market.
Each of the soundproofed rooms is individually decorated and has plenty of natural light. Most rooms offer views of central Barcelona and some look onto Las Ramblas.

Hotel Ramblas Internacional serves a daily breakfast.

Located just 150 metres from Liceu Theatre, the hotel has easy access to Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter and the city’s cathedral is less than 10 minutes’ walk away.

name: LetsGo Paseo de Gracia
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Apartament Paseo de Gracia offers self-catering accommodation with free Wi-Fi in the heart of Barcelona, just 40 metres from Plaza Catalunya. Barcelona’s La Rambla is 5 minutes’ walk away.

These modern apartments feature stylish dècor and come with 1 or 2 bedrooms and a bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Their living areas include flat-screen satellite TV and sofas. Their kitchenettes are equipped with a microwave, washing machine and dishwasher.  Some come with a terrace.

Centrally located, you will find many bars, restaurants and supermarkets in the surrounding streets.

Direct buses to Barcelona Airport depart from Plaza Catalunya and Sagrada Familia is 2.5 km from Apartament Paseo de Gracia. A 25-minute walk will take you to Barceloneta Beach.

name: Eixmaple Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 100m²
description:
Offering city views, Eixmaple Apartments is an accommodation located in Barcelona, 1.9 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.7 km from Casa Batllo. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sants Railway Station is 1.2 km away.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette, a dining area, and a private bathroom, while some feature a terrace or a balcony. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also provided, as well as a coffee machine. The units at the apartment complex include air conditioning and a desk.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and La Pedrera. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Eixmaple Apartments.

name: Hotel Oasis
description:
Hotel Oasis is located just 250 metres from França Railway Station and 100 metres from Barcelona’s Born district. The modern, air-conditioned rooms have satellite TV and private bathrooms with hairdryer.

The hotel features a seasonal terrace with a seasonal outdoor pool. The hotel's Oasis café-bar offers a range of hot drinks and cocktails throughout the day.

The beach and bars of Barceloneta are just 200 metres away, while Santa Maria del Mar Church is 4 minutes’ walk away. Oasis is 50 metres from Barceloneta Metro Station, and 300 metres from Ciutadella Park.

Please be aware that the type of bed is always subject to availability.

name: Hotel 1898
description:
Situated on Barcelona’s famous La Rambla, this restored 19th-century building features a rooftop pool with a sun terrace. The elegant rooms include free Wi-Fi and a marble bathroom.

The colonial-style Hotel 1898 has unique architectural and historical heritage which gives it the Speciality Monument status.

It features a stylish restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. It also offers a bar-restaurant with a terrace where guests can enjoy traditional tapas.

Plaza Catalunya is just 200 metres from 1898 Hotel. Guests can also walk to the Gothic Quarter with its cathedral in 10 minutes.

name: Catalonia Albeniz
description:
Catalonia Albeniz offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and satellite TV. It is situated 150 metres from Clot Train Station, and a 15-minute walk from Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia Church.

The property has a gym and an outdoor pool. You can also use the luggage storage facility on site at the Albeniz.

The varied buffet breakfast at the Catalonia Albeniz includes typical local dishes, such as potato omelette and bread with tomato.

The Albeniz offers bright, modern rooms with simple décor and wooden floors. Each room includes a minibar and a marble bathroom with a hair dryer, plus a safe. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.

Catalonia Albeniz is just 700 metres from the shops and restaurants of Glòries Shopping Centre, while Encants Flea Market is a 5-minute walk away. Metro services and direct airport trains are available from nearby Clot Station.

name: L'Olivera Casa Rural
description:
Featuring free WiFi, parking on-site and a garden, the recently renovated property of L'Olivera Casa Rural, offers accommodation in Barcelona, 29 km from Tibidabo Amusement Park and 31 km from Camp Nou. This sustainable farm stay is located 33 km from Sants Railway Station and 34 km from La Pedrera. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area.

Some units have a terrace and/or a balcony with mountain or inner courtyard views. At the farm stay, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the farm stay will be able to enjoy activities in and around Barcelona, like hiking. Barbecue facilities are at guests' disposal and guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

Casa Batllo is 35 km from L'Olivera Casa Rural, while Passeig de Gracia is 35 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 37 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Casanova Apartments by Olala Homes
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
In the Eixample district of Barcelona, close to Casa Batllo, Casanova Apartments by Olala Homes features a terrace and a washing machine. This sustainable apartment is located 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.3 km from Plaça Catalunya. The property has an indoor pool, free WiFi throughout the property and a lift.

At the apartment complex, every unit is equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a bidet and free toiletries. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Casanova Apartments by Olala Homes include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, La Pedrera and Boqueria Market. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

name: APTBCN Super Balmes Guest House
description:
Super Balmes Guest House is located in Barcelona city center, 2 minutes' walk from Plaza Catalunya Square. Free Wi-Fi access is available.

The Guest House offers private rooms in shared apartments located in different building of the same central area.

They all come with a flat-screen TV and have a shared or private bathroom. Bed linen and towels are included. All apartments have a fully equipped kitchen for guests’ use and a shared lounge with sofas.

There are plenty of bars and restaurants within walking distances. Regular airport buses leave from a bus stop located within 10-minute walk.

The pictures at the top of this page are a selection of the different rooms and apartments located in the Barcelona City Center area. Please select a date and click on the room type to see the pictures of the individual apartments.

name: Apartments Sata Olimpic Village Area
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 65m²
description:
Offering contemporary apartments with balconies and private parking, Apartments Sata Olimpic Village Area is a 10-minute walk from Vila Olimpica Beach. This stylish property is a 5-minute walk from Marina Metro Station.

Each air-conditioned apartment is decorated in simple, grey tones with modern finishes. All apartments have a well-equipped kitchenette with a microwave, fridge and hob.

ApartmentsSata Olimpic Village Area is a 15 minutes’ walk from the Olympic Marina and Barcelona’s seafront promenade. The centre of Barcelona can be reached in just 10 minutes, by Metro. An airport shuttle service is available for a surcharge.

Nord Bus Station is located within a 15-minute walk of the apartments and regular airport trains leave from Passeig de Gràcia Station, which is 5 stops from Bogatell Metro.

name: Umma Barcelona B&B Boutique
description:
Umma Barcelona B&B Boutique offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom. The property is 10 minutes’ walk from both La Pedrera and fashionable Passeig the Gracia.

Featuring an elegant décor, rooms at Umma Barcelona B&B Boutique have a flat-screen TV, free safe and a wardrobe. The private bathroom comes with shower, free toiletries and hairdryer. Some rooms have a balcony with street views.

A breakfast is served every morning at Umma Barcelona B&B Boutique. Several restaurant, traditional tapas bars and shops can be found in the surrounding area. Some of the trendiest bars are in Gracia District, 500 metres away.

Umma Barcelona B&B Boutique is in the Eixample District of Barcelona. You can walk to Gaudi’s Casa Batlló in 15 minutes. The closest metro station is Diagonal Metro Station, just 400 metres away. Trains to Barcelona El Prat Airport leave from a train station located 1 km away.

name: Nobu Hotel Barcelona
description:
Situated in Barcelona, 400 metres from Sants Railway Station, Nobu Hotel Barcelona features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers a concierge service, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests.

At the hotel rooms have air conditioning and a safety deposit box.

Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.4 km from Nobu Hotel Barcelona, while Casa Batllo is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from the accommodation.

name: Barcelona House
description:
Barcelona House Hotel is in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, 80 metres from the Ramblas. The hotel offers modern, air-conditioned rooms with wooden floors, free wired internet and a flat-screen TV.

Barcelona Cathedral and the Boquería Market are 500 metres away. The port and Maremagnum Shopping Centre are a 10-minute walk from the hotel. You can walk to Barceloneta Beach in 20 minutes or take a bus.

Rooms are also heated and have a safe. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

There are many bars, restaurants and galleries near the Barcelona House. The Picasso Museum and fashionable Borne district are a 10-minute walk away.

There is a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage is available.

name: Hotel Acta Azul Barcelona
description:
Set just off Plaça d’Espanya and at the foot of Montjuïc, Hotel Acta Azul Barcelona offers stylish accommodation in central Barcelona. It features a roof terrace, 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi.

Las Ramblas and the city’s Gothic Quarter can be reached in less than 10 minutes, by Metro and here you will find where a selection of bars and restaurants.

Each of the Azul’s spacious rooms has bright décor and wooden flooring. All rooms have air conditioning, satellite TV and a desk.

The hotel is a 5-minute walk from Barcelona’s Fira Conference Centre and Plaça d’Espanya’s Magic Fountains. Montjuïc Park and the MNAC Gallery are within 1 km of the hotel. The bullring-turned-shopping centre of Las Arenas is next door.

name: Hostel Friends Barcelona
description:
Hostel Friends Barcelona is located on the well-known Gran Vía Avenue in Barcelona, 500 metres from Plaza Espanya Square. Free WiFi access is available and 24-hour reception is featured.

This guest house offers free services like luggage storage and safe box.

Rooms at Friends Barcelona have heating, a fan and a small fridge, as well as a hairdryer. Some rooms have a private bathroom, a balcony and a flat-screen TV, while others have a shared bathroom and a TV. Bed linen and towels are included.

The area has very good public transport links. Rocafort metro station is only a minute on foot. Sagrada Familia Temple is 20 minutes by metro.

name: BarcelonaForRent Tucson Suites
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms
description:
BarcelonaForRent Tucson Suites is within walking distance of Gaudi’s masterpiece Sagrada Familia. It offers free WiFi; and some apartments have access to a rooftop private terrace.

The modern kitchen at the Tucson Suites, equipped with a dishwasher, ceramic hobs and kitchenware; opens onto a living-dining room featuring brick walls and traditional Catalan vaulted ceilings. There is a washing machine, a dryer and cleaning products are provided.

Numerous bars, restaurants as well as supermarkets can be found within 2 minutes’ walk.

Well connected by public transport, you can reach Barcelona City Centre and fashionable Passeig de Gracia within 15 minutes by metro.

name: Central Suites Barcelona
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
These modern, air-conditioned apartments are located on the tree-lined Rambla de Catalunya, just one block from Barcelona’s famous Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. Casa Batlló is 300 metres away.

Set in an attractive Modernist building, apartments have tiled floors and high ceilings. Each one has a modern kitchen with an oven, washing machine and dishwasher. There is a Nespresso Coffee Machine, and free capsules are provided. All have free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen and DVD player. Bed linen and towels are provided.

There are plenty of bars and restaurants within a 2-minute walk of the apartments.

Central Suites Barcelona is just 400 metres from Plaza Catalunya where you can find regular buses to Airport; and a 5-minute walk from Ramblas. The closest metro station is Passeig de Gracia, 2 minutes’ walk from the apartment.

name: Central Suites Barcelona
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
These modern, air-conditioned apartments are located on the tree-lined Rambla de Catalunya, just one block from Barcelona’s famous Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. Casa Batlló is 300 metres away.

Set in an attractive Modernist building, apartments have tiled floors and high ceilings. Each one has a modern kitchen with an oven, washing machine and dishwasher. There is a Nespresso Coffee Machine, and free capsules are provided. All have free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen and DVD player. Bed linen and towels are provided.

There are plenty of bars and restaurants within a 2-minute walk of the apartments.

Central Suites Barcelona is just 400 metres from Plaza Catalunya where you can find regular buses to Airport; and a 5-minute walk from Ramblas. The closest metro station is Passeig de Gracia, 2 minutes’ walk from the apartment.

name: Four Petals Barcelona Boutique Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 80m²
description:
Four Petals Barcelona Boutique Apartments features accommodation within 300 metres of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. This sustainable apartment is located 2.3 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.3 km from Sant Miquel Beach. The apartment has family rooms.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath. There is a seating and a dining area in all units. At the apartment complex, units have bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Portal de l'Angel and Cathedral of Barcelona. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Four Petals Barcelona Boutique Apartments.

name: Hotel Raval House
description:
Well set in Barcelona, Hotel Raval House provides air-conditioned rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a garden. 2.5 km from Sant Sebastian Beach and 2.5 km from Sant Miquel Beach, the property offers a terrace and a bar. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.7 km from Barceloneta Beach.

At the hotel, every room comes with a wardrobe. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, certain units at Hotel Raval House also provide guests with a city view. All units at the accommodation are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are willing to help at any time of the day.

Popular points of interest near Hotel Raval House include Boqueria Market, Passeig de Gracia and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from the hotel.

name: DreamKeys Barcelona City
description:
Featuring air conditioning, DreamKeys Barcelona City offers accommodation in Barcelona. Passeig de Gracia Boulevard and Gaudís La Pedrera and Casa Batlló are a 10-minute walk away.

The property offers apartments and rooms. There is a seating and/or dining area in some units. There is also a kitchen in some of the units, equipped with a dishwasher and oven. Towels and bed linen are featured.

The property offers grocery delivery and packed lunches. You will also find many restaurants, bars and shops in the surrounding area.

Plaça Catalunya is 2 km from DreamKeys Barcelona City. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 12 km from DreamKeys - Barcelona City.

name: Mihlton Barcelona Boutique B&B
description:
Set in the centre of Barcelona, Mihlton Barcelona Boutique B&B is a recently renovated accommodation, which offers allergy-free rooms. Boasting a lift, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The accommodation features luggage storage space, a housekeeping service and organising tours for guests.

All units feature air conditioning and a satellite flat-screen TV. Units are equipped with a private bathroom, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while certain rooms also offer a balcony and some have garden views. At the bed and breakfast, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with warm dishes, local specialities and champagne are available every morning at the bed and breakfast. There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available.

Guests at Mihlton Barcelona Boutique B&B will be able to enjoy activities in and around Barcelona, like walking tours. The bed and breakfast has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include La Pedrera, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Mihlton Barcelona Boutique B&B.

name: Villa Sagrada
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 40m²
description:
Villa Sagrada offers self-catering accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning and a balcony with street views, just 550 metres from Sagrada Familia. Encants Metro Station is 3 minutes’ walk away.

This modern studio has a 2 single beds, a sofa bed, a flat-screen TV and dining table. The kitchenette is equipped with a fridge, hob, microwave and coffee machine. There is also a bathroom with a shower.

You will find bars, restaurants and supermarkets in the surrounding streets.

Plaza Catalunya, with direct buses to Barcelona Airport is a 15-minute metro ride away and Barceloneta Beach is 3.5 km away.

name: Montserrat Apartments by gaiarooms
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom
description:
Offering city views, Montserrat Apartments by gaiarooms is an accommodation located in Barcelona, 1.6 km from La Pedrera and 2 km from Casa Batllo. The air-conditioned accommodation is 200 metres from Sagrada Familia. The apartment features family rooms.

Certain units in the apartment complex have private entrance and are equipped with desk and wardrobe. With a private bathroom, units at the apartment complex also offer free WiFi, while selected rooms are equipped with a terrace.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.4 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Montserrat Apartments by gaiarooms.

name: 1881 Barcelona Gran Rosellon Hotel
description:
Featuring free WiFi, a restaurant and a seasonal outdoor pool, 1881 Barcelona Gran Rosellon Hotel offers accommodation in Barcelona, 5 minutes' walk from Diagonal Metro Station.

The hotel has a sun terrace and a fitness centre, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. There is also a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV and a telephone. Some have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Every room includes a private bathroom with free toiletries.

La Pedrera is 600 metres from Bcn Urban Gran Rosellon, while the trendy Passeig de Gràcia Street is 8 minutes' walk away. Plaça Catalunya is 1.7 km from the property and Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away. Private parking is available on site.

name: Monument Hotel
description:
Located on the fashionable Paseo de Gracia, within 5 minutes’ walk from both Gaudi’s masterpieces Casa Battló and La Pedrera, Monument Hotel offers luxury services including a gourmet restaurant and a spa.

Elegantly decorated, all soundproofed rooms have a flat-screen TV with pay-per-view channels, Bluetooth sound system, and a safe deposit box with plug for charging laptop devices. Most of the room types have a private bathroom with a free-standing bath, velour bathrobe and luxury toiletries. Most of the rooms have a balcony with city views.

The 3 Michelin-starred restaurant, Lasarte, offers a range of options designed by the chef Martin Berasategui; while the on-site bistro-style restaurant, Oria, serves fresh cuisine following the Mediterranean gastronomy.

Monument Hotel is a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas; regular trains to Barcelona El Prat Airport leave from Paseo de Gracia Train Station, located 300 metres away. Free high-speed WiFi is provided.

The hotel is housed on Enric Batllo’s house, an architectural jewel of 19th century that constitutes one of the characteristic works of the Eixample Quadrat d'Or and which gives it the Specialty Monument status.

name: Radisson Blu 1882 Hotel, Barcelona Sagrada Familia
description:
Set in Barcelona, 400 metres from Sagrada Familia, Radisson Blu 1882 Hotel, Barcelona Sagrada Familia has an outdoor pool and a fitness centre. The 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi.

At the hotel, each room comes with a desk. The rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV, and certain rooms include a city view. All rooms feature a wardrobe.

A continental breakfast is served every morning at the property.

Radisson Blu 1882 Hotel, Barcelona Sagrada Familia offers a terrace with views of Sagrada Familia.

Staff are ready to help around the clock. Guest can use the free bicycle service.

La Pedrera is a 14-minute walk from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Radisson Blu 1882 Hotel, Barcelona Sagrada Familia.

name: Ocean Drive Barcelona
description:
Ocean Drive Barcelona features air-conditioned rooms with satellite flat-screen TV in the Eixample district of Barcelona. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a seasonal outdoor pool. Guests can enjoy a selection of international cuisine in the in-house restaurant.

At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk. Featuring a private bathroom, rooms at Ocean Drive Barcelona also offer free WiFi. All guest rooms include a wardrobe.

Buffet and à la carte breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation.

Guests will have free access to Urquinaona Holmes Place Gym, 800 metres from the hotel. Ocean Drive Barcelona offers a terrace.

Casa Batllo is 300 metres from the hotel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

name: Lumine Luxury Suites by gaiarooms
description:
A sustainable property, Lumine Luxury Suites by gaiarooms is situated in Barcelona near Plaça Catalunya, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and La Pedrera. The air-conditioned accommodation is 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia. The property is 1.3 km from the city centre and less than 1 km from Casa Batllo.

With a private bathroom, units at the guest house also boast free WiFi. At the guest house, some units are allergy-free.

Sightseeing tours are available around the property.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Boqueria Market, Tivoli Theatre and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Lumine Luxury Suites by gaiarooms.

name: Gran Hotel Barcino
description:
Surrounded by the fascinating streets of the Gothic Quarter, this elegant hotel is located right at Barcelona’s historic heart – just a short walk from the cathedral and Las Ramblas.

The Gran Hotel Barcino is set in a street which runs off the magnificent square of Sant Jaume, home to both the Catalonian government and the city council. The narrow streets which surround the hotel are full of fashionable shops, historic sites and museums, such as the Picasso Museum.

See the city’s many sights then return for a good night’s sleep in your traditional-style room. The rooms feature marble floors and air conditioning.

name: Aparthotel Allada 3*
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Situated in a pedestrianised street in the neighbourhood of Borne, Aparthotel Allada 3* offers a tranquil atmosphere due to the scarcity of street noise and the sound-proofing of the building.

Aparthotel Allada 3* is situated in a picturesque, historical area that has maintained the façades and arches of the 17th century, whilst incorporating the modern architecture of the 21st century. The apartments and studios have been designed to offer the greatest comfort and functionality during your stay. All also benefit from ample natural light throughout the day.

The Borne district is full of winding streets that form a labyrinth, allowing you to find some of the most intriguing areas in the old city. Close to the apartments, you will find the church of Saint Mary, the city gardens, the Picasso museum, the chocolate museum, the Cathedral, the market of Saint Catherine as well as many other sites of interest. In addition, you enjoy free access to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum.

name: H10 Port Vell 4* Sup
description:
Located in the Barceloneta neighbourhood in Barcelona, H10 Port Vell is just 220 metres from Port Vell Harbour. This 4-star hotel features a rooftop chill-out terrace with plunge pool and fantastic views.

Air-conditioned rooms include a 42-inch flat-screen TV, a minibar. Bathrooms come with hairdryer, magnifying mirror and Rituals toiletries. Two rooms are adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

Other facilities that can be found are Lobby Bar del Port and Hollywood Restaurant open for breakfast. Room service is available.

This stylish hotel has a free business corner with computers and free WiFi throughout. Tourist information and tickets for local attractions can be requested at the 24-hour reception.

Set in a restored historic building, this H10 is 400 metres from Francia Railway Station. Las Ramblas and Plaza Catalunya are 20 minutes’ walk away. Barcelona Airport is 15 km away.

name: Arenas Atiram Hotels
description:
Situated 200 metres from Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue with its many shops and restaurants, Arenas offers modern rooms with TV.

A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel’s restaurant.

A public car park is situated 3 minutes away from the hotel.

Arenas Atiram is a 15-minute walk from the Camp Nou Football Stadium. Maria Cristina Metro Station is 200 metres away and L’Illa Shopping Centre is a 10-minute walk away.

name: BcnStop Sagrada Familia
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 27m²
description:
Less than 1 km from Sagrada Familia, BcnStop Sagrada Familia is a sustainable property set in Barcelona and offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and private parking. There is a private entrance at the aparthotel for the convenience of those who stay. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a coffee machine. At the aparthotel, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available close by. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the aparthotel.

La Pedrera is 2.8 km from BcnStop Sagrada Familia, while Casa Batllo is 3.3 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 16 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Room018BCN
description:
Room018BCN is located 450 metres from FC Barcelona's Camp Nou Stadium. This modern hostel offers rooms with free WiFi and individual lockers.

The air-conditioned dormitory rooms feature parquet floors and modern décor. Each bed has an LED reading light. Bed linen is provided, and towels can be rented on site. Some rooms have a private bathroom.

The reception is open 24 hours.

Staff at reception can arrange tickets for FC Barcelona matches, as well as other events or public transport tickets. There is a shared kitchen where you can prepare meals and there are vending machines on site.

Room018BCN is located next to Les Corts Metro Station, taking you to Drassanes at the bottom of the Rambla in around 15 minutes. You can walk to L'Illa Shopping Centre in around 10 minutes.

name: Hostal Bcn 46
description:
A 5-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia Metro and Railway Station, Hostal Bcn 46 has an excellent location, less than 500 metres from Las Ramblas. Its simple, stylish rooms have free Wi-Fi.

Hostal Bcn 46 offers accommodation with private or shared bathrooms. All rooms have a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and heating.

Guests can enjoy breakfast at a café near Hostal Bcn 46, and there are many more bars and restaurants within 10 minutes’ walk of the guest house.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are within 1 km of the Hostal. Airport buses stop at Plaza de Catalunya, a 10-minute walk away.

name: Olivia Balmes Hotel
description:
Offering an outdoor swimming pool, Olivia Balmes Hotel is set 400 metres from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia, in the elegant Eixample neighbourhood. The modern hotel features stylish air-conditioned rooms and a restaurant.

Each bright spacious room includes free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen satellite TV and a laptop safe. The contemporary bathrooms have an open-plan design.

The hotel’s restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner. Olivia Balmes offers a sun terrace with an outdoor swimming pool and sun loungers. There is also a bar, serving cocktails and snacks, as well as several meeting rooms.

Olivia Balmes Hotel has private parking and Barcelona Airport is around 20 minutes’ drive away. Plaza Catalunya is a 15-minute walk from the hotel and you can reach Gaudi’s famous Casa Batlló and La Pedrera within a 5-minute walk.

name: Hostalet de Barcelona
description:
Free Wi-Fi and a TV are included in Hostalet de Barcelona’s bright, functional rooms. Hospital Clinic Metro Station is 300 metres away.

The Hostalet is a 15-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia. This famous street is home to the Gaudi buildings, La Pedrera and Casa Batlló.

Hospital Clinic Metro Station offers direct trains to Sagrada Familia and Camp Nou Football Stadium. Provença Station is 800 metres away, and provides easy access to Plaza Catalunya Square.

Each simple, stylish room at the Hostalet has a private bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony, with views of the street or central patio. Guests receive a welcome gift of bottled water and a packet of biscuits.

name: LB Nice Apartment Sagrada Familia
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 65m²
description:
Situated in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, LB Nice Apartment Sagrada Familia features a patio. It is set 2.8 km from La Pedrera and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 1.2 km away.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Park Güell is 2 km from the apartment, while Casa Batllo is 3.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from LB Nice Apartment Sagrada Familia.

name: Apart céntrico con terraza en Gracia
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
Apart céntrico con terraza en Gracia features a terrace and is located in Barcelona, within just 1.6 km of Casa Batllo and 1.7 km of Sagrada Familia. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and La Pedrera is 1.1 km away.

This air-conditioned apartment comes with 1 bedroom, a TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and a living room. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.4 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Apart céntrico con terraza en Gracia.

name: Chic & Basic Born Boutique Hotel
description:
This design hotel is in Barcelona’s trendy Born district, 250 metres from the Picasso Museum. It features a gym, 24-hour reception, and air-conditioned rooms with colourful LED lighting and flat-screen TVs.

Free coffee, tea and water are offered in a self-service area in the Chic & Basic Born. The hotel also has a lounge with free Wi-Fi and comfortable designer armchairs.

The Modernist-style building has high ceilings, large windows and marble staircases. It is within 100 metres of Ciudadela Park and Barcelona’s Chocolate Museum. La Rambla is a 10-minute walk away.

Rooms at the Chic & Basic Born Boutique Hotel feature a glass shower cubicle in the centre of the room. There is also a hairdryer, slippers and bathroom amenities.

Breakfast is served in the Chic & Basic’s modern snack bar, where you can also enjoy a cocktail. It is open 7 days a week from 08:00 until midnight.

name: BYPILLOW Wander
description:
Set just 100 metres from La Rambla in central Barcelona, BYPILLOW Wander offers modern rooms with air conditioning and free WiFi. Drassanes Metro Station is just 50 metres away.

Located on the 4th floor, all rooms have a private bathroom with a hairdryer and shower. They are heated, air-conditioned and include a flat-screen TV.

You will find a wide range of shops, restaurants and bars in the area. Barcelona’s Port Vell is just 350 metres from BYPILLOW Wander and the Maritime Museum is 150 metres away.

Barcelona Beach can be reached in a 15-minute bus ride. Plaza Catalunya is a 15-minute walk from the property and buses to the airport leave from there.

name: Apartment Eixample Comfort
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
Located in central Barcelona, just 300 metres from Poble Sec and Sant Antoni metro stations, Apartment Eixample Comfort offers free WiFi, a patio and a balcony with city views.

This bright, air-conditioned apartment features wooden floors, exposed beams and classic-style décor. It has 1 large double room and 1 bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. The living room includes a sofa, flat-screen TV and dining table. The kitchen is fitted with a gas hob, electric kettle and microwave.

There are many cafés and bars in Parlmant Street and Paral•lel Avenue, with bars, theatres, supermarkets and restaurants is just 500 metres from the property.

A 15-minute metro ride will take you to Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia and Plaça Espanya, with direct buses to Barcelona Airport, is 15 minutes’ walk from Apartment Eixample Comfort.

name: 1314 -AB Passeig de Gràcia Penthouse
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 95m²
description:
Well situated in the centre of Barcelona, 1314 -AB Passeig de Gràcia Penthouse offers a terrace, air conditioning, free WiFi and TV. This sustainable apartment is located 500 metres from La Pedrera and less than 1 km from Casa Batllo. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a lift and organising tours for guests.

The apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer and free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near 1314 -AB Passeig de Gràcia Penthouse include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Musik Boutique Hotel
description:
This modern hotel is centrally located 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Urquinaona Metro Station and 400 metres from the Palau de la Musica. It offers 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi.

The air-conditioned rooms at Musik Boutique Hotel feature an iPod docking station, flat-screen satellite TV and a safe. They are sound-proofed and have a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have a balcony.

Breakfast is available and you will find many shops, bars and restaurants within a short walk. The Ramblas is a 10-minute walk away and you can reach Barceloneta Beach in 10 minutes by bus or metro.

name: Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Las Ramblas
description:
Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Las Ramblas is situated in the centre of Barcelona’s Old Town, just 200 metres from Las Ramblas. It features a rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool.

The hotel offers simple, attractive décor and rooms are spacious. Each has air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, as well as tea and coffee making facilities.

The Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Las Ramblas serves a daily, buffet breakfast. There are several bars, cafés and restaurants within walking distance of the property.

Guests can make use of computers with internet access, available in the hotel reception area. Staff at the tour desk can provide information on Barcelona’s tourist attractions and arrange car rental.

The hotel is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Cathedral and the city’s Gothic Quarter. The Old Port is around 700 metres from the hotel, whilst Liceu Metro is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Silken Ramblas
description:
This stylish hotel has an excellent central location, 50 metres from Barcelona’s Las Ramblas and just 100 metres from Plaza Catalunya. It offers a rooftop pool, sauna and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at the Silken Ramblas are stylish, and are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV and a minibar. There is central heating and air conditioning according to the season. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer.

The Silken has a restaurant and bar. Room service is available. There is a also a pleasant terrace.

The Silken has a tour desk and the sightseeing bus stops nearby in Plaza Catalunya.

name: BarcelonaForRent Vila Olimpica Pool Suites
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 120m²
description:
These spacious, air-conditioned apartments are set just 10 minutes’ walk from Vila Olímpica Beach. They are within 200 metres of Ciutadella Metro Station and a large shopping centre.

All accommodation at BarcelonaForRent Vila Olimpica Pool Suites has simple, modern décor. The living area has a sofa bed and a TV, and the kitchenette comes with an oven, coffee maker, fridge and a washing machine.

Shops, bars and cafés can be found around the Olympic Port, just 10 minutes’ walk from BarcelonaForRent Vila Olimpica Pool Suites. Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter and the Borne district are just 2 Metro stops from Ciutadella Station.

The apartments are less than 300 metres from Ciutadella Park, where there is also a tram stop. Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas can be reached in 15 minutes by bus. Private parking is available on request for an extra fee.

name: BizFlats Eixample Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 100m²
description:
Featuring free Wi-Fi, BizFlats Eixample Apartments offers 2 and 3-bedroom apartments with private bathrooms. The apartments are located in different locations within the Eixample district of Barcelona, near the famous Passeig de Gracia.

The apartments have 1 en-suite bathroom and 1 additional bathroom, and a living space with a seating area, sofa, and TV. All kitchens are equipped with a dishwasher, hob, and fridge.

Plaza Catalunya Square and Las Ramblas Boulevard are around a 10-minute walk from BizFlats Eixample. There are metro stops within 800 metres of all the apartments, and Sagrada Familia can be reached in approximately 30 minutes on foot.

name: Líbere Barcelona Sant Antoni
description_short: Entire studio • 1 kitchen • 20m²
description:
Situated 200 metres from Universitat Metro Station, Líbere Barcelona Sant Antoni offers stylish, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are a 7-minute walk away.

The Líbere Barcelona Sant Antoni is located on the edge of the lively Raval district, 350 metres from the MACBA Modern Art Museum. Direct buses to Barcelona Airport stop within 400 metres.

Rooms at this modern hotel have wooden floors and simple, elegant décor. Each room offers a bathroom with a hairdryer. Some rooms also have a private terrace.

Numerous bars and restaurants can be found in the surrounding streets.

name: Eixample private rooms
description:
Well located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Eixample private rooms is located 1.1 km from Casa Batllo, 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is situated 2.3 km from Portal de l'Angel, 2.4 km from Cathedral of Barcelona and 1.9 km from Plaça Catalunya. The property is 700 metres from La Pedrera, and within 1.5 km of the city centre.

Guest rooms at the hostel are equipped with a shared bathroom equipped with a shower.

Popular points of interest near Eixample private rooms include Sagrada Familia, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: You Stylish City Center Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 110m²
description:
Located next to Plaza Catalunya Station, You Stylish City Center Apartments offers modern apartments with air conditioning and free WiFi. These luxury apartments are, and just a 1-minute walk from Las Ramblas.

Each apartment is spacious and bright, with heating and elegant contemporary décor. The modern kitchens include a ceramic hob, dishwasher and kitchenware.

Guests have access to a 24-hour concierge service.

There are numerous restaurants and shops within a 2-minute walk, including El Corte Inglés supermarket. The You Stylish tour desk provides visitor information, and there is a Tourist Office just 150 metres away. There is a swimming pool and gym nearby available for guests at an extra cost.

Direct buses to Barcelona Airport stop only 50 metres from the apartments. Plaza Catalunya Station offers direct Metro links to all areas of Barcelona, as well as trains to the Pyrenees and the Costa Brava.

name: Casa Bella Gracia by Aspasios
description:
Casa Bella Gracia by Aspasios is less than 5 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gràcia and Diagonal Avenue. This just renewed boutique hotel features 11 attractive rooms.

Each room at Casa Bella Gracia by Aspasios has contemporary décor finished in sand colours. All rooms have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi, as well as a kettle and safety box.

A range of cafés, bars and restaurants can be found in the surrounding Gràcia district. The charming squares at Plaza del Sol and Plaza de la Vila de Gràcia can be reached in 10 minutes by foot.

Diagonal Metro Station is just 400 metres away and is 3 stops from Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas. Gaudí’s La Pedrera is less than 10 minutes’ walk from the Bella Gracia.

name: Moderno
description:
Hotel Moderno has a central location, on a side street just 20 metres from Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas. It offers free Wi-Fi access throughout.

All rooms at the Moderno are heated, air conditioned and soundproofed. There is also cable TV, a fridge and a private bathroom with toiletries.

The hotel is just a short walk from the Boquería Market on La Rambla. Plaza de Catalunya and the city’s cathedral are just a few minutes’ walk away.

The hotel’s City Tour offer is ideal for exploring the city. There is also a ticket service. The 3 computers in the lobby can be used for free.

The Moderno has a 24-hour front desk and offers express check-in and check-out.

name: Petit Palace Museum
description:
This stylish design hotel is situated in the centre of Barcelona, less than 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya. The chic rooms include free WiFi.

Rooms at the Petit Palace Museum feature a contemporary bathroom with a hydromassage shower and hairdryer.

Bicycles can be hired for free at the Petit Palace, subject to availability. Bus tours can be organised for guests. The exclusive Paseo de Gracia Boulevard is 200 metres away with its many shops, restaurants and bars.

A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel’s restaurant. There is also a bar where guests can enjoy cocktails.

name: Acta Atrium Palace
description:
This elegant hotel is 250 metres from Paseo de Gracia Metro Station and Boulevard. Plaza Catalunya is a 5-minute walk away. It offers free Wi-Fi.

Set in an attractive building, dating from 1888, rooms at the Acta Atrium Palace are modern and chic, with air conditioning and satellite TV. The private bathrooms offer free toiletries and a bathrobe.

The hotel has 24-hour room service.

Gaudí's famous Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are 10 minutes' walk away. There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car at the hotel tour desk. Public parking is available nearby.

name: Barcelona4Seasons - Sagrada Familia
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
This great selection of comfortable and cosy apartments has various locations in the area around Barcelona's Sagrada Família, each with convenient access to the excellent public transport network.

Each of the Barcelona4Seasons’ apartments is tastefully decorated and well-equipped with stylish furnishings. They provide the ideal setting for those who prefer the privacy and independence of apartment accommodation.

The apartments are located in different points of Barcelona – all a maximum of 10-15 minutes from the city centre. Each one enjoys easy access to public transport, allowing you to explore this cosmopolitan city.

Check availability for the exact location of each apartment.

name: Gran Vía by The Streets
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Set 500 metres from Plaza España, No 439 - The Streets Apartments Barcelona features accommodation with modern design and free WiFi. All apartments are located within a 10-minute walk of Fira of Barcelona.

Each air-conditioned apartment is fitted with wooden flooring and provides a pleasant seating area with sofa, flat-screen TV and DVD player. It features a well-equipped kitchen including a dishwasher, microwave and coffee machine. The bathroom comes with shower and hairdryer.

The property is surrounded by a wide range of bars, shops and restaurant with traditional Spanish dishes.  Las Arenas Shopping Centre is also a 5-minute walk from the complex.

Rocafort Metro Station is just outside the door. There is also a bus stop just in front of the property which let you reach Plaza Cataluña and Las Ramblas within 5 minutes.

Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

name: 360 Hostel Borne
description:
Centrally located 360 Hostel Borne is 5 minutes from Arco de Triunfo and its metro station. It offers free Wi-Fi and each room has air-conditioning and heating.

The hostel features a shared kitchen with stove, oven, fridge and microwave. There is laundry service and luggage storage upon request. A computer room can be accessed 24 hours.

Around the hostel there are a variety of restaurants and bars. Shopping area Passeig de Gràcia is a 10-minute walk from the hostel.

Hostel Barcelona Arts & Culture is just 750 meters from Placa de Catalunya. Within 10 minutes’ walk, travelers can reach Las Ramblas, Gothic and Born neighborhoods.

We offer a variety of activities that allow you to meet other travelers such as beach volleyball and the free dinners we offer every night.

name: Apartments Barcelona Sagrada
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Apartments Barcelona Sagrada has air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, 2.9 km from Bogatell Beach, 600 metres from Sagrada Familia and 2.1 km from La Pedrera. It is situated 2.3 km from Casa Batllo and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.7 km away.

The apartment provides guests with a balcony, city views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit includes bed linen and towels.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.7 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Apartments Barcelona Sagrada.

name: Room Mate Anna
description:
Featuring a seasonal rooftop plunge pool with views and a solarium, Room Mate Anna is set in Barcelona City Centre. The hotel features cutting-edge and modern design as well as personalized service. The hotel serves a daily hot and cold buffet breakfast until midday.

Each stylish, air-conditioned room comes with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day as well as a balcony with views over Casa Batlló. Extras include a wide variety of free toiletries, a hairdryer and safe box.

Other facilities include a portable WiFi and meeting and conference rooms.

On the eigth floor of the hotel the bar Terraza de Anna by Vida Mona offers views over the city, cocktails and mediterranean tapas.
 The restaurant Vibra Speakeasy, inspired by the style of 1920, offers live music, food and cocktails from that time.

The Room Mate Anna is set in the heart of L'Eixample, just 100 metres from Casa Batlló. You will find a wide range of shops, restaurants, and cultural spots. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

name: Casa Barcelo Hostel Barcelona
description:
Set in Barcelona’s stylish Eixample district, Barcelo Hostel offers air-conditioned dormitory rooms with free Wi-Fi. Located 600 metres from Passeig de Gracia, the hostel features a terrace, 24-hour reception and shared kitchens.

Each bright dormitory has bunk beds and lockers. There is access to shared bathrooms with showers and hairdryers. Bicycles are not allowed

Barcelo Hostel offers 2 shared kitchens, including a microwave, fridge and kitchenware. There are also 2 air-conditioned lounge areas with sofas and a TV. You can find a variety of shops, restaurants and bars within a 5-minute walk of the hostel.

Diagonal Metro Station is 500 metres from Barcelo Hostel and Plaza Catalunya is 2 stops away, on Line 3. Staff at the hostel can give you tourist information about the area.

name: Catalonia Eixample 1864
description:
Located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, this 19th-century building offers stylish modern interiors and free WiFi. It is just 300 metres from the designer shops and Gaudí buildings of Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard.

The Catalonia Eixample 1864 is housed in one of the Eixample’s oldest buildings, and its painted façade gives it the Speciality Monument status.

All soundproofed en-suite rooms sleek wooden floors and furniture, air conditioning and all rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.. Some rooms have a private terrace and pool.

A buffet breakfast with show cooking is offered every morning at the Sala Minerva; while the hotel's Les Finestres de Llúria restaurant serves traditional Catalan food with a creative twist. Room service is also available.

Catalonia Eixample 1864 boasts a rooftop swimming pool, sundeck and bar; as well as a gym.

The Catalonia Eixample 1864 is ideally located just a 5-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia Station. Plaza Catalunya Square is a 10-minute walk away.

The hotel offers private parking on-site for an extra cost and an electric vehicle charging station.

name: Midtown Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Ideally located, 6 minutes’ walk from both Paseo de Gracia and central Plaza Catalunya, Midtown Apartments offers stylish, modern décor apartments with a seasonal pool and solarium in the building’s rooftop.

Set in the same building, all the soundproofed apartments have a smart TV in each bedroom and a living-dining room with a bluetooth speaker and a free safe. The kitchen is equipped with ceramic hobs, oven and dishwasher; there is a washing machine, a dryer and cleaning products are provided.

Numerous bars and restaurants serving local and international cuisine are within walking distance, and supermarkets open till late can be found nearby.

The apartments are also well connected by bus and metro to all main tourist attractions in Barcelona. A private parking is available on site.

name: Gracia Barcelona Apartment
description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, Gracia Barcelona Apartment is located in Barcelona. It is situated 1.2 km from La Pedrera and features a concierge service. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a lift and organising tours for guests.

The spacious apartment comes with 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a toaster. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, Sagrada Familia and Park Güell. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 14 km from Gracia Barcelona Apartment, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: AC Hotel Victoria Suites by Marriott
description_short: Private suite
description:
Beautiful and stylish suites located in the heart of Pedralbes, one of the top residential areas of Barcelona and close to one of the city's main business districts.

AC Hotel Victoria Suites is ideal for business travellers due its location, for weekend breaks due its tranquil environment and excellent gastronomy offer as well for families due the spaciousness of the rooms.

It features a large terrace-bar, a high quality restaurant, friendly staff and many other details.

name: Ramblas Hotel
description:
Ramblas Hotel is situated on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, just 500 metres from Port Vell Harbour. It offers free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with a balcony or terrace.

Each bright room at the Hotel Ramblas includes satellite TV, a minibar and a safe. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and toiletries. Some rooms have views over the Ramblas.

The Ramblas Hotel has a lobby bar and a charming café with original Modernista design and a pavement terrace. Breakfast is included in all room rates.

Located at the edge of Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, the hotel is a 10-minute walk from Barcelona Cathedral. Liceu Metro Station is just 250 metres away.

name: Ramblas Hotel
description:
Ramblas Hotel is situated on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, just 500 metres from Port Vell Harbour. It offers free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with a balcony or terrace.

Each bright room at the Hotel Ramblas includes satellite TV, a minibar and a safe. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and toiletries. Some rooms have views over the Ramblas.

The Ramblas Hotel has a lobby bar and a charming café with original Modernista design and a pavement terrace. Breakfast is included in all room rates.

Located at the edge of Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, the hotel is a 10-minute walk from Barcelona Cathedral. Liceu Metro Station is just 250 metres away.

name: Aparthotel Atenea Barcelona
description:
This modern aparthotel is located just off Diagonal Avenue, 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona FC’s Camp Nou Stadium. It offers large rooms with free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a kitchen.

The elegant rooms at Aparthotel Atenea Barcelona are equipped with carpeted floors and air conditioning. Each one has a seating area with a sofa, as well as a kitchen with a fridge and 2 electric hobs.

The hotel’s restaurant offers a breakfast-to-go box for a surcharge, and serves healthy food for lunch and dinner. There is also a lounge bar, where guests can relax while having a glass of cava or a soft drink.

Les Corts Metro Station is just a 3 minutes’ walk away. Sants Train Station is only 2 Metro stops from Atenea. Barcelona’s main tourist attractions can be reached within 15 minutes by Metro.

name: Sir Victor Hotel, part of Sircle Collection
description:
Sir Victor Hotel, part of Sircle Collection in Barcelona offers stylish accommodation on Passeig de Gràcia, 5 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s La Pedrera. It features a rooftop swimming pool and a terrace offering excellent views of Barcelona.

Each of the Sir Victor Hotel, part of Sircle Collection rooms has chic, contemporary décor. Rooms overlook Passeig de Gràcia, or the hotel’s interior garden. Each has satellite TV, free Wi-Fi and a large bathroom.

The Spa features steam baths, a sauna, and a state-of the art gym.

The lobby restaurant & bar, MR PORTER, offers an innovative selection of dishes to share.

Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas can be reached in 15 minutes, by foot. Diagonal Metro Station is just 70 metres from the hotel.

name: Sunny rooms bcn
description:
In a prime location in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, Sunny rooms bcn is set 1.6 km from Sant Sebastian Beach, 1.6 km from Somorrostro Beach and 1.6 km from Barceloneta Beach. This property is located a short distance from attractions such as Picasso Museum, Passeig de Gracia, and Plaça Catalunya. The property is 1.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach, and within 1 km of the city centre.

At the hostel, all rooms come with a wardrobe. Featuring a shared bathroom with a bidet and a hairdryer, rooms at Sunny rooms bcn also provide guests with free WiFi, while certain rooms here will provide you with a city view. At the accommodation every room has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near Sunny rooms bcn include Plaça Reial, Cathedral of Barcelona and Santa Maria del Mar. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from the hostel.

name: Catalonia Catedral
description:
The Catalonia Catedral is set in a traditional Modernist building, just 100 metres from Barcelona Cathedral. It offers free use of Smartphones, Wi-Fi access, a rooftop seasonal pool and a Japanese-style terrace and garden.

The Catedral has stylish rooms, which have contemporary décor. Each has a flat-screen smart TV equipped with Chromecast app, air conditioning, a minibar, a Nespresso machine. A smartphone is available for guests during their stay free of charge.

The hotel’s Ascent Restaurant by Eboca serves Mediterrean cuisine and offers views of the nearby Palacio Pignatelli Art Gallery. There is also a bar in the hotel lobby where guests can use the computers with internet access and printers for free.

The Catalonia Catedral is around 10 minutes’ walk from landmarks such as Las Ramblas and Plaza de Catalunya Square. Barcelona’s Old Port and Marina are less than one kilometre away. Jaume I Metro Station is 5 minutes' walk away.

name: Hotel Alguer Camp Nou
description:
Hotel L’Alguer Nou is situated just 500 metres from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium and 220 metres from Collblanc Metro Station. This family-run hotel offers a bar, lounge and 24-hour reception.

Rooms at the L’Alguer Nou Hotel are simple and functional, with tiled floors. Each room comes with a TV and a private bathroom. The rooms have air conditioning in summer and central heating in winter.

Hotel L’Alguer Nou serves a daily breakfast consisting of a buffet of cold and hot dishes.

Collblanc Metro Station takes you to Barcelona Aiport in 30 minutes. L'Alguer Nou is a 20-minute walk from the campus of Barcelona University. Sants Train Station is a 10-minute bus ride away, and regular bus services stop within 200 metres of the hotel.

name: NH Collection Barcelona Podium
description:
NH Collection Barcelona Pódium offers stylish, modern accommodation in a quiet area of central Barcelona. It has free WiFi, a sauna, gym and roof terrace with swimming pool and city views.

Bedrooms at the hotel are spacious and air conditioned. They all have a choice of pillows, a minibar and satellite TV. Each room comes with a Barcelona city guidebook.

NH Collection Barcelona Pódium combines a 19th-Century façade with modern interior design. It is surrounded by other Modernist buildings in Barcelona’s Eixample district.

The hotel is set 800 metres from Plaça Catalunya and the Ramblas, near the city’s Gothic Quarter. Ciutadella Park and the Olympic Port are also within walking distance.

The NH Collection Podium Hotel has good access to all parts of the city by public transport. Arc de Triomf Metro Station is just 200 metres from the hotel.

NH Collection Barcelona Pódium's restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine and there is also a lounge bar. A healthy breakfast is available in the mornings. The restaurant is closed during summer months.

name: DO Plaça Reial powered by Sonder
description:
Set on Plaza Reial and just off Las Ramblas, DO Plaça Reial powered by Sonder features a spa, a rooftop pool and stylish rooms. Bars and cafés can be found in the square and in the surrounding Gothic Quarter.

Each spacious, air-conditioned room offers a free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and a free minibar.

In the mornings, the DO Plaça Reial offers a paid breakfast. Creative Mediterranean cuisine and tapas dishes are also served in the restaurant.

The hotel spa features a sauna.

The famous Boquería Market is just 5-minute walk away. Barcelona Cathedral, Liceu Metro and Plaza Catalunya are within 1 km of the hotel.

name: Hotel Barcelona Condal Mar Affiliated by Meliá
description:
The contemporary Hotel Barcelona Condal Mar, managed by Meliá is set in a circular building, 10 minutes’ walk from Mar Bella Beach. It offers a 24-hour gym, and the rooftop pool offers impressive views of Barcelona.

The bright soundproofed rooms at the Hotel Barcelona Condal Mar are spacious and feature air conditioning, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. Each stylish room has a private bathroom and minibar. There are 2 phone lines.

The Barcelona Condal Mar lobby bar offers a range of cocktails. The bright snack lounge features modern armchairs. Guests can also enjoy a drink in the poolside bar. A buffet breakfast is served in the restaurant.

A special late check-out service, locker and transfer is available during the summer months for an extra cost.

The Barcelona Condal Mar is an 8-minute walk from Maresme Forum Metro Station and  a 2-minute walk from the nearest bus stop. The centre of Barcelona can be reached in around 15 minutes by Metro, Bus or Tram.

name: Hotel Transit
description:
Hotel Transit is just 3 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Sants, the city’s main AVE Train Station. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.

Rooms feature a flat-screen satellite TV, central heating and central air conditioning. Some rooms overlook an interior patio. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries, shower, and hairdryer.

There are vending machines on-site for coffee, drinks and snacks. Several bars and restaurants can be found a short walk from the Transit Hotel.

You can reach Plaza Catalunya and La Rambla in 10 minutes by bus or Metro, and Sants Estació Metro Station is 250 metres away. Plaza Espanya and the Magic Fountain are 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel.

name: AC Hotel Sants by Marriott
description:
AC Hotel Sants is located just 50 metres from Barcelona Sants Train Station. It offers 24-hour reception and modern, air-conditioned rooms with a satellite TV and free safe.

Each room features special reading lamps, 4 pillows and elegant furnishings. They come equipped with a desk and a minibar. Some rooms offer city views.

Free WiFi is available in the lobby and bar. The restaurant inside the property serves a breakfast buffet every morning.

AC Hotel Sants is around 500 metres from Plaça Espanya and Montjuic. Sants Station offers direct metro access to Plaça Catalunya and Las Ramblas, as well as direct access to El Prat Airport.

name: BruStar Gotic-Centric
description:
Located just opposite Arc de Triomf, BruStarr Gotic offers rooms in central Barcelona. It is a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and the Rambla.

The rooms offer a large flat-screen TV, a safe and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Some rooms have a balcony.

You can find a wide range of dining options, bars and shops in the area around BruStar Gotic-Centric.

Arc de Triomf Metro Station is 100 metres away and there are several bus stops nearby.

name: BARCELONA CENTRO SAGRADA FAMILIA
description:
Situated within the Horta-Guinardó district in Barcelona, BARCELONA CENTRO SAGRADA FAMILIA has air conditioning, a terrace, and city views. Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.2 km from Sagrada Familia.

The spacious apartment features 4 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, a microwave, a washing machine, a fridge and a stovetop. This apartment also comes with a balcony that doubles up as an outdoor dining area.

La Pedrera is 2.2 km from the apartment, while Casa Batllo is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from BARCELONA CENTRO SAGRADA FAMILIA.

name: U232 Hotel
description:
Located in Barcelona's attractive Eixample district, U232 Hotel offers stylish, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Hospital Clinic Metro Station is just 150 metres from the hotel.

All of the rooms in Hotel U232 have modern marble bathrooms with powerful showers. Some also have city views and private terraces.

Guests can enjoy drinks, jazz music and city views on the hotel's top-floor terrace. There is also a modern gym on the same floor.

The U232 has a free business centre with an internet terminal. There is an Art Deco-inspired lounge and cocktail bar, decorated with art photography and leather armchairs.

The hotel offers an extensive breakfast buffet. Room service includes daily specials and a pizza delivery service.

The shops and department stores of Diagonal Avenue are just 7 minutes’ walk away. Passeig de Gràcia and Sants Railway Station are both about 20 minutes’ walk away.

name: Lugaris Rambla Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
Lugaris Rambla Apartments is 300 metres from Bogatell Beach, in Barcelona’s Rambla del Poble Nou. Located in a quiet neighbourhood, each modern apartment offers an LCD TV, free Wi-Fi and a Nespresso coffee machine.

Lugaris is next to Poble Nou Park, and a short walk from Llacuna and Poble Nou Metro Stations. It is also a 2-minute walk from a bus stop. Barcelona Cathedral and Town Hall are just 5 Metro stops away. Many public bus services to the historic city centre also pass nearby.

Each air-conditioned apartment has a balcony with city views. The well-equipped kitchens have a ceramic hob, an oven and a washer-dryer. Bed linen and towels are provided, and weekly cleaning is included.

Other facilities include a tour desk, babysitting and shuttle service. Guests can make use of our car or bike rental.

The Lugaris building has a private security service and a 24-hour customer emergency service line. The nearby reception offers a tour desk and car rental. Airport transfers are available on prior request and for an extra charge.

name: Consell Cent apartment I 3 dormitorios Eixample
description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Consell Cent apartment I 3 dormitorios Eixample offers air conditioning. The property is located 1.7 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 1.4 km from La Pedrera and 1.4 km from Portal de l'Angel. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.2 km from Plaça Catalunya.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 3 bedrooms, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with an oven, a microwave, a washing machine, a toaster and a fridge. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Consell Cent apartment I 3 dormitorios Eixample include Casa Batllo, Boqueria Market and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

name: Room Mate Gerard
description:
Room Mate Gerard in Barcelona provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre.

It boasts a sun terrace and location, set in the Eixample district, near attractions such as Tivoli Theatre and within 700 metres of Portal de l'Angel.

At the hotel all rooms offer a simple yet elegant décor. They come with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. Air-conditioning is featured, and certain rooms include a balcony. All units include a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property.

Speaking English and Spanish, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay. Other facilities include portable WiFi.

Plaça Catalunya is a 9-minute walk from the accommodation. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

name: Praktik Garden
description:
Featuring a charming garden terrace, Praktik Garden is located 400 metres from Barcelona’s fashionable Passeig de Gracia Boulevard. Fully reburbished in 2015, its chic rooms feature colourful mosaic floors, a flat-screen TV and free WiFi.

Girona Metro Station is just around the corner from the hotel. From there guests can reach the city’s Barceloneta Beach in 15 minutes. Plaça Catalunya is 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel.

All rooms at the Praktik Garden are equipped with air conditioning and some rooms have balconies. The modern bathroom includes a shower.

Guests can relax in the hotel lounge or on the furnished garden terrace. The hotel provides vending machines for drinks 24-hours a day.

name: Next to Paseo de Gracia Rooms
description:
Well situated in Barcelona, Next to Paseo de Gracia Rooms offers air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge and free WiFi. This property is located a short distance from attractions such as Tivoli Theatre, La Pedrera, and Portal de l'Angel. The property is non-smoking and is set 400 metres from Passeig de Gracia.

At the hostel, every room includes a wardrobe. The units feature a shared bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen.

Popular points of interest near Next to Paseo de Gracia Rooms include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Casa Batllo and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Lugano Barcelona
description:
