Set on Avinguda Parallel, HCC Lugano is 500 metres from Plaza España’s FIRA Exhibition Centre, and the nearby Metro and railway stations. It offers a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi.

Each air-conditioned room at HCC Lugano has simple décor. There is a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with free toiletries.

Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast in the Lugano’s café-bar. Restaurants can be found in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter and along Las Ramblas, 20 minutes’ walk away. Drassanes Metro Station, at the bottom of Las Ramblas, is also just 2 stops from Poble Sec Metro Station.

Montjuïc Park, the MNAC Museum and Pueblo Español Village are less than 1 km from the hotel. The city’s old port is just 2 km away.

name: Rufus Port Forum
description_short: Mobile home • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 30m²
description:
Set in Barcelona in the Catalonia region with Platja del Litoral and Llevant nearby, Rufus Port Forum features accommodation with access to a public bath. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The property is non-smoking and is situated 300 metres from Forum Beach.

Providing access to a terrace, the boat consists of 1 bedroom. The boat also comes with 1 bathroom.

A restaurant, coffee shop and bar can be found on-site.

A bicycle rental service is available at the boat.

Port Olimpic is 5.5 km from Rufus Port Forum, while Sagrada Familia is 5.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 18 km from the accommodation.

name: Private rooms in Gothic
description:
Situated conveniently in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, Private rooms in Gothic is set 2.1 km from Somorrostro Beach, 2.2 km from Barceloneta Beach and 200 metres from Cathedral of Barcelona. Popular points of interest nearby include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Tivoli Theatre and Portal de l'Angel. The property is 2 km from Sant Miquel Beach, and within 400 metres of the city centre.

Popular points of interest near the hostel include Santa Maria del Mar, Plaça Reial and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Private rooms in Gothic.

name: Private rooms in Born
description:
Situated in Barcelona, within 1.4 km of Barceloneta Beach and 1.5 km of Sant Miquel Beach, Private rooms in Born features accommodation with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.1 km from Plaça Reial, less than 1 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana and a 16-minute walk from Tivoli Theatre. The property is 1.1 km from the city centre and 1.3 km from Somorrostro Beach.

At the hostel, rooms include a shared bathroom with a shower.

Popular points of interest near Private rooms in Born include Picasso Museum, Cathedral of Barcelona and Santa Maria del Mar. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: By Rambla de Catalunya Rooms
description:
Well situated in the Eixample district of Barcelona, By Rambla de Catalunya Rooms is located 1.2 km from Casa Batllo, 1.6 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.7 km from Plaça Catalunya. The property is situated 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 2.7 km from Boqueria Market and 1.8 km from Tivoli Theatre. The property is non-smoking and is set less than 1 km from La Pedrera.

With a shared bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hostel also provide guests with free WiFi. The units at By Rambla de Catalunya Rooms feature air conditioning and a desk.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 3 km from the accommodation, while Portal de l'Angel is 3.1 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from By Rambla de Catalunya Rooms.

name: Hotel 54 Barceloneta
description:
Located in Barcelona’s beachfront area of Barceloneta, this design hotel has a stylish terrace overlooking the port. It offers a 24-hour reception, free Wi-Fi and air-conditioned rooms with a smart TV.

The rooms at the Hotel 54 Barceloneta feature modern décor and innovative lighting. Each one has a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

There is a variety of good seafood restaurants within 5 minutes’ walk of Hotel 54.

The 54 Barceloneta is just 3 minutes’ walk from Barceloneta Beach. You can walk to the attractive Born district in 10 minutes, and Barceloneta Metro Station is a 7-minute walk away.

name: Beautiful Triple room with private bathroom in Gothic
description:
Situated in the centre of Barcelona, 1.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach and 1.5 km from Somorrostro Beach, Beautiful Triple room with private bathroom in Gothic offers free WiFi and air conditioning. The property is located 500 metres from Picasso Museum, less than 1 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana and a 16-minute walk from Tivoli Theatre. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.6 km from Barceloneta Beach.

Towels and bed linen are available in the bed and breakfast.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Cathedral of Barcelona, Santa Maria del Mar and Plaça Reial. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Beautiful Triple room with private bathroom in Gothic.

name: Hostal Colkida
description:
Situated in central Barcelona, 350 metres from Girona Metro Station, Hostal Colkida features a furnished terrace overlooking a private courtyard. It offers rooms with air conditioning and heating.

All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV and wardrobe. Each has a private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are also provided.

Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas and the property includes a luggage storage room and vending machine. Public parking is available on site and it carries a surcharge.

You will find shops and restaurants within 100 metres of the guest house. Paseo de Gracia Boulevard, with its exclusive boutiques and Gaudi’s buildings, is a 5-minute walk away.

Sagrada Familia Cathedral is 1.6 km from the property and Barceloneta Beach can be reached in 25 minutes by metro.

name: Charmsuites Paralel
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 75m²
description:
Offering stylish, well-equipped apartments with free Wi-Fi, Charmsuites Paralel is set next to Parallel Metro Station and Victoria Theatre. It features air-conditioned accommodation with kitchen facilities.

These spacious, newly built apartments have attractive, modern décor. All have a spacious living room with a sofa bed and a flat-screen TV. Kitchens and kitchenettes come with an electric hob, oven, kettle and coffee maker.

Shops, cafés and bars can be found in the streets surrounding the apartments. There are many restaurants in the nearby Raval district and around Las Ramblas, a 10-minute walk away.

Barcelona’s Port Vell marina is just over 1 km from Charmsuites Paralel, and the Funicular Train to Montjuïc Hill leaves from Parallel Station. Barcelona's Fira Exhibition Centre is around 15 minutes' walk away.

name: BBarcelona Central Boutique Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
BBarcelona Central Boutique Apartments has air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Casa Batllo, 1.6 km from Sants Railway Station and 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia. This sustainable apartment is located 1.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Guests can access the apartment via private entrance.

Each unit has a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with bath and a hair dryer. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while selected rooms also boast a terrace. At the apartment complex, units include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Magic Fountain of Montjuic, La Pedrera and Boqueria Market. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from BBarcelona Central Boutique Apartments.

name: Hostal Ramos
description:
Hostal Ramos is in Barcelona's Raval district, just 50 metres from the famous Ramblas. It offers 24-hour reception and simple, air-conditioned rooms with a TV and private bathroom.

The Ramos has a computer with free internet access. There is also a luggage storage facility in reception.

The guesthouse is set near many of the city's attractions. It is next to the Boquería Market and the Liceu Opera House.

Plaça Catalunya is just 5 minutes’ walk away. Airport buses, trains and metro lines all stop here.

name: Hostal Barcelona
description:
Located 15 minutes' walk from Las Ramblas and Plaça Espanya, Hostal Barcelona has rooms with air conditioning, TV and free Wi-Fi. Famous for its theatres, Parallel Avenue is 100 metres away.

Hostal Barcelona can provide tourist information, assist with ticket reservations including the Barcelona Tourist Bus, and help arrange car/bike rental. There is an internet terminal in reception. A luggage storage service is available and all rooms have a safe. Reception is available 24 hours.

A continental breakfast buffet is served from 07:30 to 10:30 It offers different kinds of bread, butter, jams, cornflakes, yogurt, cheese, ham, salami, croissants, chocolate croissants, muffins, biscuits, gaufres, Nutella, fruit, juice, coffee, milk and tea. Cold and hot drinks and pastries are available 24 hours a day. Guests also have access to a microwave. There is a supermarket in the same building, restaurants and bars in the surroundings.

Parallel Metro Station and many bus routes are 100 metres from Hostal Barcelona. The Fira Convention Centre is 12 minutes away by public transport. Montjuïc is a 5-minute walk from the guest house, and the Old Harbour can be reached in 20 minutes on foot.

name: Alba Hotel
description:
This hotel is set in the heart of the cosmopolitan city of Barcelona, just a short distance from Las Ramblas and within walking distance of attractions such as the Liceu opera house and Plaça Catalunya.

The Hotel Alba is located in Barcelona’s old town, and its beautiful façade is listed for its artistic interest. Inside, relax in a spacious en suite bedroom with balcony and air conditioning.

Stroll down the colourful Ramblas to the seafront, or enjoy cava and tapas in the famous Boqueria food market. Just a short walk away, the narrow streets of the Gothic Quarter are full of shops, bars and restaurants.

The Alba boasts convenient public transport links, with Liceu metro station only 300 metres away. From here you can travel quickly and conveniently to attractions including the Fira de Barcelona and Gaudi’s incredible Parc Güell.

name: Yate Hotel STV
description:
Yate Hotel STV, a property with a garden and a bar, is located in Barcelona, 800 metres from Forum Beach, 1.7 km from Llevant, as well as 1.8 km from Platja del Litoral. The property is situated 5.8 km from Port Olimpic, 6 km from Sagrada Familia and 6.6 km from Santa Maria del Mar. The boat provides sea views, a terrace, and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

At the boat, units have a outdoor furniture. There is a seating and a dining area in all units. At the boat, every unit has bed linen and towels.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 7 km from the boat, while Tivoli Theatre is 7 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 19 km from Yate Hotel STV.

name: Europark
description:
Set 600 metres from Barcelona’s central Passeig de Gracia, Hotel Europark offers a rooftop terrace with outdoor pool. The stylish rooms include a 32-inch LCD TV and free Wi-Fi access.

Each air-conditioned room at the Europark has elegant black and white décor. There is a laptop safe and minibar, as well as a modern bathroom with hairdryer.

Hotel Europark has a café-bar and a breakfast room, where a varied buffet breakfast is served. A free early-morning coffee service is also available.

The hotel is a 15-minute walk from Plaça Catalunya and Las Ramblas. Girona Metro Station is just 200 metres away and provides direct access to Barceloneta Beach and the Gothic Quarter.

name: Alexandra Barcelona Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton
description:
Located between the stylish Paseo de Gràcia and Rambla de Catalunya, Alexandra Barcelona Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton offers a private terrace with an outdoor pool. Plaza Catalunya is 7 minutes' walk away.

Rooms combine modern and vintage furniture and some feature traditional details like mosaic-tiled floors. They have flat-screen TVs, a minibar, hairdryer and free safe. The TVs have over 50, some international channels and free WiFi.

Solomillo Restaurant is a brasserie, offering guests the option of having meat by weight. The modern Charcuteria serves cheese plates, cold cuts and market products, as well as a variety of cocktails. You can also visit the Patio, Terrace & Pool.

There is a fitness room and guests can make use of the chromatic sauna for free. Massages are available on request for an extra cost.

Alexandra Barcelona Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton is just 5 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s impressive Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. Passeig de Gràcia Train Station is 5 minutes’ walk away, with a direct route to the Barcelona Airport.

name: Casa Balmes
description:
Casa Balmes is a bed and breakfast located in the very centre of Barcelona, 400 metres from the well-known Passeig de Gràcia Avenue and monuments like Casa Batlló. Free WiFi access is available.

Each air-conditioned room at Casa Balmes is soundproof and has elegant décor, as well as a full HD flat-screen TV and a minibar. There is also a free safe and a private bathroom with hairdryer and free toiletries. Bed linen and towels are included. Some rooms have street views.

At Casa Balmes you will find a terrace and a shared lounge with vending machines. A daily breakfast consisting of fruit juices, coffee, tea, toast, jams, cereals and a selection of pastries is included.

Other services offered at the property include tourist information, luggage storage and laundry. Guests can find a sports centre with gym and spa just 80 metres away from the b&b.

Casa Balmes is 8 minutes' walk from Plaza Catalunya. Barcelona El Prat Airport is less than 20 minutes by car.

name: Catalonia Castellnou
description:
Catalonia Castellnou offers free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour reception and bright, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. It is located 250 metres from Tres Torres Underground Station, in a quiet residential area.

There are many cafés, bars and restaurants within a 10-minute walk, in the centre of Sarrià.

Hotel Catalonia Castellnou is close to some of Barcelona’s most important medical centres, including Clínica IVI, Clínica Corachan and Fertilab.

The Castellnou offers easy access to the C32 Ring Road and Vallvidrera Tunnel. It is within a 15-minute train journey of central Barcelona, and less than 2 km from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium.Diagonal Avenue, with El Corte Ingles Department Store and two shopping centres, is a 10-minute walk away. Real Club de Tenis Barcelona is 15-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Serhs Rivoli Rambla
description:
Situated on the famous Ramblas, Hotel Serhs Rivoli Rambla has a beautiful interior courtyard and a terrace from where you can enjoy views over the Gothic Quarter while you sip an espresso.

 Return here for lunch and enjoy views over the urban gardens which date back to the Romantic era.

The Hotel Serhs Rivoli Rambla is a celebration of the Art Deco style which has become a signature of this Catalan city. Enjoy theatrical interiors which combine classic style with avant garde features such as clever lighting and contemporary furniture. Sit in the interior patio of the Rivoli Ramblas where you can enjoy the cool surroundings and murals painted on the walls.

The 128 Rambla Restaurant serves a wide selection of Mediterranean and international cuisine. The varied and appealing buffet breakfast is a great way to help prepare you for the day ahead.

name: Holiday Inn Express Barcelona City 22@, an IHG Hotel
description:
Holiday Inn Express Barcelona City 22@ is situated in the city’s 22@ District, 300 metres from Llacuna Metro Station. This hotel features rooms with satellite TV and a continental buffet breakfast included in all rates.

The Barcelona City offers simple, contemporary décor throughout. Rooms are spacious and air conditioned.Some amenities and high touch items such as kettles, pens, note pads, etc have been removed from guest rooms as per Covid-19 hygienic and security regulations. In any case, all of these items are still available upon request.

The hotel offer free WiFi access to the guests. There is also a computer and printer for their use.

The City 22@ is ideally situated for visiting many of Barcelona’s attractions and the beach is less than one kilometre away. Plaza de Catalunya and the famous Las Ramblas can be reached in less than 20 minutes, by Metro.

name: Catalonia Portal de l'Angel
description:
Housed in a traditional 19th-century building, this hotel is located between Plaza de Catalunya and Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter. It offers free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool surrounded by painted murals.

The Catalonia Portal de l'Angel maintains much of its original design. It features comfortable rooms with air conditioning, satellite TV and coffee and tea facilities. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served daily from 07:30 to 11:00 at Catalonia Portal de l'Angel.

The famous Las Ramblas is less than 200 metres away, while Barcelona Cathedral is 100 metres from the hotel. The Portal de l'Angel is just a 5-minute walk from Catalunya Metro and Railway Station.

name: Hotel Constanza
description:
Located 7 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya, Hotel Constanza has a fantastic rooftop terrace (open from May to October) with views over Barcelona. It offers a 24-hour reception and rooms with smart décor and satellite TV.

Staff at the Constanza Hotel’s 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. You can also hire a bicycle or car from reception.

The Constanza is 7 minutes’ walk from the Gothic Quarter, where you can find the Palau de la Música Catalana, a spectacular Modernist auditorium. Casa Batllo & la Pedrera are at 10-12 minutes walking distance form the Hotel. Urquinaona Metro Station & Plaza Catalunya Metro station are under 5 minutes’ walk away, connecting you with the rest of the city.

name: Fisa Rentals Les Corts Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
These stylish modern apartments offer free Wi-Fi and well-equipped kitchens. Sants Train Station is just a 10-minute walk away, while Entença Metro Station is 450 metres away.

Offering minimalist décor, each bright, air-conditioned Fisa Rentals apartment has a living room with flat-screen cable TV. Kitchens include a washing machine, microwave and coffee maker. Some apartments have terraces with city views, available on request and subject to availability.

A range of bars and supermarkets can be found in the streets around the Fisa Rentals Les Corts Apartments. L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre is around 600 metres away.

Buses to the city centre stop within a 5-minute walk of the apartments. FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium can be reached in 20 minutes on foot, or in 5 minutes by bus or Metro.

name: Hostal Operaramblas
description:
Hostal Operaramblas is situated less than 100 metres from Las Ramblas and Liceu Metro Station. This guest house features rooms with private bathrooms, a 24-hour front desk and free Wi-Fi.

The Operaramblas’ rooms offers simple décor with tiled floors. Each room has heating and a telephone.

The guest house has a drinks machine and sells snacks in the reception, where there is also a computer with internet access.

The guest house has an ideal location in the centre of Barcelona. It is 5 minutes’ walk from the Gothic Quarter, where there are a range of cafés, bars and restaurants. The city’s cathedral is 500 metres from the Opera and the Old Port is less than 10 minutes’ walk away.

name: Sonder Los Arcos
description:
Sonder Los Arcos features accommodation with free WiFi in Barcelona, ideally set less than 1 km from Plaça Catalunya and a 15-minute walk from Tivoli Theatre. Popular points of interest nearby include Cathedral of Barcelona, Boqueria Market and Picasso Museum. The property is less than 1 km from the city centre and 2 km from Sant Sebastian Beach.

All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a coffee machine, a bath or shower, free toiletries and a desk. The rooms have a private bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Passeig de Gracia, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Sonder Los Arcos.

name: Le Meridien Barcelona
description:
Frequently hosting world-famous celebrities, this prestigious hotel is located on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas. Le Méridien’s stylish rooms feature flat-screen TVs, a music system and iPod dock.

The iconic building housing Le Méridien Barcelona features a Neoclassical style façade and chic, boutique design throughout with bright colours. Some rooms have carpets featuring a Barcelona street map design, while others have Gaudí-inspired finishings.

The Méridien serves a varied, international breakfast. The CentOnze restaurant provides creative Mediterranean cuisine and cocktails, prepared with fresh ingredients from the nearby Boquería Market, as well as music and impressive views of Las Ramblas.

The on-site spa offers a wide selection of aromatherapy, massage and holistic treatments.

All guests can enjoy free entry to the nearby Palau Güell.

name: Barcelona City North Hostal
description:
The Barcelona City North Hostal offers value-for-money accommodation and free Wi-Fi. It is in the quiet Sarrià-Sant Gervasi area of Barcelona, with good access by car to the airport.

The rooms at the Barcelona City North are clean, heated and air conditioned. All come with a private bathroom, a TV and a kettle.

Guests at Barcelona City North Hostal have access to a common area with a microwave and fridge.

The hostel is within walking distance of the popular Gràcia neighbourhood and the Modernist buildings of the Eixample.

Nearby Lesseps Metro Station offers easy access to Vallcarca and the Parc Güell. Plaça Catalunya is only 3 stops away.

name: Yurbban Ramblas Boutique Hotel
description:
Situated conveniently in the centre of Barcelona, Yurbban Ramblas Boutique Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. Popular points of interest nearby include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Casa Batllo. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.5 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a wardrobe, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Every room has a safety deposit box, while selected rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also have city views.

Speaking English, Spanish and French, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay.

Popular points of interest near Yurbban Ramblas Boutique Hotel include Boqueria Market, Passeig de Gracia and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: ClassBedroom Gaudí Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
ClassBedroom Gaudí Apartments offers stylish and modern self-catering apartments in Barcelona. Apartments are spread around the San Marti district.

With air conditioning, each apartment is equipped with a flat-screen TV and a kitchen with microwave and coffee machine. The private bathroom comes with a shower and hairdryer.

La Sagrera, Bac de Roda and San Marti Metro Stations are all within a 15-minute walk from Apartments VI ClassBedroom. San Marti Park is 1.5 km away.

name: HABITACION PARA PAREJA CON BALCON
description:
Set in the centre of Barcelona, 2.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach and 2.4 km from Somorrostro Beach, HABITACION PARA PAREJA CON BALCON offers free WiFi, a garden and air conditioning. The property is around 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 400 metres from Palau de la Musica Catalana and 100 metres from Portal de l'Angel. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.5 km from Barceloneta Beach.

Towels and bed linen are offered in the aparthotel.

Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Plaça Catalunya, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from HABITACION PARA PAREJA CON BALCON.

name: Barrio Gotico Apartments Escudellers
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
A sustainable property, Barrio Gotico Apartments Escudellers is situated in Barcelona near Sant Miquel Beach, Barceloneta Beach and Plaça Reial. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is less than 1 km from the city centre and 1.9 km from Sant Sebastian Beach.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Cathedral of Barcelona, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Barrio Gotico Apartments Escudellers.

name: Rooms Nueva Valencia
description:
Well set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Rooms Nueva Valencia is located 800 metres from Sants Railway Station, 1.3 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 2.2 km from Casa Batllo. This bed and breakfast provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi. Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.6 km from the bed and breakfast and La Pedrera is 2.8 km away.

A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a kettle. The units include a shared bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.5 km from the bed and breakfast, while Plaça Catalunya is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Rooms Nueva Valencia.

name: Sonder La Casa del Sol
description:
A 10-minute walk from La Pedrera, Sonder l La Casa del Sol is situated in Barcelona and features rooms with free WiFi. Well set in the Gràcia district, this hotel offers rooms with balcony.

The units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with free-to-air channels. All rooms have a private bathroom.

Sonder l La Casa del Sol offers a beautiful sun terrace.

Speaking English, Spanish, French and Catalan.

Casa Batllo is 1.3 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Sonder l La Casa del Sol.

name: Arc La Rambla
description:
The Arc La Rambla has an ideal location on Las Ramblas, 100 metres from Drassanes Metro Station. It offers rooms with free WiFi.

The hotel is a 5-minute walk from the city’s port. Plaça Catalunya and the Gothic Quarter are 10 minutes' walk of the hotel.

All air-conditioned rooms at the Arc la Rambla feature simple décor. Each has satellite TV and a private bathroom.

The Arc La Rambla also has a ticket service and bicycle and car rental are possible on site. Lockers are available to rent.

A daily continental breakfast is served in the Ramblas’ dining room. The hotel is within 10 minutes’ walk of a selection of cafés, bars and restaurants in Barcelona’s old town.

name: Habitaciones Rambla Catalunya
description:
Habitaciones Rambla Catalunya features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia, 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 500 metres from La Pedrera. It is set less than 1 km from Plaça Catalunya and offers a lift. The property is 300 metres from Casa Batllo, and within less than 1 km of the city centre.

The units in the bed and breakfast are equipped with a kettle. Featuring a shared bathroom with a a bath or shower and a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also provide guests with free WiFi, while certain rooms here will provide you with a balcony. At the bed and breakfast, the units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Tivoli Theatre and Boqueria Market. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Habitaciones Rambla Catalunya.

name: Inside Barcelona Apartments Salva
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
These modern, fully-equipped apartments with free Wi-Fi are located in a quiet neighbourhood near Montjuïc Hill and the lively Poble Sec neighbourhood. Barcelona’s ferry terminal is just 5 minutes’ drive away.

There are several bars, restaurants and shops within 5 minutes’ walk of the apartments. Mercat Sant Antoni Food Market is about 10 minute’s walk away.

The apartments are about 15 minutes’ walk from the city’s famous Ramblas. Parallel Metro Station is about 5 minutes’ walk away and services line 3, which will take visitors to Plaza Catalunya and Plaza Espanya.

name: Àmfores Boutique Guest House
description_short: Private suite • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 20m²
description:
Set within 1.2 km of Santa Maria del Mar and 1.1 km of Picasso Museum, Àmfores Boutique Guest House provides rooms in Barcelona. Located around 850 m from Tivoli Theatre, the guest house with free WiFi is also 750 m away from La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is situated in the Ciutat Vella district.

All guest rooms in the guest house are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Each room comes with a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries.

Àmfores Boutique Guest House is set in a building of medieval origin, located next to the Palau de la Música and the city centre.

The accommodation offers a terrace.

Speaking Catalan and English, staff are ready to help at the reception.

Plaça Catalunya is 800 m from Àmfores Boutique Guest House. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 18 km from the guest house.

name: Romantic In Trendy Gracia
description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.2 km from La Pedrera and 1.6 km from Casa Batllo, Romantic In Trendy Gracia offers air conditioning. The property is around 2 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 2.6 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.9 km from Park Güell. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.5 km from Passeig de Gracia.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment provides a TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and oven. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 3.1 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 3.1 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Romantic In Trendy Gracia.

name: Private room By BCN Center
description:
In a prime location in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, Private room By BCN Center is set 1.2 km from Sant Miquel Beach, 1.3 km from Barceloneta Beach and 300 metres from Santa Maria del Mar. This property is located a short distance from attractions such as Port Olimpic, Palau de la Musica Catalana, and Tivoli Theatre. The property is 1.2 km from Somorrostro Beach, and within 1.2 km of the city centre.

Popular points of interest near the hostel include Picasso Museum, Cathedral of Barcelona and Plaça Reial. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Private room By BCN Center.

name: Comfort Home Playa Poblenou
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 80m²
description:
Located in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Mar Bella Beach and a 11-minute walk from Bogatell Beach, Comfort Home Playa Poblenou provides spacious air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is situated 3.1 km from Port Olimpic, 3.7 km from Sagrada Familia and 4 km from Santa Maria del Mar. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.1 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach.

The apartment is equipped with 3 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer and free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Picasso Museum is 4.6 km from Comfort Home Playa Poblenou, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 4.7 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: Paseo de Gracia Bas Apartments by Aspasios
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 54m²
description:
Paseo de Gracia Bas Apartments by Aspasios is centrally located, just an 8-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas. It features air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi and smart TV with internet connection.

Fitted with wooden flooring, each apartment boasts a modern and functional décor. Apartments have a pleasant lounge area with a sofa and floor-to-ceiling windows. Kitchens include a dishwasher, microwave and coffee machine. There is also a Smart TV with keyboard and internet access. The bathroom includes a hydro-massage shower.

Paseo de Gracia Bas Apartments are surrounded by a wide range of bars, traditional Spanish restaurants, as well as shops and supermarkets. Las Ramblas, Plaza Catalunya Square, and the Gothic Quarter are all approximately a 10-minute walk away.

The apartments are just 3 minutes’ walk from the fashionable Paseo de Gracia Avenue. Gaudí's masterpiece Casa Batlló is 450 metres away. You can go to the beach by car or by public transport in less than 10 minutes from the apartments.

Regular airport buses to Barcelona El Prat Airport leave from a bus stop located in Plaza Catalunya. You can also catch a train to the airport from nearby Passeig de Gràcia Train Station.

name: Niu Barcelona Hotel
description:
Located 600 metres from Plaza Reial in Barcelona, Niu Barcelona Hotel features an outdoor pool on the rooftop. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property

Every room at this hotel comes with a flat-screen TV; while the private bathrooms come with shower and hairdryer. Rooms are air-conditioned in summer and heated in winter.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Guests benefit from a complimentary bottle of water upon arrival.

Portal de l'Angel is 800 metres from Niu Barcelona Hotel, while Plaça Catalunya is 900 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Niu Barcelona Hotel.

name: Close to Passeig de Gracia
description:
Set in a renovated modernist building, Close to Passeig de Gracia B&B is located in Barcelona. This bed and breakfast is located 150 metres from Girona Metro Station and offers free WiFi.

Fitted with tiled flooring and featuring high ceilings and large windows, this accommodation offers air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV, a seating area and a dining table.

Each room has 1 double bed and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a hairdryer, and shower.

Passeig de Gracia, famous for its luxury shops, is just 500 metres from Close to Passeig de Gracia B&B, and there are several shops and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of the property.

Gaudi's famous La Pedrera is 1 km from the property. Plaza Catalunya is 10 minutes away on foot.

name: Paral·lel
description:
Situated just 10 minutes walk from the stunning centre of Barcelona, this smart and practical hotel is set in the charming neighbourhood of Poble Sec, at the foot of Montjüic, where you can visit the Olympic site.

Start your day with breakfast in Paral.lel, before heading out for a stroll up Montjüic, where you can spend the day relaxing in a natural setting, and also visit museums such as Fundació Joan Mirò and the national gallery, MNAC.

Each of the bedrooms in Paral.lel comes with air conditioning, so you can enjoy tranquillity and rest in the warm summer months. Browse the internet using the free Wi-Fi connection available in this hotel.

Paral.lel is located just a short stroll from the port and beach area of the city, and you can get to top sights such as Las Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter with its stunning cathedral.

name: APBCN Eixample Center
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 65m²
description:
Featuring free WiFi, APBCN Eixample Center is located in Barcelona. This property is set 200 metres from Tetuan Metro Station and a 15-minute walk from the famous Sagrada Familia.

All air-conditioned apartments at this property provide you with a flat-screen TV and dining table, while the kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, oven, coffee machine, and microwave. You can enjoy views of the city from the private balcony.

The private bathroom comes with a shower and a hairdryer. Bed linen and towels are provided, and a washer and dryer are available.

You can find a grocery shop, and various restaurants and bars within a 10-minute walk of APBCN Eixample Center. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas Boulevard are 1.3 km from the property, and Passeig de Gracia, famous for its designer shops, can be reached in 15 minutes on foot.

name: Sweet Inn - Ethnic Eixample
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Set in Barcelona, 200 metres from La Pedrera, less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia and a 10-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Sweet Inn - Ethnic Eixample offers accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. It is located 1.5 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana and provides a lift. The property is 600 metres from Casa Batllo, and within 1.2 km of the city centre.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and slippers. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

There is a supermarket near the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Sweet Inn - Ethnic Eixample include Tivoli Theatre, Portal de l'Angel and Cathedral of Barcelona. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Tres Torres Atiram Hotels
description:
Hotel Tres Torres is located in Barcelona’s Sarrià district, just 350 metres from Tres Torres Metro Station, connecting you to Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas in 15 minutes. It offers attractive rooms with free Wi-Fi.

The modern rooms are air-conditioned and feature wooden floors. All have satellite TV, a safe and minibar. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

A buffet breakfast is served in the Tres Torres' restaurant. There is a bar and room service is available.

The Tres Torres has a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. On-site parking is offered for an extra charge.

The hotel is located close Barcelona's L'Illa Shopping Centre.

name: The One Barcelona GL
description:
The One Barcelona GL has a fitness centre, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Barcelona. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The property is 1.2 km from the city centre and 200 metres from La Pedrera.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The rooms are fitted with a kettle, while some rooms also boast a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and a microwave. At The One Barcelona GL all rooms come with bed linen and towels.

A continental, Full English/Irish or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

At the accommodation guests will find facilities including a sauna and a spa and wellness centre.

Speaking Arabic, Catalan, Czech and German at the reception, staff are always on hand to help.

Popular points of interest near The One Barcelona GL include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 13 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Apartment Eixample Dret Sagrada Familia by Interhome
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 39m²
description:
500 metres from Sagrada Familia, Apartment Eixample Dret Sagrada Familia by Interhome provides a sustainable 3-star accommodation in the Eixample district of Barcelona. The air-conditioned accommodation is 2.3 km from Casa Batllo. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.7 km away.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

La Pedrera is 1.9 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Apartment Eixample Dret Sagrada Familia by Interhome.

name: Habitat Apartments Bailén
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Habitat Apartments Bailén is a modern apartment located in Barcelona, 5 minutes' walk from Arc de Triomf and 280 metres from Tetuan Square. Free WiFi access is available.

The stylish, bright apartment features a furnished balcony and a living room with sofa bed, flat-screen TV and DVD player. The fully equipped kitchenette includes a dishwasher, while the bathroom has a hairdryer and a shower.

Bed linen and towels are included. There is a double bedroom and a twin bedroom.

Habitat Apartments Bailén is situated in a private building with lift. Transportation to El Prat Airport, located 18 km away, can be provided for an extra cost.

City sights like Barcelona Zoo or Ciutadella Park are within a 15-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Condal
description:
Set 50 metres from Las Ramblas and Liceu Metro Station, Hotel Condal offers rooms with free WiFi and private bathrooms. Opened in 1850, this hotel in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter offers air conditioned or heated accommodation, depending on the season.

The Condal’s rooms have simple décor with tiled floors. Each room has a flat-screen TV.

A continental breakfast is served in Hotel Condal’s café-bar. There is a varied selection of restaurants in the streets surrounding the hotel.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information on Barcelona’s many attractions, including the MACBA Museum and Barcelona Cathedral, which can be reached in 10 minutes by foot. The Condal is less than 1 km from Port Vell Marina.

name: MUN21 · MUN21 - Apartment with balcony Sagrada Familia
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 55m²
description:
Located within 1.4 km of Sagrada Familia and 3.2 km of La Pedrera, MUN21 · MUN21 - Apartment with balcony Sagrada Familia provides rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. The property is set 3.4 km from Casa Batllo, 3.8 km from Passeig de Gracia and 3.9 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Palau de la Musica Catalana is 4.2 km away and Tivoli Theatre is 4.2 km from the apartment.

At the apartment complex, all units come with a balcony. The units will provide guests with an oven.

Picasso Museum is 4.3 km from the apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is 4.6 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from MUN21 · MUN21 - Apartment with balcony Sagrada Familia.

name: Le Palacete powered by Sonder
description:
Situated in Barcelona, in the Gracia district, 1 km from Park Güell, Sonder l Le Palacete features an interior garden and courtyard.

Rooms come with a flat-screen TV. Some units feature a seating area and a private terrace. You will find a coffee machine in the room. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. Sonder l Le Palacete features free WiFi throughout the property. The property offers contact-free check-in and 24/7 virtual support which limits in-person interaction.

Sagrada Familia is 1.3 km from Sonder l Le Palacete, while La Pedrera is 1.4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Sonder l Le Palacete.

name: Habitat Apartments Alissia
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Habitat Apartments Alissia features accommodation within 800 metres of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. It is situated 1.7 km from Somorrostro Beach and provides a lift. The apartment has family rooms.

Fitted with a balcony, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. Kitchenware is also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available around the property.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Barceloneta Beach, Sant Miquel Beach and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Habitat Apartments Alissia.

name: Apartamentos Laforja
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 30m²
description:
Offering free Wi-Fi, these modern décor apartments are located in Sant Gervasi District, less than 15 minutes’ walk from the famous Passeig the Gracia Avenue and the Modernist buildings.

Apartamentos Laforja features air-conditioned 1-bedroom apartments. They all include 1 double room, a seating area with sofa bed, a modern and well equipped kitchenette and a private bathroom.

Numerous bars and restaurants as well as supermarkets can be found nearby. You can also visit the charming Gracia District, less than 15 minutes’ walk from the apartments.

Muntaner Train Station is 5 minutes’ walk of the apartments while Diagonal Metro Station is 15 minutes’ walk away.

Apartments are well connected to the city centre, only 10 minutes away by public transport.

name: Uma Suites Sagrada Familia
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 22m²
description:
Uma Suites Sagrada Familia features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, 2.7 km from Nova Icaria Beach, 3 km from Somorrostro Beach and 300 metres from Sagrada Familia. It is located 1.7 km from Casa Batllo and provides a lift. Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.9 km from the apartment and Palau de la Musica Catalana is 2.8 km away.

Each unit is equipped with a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. Every unit includes a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while selected rooms are equipped with a balcony. The units will provide guests with a microwave.

La Pedrera is 1.6 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Uma Suites Sagrada Familia.

name: Southern Cross
description:
This restored Scottish yacht is docked at the Real Club Nautico Sailing Club in Barcelona’s Port Vell Marina. It offers a spacious sundeck and hot tub, views of Paseo de Colon Promenade and free Wi-Fi.

The 5 comfortable cabins on Southern Cross feature classic nautical décor with mahogany furniture. They all feature air conditioning, a TV and a private bathroom. Cabin crew are available on the yacht 24 hours.

A free continental breakfast is served daily and there is a charming outdoor seating area for al fresco dining. There is also an inner dining area, a bar serving cocktails and a lounge with TV, sofas and games.

Southern Cross is ideally located for exploring Barcelona’s main sites, with Las Ramblas just a 10-minute walk away. The Maremagnum Shopping Centre is located next to Sailing Club.

Barceloneta Metro Station is 1 km from the Southern Cross, while Barceloneta Beach, with its bars and restaurants, is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Indigo Barcelona - Plaza Catalunya 4Sup, an IHG Hotel
description:
Featuring an outdoor swimming pool with a poolside terrace, Hotel Indigo Barcelona - Plaza Catalunya is just 200 metres from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. Plaça Catalunya is about 4 minutes’ walk away.

The stylish, air-conditioned rooms in the Hotel Indigo have a flat-screen satellite TV and free WiFi.  Some bathrooms have a spa bath, while all rooms include amenities such as a minibar, coffee maker, scale and daily newspaper delivery. A pillow menu is also offered. Some rooms have a balcony or terrace.

The restaurant, Gastro Bar Catalunya, offers Spanish dishes for breakfast, lunch and dinner.  The 24-hour reception can arrange hire of bicycles and cars, and book tickets for exhibitions and musicals.

The train station offering a connection with Barcelona Airport is about 6 minutes’ walk away. Gaudi’s famous La Pedrera is just 10 minutes’ walk away.

A great range of bars and restaurants can be found in the area surrounding the Indigo Hotel.

name: Sunotel Junior
description:
Offering panoramic views from its rooftop terrace, which has a seasonal hot tub and swimming pool, Sunotel Junior is set 300 metres from Francesc Macià Square. It offers free, high-speed WiFi.

All rooms at Sunotel Junior have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, soundproofed windows and a fully equipped bathroom.

Guests can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast each morning. The hotel’s restaurant, Pa'l Caldero, offers a selection of dishes from around the world. There is also a range of cafés and restaurants nearby.

You will find a 24-hour reception that offers a luggage storage service and free pool towels. There are also several meeting rooms available.

The Sunotel is a 5-minute walk from Hospital Clinic Metro Station, and Sants Railway Station is just 2 metro stops away.

FC Barcelona’s famous Camp Nou Stadium can be reached in 15 minutes by public transport, and Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are also around 15 minutes away.

name: Sepulveda 1
description:
Sepulveda 1 is situated in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 1.7 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.2 km from Plaça Catalunya. Popular points of interest nearby include Portal de l'Angel, Cathedral of Barcelona and Plaça Reial. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 1.2 km away.

Towels and bed linen are available in the bed and breakfast. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Casa Batllo, Boqueria Market and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Sepulveda 1.

name: MAB2 · MAB2 - Apt at street level with private terrace
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
Conveniently situated in the Sants-Montjuïc district of Barcelona, MAB2 · MAB2 - Apt at street level with private terrace is located 1 km from Sants Railway Station, 2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.7 km from Camp Nou. The property is around 4 km from Passeig de Gracia, 4.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 4.1 km from La Pedrera. In good weather, guests are welcome to sit outside.

All units are air-conditioned and some of them include a seating area with a flat-screen TV, and a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area. Each unit is equipped with a private bathroom and a hair dryer, and certain units at the apartment complex have a terrace. The units will provide guests with a toaster.

Casa Batllo is 4.3 km from the apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is 4.7 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from MAB2 · MAB2 - Apt at street level with private terrace.

name: Suite Miro Eixample Barcelona
description:
Set in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, Suite Miro Eixample Barcelona features a balcony. The property is located 1.4 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, 2 km from Casa Batllo and 2.4 km from Passeig de Gracia. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sants Railway Station is less than 1 km away.

The apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV with streaming services and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a toaster. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Plaça Catalunya is 2.5 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Suite Miro Eixample Barcelona.

name: Relax
description_short: Mobile home • 1 bedroom • 2 bathrooms • 15m²
description: Relax is located in Barcelona.

name: Hotel Miramar Barcelona GL
description:
Miramar Barcelona has a picturesque setting within gardens on Montjuïc Mountain, overlooking the Mediterranean Sea. It offers 2 swimming pools, free Wi-Fi and rooms with spectacular views of Barcelona.

Housed in a former palace with a Neucentisme style, the hotel maintains many of the building’s original features and it is one of the symbols of the city. The interiors have chic, contemporary design.

Guests can make use of the on-site fitness centre, or relax by the seasonal outdoor swimming pool. The hotel's L´Occitane Spa features an indoor pool, hot tub, sauna, steam room, pressure showers and treatment cabins.

The hotel has 24-hour room service and a bar with a terrace. Studio Miramar restaurant serves a selection of Catalan and Mediterranean dishes.

Each of the Miramar’s air-conditioned rooms has floor to ceiling windows, a 47-inch TV with international channels and a minibar with a courtesy bottle of water. Their private bathrooms come with L'Occitane toiletries, hairdryer, bathrobes, slippers and either a shower or a designer bath tub.

The Joan Miró Foundation, the Old Port and the National Art Museum of Catalonia are within 20 minutes’ walk of the Miramar. And just 10 minutes walk from the Olympic Stadium and Palau Sant Jordi.

name: Catalonia Gracia
description:
This hotel is located next to Avinguda Diagonal and Passeig de Gràcia, ideal for shopping. Guests can easily access Plaza Cataluña and the city’s historic gothic quarter. Free Wi-Fi is available.

Situated along the modernist route, Hotel Catalonia Gracia is surrounded by much of the interesting architecture that Barcelona is famous for, such as Gaudí and Domenech i Muntaner's key buildings, including La Pedrera.

A buffet breakfast is available at the on-site restaurant; room service is also available.

Guests can easily enjoy this cosmopolitan city as Hotel Catalonia Gracia is within walking distance of Barcelona’s many attractions. As well as the excellent public transport links providing swift access to the entire city and the surrounding area, the hotel offers great value for money. The hotel also includes meeting amenities and conference rooms available for business events and banquets.

name: Sweet Inn - Palau
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²
description:
Sweet Inn - Palau offers accommodation within 1.4 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 1.8 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana and 1.4 km from Tivoli Theatre. Portal de l'Angel is 1.7 km from the apartment and Cathedral of Barcelona is 1.9 km away.

Each unit is fitted with a toaster, fridge, a coffee machine, as well as a stovetop and kettle. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, the units at the apartment complex have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms will provide you with a terrace. At the apartment complex, the units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Sweet Inn - Palau.

name: Dream Gracia Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 45m²
description:
Offering a balcony and modern décor with original features, including wooden shutters and beamed ceilings, Dream Gracia Apartments is located just off charming Plaça de la Vila Square.

Each air-conditioned 2-bedroom has a free Wi-Fi throughout and includes a double sofa bed, flat-screen TV, radio and dining table in the living room.  The bathroom features a shower and hairdryer.

Modern kitchenette includes an oven, ceramic hob and washer-dryer. A wide range of bars and restaurants can be found within a 5-minute on foot.

Sol Gracia Apartments are located in just 2 Metro stops from Plaça Catalunya Square. Gaudi’s La Pedrera is 750 metres from the property and Passeig de Gràcia Train Station is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Sweet Inn - Sepulveda
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Ideally located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Sweet Inn - Sepulveda is located 1.3 km from Plaça Catalunya, 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 1.3 km from Boqueria Market. It is set 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.6 km away.

Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a well-fitted kitchen with a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Casa Batllo and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Sweet Inn - Sepulveda.

name: Hotel Suizo
description:
This hotel, located in the Gothic heart of Barcelona near the Cathedral, enjoys an ideal location for visiting the sights of this exciting city.

Hotel Suizo has modern facilities and comfortable rooms with satellite television and air conditioning. Watch the world go by from the bedroom with a balcony overlooking the streets of Barcelona’s Gothic quarter, or relax in the Suizo’s lounge.

Wander in the labyrinth of narrow streets surrounding the impressive Barcelona Cathedral, just 200 metres from the hotel. A short walk takes you to the famous Ramblas, with its colourful street performers and pavement cafés.

Walk down to the old port or the beach, or take the metro to visit other areas of the city. A metro station next to the Hotel Suizo makes public transport connections easy.

name: The Barcelona EDITION
description:
The Barcelona EDITION has a restaurant, outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and bar in Barcelona. Featuring a terrace, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests.

All guest rooms at the hotel come with a seating area. At The Barcelona EDITION all rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

A la carte breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation.

You can play billiards at The Barcelona EDITION.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Barceloneta, Somorrostro and Sant Miquel Beach. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from The Barcelona EDITION.

name: Urban Loft Barcelona Diagonal super ubicación wifi
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
In a prime location in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Urban Loft Barcelona Diagonal super ubicación wifi is a sustainable apartment set 2.3 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 2.6 km from Bogatell Beach. The property invites guests to reconnect with nature and encourages them to make eco-friendly travel choices. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.7 km from Somorrostro Beach.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Sightseeing tours are available in the neighbourhood.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sagrada Familia, Casa Batllo and La Pedrera. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Urban Loft Barcelona Diagonal super ubicación wifi.

name: Best Western Premier Hotel Dante
description:
The Best Western Premier Dante is located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, a few minutes walking from the elegant Paseo de Gracia, Plaza de Catalunya and the famous Pedrera and Casa Batlló. With a functional design, the Hotel has a Lobby Bar, meeting rooms, internet corner and private parking.

The rooms are spacious and daylight. They have free WI-FI connection, coffee maker, electronic safe, LCD satellite TV and air conditioning, as well as a complete bathroom. The Suites are located on the 7th floor and have a large terrace with views of Barcelona.

The Buffet Breakfast offers a wide variety of milk and vegetable drinks, juices, coffees, infusions, pastries and salty. Many of the products served are gluten free. The Hotel's Lobby Bar, serves Mediterranean cuisine, both for lunch and dinner. It is also possible to taste an aperitif.
The Hotel also has 4 fully equipped meeting rooms and private parking, as well as free Wi-Fi in rooms and common areas.

It is about 20 minutes away by car from Barcelona airport and 10 from the AVE station.

name: Dalia Ramblas
description:
Set 50 metres from the Ramblas, in the Raval district, Dalia Ramblas features air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. Well served by public transport, it offers 24-hour reception and free luggage storage.

Featuring a modern and functional décor, rooms come with a flat-screen TV, wardrobe and a desk. All have a private bathroom with bath or shower. Free toiletries and hairdryer are provided.

Dalia Ramblas is set in the lively city centre. There are plenty of bars and restaurants in the surrounding area.

Next to the Gothic Quarter, Dalia Ramblas is 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and from Barcelona Cathedral. You can also reach the bustling Plaza Reial Square in a 5-minute walk.

Barcelona Airport is 12 km away from the hotel. Regular airport buses leave from a bus stop located just 800 metres away.

name: LucasLand Apartments Barcelona
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Set 2.7 km from Nova Icaria Beach, LucasLand Apartments Barcelona offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 3 km from Somorrostro Beach and offers a lift. When staying at the apartment, guests can use private entrance.

The apartment provides guests with a terrace, city views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near LucasLand Apartments Barcelona include Sagrada Familia, Casa Batllo and La Pedrera. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

name: Catalonia Port
description:
Situated in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, Hotel Catalonia Port has a modern gym and a sun terrace with a small seasonal outdoor pool. Each air-conditioned room has free WiFi, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The hotel’s contemporary El Racó del Port restaurant opens from Monday to Saturday, serving seasonal Mediterranean cuisine. A varied buffet breakfast, available until 12:00 at the weekends, is offered in the dining room, and there is also a lobby bar.

The Catalonia Port Hotel offers stylish rooms with hardwood floors. They all include a safe, a minibar and a private bathroom.

Catalonia Port is just 250 metres from the bottom of the famous Las Ramblas, and Port Vell Harbour is 400 metres away. Drassanes Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Habitación doble en Eixample
description:
Conveniently located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Habitación doble en Eixample is set 1.2 km from Casa Batllo, 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is situated 2.3 km from Portal de l'Angel, 1.9 km from Plaça Catalunya and 4.2 km from Park Güell. The property is 1.6 km from the city centre and 700 metres from La Pedrera.

With a shared bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hostel also have free WiFi. At Habitación doble en Eixample all rooms have bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sagrada Familia, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Habitación doble en Eixample.

name: limehome Barcelona Carrer de Fontcoberta - Digital Access
description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.8 km from Camp Nou, limehome Barcelona Carrer de Fontcoberta - Digital Access offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. The property is situated 3.9 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, 4.1 km from La Pedrera and 4.4 km from Casa Batllo. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.8 km from Sants Railway Station.

All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. The rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At limehome Barcelona Carrer de Fontcoberta - Digital Access every room is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Passeig de Gracia is 4.8 km from the accommodation, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 4.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from limehome Barcelona Carrer de Fontcoberta - Digital Access.

name: Catalonia Diagonal Centro
description:
Catalonia Diagonal Centro is set in the heart of Barcelona’s Eixample district, 300 metres from Diagonal Metro Station. It features a seasonal outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.

At the Catalonia Diagonal Centro, you can enjoy modern, comfortable accommodation next to some of Barcelona’s most popular sights. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app

Only 300 metres away on Passeig de Gràcia is La Pedrera, one of Gaudi’s famous creations. Take a stroll past the Modernista buildings to reach Plaça Catalunya and the lively Ramblas area.

Back at the hotel, relax in your stylish bedroom with contemporary wooden furniture and marble en suite bathroom. Watch satellite television or take advantage of the free wireless internet connection.

A short stroll from the hotel takes you to trendy Gràcia, with its bohemian shops and leafy squares, and a huge selection of bars and restaurants. Nearby metro and bus lines make it easy to see the whole of this cosmopolitan city.

name: Catalonia Plaza Catalunya
description:
Hotel Catalonia Plaza Cataluña offers an outdoor pool and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV. It is housed in a building 50 metres from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya. All hotel rooms have smart TVs equipped with Chromecast app.

The hotel serves a continental buffet breakfast with show cooking and it includes a wide variety of regional products and home-made cakes.

Catalonia Plaza Cataluña Hotel has a sun terrace with loungers, a gym and a pool. Guests can also enjoy the on-site spa and cabin for spa treatments and massages.

Hotel Catalonia Plaza is a 5-minute walk from Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter and the Palau de la Música Catalana. A regular bus service to the airport leaves from the other side of Plaza Catalunya, just 100 metres away.

name: Yurbban Passage Hotel & Spa
description:
Situated in Barcelona in the Catalonia Region, 400 metres from Portal de l'Angel, Yurbban Passage Hotel boasts an outdoor pool and spa centre. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant.

All rooms include a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms feature a seating area to relax in after a busy day. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. Each room includes a private bathroom. Extras include bathrobes and slippers. Yurbban Passage Hotel features free WiFi throughout the property.

Guests can enjoy an authentic Catalan breakfast each morning.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

The hotel also offers bike hire. Plaça Catalunya is 500 metres from Yurbban Passage Hotel, while La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 500 metres from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

name: Catalonia Magdalenes
description:
Catalonia Magdalenes Hotel is set in  Barcelona, 200 metres from the Cathedral of Barcelona and offers a terrace with an outdoor pool with views of the Cathedral and a spa. Portal de l'Angel is 200 metres away.

Each room at this hotel is air conditioned, soundproofed and features a flat-screen TV and a Nespresso Coffee Machine. The bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property, There is also a spa with a hot tub and a gym. The hotel offers show-cooking during breakfast.

Plaça Catalunya is 400 metres from Catalonia Magdalenes Hotel, while Picasso Museum is 600 metres away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

name: Room Mate Pau
description:
Room Mate Pau is set 50 metres from the emblematic Plaza Catalunya. It offers a stylish décor and a terrace and bright, contemporary rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at Room Mate Pau feature chic decor and air conditioning. All include a plasma TV with USB port for laptop connection, a minibar, safe and a modern private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served daily, which you can enjoy at the property's shared terrace. Events can be catered for and various bars, restaurants and shops are within 2 minutes’ walk.

Other facilities include meeting and conference rooms.

Room Mate Pau is 2 minutes’ walk from Las Ramblas and Passeig de Gracia, with its exclusive shops and Gaudí monuments. Urquinaona Metro station is 150 metres away, 2 stops from Barceloneta and its beach.

The hotel can help book tickets and activities and is 250 metres from Catalunya Metro and FGC Train Station.

name: Duquesa Suites Barcelona
description:
Set the centre of Barcelona, 400 metres from Picasso Museum and Barceloneta Metro Station, Duquesa Suites Barcelona features a year-round outdoor plunge pool, sun terrace and free WiFi. It is housed in a building from the 18th century with the Speciality Monument status.

Rooms at this hotel come with 1 extra large double bed, a sofa bed and a bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Rooms have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and capsule coffee machine.

Please note that the hotel reserves the right to pre-authorise credit cards prior to arrival. When booking more than 3 rooms, different policies and additional charges may apply. Buffet breakfast is served at Hotel Duquesa de Cardona. Local City Tax pending to be paid at Front Desk.

Plaza Reial is 500 metres from Duquesa Suites Barcelona, while La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 600 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Duquesa Suites Barcelona.

name: Hotel El Palace Barcelona
description:
Hotel El Palace Barcelona is located in Eixample District, close to the Ramblas, the main shopping area and Barcelona’s main tourist attractions. It offers a Mayan-style luxury spa. A limousine service with a chauffeur is available on request.

Opened in 1919, this hotel features a neo-classical façade and stylish air-conditioned rooms with classic decor. Each room is spacious and comes with satellite TV, desk, minibar and a private bathroom with hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers.

There are 2 restaurants: L'Éclair, located at the hall, and the Winter Garden Restaurant, set at the Roof Terrace; guests can also enjoy a cocktail at the Bluesman Cocktail Bar.

Hotel El Palace Barcelona has a Mayan-style spa with a Temazcal Sauna. Other facilities at this hotel include both fitness and business center and an outdoor pool.

Third person sharing in room is available for Superior room, Junior Suite and Superior Suite.

Staff at Hotel El Palace Barcelona can provide information about the area. Passeig de Gràcia Metro and Railway Station as well as Urquinaona Metro station are less than 5 minutes’ walk of the hotel.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are approximately 15 minutes’ walk away.

name: !!Boat with AC in Port Forum 2 Bikes Included!!
description_short: Mobile home • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 29m²
description:
A recently renovated property, !!Boat with AC in Port Forum 2 Bikes Included!! is set in Barcelona near Forum Beach, Llevant and Platja del Litoral. Featuring full-day security, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The property is non-smoking and is situated 5.6 km from Port Olimpic.

This air-conditioned 1-bedroom boat comes with a seating area, a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave. Towels and bed linen are featured in the boat. The property has an outdoor dining area.

A minimarket is available at the boat.

Sagrada Familia is 5.9 km from the boat, while Santa Maria del Mar is 6.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 19 km from!!Boat with AC in Port Forum 2 Bikes Included!!.

name: Friendly Rentals Santa Monica
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 38m²
description:
Set in the centre of Barcelona, 2.2 km from Sant Sebastian Beach and 2.2 km from Sant Miquel Beach, Friendly Rentals Santa Monica offers free WiFi and air conditioning. This sustainable apartment is located 2.3 km from Barceloneta Beach and 1.1 km from Santa Maria del Mar. The apartment features family rooms.

Each unit is fitted with a balcony, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with bidet and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and stovetop are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Picasso Museum, Cathedral of Barcelona and Plaça Reial. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Friendly Rentals Santa Monica.

name: AinB Sagrada Familia Apartments
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²
description:
Just a 15-minute walk from Gaudí’s Sagrada Família Basilica, the stylish, air-conditioned AinB Sagrada Familia apartments offer free Wi-Fi and well-equipped kitchens. Arc de Triomf Metro Station is 250 metres away.

The bright apartments offer city views and elegant minimalist décor. Each apartment has a spacious living-dining room with flat-screen satellite TV. Kitchenettes include a hob, oven and coffee maker.

The charming Born district and Ciutadella Park are within a 10-minute walk of AinB Sagrada Familia. Las Ramblas and Barceloneta Beach can be reached within a 20-minute walk.

Estació del Nord Bus Station is just 200 metres from the apartments and offers national and international bus services, including direct buses to Girona Airport.

name: My Space Barcelona Charming Apartment in the Heart of Gracia
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
My Space Barcelona Charming Apartment in the Heart of Gracia features a terrace and is located in Barcelona, within just 1.8 km of Casa Batllo and 1.7 km of Park Güell. The property is around 2.4 km from Passeig de Gracia, 2.5 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 2.8 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and La Pedrera is 1.3 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bidet and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Tivoli Theatre is 2.8 km from the apartment, while Sagrada Familia is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from My Space Barcelona Charming Apartment in the Heart of Gracia.

name: Stay U-nique Apartments Gaudi II
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 58m²
description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Gaudi II has a balcony and is situated in Barcelona, within just 1.6 km of La Pedrera and 2 km of Casa Batllo. The property is set 2.5 km from Passeig de Gracia, 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 2.9 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 200 metres away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Tivoli Theatre is 2.9 km from the apartment, while Portal de l'Angel is 3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Gaudi II.

name: Nice room close to Sagrada Familia
description:
Set in Barcelona, within 1.3 km of Casa Batllo and 1.6 km of Passeig de Gracia, Nice room close to Sagrada Familia offers free WiFi throughout the property. The property is around 1.7 km from Tivoli Theatre, 2.2 km from Portal de l'Angel and 2.4 km from Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is 1.5 km from the city centre and less than 1 km from La Pedrera.

At the hostel, the rooms are equipped with a shared bathroom with a shower.

Popular points of interest near Nice room close to Sagrada Familia include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Sagrada Familia and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Port VII Apt centrico acogedor w balcon 23
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
Port VII Apt centrico acogedor w balcon 23 has a balcony and is situated in Barcelona, within just 1.5 km of Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.9 km of Santa Maria del Mar. It is located 1.8 km from Plaça Catalunya and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sant Miquel Beach is 3 km away.

This air-conditioned apartment features 1 bedroom, a TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and a living room. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Port VII Apt centrico acogedor w balcon 23.

name: Seventy Barcelona
description:
