Seventy Barcelona has a shared lounge, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Barcelona. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, fitness centre, and sauna, as well as an outdoor swimming pool.

At the hotel the rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Seventy Barcelona the rooms include bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a hammam.

Popular points of interest near Seventy Barcelona include La Pedrera, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the hotel.

name: Catalonia Born
description:
Set in a 19th-century building in Barcelona’s El Born district, Catalonia Born offers a rooftop pool, an attractive central courtyard and free Wi-Fi. Arc de Triomf Metro Station is 250 metres away.

The classic rooms at Catalonia Born Hotel come with an elegant marble bathroom. They also include a satellite TV and centrally controlled heating or air conditioning, depending on the season.

A buffet breakfast is served, and the snack bar is open for lunch and dinner. There is also a bar in the lobby.

Located minutes from França Train Station, the hotel is well-connected to the rest of the city and its surroundings. Car rental is also available from the tour desk.

name: Rooms in the center of Barcelona
description:
Attractively set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Rooms in the center of Barcelona is situated 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia, 1.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The air-conditioned accommodation is 1.8 km from Sants Railway Station. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Casa Batllo is 1.1 km away.

At the bed and breakfast, every unit is equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a shared bathroom, bed linen and towels. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a kettle. All units have a wardrobe.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include La Pedrera, Boqueria Market and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Rooms in the center of Barcelona.

name: Casa Trafalgar Barcelona
description:
Located in the heart of Barcelona, Casa Trafalgar Barcelona offers modern-style rooms with  free  Wi-Fi access. The shops and restaurants of Paseo de Gracia Boulevard are a 5-minute walk away.

The air-conditioned rooms all come with a satellite TV, cable channels and some have a terrace. Each has a private bathroom equipped with a hairdryer.

Urquinaona Hotel is just 30 metres from the Urquinaona Metro Station, 2 stops from Barceloneta and its beach.

Urquinaona Hotel will be reopened on April 2023 since it's been renovated.

name: ICON Bcn
description:
This boutique hotel is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and Paseo de Gracia. It offers a free bicycle use, free WiFi

Each room at the ICON Bcn by Petit Palace features modern décor, a flat-screen TV and a shower.

Guests will find a bar and a restaurant with Mediterranean cuisine and reception is open 24 hours a day. The hotel also offers a scooter hire service, subject to availability.

ICON Bcn by Petit Palace is just 7 minutes’ walk from the Gothic Quarter, where you can find the Palau de la Música Catalana. Urquinaona and Paseo de Gracia Metro are less than 5 minutes’ walk away. Gaudi's La Pedrera is 750 metres away, and you can walk to Ciutadella Park in 15 minutes.

name: Magic Place
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
Boasting air-conditioned accommodation with a private pool, mountain view and a balcony, Magic Place is situated in Barcelona. With pool views, this accommodation features a patio. Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, the allergy-free apartment features a solarium.

The spacious apartment with a terrace and sea views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

For those times when you'd rather not dine out, you can choose to have groceries delivered.

Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

Tibidabo Amusement Park is 1.7 km from the apartment, while Camp Nou is 7.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from Magic Place.

name: Cozy Apartament in the center
description:
Right in the heart of Barcelona, situated within a short distance of Somorrostro Beach and Barceloneta Beach, Cozy Apartament in the center offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a fridge and kettle. It is located 200 metres from Picasso Museum and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.6 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

This apartment features 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a bidet. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property offers city views.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Cathedral of Barcelona, Santa Maria del Mar and Plaça Reial. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Cozy Apartament in the center.

name: Catedral Bas Apartments by Aspasios
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
Catedral Bas Apartments by Aspasios is centrally located, 2 minutes' walk from Barcelona Cathedral and 4 minutes from Plaza Catalunya. It offers free Wi-Fi and a small rooftop pool with a sun terrace and views of the cathedral.

The spacious, modern apartments feature wooden floors and have a living room with a sofa and Smart TV, with which you can use the internet and Skype. The well-equipped kitchenette includes a washing machine and dishwasher.
Set on the corner of Portal de l'Àngel, a popular shopping street, Catedral Bas Apartments's location means that many museums, shops and restaurants can be reached by foot. Las Ramblas and Passeig de Gràcia are a 5-minute walk away.

You can walk to the port in 10 minutes and the beach in 15 minutes. There is also a children's playground opposite.

Airport buses stop at nearby Plaça de Catalunya, where there are several Metro, railway and bus connections.

name: Rooms Sepulveda
description:
Ideally set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Rooms Sepulveda is situated 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 1.6 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.2 km from Plaça Catalunya. The air-conditioned accommodation is 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia. The accommodation features a lift and a shared kitchen for guests.

A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a kettle. All units have a shared bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Casa Batllo, Boqueria Market and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Rooms Sepulveda.

name: Sensation Authentic Gràcia
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
Sensation Authentic Gracia is a self-catering accommodation located in Barcelona. Free WiFi access is available in all apartments. The property is a 10-minute walk from Gaudi's La Sagrada Familia.

Accommodation will provide you with a TV and air conditioning. There is a full kitchenette with a dishwasher and a microwave. Featuring a bath, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. All properties include a private balcony with chairs and tables. Bed linen and towels are provided.

Joanic Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away, and you can reach Plaça Catalunya and the centre in 15 minutes by metro. You can reach Gaudi's La Pedrera in 20 minutes by metro, and Barcelona-El Prat Airport is located 16 km away.

name: Apartment Vila Olímpica Barcelona next to beach & garden
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Featuring a garden and garden views, this sustainable apartment is well set in Barcelona, close to landmarks like Nova Icaria Beach and Bogatell Beach. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.3 km from Somorrostro Beach.

Apartment Vila Olímpica Barcelona next to beach & garden features 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

For guests with children, the apartment provides outdoor play equipment. Pub crawls can be enjoyed nearby.

Popular points of interest near Apartment Vila Olímpica Barcelona next to beach & garden include Port Olimpic, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: W Barcelona
description:
W Barcelona is a striking sail-like structure next to Barceloneta Beach, offering breathtaking design and fantastic views over Barcelona. It features a spa, infinity pool, rooftop bar and luxurious rooms.

The W Hotel’s impressive rooms feature avant-garde design and views of the Mediterranean or the city. They all come with a chaise lounge, flat-screen TV, iPod docking station and rainfall shower.

The W has a stylish gourmet restaurant, FIRE; and you can enjoy a cocktail with panoramic views over the city and sea at NOXE rooftop bar, located on the 26th floor. Cocktails are also offered in the W Lounge. The SALT Beach Club & Restaurant has a menu of innovative burgers accompanied by specially designed cocktails to live the ultimate burger by the beach experience.

There are two pools, SUN Deck and WET Deck, which are surrounded by decking with loungers. The hotel also has direct beach access. Facilities at the W Spa include a hot tub, sauna and steam room, and a brand new relaxation area, GETAWAY, is available from 2018. A wide range of relaxation and beauty treatments is available.

The W is 20 minutes’ walk from Barceloneta Metro Station, and buses stop outside the hotel.

name: Melia Barcelona Sky 4* Sup
description_short: Private suite
description:
One of Barcelona’s tallest buildings, this design hotel offers spectacular views over the city and sea. Melia Barcelona Sky features an outdoor swimming pool. Treatments are available at the Serena SPA Wellness and free access is offered to the gym.

Each spacious room at Melia Barcelona Sky includes a 32-inch plasma-screen TV and offers city views. The stylish bathrooms come with a rain shower.

You can enjoy a cocktail on the 24th floor, at the Skyline 24 Panoramic Terrace, which offers views over the city.

El Merkado Restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine, and you can enjoy a cocktail on its terrace. WiFi is free in all areas.

Located in the lively area of Poblenou, Melia Barcelona Sky is just 200 metres from Poble Nou Metro Station. The Forum and the International Convention Centre are within a 15-minute walk. The Mar Bella beach is only 10 minutes' walk of the hotel.

name: Duquesa de Cardona 4* Sup
description:
The 19th-century Duquesa de Cardona 4* Sup, opposite Barcelona’s marina in the Gothic Quarter, is 600 metres from the Ramblas and has free Wi-Fi. Its rooftop terrace offers panoramic city views and includes 2 plunge pools and a bar. Property also features a Gym.

Duquesa de Cardona has spacious, air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen satellite TV, a safety deposit box and a minibar. The private bathroom comes with a bathrobe and slippers.

The hotel’s restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine. During summer, the snack bar serves creative tapas, BBQ dishes and cocktails.

The famous Sagrada Familia is 2.5 km away, and Barceloneta Metro Station is only 300 metres away. The Maremagnum Shopping Centre and Barcelona Aquarium are 500 metres from Duquesa de Cardona 4* Sup.

name: W Barcelona
description:
W Barcelona is a striking sail-like structure next to Barceloneta Beach, offering breathtaking design and fantastic views over Barcelona. It features a spa, infinity pool, rooftop bar and luxurious rooms.

The W Hotel’s impressive rooms feature avant-garde design and views of the Mediterranean or the city. They all come with a chaise lounge, flat-screen TV, iPod docking station and rainfall shower.

The W has a stylish gourmet restaurant, FIRE; and you can enjoy a cocktail with panoramic views over the city and sea at NOXE rooftop bar, located on the 26th floor. Cocktails are also offered in the W Lounge. The SALT Beach Club & Restaurant has a menu of innovative burgers accompanied by specially designed cocktails to live the ultimate burger by the beach experience.

There are two pools, SUN Deck and WET Deck, which are surrounded by decking with loungers. The hotel also has direct beach access. Facilities at the W Spa include a hot tub, sauna and steam room, and a brand new relaxation area, GETAWAY, is available from 2018. A wide range of relaxation and beauty treatments is available.

The W is 20 minutes’ walk from Barceloneta Metro Station, and buses stop outside the hotel.

name: Melia Barcelona Sky 4* Sup
description_short: Private suite
description:
One of Barcelona’s tallest buildings, this design hotel offers spectacular views over the city and sea. Melia Barcelona Sky features an outdoor swimming pool. Treatments are available at the Serena SPA Wellness and free access is offered to the gym.

Each spacious room at Melia Barcelona Sky includes a 32-inch plasma-screen TV and offers city views. The stylish bathrooms come with a rain shower.

You can enjoy a cocktail on the 24th floor, at the Skyline 24 Panoramic Terrace, which offers views over the city.

El Merkado Restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine, and you can enjoy a cocktail on its terrace. WiFi is free in all areas.

Located in the lively area of Poblenou, Melia Barcelona Sky is just 200 metres from Poble Nou Metro Station. The Forum and the International Convention Centre are within a 15-minute walk. The Mar Bella beach is only 10 minutes' walk of the hotel.

name: Duquesa de Cardona 4* Sup
description:
The 19th-century Duquesa de Cardona 4* Sup, opposite Barcelona’s marina in the Gothic Quarter, is 600 metres from the Ramblas and has free Wi-Fi. Its rooftop terrace offers panoramic city views and includes 2 plunge pools and a bar. Property also features a Gym.

Duquesa de Cardona has spacious, air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen satellite TV, a safety deposit box and a minibar. The private bathroom comes with a bathrobe and slippers.

The hotel’s restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine. During summer, the snack bar serves creative tapas, BBQ dishes and cocktails.

The famous Sagrada Familia is 2.5 km away, and Barceloneta Metro Station is only 300 metres away. The Maremagnum Shopping Centre and Barcelona Aquarium are 500 metres from Duquesa de Cardona 4* Sup.

name: Enjoy Apartments Calabria
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
Enjoy Apartments Calabria offers free WiFi and a balcony with city views. Located in Barcelona, this apartment is 2 km from Plaza Catalunya Square.

Featuring contemporary décor, warm tones and wooden furniture, this apartment offers an air-conditioned living area with parquet flooring, a flat-screen TV and a DVD player. The kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, oven and a microwave.  A washing machine is also available.

There is a double bedroom and a bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. Bed linen and towels are provided.

A variety of restaurants, shops and bars are within 3 minutes' walk from the apartment. Enjoy Apartments Calabria is 170 metres from Rocafort Metro Station.

Berceloneta Beach is 4 km away.

name: Apartaments Clot-Sant Martí
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Situated just 100 metres from Clot-Aragó Station, these functional apartments offer free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and a terrace with street views. The Sagrada Família is a 20-minute walk away.

Each Clot-Sant Martí apartment has 2 bedrooms and a living room with a double sofa bed. Kitchens include a microwave, oven, toaster and kettle, and apartments also have a washing machine.

Apartaments Clot-Sant Martí are located 500 metres from Glòries Shopping Centre. Nearby Clot-Aragó Station offers Metro links to Barcelona city centre, as well as regional train services.

Please see Important Information for details of late arrival and cleaning charges. Guests must provide a valid contact telephone number to the property before arrival.

name: Radas
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Featuring free WiFi,  Radas is set in Barcelona, 500 metres from Montjuïc. Palau Sant Jordi is 1.3 km away and Fira Barcelona is a 13-minute walk away.

The apartment features a seating-dining area with a satellite flat-screen TV, CD and DVD player. All units include a kitchen fitted with a dishwasher, electric kettle, ceramic hob and oven. A microwave, a toaster and refrigerator are also offered, as well as a coffee machine. Some apartments have a terrace, balcony or chill out area.

Radas offers two-bedroom and one-bedroom apartments. They are equipped with a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Bed linen and towels are provided. Each apartment has a climate control system.

Plaza Reial is 1.5 km from Radas, while Plaça Catalunya is 1.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 11 km from Radas, which you can reach by public transport from a bus stop 500 metres from the property.

name: Barcelona City Hotel
description:
This practical hotel is located 1 streets from Passeig de Gràcia, metres from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló. It offers simple rooms with free Wi-Fi.

The Barcelona City Hotel is situated within easy walking distance of the city’s famous Modernist buildings. These include La Pedrera and the Casa Amatller.

The surrounding streets are full of elegant boutiques and great restaurants. The shopping and touristic centre of La Rambla is a short stroll away.

There are many metro stations and buses near the Barcelona City. The tourist bus also stops on Passeig de Gràcia.

All rooms at the hotel are air conditioned and heated.

name: Acta Splendid
description:
Acta Splendid is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas. It offers 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

Staff at the Hotel Splendid’s 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. There is also a computer in the lobby that guests can use for free.

There is a public car park 450 metres from the hotel, around a 7-minute walk. You can walk to the Palau de la Música Catalana, a Modernist auditorium and UNESCO World Heritage Site, in 15 minutes.

Gluten-free breakfasts are available upon request.

name: Permar Sagrada Familia
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Sagrada Familia and 2.2 km from La Pedrera, Permar Sagrada Familia offers air conditioning. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is soundproof and is situated 2.7 km from Casa Batllo.

Offering a balcony and inner courtyard views, the apartment includes 1 bedroom, a living room, satellite flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Guests can take in the ambience of the surroundings from an outdoor dining area. Laundry service is also available.

Park Güell is 1.6 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 3.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Permar Sagrada Familia.

name: Hotel Jazz
description:
The stylish Hotel Jazz is located 2 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya in the centre of Barcelona. It features a rooftop pool and terrace with views over the city.

The contemporary rooms include free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The modern bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

A breakfast buffet is served in the modern bar-café area of Hotel Jazz. This includes fresh fruit, pastries, and baked goods.

Universitat Metro Station is less than 100 metres from the hotel. The MACBA and CCCB galleries are within a 5-minute walk while the Gothic Quarter is 10 minutes away.

name: Hostal Drassanes
description:
Located 300 metres from Las Ramblas, Hostal Drassanes offers free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour reception and bright, air-conditioned rooms with TVs and modern bathrooms. Port Vell Harbour is just 100 metres away.

Each simple room has tiled floors and a safe. Some rooms have views of La Mercè Church and the charming La Mercè Square.

Hostal Drassanes is surrounded by the narrow streets and lively bars of the Gothic Quarter. Drassanes Metro Station is 400 metres away, while Maremàgnum Shopping Centre is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Catalonia Barcelona Plaza
description:
Located in Barcelona's Plaza de España, Hotel Catalonia Barcelona Plaza offers a seasonal rooftop pool and a terrace with panoramic city views. It also has a fitness room, beauty salon and free Wi-Fi.

The property is located next to Espanya Metro Station. In the square there are numerous bus stops that connect with other parts of the city, with the Fira Barcelona fairground and with Barcelona airport.

All spacious rooms are equipped with air conditioning, satellite TV, a safe and a private marble bathroom with hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout, and Smart TVs with Chromecast apps are available. Choose one of the two clock suites and you will have incredible views of Montjuïc from the floor-to-ceiling windows. If you prefer, the hotel also has rooms and suites with private terrace.

The Catalonia Barcelona Plaza serves a daily buffet breakfast in the Simultáneo space, Barcelona's new meeting point that fuses cultural and leisure activities with the best gastronomic offer. Come to Simultáneo to telework with free wifi, to have an informal meeting, to enjoy a concert or to have an afterwork cocktail.

Do you already know the  Simultáneo Gastrobar? An avant-garde space that offers unique haute cuisine dishes. If you book half board, you can enjoy the Gastrobar menu during lunch or dinner.

The Filigrana restaurant specialises in modern Catalan cuisine made with local ingredients. You can also visit the Japanese restaurant Kurai or have a drink on The Clock terrace, overlooking Montjuïc.

The Catalonia Barcelona Plaza has a spacious business centre with 3 large conference rooms and 8 meeting rooms, all equipped with the latest technology.

This is our guests' favourite part of Barcelona, according to independent reviews.

name: AB Gracia Sant Salvador
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 42m²
description:
These stylish, air-conditioned apartments are located in a peaceful part of Barcelona’s Gracia district, just 400 metres from Lesseps Metro Station. The BWH Gracia apartments offer free WiFi.

Decorated in a modern and minimalistic style, the apartments feature floor-to-ceiling windows and parquet floors. Each one has a lounge area with a sofa, flat-screen TV, DVD player and iPod docking station. The kitchen is well-equipped and includes an oven and washer-dryer.

Gracia is a lively neighbourhood and has many unique shops, restaurants and bars. Gaudí’s famous Park Güell is only 15 minutes’ walk from the apartments.

Plaza Catalunya, the very centre of Barcelona, is 10 minutes away by metro. Airport buses stop there, or alternatively the property can arrange an airport transfer for an extra charge.

name: numa I Colmena Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 44m²
description:
Attractively situated in the Sarrià-St. Gervasi district of Barcelona, numa I Colmena Apartments is a sustainable apartment situated 1.8 km from La Pedrera and 1.3 km from Park Güell. The property invites guests to reconnect with nature and encourages them to make eco-friendly travel choices. Private parking is available on site at this recently renovated property. The apartment has family rooms.

Each unit is fitted with air conditioning, a private bathroom and a well-fitted kitchen including a dishwasher, oven, fridge and a stovetop. Every unit is fitted with a coffee machine, a flat-screen TV, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while certain rooms have a terrace. At the apartment complex, all units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Casa Batllo is 2.4 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from numa I Colmena Apartments.

name: Fontanella By BCN URBAN Rooms
description:
Fontanella By BCN URBAN Rooms is a recently renovated guest house in the centre of Barcelona, 2.4 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach. The air-conditioned accommodation is 2.5 km from Barceloneta Beach. The accommodation offers a lift, full-day security and currency exchange for guests.

With a private bathroom, units at the guest house also have free WiFi, while selected rooms also offer a balcony. At the guest house, some units are soundproof.

Sightseeing tours are available within easy reach. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the guest house.

Popular points of interest near Fontanella By BCN URBAN Rooms include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Portal de l'Angel and Cathedral of Barcelona. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Sant Pau Ramblas Apartments Serennia
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 65m²
description:
Sant Pau Ramblas Apartments Serennia provides accommodation within less than 1 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. It is located 2.4 km from Sant Sebastian Beach and features a lift. The apartment features family rooms.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Some units include a terrace and/or a balcony with city views and an outdoor dining area. At the apartment complex, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Sant Pau Ramblas Apartments Serennia.

name: AinB Picasso-Corders Apartments
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 35m²
description:
These studio apartments are located next to the Picasso Museum, Santa Caterina Market and in the heart of the bohemian Born and Gothic Quarter. They offer free Wi-Fi.

Apartments in Barcelona Corders are housed in a refurbished building, with a private lift to each apartment. Each stylish studio is decorated in light colours, using traditional materials such as stone and wood. Each studio has a small kitchen corner with a fridge and a hob or microwave.

The local district of the Born has a wealth of bars, restaurants and nightlife from which to choose. From the Corders apartments you can also walk to Las Ramblas, Barcelona Port and Barcelona Beach.

name: ChicStays Apartment Vila Olímpica
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
ChicStays Apartment Vila Olímpica features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Nova Icaria Beach, a 13-minute walk from Somorrostro Beach and 1.3 km from Bogatell Beach. Complimentary WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk and a lift for guests.

Each unit is equipped with a balcony, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with bidet and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Port Olimpic, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from ChicStays Apartment Vila Olímpica.

name: Lodging Apartments Gracia 2
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 63m²
description:
Situated in Barcelona, less than 1 km from La Pedrera and a 17-minute walk from Casa Batllo, Lodging Apartments Gracia 2 offers free WiFi and air conditioning. It is set 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.4 km from Sagrada Familia.

The spacious apartment has 3 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and dishwasher, and a living room with a TV. The property offers inner courtyard views.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Park Güell. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Lodging Apartments Gracia 2.

name: Hostal Aslyp 114
description:
Situated in the L'Eixample neighbourhood of Barcelona, Hostal Aslyp 114 offers free WiFi and features a shared lounge with flat-screen TV and satellite channels. Plaza Catalunya is 2.8 km away.

Fitted with tile flooring, the guest house has air-conditioning and heating. The rooms feature simple décor, wardrobe and city view. The private bathroom has a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The property offers a continental breakfast and vending machines are available.

Restaurants, shops and bars are within 250 metres away. Gaudí's famous Sagrada Familia Cathedral is 3.5 km from Hostal Aslyp 114. Sants Metro and Train Station is a 15-minute walk away.

Barcelona Airport is 20 minute-drive away. Hostal Aslyp 114 offers shuttle service for a surcharge.

name: Cool&colorful Centric Apartment
description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, Cool&colorful Centric Apartment is located in Barcelona. It is situated 1.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and features a lift. The property is 1 km from Passeig de Gracia, and within less than 1 km of the city centre.

With free WiFi, this 2-bedroom apartment provides a TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Cool&colorful Centric Apartment include Plaça Catalunya, Casa Batllo and Boqueria Market. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

name: CAMP NOU & FiRA BUSINESS LOFTS
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 25m²
description:
Located in Barcelona, near Camp Nou and Sants Railway Station, CAMP NOU & FiRA BUSINESS LOFTS is a sustainable aparthotel that offers guests with greener choices throughout their stay. Among the facilities at this property are free shuttle service and full-day security, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace.

At the aparthotel, all units come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a shower and free toiletries. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the aparthotel, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 3.2 km from the aparthotel, while Palau Sant Jordi is 4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from CAMP NOU & FiRA BUSINESS LOFTS.

name: Sercotel Hotel Rosellon
description:
Located 300 metres from Sagrada Familia, Sercotel Hotel Rosellon offers 4-star accommodation in Barcelona and features a bar. With a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service, a concierge service and organising tours for guests.

Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. At Sercotel Hotel Rosellon each room comes with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help.

La Pedrera is 1.6 km from Sercotel Hotel Rosellon, while Casa Batllo is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: H La Paloma Adults Only
description:
The H La Paloma is located in the Raval neighborhood, just 200 meters from the Sant Antoni market.
 The rooms at H La Paloma feature modern and elegant decoration.
They feature a king-size bed, free Wi-Fi, Smart TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. It also has private parking and 24-hour room service.
The H La Paloma has the ideal location to visit the major centers of interest on foot, being 600 meters from the MACBA Museum of Modern Art and just a 5-minute walk from Paseo de Gracia, Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas.
The Sant Antoni and Universidad metro stations are just a few meters away.

name: Barcelona City Apartment
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 14m²
description:
These stylish apartments close to the Torre Agbar and Glòries Metro station have free Wi-Fi and fully equipped kitchens.

The Barcelona City Apartments offer flexible accommodation for up to 4 people. They have TV and DVD player, and the kitchens have microwave, fridge, hob and washing machine. The apartments also have an iron, towels, and bed linen.

Barcelona City Apartment can be found close to Plaça de les Glòries, a transport hub in Barcelona. You have easy access to several Metro, bus and tram routes. You are only 10 minutes’ walk from the beach.

name: AB Sagrada Familia Premium
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 65m²
description:
AB Sagrada Familia Premium offers stylish apartments only 200 metres from the famous Sagrada Familia. They feature free Wi-Fi, a plasma TV and a CD player.

AB Sagrada Familia Premium are spacious, the kitchen in each apartment is equipped with an oven, microwave, coffee machine and kettle. The private bathroom includes a shower.

Bed linen and towels are provided and each apartment is cleaned before arrival. A washing machine and drier are included.

The city centre of Barcelona is just 10 minutes away by metro. The bohemian district of Gracia is just 20 minutes’ away by foot from the AB Sagrada Familia Premium.

name: SmartRoom Barcelona
description:
SmartRoom Barcelona is an eco-friendly economy hotel located in central Barcelona, 1 km from Sants Train Station. Decorated in a modern style, each room here will provide you with a flat-screen Smart TV with satellite channels. This hotel has been awarded the Green Key for their sustainable and environmental friendly business.

The air-conditioned rooms have free WiFi access. Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with free toiletries. Extras include a desk and bed linen.

A buffet breakfast is available daily. Other facilities offered at the property include a vending machine with drinks and snacks. At SmartRoom Barcelona you will find a 24-hour front desk.

Plaza de Sants is 450 metres from SmartRoom Barcelona and Sants Train Station is 15 minutes' walk away. The hotel is 1.5 km from Camp Nou and Magic Fountain of Montjuïc. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 20 minutes' drive away.

name: Colors
description:
This modern hotel offers free wired internet access and colourful rooms with flat-screen satellite TV. The beautiful Laberint d’Horta Park is around a 15-minute walk away.

Colors is situated in a quiet residential area, just 350 metres from Valldaura Metro Station. Direct trains connect to Barcelona city centre in around 15 minutes. Free parking can also be found nearby.

Colors is located next to Can Cortada, one of Barcelona’s most popular restaurants. The hotel also has a coffee bar, where you can enjoy a breakfast buffet and light meals.

Rooms at the hotel offer a functional design and simple, stylish décor. Each room is air-conditioned and includes a safe.

name: Olivia Plaza Hotel
description:
Situated on Plaza Catalunya in the centre of Barcelona, the Hotel Olivia Plaza offers free Wi-Fi and a terrace bar with views of Santa Ana Church. Stylish rooms include a flat-screen TV.

This design hotel serves a buffet breakfast and guests can also order breakfast to the room. The modern Nineteen restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine.

The chic rooms at the Olivia Hotel Barcelona include a free safe and views over the square. They are also equipped with a sofa or armchair and a breakfast table.

Guests at Olivia Plaza Hotel have free access to Holmes Place Urquinaona gym, located 500 metres from the hotel. Guests can make free use of the pool area and fitness room there.

The Olivia Plaza Barcelona is just 100 metres from the famous Ramblas with its many restaurants and street performers. Catalunya Metro Station is 2 minutes’ walk from the hotel and the Gothic Quarter is less than 10 minutes away.

name: Aparthotel Mariano Cubi Barcelona
description_short: Private suite
description:
Aparthotel Mariano Cubi can be found just 200 metres from Barcelona’s Avinguda Diagonal and 15 minutes' walk from Passeig de Gracia. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and some have a kitchenette.

All spacious rooms have wooden floors, satellite TV, and a desk.

The Aparthotel Mariano Cubi's tour desk can help guests plan their stay in Barcelona. There is also a free business centre with internet access.

The area has a wide range of shops. Fontana Metro station is about 500 metres away and Gràcia FGC Station is only 150 metres away. From there you can get to Plaça Catalunya and the Ramblas. Gaudí's La Pedrera is about 20 minutes’ walk away.

name: Sweet Inn - Verdi
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
Sweet Inn - Verdi features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, 1.9 km from Casa Batllo, 2.4 km from Passeig de Gracia and 2.5 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and La Pedrera is 1.4 km away.

The apartment provides guests with a balcony, city views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

Park Güell is 1.4 km from the apartment, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 15 km from Sweet Inn - Verdi, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Limonaia
description:
Boasting a garden and free WiFi, Limonaia is set in Barcelona, 100 metres from La Pedrera and 600 metres from Casa Batllo. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and organising tours for guests.

All rooms have a contemporary décor and come with air conditioning, free WiFi, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. At the hotel all rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with free toiletries.

Popular points of interest near Limonaia include Passeig de Gracia, Tivoli Theatre and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Habitat Apartments ADN
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 2 living rooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Situated in Barcelona, 120 metres from Hostafrancs Metro Station, Habitat Apartments ADN offers air conditioning, heating, and free WiFi.

The apartments feature modern décor and include a living room with a sofa bed and flat-screen TV. Each also has a kitchen, equipped with a dishwasher, washing machine, and hob.

The apartments have 1 or 2 bedrooms, as well as a private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. Toiletries, towels, and bed linen are provided.

Arenas Shopping Centre is 600 metres from the property and it includes a big supermarket and a number of rooftop restaurants with panoramic views of the city. Sants Train Station, where you can catch a train to the airport, is a 10-minute walk away.

name: H10 Art Gallery 4* Sup
description:
Offering a terrace with hammocks and swimming pool on the 7th floor, H10 Art Gallery is a modern hotel located in Barcelona, 350 metres from Rambla Catalunya. Free Wi-Fi access is available.

This design hotel showcases various pieces of art including paintings, lithographs and sculptures. There is a free business corner with computers, free national and international newspapers and a panoramic lift.

The elegant, air-conditioned rooms at the Art Gallery hotel come with a LED-screen TV with international channels, an iPod dock, a minibar and a laptop safe. The private bathrooms have a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast made of high-quality, natural products and a range of à la carte dishes, is served every morning.

There is a stylish garden with decorative sheets of water, a bar and a restaurant on the hotel's ground floor. At H10 Art Gallery you will find a 24-hour front desk where tourist information can be provided, as well as meeting and banquet facilities.

Private parking is available for an extra cost. Provença Railway Station is 2 minutes' walk away, while Diagonal Metro Station is 400 metres away. El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

THE NIRTC LICENSE NUMBER IS : HB-004616

name: Plaza Goya Rooms
description:
Plaza Goya Rooms is located in the centre of Barcelona and a few minutes’ walk from the Las Ramblas. It features free WiFi and free luggage storage.

Rooms at Plaza Goya Rooms are air conditioned and include a flat-screen TV and safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have a balcony.

You can find several restaurants, bars, and a grocery shop within a 5-minute walk of Plaza Goya Rooms. Universitat Metro Station is 50 metres away, and Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia is 4 metro stops away. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are 700 metres from the property.

name: Evenia Rocafort
description:
The stylish Evenia Rocafort is located in central Barcelona, 200 metres from Poble Sec Metro Station. Air-conditioned, soundproofed rooms feature flat-screen TV and free internet access.

Rooms at the Evenia have a private bathroom, minibar and safe. There is also a work desk.

Evenia Rocafort serves a varied buffet breakfast.

There is a 24-hour front desk and an internet corner. The hotel can provide tourist information, and is within a short walk of the Fira Exhibition Centre, the Magic Fountain and Poble Espanyol.

Poble Sec Metro Station is just 2 stops away from the Ramblas. Sants Train and Bus Station is just 3 stops away.

name: Port I Espectacular apartament con terraza
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
Port I Espectacular apartament con terraza has a terrace and is situated in Barcelona, within just 1.5 km of Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.9 km of Santa Maria del Mar. It is set 1.8 km from Plaça Catalunya and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 3 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

This air-conditioned apartment has 1 bedroom, a TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and a living room. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Port I Espectacular apartament con terraza.

name: By La Boqueria Rooms
description:
Offering air-conditioned rooms in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, By La Boqueria Rooms is 2.3 km from Sant Miquel Beach. Popular points of interest nearby include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Portal de l'Angel and Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is 400 metres from the city centre and 2.3 km from Sant Sebastian Beach.

With a shared bathroom equipped with a bidet and a hairdryer, rooms at the hostel also offer free WiFi. Guest rooms include bed linen.

Popular points of interest near By La Boqueria Rooms include Plaça Catalunya, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Gótico
description:
Hotel Gótico is 50 metres from Barcelona’s Jaume I Metro Station and a 2-minute walk from Barcelona Cathedral. It offers a rooftop terrace, and stylish, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV.

Soundproofed rooms are heated and feature beautiful tiled floors. They have a safe and work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast in the Gótico hotel café-bar, which features impressive stone arches. Packed lunches can be requested and there are vending machines for drinks and snacks.

There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Parking is available nearby for an extra charge. The hotel is just 5 minutes’ walk from La Rambla.

name: Condes de Barcelona
description:
Hotel Condes Barcelona occupies a 19th-century building on Passeig de Gracia with a seasonal rooftop pool and terrace. It features a gym and a sauna.

The soundproofed rooms at Condes de Barcelona Hotel are air conditioned, LCD satellite TV and laptop safe. They have views of Passeig de Gracia or a pretty Eixample courtyard, and some rooms include a small balcony.

The hotel has an elegant rooftop bar, Alaire Terrace Bar with wonderful views.

The Condes is just 100 metres from Gaudi’s La Pedrera, and a 10-minute walk from Plaça Catalunya and La Rambla. Passeig de Gracia Train Station, 200 metres away, offers direct links to Barcelona Airport.

name: Catalonia Ramblas 4* Sup
description:
Set just off Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, 3 minutes’ walk from central Plaza Catalunya, Catalonia Ramblas 4* Sup  features a seasonal outdoor pool with a south-facing terrace, a poolside snack bar and a chill-out area.

Housed in a modernist building, all bright and spacious rooms come with a flat-screen satellite smart TV equipped with Chromecast App, free WiFi and tea and coffee facilities. Some have a private terrace with a private pool. Room service is available.

The spa at Catalonia Ramblas 4* Sup features a relaxation area. It includes a sauna, a steam bath and a hot tub. Massage and beauty treatments are also available.

The hotel’s restaurant, Pelai Restaurant, offers Catalan market cuisine. Dishes cooked on a coal stove are available at the Pelai terrace, a rooftop terrace with a chill-out area with panoramic city views. A buffet breakfast is offered every morning and, on weekends, it is available until 11:00.

In the summer months, the terrace is open until 00:00 and has a summer menu, as well as cocktails and milkshakes.

name: Catalunya
description:
Hotel Catalunya offers free Wi-Fi and is centrally located in Barcelona’s Gothic centre, just off La Rambla, 50 metres from Plaça Catalunya. It offers air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV.

All rooms at the Catalunya come with a fridge and a safe. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer. Breakfast is served in a café 25 metres from the hotel.

Barcelona Cathedral is just a 5-minute walk from Catalunya Hotel. The famous Gaudi buildings of Passeig de Gracia are only 500 metres away.

The hotel is near Plaça Catalunya Train and Metro Station. The airport and sightseeing buses also stop in this central square.

Hotel Catalunya’s tour desk can provide recommendations and book tickets. Car hire is available, and the 24-hour reception offers express check-out and luggage storage.

name: Hostal Girona
description:
Hostal Girona is located in the historic heart of Barcelona, a 10-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia and Plaça Catalunya. It offers free Wi-Fi.

Hostal Girona is a small and modern guest house with a lift. All rooms are air conditioned and have a TV. Some rooms are en suite and others have a shared bathroom.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are within walking distance. Private parking is possible nearby, at a daily cost.

The guest house occupies a historic, 19th-century building. The building was part of the Quadrat d’Or. This block was designed by the father of the Eixample neighbourhood, Ildefons Cerdà.

name: AB Paral·lel Spacious Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 6 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 110m²
description:
Featuring air conditioning, AB Paral·lel Spacious Apartments offers pet-friendly accommodation in Barcelona. Plaza Reial is 900 metres from the property.

Featuring a balcony, the accommodation comes with a dining area and seating area with a TV. All units include a kitchen equipped with a dishwasher and microwave. A toaster is also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. There is a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer in each unit. Towels and bed linen are featured.

AB Paral·lel Spacious Apartments also some of the apartments include a terrace

Montjuïc is 1.1 km from AB Paral·lel Spacious Apartments. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km.

name: Mediterranean Barcelona Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 80m²
description:
Offering city views, Mediterranean Barcelona Apartments is situated in the Nou Barris district of Barcelona, 5 km from Park Güell and 5.2 km from La Pedrera. Featuring private parking, the 4-star apartment is 4 km from Sagrada Familia. The apartment features mountain views, a sun terrace, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available.

All units in the apartment complex are fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchen, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available within a reachable distance.

Casa Batllo is 5.7 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 6.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 18 km from Mediterranean Barcelona Apartments.

name: Valencia 3
description:
Valencia 3 in Barcelona offers accommodation with free WiFi, 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia, 1.3 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as Palau de la Musica Catalana, Portal de l'Angel, and Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is 1.1 km from the city centre and less than 1 km from Casa Batllo.

Towels and bed linen are offered in the bed and breakfast. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include La Pedrera, Boqueria Market and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Valencia 3.

name: Apartment Gracia Torrijos by Interhome
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 48m²
description:
1.6 km from Casa Batllo, Apartment Gracia Torrijos by Interhome features a sustainable 3-star accommodation in the Gràcia district of Barcelona. The property is situated 2.9 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 2.9 km from Tivoli Theatre and 3 km from Portal de l'Angel. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and La Pedrera is 1.1 km away.

The apartment has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sagrada Familia, Passeig de Gracia and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Apartment Gracia Torrijos by Interhome.

name: Lovely apartment with a terrace
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Lovely apartment with a terrace offers accommodation in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Plaça Catalunya.

Offering a private, furnished terrace with city views, this apartment offers a kitchen complete with an oven and a microwave. A flat-screen TV is available. There is a private bathroom with a shower.

La Pedrera is 1.3 km from Lovely apartment with a terrace, while Portal de l'Angel is 1.4 km away. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 12 km from the property.

name: Sunny Apartments Barcelona
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
Sunny Apartments Barcelona is located in Barcelona's Gràcia neighbourhood. These modern studios have a flat-screen TV and a DVD player. Some of them also include free WiFi.

Each studio includes a kitchenette with a hob and microwave, as well as a washing machine. Bed linen and towels are provided, and the bathroom has a hairdryer.

There are many shops, restaurants and bars within a few minutes' walk in Gràcia, and the studios are located near metro stations to connect you to other areas of Barcelona.

name: By Universitat Rooms
description:
Situated in Barcelona, within 400 metres of Plaça Catalunya and less than 1 km of Boqueria Market, By Universitat Rooms features accommodation with free WiFi throughout the property. Popular points of interest nearby include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Portal de l'Angel and Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is 2.9 km from Sant Miquel Beach, and within 400 metres of the city centre.

The rooms at the hostel are fitted with a shared bathroom fitted with a shower.

Popular points of interest near By Universitat Rooms include Tivoli Theatre, Passeig de Gracia and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

name: By Universitat Rooms
description:
Situated in Barcelona, within 400 metres of Plaça Catalunya and less than 1 km of Boqueria Market, By Universitat Rooms features accommodation with free WiFi throughout the property. Popular points of interest nearby include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Portal de l'Angel and Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is 2.9 km from Sant Miquel Beach, and within 400 metres of the city centre.

The rooms at the hostel are fitted with a shared bathroom fitted with a shower.

Popular points of interest near By Universitat Rooms include Tivoli Theatre, Passeig de Gracia and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

name: Barceló Sants
description:
Situated above Barcelona Sants Train Station, Barceló Sants offers a subtle outer space theme throughout. Minimalist rooms feature free Wi-Fi, rain showers, and large windows with city views.

Air-conditioned rooms feature modern décor and designer furniture. Each has an iPod dock, flat-screen TV, and tea and coffee making facilities. The bathroom comes with a hairdryer.

This design hotel includes a fitness centre.

The hotel has 2 restaurants. Oxygen Restaurant serves a healthy buffet and Hydrogen Restaurant offers more avant-garde cuisine. The hotel's Orbital Bar serves a selection of cocktails, gins and vodkas. You can also try typical tapas in the many nearby bars and restaurants.

Sants Train and Metro Station offers direct access to Barcelona Airport, and the historic city centre, 3.5 km away. There are also high-speed AVE services to Madrid and international trains.

There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. On-site parking is available for an extra charge and the hotel has a Wi-Fi zone.

name: Apartamento Barcelona
description:
Situated in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Casa Batllo and a 16-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia, Apartamento Barcelona offers air conditioning. The property is set 2.8 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 2.9 km from Park Güell and 2 km from Portal de l'Angel. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and La Pedrera is 500 metres away.

The apartment has a terrace, 1 bedroom, a living room and a well-equipped kitchen. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Sagrada Familia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Apartamento Barcelona.

name: By Born & Gothic Rooms
description:
Ideally located in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, By Born & Gothic Rooms is set 2.1 km from Sant Miquel Beach, 2.2 km from Barceloneta Beach and 300 metres from Cathedral of Barcelona. Popular points of interest nearby include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Tivoli Theatre and Portal de l'Angel. The property is 2.1 km from Somorrostro Beach, and within 400 metres of the city centre.

Featuring a shared bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hostel also feature free WiFi, while some rooms also feature a city view. At By Born & Gothic Rooms the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Santa Maria del Mar, Plaça Reial and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from By Born & Gothic Rooms.

name: Stay U-nique Apartments Rossello
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Located in Barcelona, just a 15-minute walk from Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia, U-nique Rosello offer self-catering accommodation with free WiFi. Verdaguer Metro Station is 300 metres away.

These modern, air-conditioned apartment come with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom and 1 toilet. Their living rooms include a sofa bed, TV and dining area. The kitchen is equipped with a microwave, coffee machine, kitchenware and electric kettle.

You will find many restaurants in the surrounding streets and the nearest supermarket is 3 minutes’ walk away.

Gaudi’s La Pedrera is 550 metres from U-nique Rosello and a 10-minute walk will take you to Passeig de Gràcia Train Station, with direct trains to Barcelona El Prat Airport.

name: Habitat Apartments Ribes
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 100m²
description:
Located in Barcelona, 2.1 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 2.3 km from Barceloneta Beach, Habitat Apartments Ribes offers air conditioning. It is situated 1.1 km from Picasso Museum and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Somorrostro Beach is 2 km away.

The spacious apartment is equipped with 2 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and oven, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Tivoli Theatre and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 14 km from Habitat Apartments Ribes, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: By Born Rooms
description:
Situated in Barcelona, within 1.7 km of Sant Miquel Beach and 1.8 km of Barceloneta Beach, By Born Rooms features accommodation with free WiFi throughout the property. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as Picasso Museum, Palau de la Musica Catalana, and Tivoli Theatre. The property is 700 metres from the city centre and 1.7 km from Somorrostro Beach.

The rooms have bed linen.

Popular points of interest near the hostel include Cathedral of Barcelona, Santa Maria del Mar and Plaça Reial. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from By Born Rooms.

name: Apartamentos Navas 2
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 65m²
description:
Featuring free WiFi throughout, Apartamentos Navas 2 is located in Barcelona. This property offers bright, air-conditioned apartments with a private balcony, set 250 metres from Navas Metro Station.

Accommodation at this property has 2 or 3 bedrooms and a bathroom with a bath or shower and hairdryer. There is a living space with a sofa or sofa bed, flat-screen TV, and dining table, while the kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, oven, electric kettle, microwave, and fridge.

Bed linen and towels are provided, and a washing machine is available. Heating is available in all apartments.

You can find a restaurant, bar, and grocery shop within a 5-minute walk of Apartamentos Navas 2. Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia is 1.7 km from the property, and Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas Boulevard are 6 metro stops away.

name: HCC Regente
description:
Hotel HCC Regente is set in a traditional Modernist building which has been recently restored, maintaining its original features. HCC Regente is located on Rambla de Catalunya.

The Regente features Art Nouveau décor and wrought-iron balconies. Each air-conditioned room has satellite TV, free wired internet access and a minibar.

The hotel serves a varied breakfast in its restaurant. There is a wide range of cafés, bars and restaurants in the streets surrounding the HCC.

Attractions including Las Ramblas and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló are within 10 minutes’ walk of the Regente. Passeig de Gràcia Metro Station is just 200 metres from the hotel.

name: By Paseo de Gracia Rooms
description:
Set in the centre of Barcelona, 300 metres from Casa Batllo, By Paseo de Gracia Rooms offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. Popular points of interest nearby include Tivoli Theatre, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Portal de l'Angel. The property is non-smoking and is located 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia.

All rooms are fitted with a shared bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At the hostel all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near By Paseo de Gracia Rooms include Plaça Catalunya, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Boqueria Market. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Urquinaona Rooms
description:
Located in the centre of Barcelona, 2.4 km from Somorrostro Beach, Urquinaona Rooms provides air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. The property is situated 2.6 km from Sant Miquel Beach, 600 metres from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 500 metres from Passeig de Gracia. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.6 km from Barceloneta Beach.

All units include bed linen.

Popular points of interest near the hostel include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Tivoli Theatre and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Urquinaona Rooms.

name: Rambla de Mar Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 85m²
description:
Rambla de Mar Apartments is designed to ensure you have a stay in Barcelona worthy of being remembered with your family or friends.

Newly renovated, well lit and equipped to make you feel at home, in Rambla de Mar you will get an excellent location and the freedom to organize your stay in the Catalan capital as it best suits you.

Let us share more with you: The spacious living room is equipped to spend the day to day with the greatest possible comfort, its kitchen will allow you to prepare from the simplest to the most sophisticated dish thanks to all its equipment, the rooms are designed for maximum relaxation and featuring a total of 2 private bathrooms per apartment.

Each spacious apartment at Rambla de Mar Apartments has free Wi-Fi, and a living room with a sofa bed, a TV and a dining area.

The entire common area is enabled for people with reduced mobility to move around. You will also have a common terrace/solarium for sunbathing.

The building is located next to the Ramblas, the Port Vell, the Palau Güell and the Liceo. The Cathedral and the Barceloneta beach can be reached on foot. The Drassanes stop on metro line 3 is less than a minute away; Plaça Catalunya is 2 metro stops away, Passeig de Gracia and Plaça Espanya are 4 stops away and Sants station is 6 stops away (among others).

Check in is from 16:00h and check out is from 09:00h to 11:30h.

We are a Pet Friendly apartment.

name: Habitat Apartments Plaza España Urban
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 68m²
description:
In the Sants-Montjuïc district of Barcelona, close to Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Habitat Apartments Plaza España Urban has free WiFi and a washing machine. This apartment features accommodation with a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.1 km from Sants Railway Station.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 3 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Palau Sant Jordi is 2 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 3.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from Habitat Apartments Plaza España Urban.

name: Occidental Diagonal 414
description:
Attractively set in the centre of Barcelona, Occidental Diagonal 414 features air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a fitness centre. Boasting room service, this property also has a restaurant and a terrace. Private parking is available on site.

At the hotel, rooms come with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms come with a safety deposit box, while certain rooms are equipped with a balcony and others also boast city views. The rooms will provide guests with a minibar.

Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish at the reception, staff are willing to help at any time of the day.

Popular points of interest near Occidental Diagonal 414 include La Pedrera, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Gracia14
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
Set in Barcelona, 800 metres from La Pedrera and 1.3 km from Casa Batllo, Gracia14 offers air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. This sustainable apartment is located 1.6 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.4 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana.

The spacious apartment has 2 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and oven, and a living room with a TV. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Plaça Catalunya and Sagrada Familia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Gracia14.

name: ME Barcelona
description:
Conveniently located in the centre of Barcelona, ME Barcelona offers air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The accommodation features nightclub and a tour desk.

At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. ME Barcelona provides some units with city views, and each room comes with a coffee machine. All guest rooms feature a safety deposit box.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk.

Popular points of interest near ME Barcelona include Tivoli Theatre, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 13 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Catalonia Mikado
description:
This elegant hotel is situated in the exclusive Sarrià area and has a garden terrace with an outdoor pool and hot tub. It offers functional, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV, a mini fridge with complimentary water and free Wi-Fi.

The Catalonia Mikado's restaurant serves breakfast and evening meals, specializing in international dishes. There is also a bar. Only 500 metres away, the charming centre of Sarrià is famous for its cake shops.

The Catalonia Mikado is within a 10-minute walk of Ramon Llull University and the International University of Catalonia. It is also well located for some of Barcelona's most important medical centres, including the Teknon Centre and IMO and the Institut Catalá de la Retina.

Sarrià Train Station is just 10 minutes’ walk away. From here you can get to central Barcelona in 5 minutes.

name: Classbedroom Park Güell Apartment
description_short: Entire apartment • 4 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 110m²
description:
These stylish, modern apartments are located in some of the most elegant and authentic districts of Barcelona, such as Gothic Quarter, Eixample, Sant Gervasi, Guinardó and Montjuic.

Accommodation between 2 and 4 guests each, these recently refurbished apartments are ideal for families and groups of friends visiting the Catalan capital. Each apartment has a clean, bright, airy feel and many enjoy views over the surrounding historic streets and monuments.

Convenient public transport links, including local metro stations, make sightseeing trips around the city easy.

name: Hotel SOFIA Barcelona, in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt
description_short: Private suite
description:
Hotel Sofia Barcelona is set on Barcelona's Diagonal Avenue, a 5-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium. It features free WiFi throughout, on-site restaurants and stunning city views. Guests have free access to a bright, modern 24-hour gym with a variety of equipment.

Designer rooms at Sofia offer home automation technology, a 49-inch Smart TV, a safe, and air conditioning. Their private bathroom includes Natura Bissé amenities, bathrobes and slippers.

The hotel offers several gastronomic spaces, including SOFIA Be So restaurant serving traditional dishes, and Impar Restaurant, which serves fresh Mediterranean dishes prepared with international culinary techniques. It also features a spacious outdoor terrace.

Guests will also find a sophisticated book cafe, Philosofia, which serves confectionery and fresh pastries, to eat in or take away.

Sofia Oasis Wellness & Spa houses more than 1000 m² space for well-being, including water circuits, saunas and steam baths. You can relax with one of the range of treatments available onsite and coordinated by expert therapists.

Sofia Barcelona, in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt is 400 metres from Maria Cristina Metro Station and the central Plaza España Square is 3 metro stops away. L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre is 15 minutes away on foot

We only accept dogs up to 18 kg in weight, with a maximum of one per room. We do not accept any other pets

For pets.
Dogs classified as dangerous breeds are not allowed.
Pets must comply with current health regulations.
They must be supervised by an adult at all times and steady on a leash when going through public areas.
€100 will be charged for deep cleaning of the room at the time of departure. (Service dogs are exempt from said fee)
€25 per pet per day will be charged in addition to the room rate.

name: SmartRental Barcelona Ramblas
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 25m²
description:
SmartRental Barcelona Ramblas offers accommodation in Barcelona. Plaza Reial is 100 metres from the property.

There is a seating and/or dining area in some units. There is also a kitchen in some of the units, equipped with a refrigerator.

La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 600 metres from SmartRental Barcelona Ramblas, while Portal de l'Angel is 700 metres away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from SmartRental Barcelona Ramblas.

name: Modern and Chic Apartments in Gracia near Parc Guell
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Featuring free Wi-Fi and air conditioning, Modern and Chic Apartments in Gracia near Parc Guell offers bright and modern apartments in Barcelona. The property is set in the Gracia District, 10 minutes’ walk from Parc Güell.

Each wooden-floored apartment has a living room with a sofa, TV and DVD player. The kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, washing machine and oven. The bathroom includes a shower and hairdryer. All the apartments feature an interior courtyard, terrace or balcony.

A large variety of bars and restaurants can be found within 5 minutes’ walk. There is a supermarket 150 metres away.

Lesseps Metro Station, with connection to Barcelona’s historic centre, is 200 metres from the apartments. The famous Sagrada Familia is 2 km away.

name: Heart of Barcelona Rooms
description:
Ideally situated in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, Heart of Barcelona Rooms is situated 2.3 km from Somorrostro Beach, 2.4 km from Barceloneta Beach and 400 metres from Plaça Catalunya. This property is located a short distance from attractions such as Palau de la Musica Catalana, Portal de l'Angel, and Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is 300 metres from the city centre and 2.2 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

Featuring a shared bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hostel also feature free WiFi. All rooms at Heart of Barcelona Rooms have air conditioning and a desk.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Tivoli Theatre, Passeig de Gracia and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Heart of Barcelona Rooms.

name: Sant Antoni 3 - Downtown Barcelona & Modern
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
In the centre of Barcelona, located within a short distance of Passeig de Gracia and Plaça Catalunya, Sant Antoni 3 - Downtown Barcelona & Modern offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. It is set less than 1 km from Boqueria Market and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station.

The apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Tivoli Theatre and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Sant Antoni 3 - Downtown Barcelona & Modern.

name: Bird House
description:
Offering modern rooms with free WiFi, Bird House is just 30 metres from Urgell Metro Station and within 15 minutes’ walk of Plaza de Catalunya, Las Ramblas and Plaza Espanya.

Featuring high ceilings, each air-conditioned room at Bird House has bright, minimalist décor. There is heating and access to shared bathroom facilities. The bedrooms also include free WiFi, a wardrobe and a desk. Bed linen and towels are provided.

It offers use of a shared kitchen and serves breakfast.

Restaurants, bars and cafés can be found around Sant Antoni District, 5 minutes' walk away. Passeig de Gràcia is a 15-minute walk away.

The Airport Bus stops 30 metres away from Bird House, at Gran Via-Urgell bus stop. The MACBA Modern Art Museum is less than 1 km from the Bird House, while Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló houses can be reached in 20 minutes by foot.

name: By Liceu Rooms
description:
Set in the centre of Barcelona, 2.3 km from Sant Sebastian Beach, By Liceu Rooms offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 700 metres from Cathedral of Barcelona, 500 metres from Plaça Reial and 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.3 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

The units feature bed linen.

Popular points of interest near the hostel include Boqueria Market, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from By Liceu Rooms.

name: Habitat Apartments Grace
description_short: Entire apartment • 4 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 110m²
description:
Located in Barcelona within 1.1 km of La Pedrera and less than 1 km of Sagrada Familia, Habitat Apartments Grace provides accommodation with free WiFi, seating area and a kitchen. The property has city views and is 1.1 km from Casa Batllo and 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia. The apartment features family rooms.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a desk, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 14 km from Habitat Apartments Grace, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Beautiful y Luxury Apartment centrallylocated
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Beautiful y Luxury Apartment centrallylocated features a balcony and is located in Barcelona, within just 1.7 km of Sants Railway Station and 1.5 km of Passeig de Gracia. It is set 1.7 km from Plaça Catalunya and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Casa Batllo is 1.2 km away.

This air-conditioned apartment comes with 1 bedroom, a TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and a living room. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Boqueria Market. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Beautiful y Luxury Apartment centrallylocated.

name: Hostal Argo
description:
Hostal Argo is a modern guest house located Barcelona, 4 minutes' walk from Diagonal Avenue and 450 metres away from Passeig de Gràcia. Free Wi-Fi access is available.

Air-conditioned rooms at Argo feature stylish Minimalist décor in neutral tones. They feature parquet floors, a TV and a private bathroom with shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Bed linen and towels are included.
