At Hostal Argo you will find a 24-hour front desk where luggage storage can be provided for free. An exclusive roof-top terrace with limited access is featured during summer season.

Modernist buildings like La Pedrera or Casa Batlló are 8 minutes on foot. Sagrada Familia Temple is 1 km away. The nearest metro station is Girona, 400 metres away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 20 minutes by car.

name: Cosmo Apartments Sants
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 43m²
description:
Located just 50 metres from Barcelona Sants Train Station, Cosmo Apartments Sants offers air-conditioned apartments with flat-screen TVs, free Wi-Fi and city views. The building has a 24-hour reception with tour desk.

Each stylish Cosmo Apartments Sants apartment has large windows, and some have a balcony. All apartments have a modern kitchenette with a microwave-grill, ceramic hob and dishwasher. Cooking utensils, bed linen and towels are provided.

There are numerous bars and restaurants in the streets around the Cosmo Apartments Sants building.

The Fira Conference Centre is within a 15-minute walk, while FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium is a 20-minute walk away. Plaça de Sants Metro Station is 200 metres away and offers direct access to the historic city centre.

name: Catalonia Roma
description:
Catalonia Roma is 600 metres from Sants AVE Train and Metro Station. It offers free Wi-Fi, and you can reach Barcelona city centre in 10 minutes by Metro or bus.

There are direct train links to Barcelona Airport from Sants Station and the Airport Bus also stops outside it.

The modern, air-conditioned rooms have wooden floors, a mini fridge with complimentary water and satellite TV. There is a safe and minibar, and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served at the hotel restaurant. Room service is available and there is also a bar.

Plaza Espanya, Montjuic’s Magic Fountain and the Fira Conference Centre are all within 15 minutes’ walk of the hotel.

The 24-hour front desk at Catalonia Roma boasts a large stained-glass skylight. You can rent a car and currency exchange is offered.

Pets: Only one dog or cat less than 20 kg is allowed per room (on request). Supplement of 22€ night/animal and deposit of 200€.

name: Tendency Apartments 5
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 2 living rooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Located opposite the famous Casa Batlló, Tendency Apartments 5 offers modern apartments with air conditioning, flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Most of the apartments overlook the famous Paseo de Gracia Boulevard.

Bright apartments feature a spacious living-dining room with a sofa bed; and a kitchen equipped with a dishwasher, hobs, and kitchenware. All have a washing machine, and cleaning products are also provided.

There are plenty of places to eat out nearby, and a 24-hour supermarket is a 10-minute walk away.

Ideally located, apartments are 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and popular Las Ramblas. Regular airport trains leave from Passeig de Gracia Train Station located just 300 metres away.

name: Habitación doble con baño privado en Barcelona
description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.7 km from Casa Batllo and 2.4 km from Passeig de Gracia, Habitación doble con baño privado en Barcelona offers air conditioning. The property is set 2 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 2.6 km from Plaça Catalunya and 2 km from Park Güell. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and La Pedrera is 1.2 km away.

The homestay features a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are available in the homestay. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Sants Railway Station is 3.1 km from the homestay, while Tivoli Theatre is 3.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Habitación doble con baño privado en Barcelona.

name: Aspasios Market Balconies
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 80m²
description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.3 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Aspasios Market Balconies provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. This sustainable apartment is located 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.5 km from Plaça Catalunya. The apartment features family rooms.

Each unit is equipped with a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Boqueria Market and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Aspasios Market Balconies.

name: By Plaza Urquinaona Rooms
description:
Ideally situated in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, By Plaza Urquinaona Rooms is situated 2.2 km from Barceloneta Beach, 2.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach and 400 metres from Palau de la Musica Catalana. The property is close to several well-known attractions, less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia, a 8-minute walk from Picasso Museum and less than 1 km from Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is 2.2 km from Somorrostro Beach, and within 700 metres of the city centre.

Featuring a shared bathroom with a bidet and a hairdryer, rooms at the hostel also feature free WiFi. All rooms have bed linen.

Popular points of interest near By Plaza Urquinaona Rooms include Tivoli Theatre, Portal de l'Angel and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Royal Passeig de Gracia
description:
Within 50 metres of La Pedrera and Diagonal Metro Station, Hotel Royal Passeig de Gracia features a terrace bar with panoramic views of Barcelona. This 4-star hotel also has an interior garden.

Hotel Royal Passeig de Gracia is set in a restored building with contemporary architecture. The smart bedrooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi and a bathroom with a rain-effect shower.

Casa Batlló is just 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel, while Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are 2 stops from Diagonal Station.

The Gràcia district is within a 5-minute walk, and charming street cafés can be found along the tree-lined Rambla de Catalunya, 200 metres away.

name: Jacobs Inn Barcelona
description_short: Shared dormitory room
description:
Located in Barcelona and with Mar Bella Beach reachable within 700 metres, Jacobs Inn Barcelona provides concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. The property is situated 700 metres from Bogatell Beach, less than 1 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach and 2.2 km from Somorrostro Beach. The accommodation features a shared kitchen, a tour desk and luggage storage for guests.

Guest rooms include bed linen.

Speaking Catalan, Czech, Greek and English at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help.

Barceloneta Beach is 2.8 km from the hostel, while Port Olimpic is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Jacobs Inn Barcelona.

name: BYPILLOW Mothern
description:
Situated just outside Barcelona’s central Plaza Catalunya Square, BYPILLLOW  Mothern  offers bright, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV. Buses to Barcelona Airport stop 100 metres away.

BYPILLLOW Mothern is situated next to Passeig de Gracia Boulevard, 600 metres from Gaudi’s famous Casa Batlló and a 5-minute walk from the Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter. Metro and regional train services stop at Catalunya Station, just 50 metres away.

 Set in a restored 19th century building, BYPILLLOW Mothern features simple and modern décor throughout. It has a 24-hour reception with a tour desk and ticket service.

You can work from the comfortable coworking space or terrace, or having a buffet breakfast in the dining room. You can also find a wide range of cafés, tapas bars and restaurants in the surrounding streets.

name: Apartaments-Hotel Hispanos 7 Suiza
description_short: Private suite • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 70m²
description:
Boasting air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, Apartaments-Hotel Hispanos 7 Suiza is set in Barcelona. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a lift and luggage storage for guests.

The spacious aparthotel has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet. The unit has soundproofing and a bath. The aparthotel offers bed linen, towels and daily maid service.

A minimarket is available at the aparthotel.

Sightseeing tours are available within easy reach of the property. A car rental service is available at the aparthotel.

Popular points of interest near Apartaments-Hotel Hispanos 7 Suiza include Sagrada Familia, La Pedrera and Casa Batllo. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 15 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hostal Lausanne
description:
Hostal Lausanne is on Barcelona’s popular shopping street, Portal de l’Angel. It is a 2-minute walk from the Rambla and Plaza Catalunya Metro Station, and offers a free Wi-Fi zone.

Rooms at the Hostal Lausanne are simple and functional. There is a choice between rooms with a private or shared bathroom, and some have a sink.

The sightseeing bus stops in nearby Plaza Catalunya. The Gothic Quarter and Paseo de Gracia Avenue are within a 5-minute walk.

Bicycle and car rental are available, and the Lausanne has a 24-hour front desk.

name: Negresco Princess 4* Sup
description:
Negresco Princess is situated in Barcelona in the Catalonia Region. The hotel has an outdoor pool and sun terrace, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant.

Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.  For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. Negresco Princess features free WiFi throughout the property.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Plaça Catalunya is 400 metres from Negresco Princess, while Portal de l'Angel is 500 metres away. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 13 km from Negresco Princess.

name: Weflating Suites Sant Antoni Market
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 65m²
description:
Weflating Suites Sant Antoni Market is located in Barcelona, right next to Sant Antoni Market and 12 minutes' walk from the Ramblas. It offers modern, air-conditioned apartments with free WiFi.

The apartment will provide you with a balcony and a seating area. There is a full a kitchenette with a dishwasher and a microwave. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. You can enjoy city view from the apartments.

There are many great bars and restaurants in the streets around the apartments, such as Carrer Parlament or Carrer Blai. Apolo Nightclub is also 8 minutes' walk away.

name: Stylish Apartment with Terrace for Couple or Family
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
Situated in Barcelona, 400 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.5 km from Palau Sant Jordi, Stylish Apartment with Terrace for Couple or Family features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. With city views, this accommodation provides a patio. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The spacious apartment with a terrace and garden views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Sants Railway Station is 1.5 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from Stylish Apartment with Terrace for Couple or Family.

name: Stay Barcelona Borne Apartment
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 95m²
description:
Offering stylish apartments with balconies and free WiFi, Stay Barcelona Borne Apartment is located in Barcelona’s El Born district. The apartments are within 5 minutes’ walk of Ciutadella Park.

The spacious apartments have minimalist décor with wooden furnishings. The spacious living area has a sofa and a flat-screen TV, while kitchen facilities include a microwave and washing machine. Some apartments come with air conditioning.

You can find shops, bars and cafés in the streets surrounding the apartments. The lively Port Olímpic, including bars and nightclubs, can be reached in 20 minutes on foot.

Arc del Triomf metro and train stations are within 5 minutes’ walk of the apartments. Las Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter are approximately 1.5 km from the property.

name: Pedrera - Gràcia
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Situated in Barcelona’s Gracia District, a 6-minute walk from Joanic Metro Station, Pedrera-Gracia offers fully equipped apartments with air conditioning and heating. Central Barcelona is 20 minutes away by metro.

The apartments include a living area with a flat-screen TV and dining table. Each has a kitchen equipped with a hob, washing machine, and microwave. WiFi is available at an extra charge and upon prior request.

The apartments have 1 or 2 bedrooms and a private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. One apartment has a private balcony with outdoor furniture.

Situated in the heart of Gracia District, the apartments are minutes away from a number or trendy restaurants, artisan shops, and tapas bars. Paseo de Gracia Boulevard, with its exclusive boutiques and Gaudì’s buildings, is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Sweet Inn - Carrer Girona
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 64m²
description:
Sweet Inn - Carrer Girona offers accommodation within less than 1 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. It is set 700 metres from Casa Batllo and features a lift. The property is close to popular attractions like Palau de la Musica Catalana, Tivoli Theatre and Portal de l'Angel.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Some units feature a terrace and/or a balcony. At the apartment complex, the units include bed linen and towels.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Sweet Inn - Carrer Girona include La Pedrera, Passeig de Gracia and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Aparthotel Silver
description:
Situated 100 metres from Fontana Metro Station in Barcelona's popular Gracia district, Aparthotel Silver offers a 24-hour reception, a bar and a garden terrace. Rooms include free Wi-Fi and a kitchenette.

Each air-conditioned room at Aparthotel Silver has simple, elegant décor. All rooms offer satellite TV, a laptop safe and a private bathroom with amenities. Kitchenettes include an electric oven, kettle and fridge.

You can enjoy a drink in the Silver’s bar, and room service is available on request. Staff at reception can also arrange car or bicycle rental and provide information about the city.

Silver Aparthotel is 200 metres from Casa Vicenç, a Gaudi building. Barcelona city centre is within a 10-minute Metro journey, while Parc Guell is just one Metro stop away.

name: Boutique Hostemplo Sagrada Familia
description:
Offering free WiFi throughout the property, Hotel Boutique Hostemplo is located on a pedestrian street just 100 metres from Barcelona's Sagrada Familia. The hotel has a friendly and very peaceful atmosphere.

Each room comes with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. You will find a kettle in the room. Every room comes with a private bathroom equipped with a shower. For your comfort, you will find a hairdryer and toiletries.

The surroundings are full of bars, restaurants and shops, like the F.C. Barcelona Museum. Las Glorias Shopping Centre is a 10-minute walk away. Gaudí’s Pedrera and Casa Batlló are 10 minutes' walk away. Sagrada Familia Metro Station, located 2 minutes' walk away, connects you with the city centre in 7 minutes, offering easy access to Plaza Catalunya, the Ramblas and the beach.

You can buy discounted tickets for the tourist bus, which stops 100 metres from the hotel.

The buffet breakfast with homemade pastries, local products and freshly squeezed natural orange juice is served daily in our café from 08:00 to 10:30.

name: You Stylish Sagrada Familia Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Surrounded by views of the city, You Stylish Sagrada Familia Apartments is a sustainable apartment in Barcelona, offering guests an environmentally friendly accommodation close to Sagrada Familia. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation provides a shuttle service, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. There is also a dining area and a fully equipped kitchen equipped with a microwave, a toaster, and a fridge. At the apartment complex, all units have bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the area.

Nova Icaria Beach is 2.8 km from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 2.2 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from You Stylish Sagrada Familia Apartments.

name: Melia Barcelona Sarriá
description:
Meliá Barcelona Sarriá features a spa, a 24-hour gym and a restaurant. Gaudi’s major works, such as La Pedrera and Casa Battló are 2 km away. There is free WiFi available throughout.

The Melia Barcelona Sarriá’s rooms feature chic, contemporary décor with 42-inch TVs and bathrooms with marble finishing and baths or showers.

All Level Lounge Rooms offer superior services including exclusive private areas, a private reception area with personalized attention and 1 free access per stay to the on-site  Serena spa.

A welcoming international buffet breakfast, including gluten-free products and options and special dietary options, is served every morning. The Nonna Maria restaurant serves mediterranean and international cuisine.

The city’s upmarket Avenida Diagonal shopping avenue is just 1 block away; while Barcelona Camp Nou is within 10 minutes by car. Francesc Macià square is just 200 metres from the hotel and you can walk to the elegant Passeig de Gracia Boulevard in about 20 minutes.

name: Hostemplo Sagrada Familia
description:
This design guest house has an excellent location just 200 metres from Gaudí’s world-famous Sagrada Familia. There is free Wi-Fi throughout.

Rooms and apartments at Hostemplo Sagrada Familia are bright and have modern design. They have a flat-screen TV with DVD player and air conditioning. All rooms have a private bathroom.

Hostemplo Sagrada Familia rooms occupy all three floors of a historic modernist building, that preserves its original front. The interior is fully renovated. The suites are located in a new outbuilding.

A buffet breakfast with homemade pastries, local produce and freshly squeezed natural orange juice is served daily at Hotel Hostemplo, located 150 metres from the property.

The Tourist Bus passes the guest house and stops only 100 metres away. Tickets are conveniently available at reception. There is a metro station just 150 metres from the property.

There is 24-hour access to the building, as well as 24-hour reception.

name: El Jardi
description:
Located in Plaça del Pi Square, El Jardi is in the heart of Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter. All of the air-conditioned rooms include a safe and TV, and most have a private balcony overlooking the square.

El Jardi is just 2 minutes’ walk from the Ramblas, and 170 metres from Liceu Metro Station. The area around the hotel offers a huge range of restaurants and bars.

Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. The hotel offers 24-hour reception, and there is also a vending machine.

El Jardi first opened as a hotel in 1860, and became popular with artists. Today it retains much of its original charm and many of its historic features.

name: Central Corner of Love with terrace
description:
Boasting air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace, Central Corner of Love with terrace is set in Barcelona. The property is close to Palau de la Musica Catalana, Tivoli Theatre and Portal de l'Angel. The property is less than 1 km from Casa Batllo, and within 1.2 km of the city centre.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment offers a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Passeig de Gracia and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Central Corner of Love with terrace.

name: Tendency Apartments 9
description_short: Entire apartment • 4 bedrooms • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 150m²
description:
Centrally located, just 3 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia Metro and Train Station, these modern air-conditioned apartments offer 4 or 5 bedrooms. Each apartment features free WiFi and a balcony with garden views.

The spacious living rooms come with a flat-screen TV and DVD player. Private bathrooms have a shower. Each apartment offers a well-equipped kitchen, which includes a dishwasher and washing machine. Towels and bed linen are provided.

Thanks to its central location, you will find lots of shops, bars and restaurants in the immediate area. The famous La Pedrera and Casa Batlló buildings on Passeig de Gracia are a 5-minute walk away.

name: Coronado
description:
Coronado is conveniently situated 200 metres from Paral•lel Metro Station and 15 minutes’ from Barcelona’s famous Ramblas. It offers free Wi-Fi throughout and reception is open 24 hours a day.

Rooms at Coronado feature a simple design and come with a private bathroom. They also include air conditioning and heating.

Guests can enjoy drinks and snacks at the bar-cafeteria in the lobby area. There are also many bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of the hotel.

The Magic Fountains in the Montjuic area are 15 minutes’ walk from Coronado while Barcelona’s port is 10 minutes away.

name: Happy People Plaza España Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 4 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 95m²
description:
Located 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Plaza Espanya Square, the air-conditioned apartments at Happy People Plaza España Apartments come with free Wi-Fi. The building has a rooftop chill-out terrace for all guests.

Bright and modern, the apartments feature a lounge with a flat-screen TV, and a kitchen with a dining area and microwave. Both apartments have 2 double rooms, 2 twin rooms and 2 bathrooms. Towels and bed linen are included.

Many restaurants, bars and shops can be found in the surrounding area. Hostafrancs Metro Station is 300 metres from the apartments and you can reach Plaza Catalunya in a 10-minute metro ride.

Barcelona Sants Train Station is a 5-minute walk from Happy People Plaza España Apartments and trains to Barcelona Airport leave from there.

name: Homenfun Barcelona Guinardó Hospital Sant Pau
description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.5 km from Park Güell and 3.6 km from La Pedrera, Homenfun Barcelona Guinardó Hospital Sant Pau offers air conditioning. The property is around 4.1 km from Casa Batllo, 4.5 km from Passeig de Gracia and 4.6 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 1.7 km away.

This apartment features 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 4.9 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 4.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Homenfun Barcelona Guinardó Hospital Sant Pau.

name: Oasis Sagrada Familia
description:
Set in Barcelona, 3 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 500 metres from Sagrada Familia, Oasis Sagrada Familia offers spacious air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. The property is around 2 km from La Pedrera, 3 km from Passeig de Gracia and 3.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.6 km from Casa Batllo.

This apartment comes with 1 bedroom, a kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom equipped with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 3.4 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 3.4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Oasis Sagrada Familia.

name: The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky
description_short: Private suite • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 70m²
description:
The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky is located in Barcelona’s Poblenou district. This stylish hotel offers a range of luxury services, including 1 on-site restaurant and free spa access.

The Serena SPA Wellness includes a sauna, Turkish baths, bithermal shower and a heated pool with whirlpool. Guests also have access to a discount on massages.

The modern, air-conditioned rooms at The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky feature free WiFi, a 55-inch flat-screen satellite TV, a coffee maker and a minibar. Each one has a private bathroom with a rain-effect shower, bathrobe and slippers.

There is a restaurant serving Mediterranean dishes, and guests have the option of a buffet breakfast with views over Barcelona. The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky has a poolside bar.

On the 24th floor of the hotel The Level at Meliá Barcelona Sky you can enjoy a cocktail or premium drinks at the Skyline 24 which offers views over the city.

The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky offers a personalised reception with flexible check-out times, as well as helping to arrange tickets for trips, shows and car hire.

Poblenou Metro Station is 450 metres from the hotel, and you can walk to the seafront in around 15 minutes. Torre Agbar Tower is 1 km away.

name: Yach boat Experience
description_short: Mobile home • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 30m²
description:
Yach boat Experience features a terrace and is set in Barcelona, within just 700 metres of Forum Beach and 1.6 km of Platja del Litoral. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.7 km from Llevant.

The boat includes 2 bedrooms, a living room, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the boat.

Guests can also relax in the garden.

Port Olimpic is 5.7 km from the boat, while Sagrada Familia is 5.9 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 19 km from Yach boat Experience.

name: Espais Blaus Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Just 400 metres from Joanic Metro Station, these stylish apartments offer free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and a kitchenette with a washer-dryer, oven and dishwasher. The building features a rooftop sun terrace.

Each bright, air-conditioned apartment has a spacious living-dining area with a sofa bed. All of them have a modern bathroom with a hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are provided.

There is a small supermarket directly below the apartments, and L’Abaceria Central food market is just 250 metres away. You can find many shops, bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk.

Espais Blaus Apartments are situated in a quiet area of the popular Gràcia district. Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard and Gaudi’s La Pedrera are just a 15-minute walk away.

name: Autèntic Eixample Barcelona
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 90m²
description:
Located in central Barcelona, just 400 metres from Universitat Metro Station, Autèntic Eixample Barcelona apartments offer free WiFi and air conditioning and some have a private terrace.

Featuring wooden floors, the apartments come with 1 or 3 bedrooms and 1 bathroom. The living area has a flat-screen TV, sofa and radio and the kitchens are equipped with an oven, microwave and dishwasher.

You will find many bars and restaurants in the surrounding streets. Plaza Catalunya, with direct buses to Barcelona El Prat Airport is 10 minutes’ walk away and Gaudi´s Sagrada Familia is 14 minutes’ metro ride away.

name: Central Apartments Barcelona
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 2 living rooms • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 90m²
description:
Central Apartments Barcelona is 100 metres from Verdaguer Metro Station and 10 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gràcia Avenue and Sagrada Familia. Set in a Modernist building, the air-conditioned apartments feature free WiFi, and some have balconies.

Each modern apartment has a living room with a sofa and flat-screen TV. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and shower. There is a well-equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and washing machine, as well as a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. Bed linen and towels are included in all apartments.

The apartment building has a lift and tourist information is available. You can reach the Ramblas in 10 minutes by Metro, and Barceloneta Beach in 20 minutes.

name: Central Rooms Barcelona
description:
In a prime location in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, Central Rooms Barcelona is set 2.6 km from Sant Miquel Beach, 2.7 km from Barceloneta Beach and 300 metres from Boqueria Market. The property is around less than 1 km from Tivoli Theatre, a 14-minute walk from Picasso Museum and less than 1 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana. The property is 2.6 km from Sant Sebastian Beach, and within 500 metres of the city centre.

At the hostel, every room has a wardrobe. With a shared bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at Central Rooms Barcelona also provide guests with free WiFi. The units at the accommodation feature air conditioning and a desk.

Popular points of interest near Central Rooms Barcelona include Passeig de Gracia, Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from the hostel.

name: May Ramblas Hotel
description:
Set in Barcelona in the Catalonia Region, 200 metres from Plaza Reial, May Ramblas Hotel boasts a sun terrace and views of the city. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. All rooms have a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property.

La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 400 metres from May Ramblas Hotel, while Portal de l'Angel is 500 metres away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

name: Trip Barcelona Spain
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Located 150 meters from Plaza de España, Tripbarcelonaspain Plaza de España feature apartments with air conditioning.  Free WiFi is available in all areas and there is a public parking nearby.

The apartment offers a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom includes a shower and hairdryer. A ceramic hob, microwave and washing machine are provided in the kitchen.

The property is 300 metres from Barcelona’s Fira Conference Centre. There are various bars and restaurant within a 5-minute walk of the property.

name: Apartment Gracia- Providencia by Interhome
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 66m²
description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.7 km from La Pedrera and 2.2 km from Casa Batllo, Apartment Gracia- Providencia by Interhome offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. This sustainable apartment is located 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.2 km from Park Güell. Palau de la Musica Catalana is 3.1 km from the apartment and Tivoli Theatre is 3.1 km away.

The spacious apartment features 3 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.7 km from the apartment, while Sagrada Familia is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Apartment Gracia- Providencia by Interhome.

name: Hotel Inglés
description:
Hotel Inglés is located right next to the Ramblas and Boquería market, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaça Catalunya. It offers 24-hour reception and rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV.

Air-conditioned rooms at the Inglés are simple and comfortable. They come with a private bathroom and some rooms have a private balcony.

A breakfast is served every morning in a restaurant located next to the hotel.

Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. You can also hire a car and store your luggage at the front desk.

The Palau de la Música Catalana, a Modernist auditorium, is 10 minutes’ walk from the Hotel Inglés. The characterful streets of the Gothic Quarter are on the doorstep, and you can walk to the trendy Born area in around 5 minutes.

name: Cozy Apartment Les Corts
description:
Located in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, Cozy Apartment Les Corts features a terrace. This apartment provides accommodation with a balcony. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sants Railway Station is 1.2 km away.

This air-conditioned 2-bedroom apartment comes with a fully equipped kitchen, a seating area, and a flat-screen TV. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Camp Nou is 1.7 km from the apartment, while Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Cozy Apartment Les Corts.

name: Rooms Nuevo Roger
description:
Attractively set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Rooms Nuevo Roger is situated 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia, 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 1.8 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana. The air-conditioned accommodation is less than 1 km from Casa Batllo. The property is 500 metres from La Pedrera, and within 1.4 km of the city centre.

All units in the bed and breakfast are fitted with a kettle. Featuring a shared bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also boast free WiFi. At the bed and breakfast, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Tivoli Theatre, Portal de l'Angel and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Rooms Nuevo Roger.

name: Bed&BCN Diagonal 1
description:
In the Eixample district of Barcelona, close to Casa Batllo, Bed&BCN Diagonal 1 features free WiFi and a washing machine. With city views, this accommodation provides a balcony. The property is 300 metres from La Pedrera, and within 1.4 km of the city centre.

This air-conditioned apartment comes with 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and a living room. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 14 km from Bed&BCN Diagonal 1, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Majestic Hotel & Spa Barcelona GL
description:
Majestic Hotel & Spa Barcelona GL offers luxurious accommodation in a neoclassical building on Passeig de Gràcia. It features a spa and an outdoor unheated plunge-pool on the rooftop with amazing views of the city.

The Majestic Hotel Barcelona maintains its original façade and its stylish, modern rooms feature attractive, classic décor. Each has air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. The apartments are located at an independent building next to the hotel.

SOLC Restaurant, located on the first floor, is a tribute to catalan and traditional cuisine. There is also a piano bar, Bar del Majestic, with live music in the evenings. During the summer guests can enjoy Dolce Vitae Cocktail Bar, which is located by the pool and overlooks Barcelona

The spa features steam baths, a sauna and offers a range of treatments. There is also a fitness centre.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló is just 100 metres from Majestic Barcelona. Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are just 10 minutes’ walk away.

name: ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento
description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.9 km from Park Güell, ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento provides accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, fitness centre, and sauna, as well as a garden.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento every room is fitted with bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a range of wellness facilities including a hot tub and a hammam.

La Pedrera is 3.3 km from ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento, while Casa Batllo is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 14 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: París Habitaciones
description:
París Habitaciones is located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 1.5 km from Casa Batllo, 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia and 2.1 km from Plaça Catalunya. It is set 1.2 km from La Pedrera and offers a shared kitchen. The bed and breakfast features family rooms.

The units in the bed and breakfast are equipped with a kettle. Featuring a shared bathroom with a bidet and a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also provide guests with free WiFi. At the bed and breakfast, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Dining options are available close to the bed and breakfast.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.9 km from París Habitaciones, while Sants Railway Station is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: L'alzina Apartment
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a private pool, garden view and a balcony, L'alzina Apartment is located in Barcelona. The property has quiet street views and is 2.3 km from Casa Batllo and 2.7 km from Passeig de Gracia. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and La Pedrera is 1.7 km away.

The apartment with a terrace and pool views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

Park Güell is 1.1 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from L'alzina Apartment.

name: Chic Apartments Barcelona
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Located in Barcelona within 2.9 km of Somorrostro Beach and 2.9 km of Nova Icaria Beach, Chic Apartments Barcelona provides accommodation with free WiFi, seating area and a kitchen. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment features family rooms.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a desk, a coffee machine, an oven, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, La Pedrera and Sagrada Familia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Chic Apartments Barcelona.

name: Aspasios Sagrada Familia Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 3 living rooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Situated in Barcelona, Aspasios Sagrada Familia Apartments has well-equipped accommodation boasting free WiFi, 500 metres from Sagrada Familia.

Each unit offers a fully equipped kitchen, a flat-screen TV, a living room with a sofa, and a private bathroom. A dishwasher and oven are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. There is a washing machine and bed linen and towels are provided.

La Pedrera is a 19-minute walk from the apartment, while Casa Batllo is 1.8 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

name: Lodging Apartments Illa Diagonal
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Lodging Apartments Camp Nou offers a modern apartment with free Wi-Fi. The apartment is between Las Tres Torres and La Bonanova Railway Stations, in the Sarría District.

This apartment offers a double bedroom and a bedroom with 2 single beds; and a modern bathroom with shower. The living-dining area has a sofa, a flat-screen TV; while the kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, oven and coffee machine. Kitchenware, bed linen and towels are also provided.

A range of shops and supermarkets can be found within a 5-minute walk; and the Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre is 1 km away.

You can reach Barcelona City Centre in around 30 minutes by public transports.

name: numa l Roca Rooms & Apartments
description:
Just 600 metres from Passeig de Gràcia, numa l Roca Rooms & Apartments offers spacious air-conditioned rooms with beautiful vintage décor, free Wi-Fi and tea and coffee-making facilities. Girona Metro Station is a 1-minute walk away.

numa l Roca Rooms & Apartments´s individually decorated rooms offer interactive LED TVs with satellite channels. Some rooms have access to a patio or balcony. The stylish bathrooms feature a rain shower, hairdryer and toiletries.

Situated in the Eixample district, numa l Roca Rooms & Apartments is a 10-minute walk from the famous Gaudi buildings of Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. The beach is just 4 Metro stops away.

Trains to Barcelona Airport stop at Passeig de Gracia Train Station, a 5-minute walk away.

name: Royal Ramblas
description:
Royal Ramblas is located on Barcelona's famous Ramblas, 100 meters from Plaza de Catalunya. It offers elegant and modern rooms with air conditioning, plasma TV, free Wi-Fi, and private parking. Some  rooms provide magnificent views of the Ramblas.

The Hotel has a meeting room with magnificent views of the Ramblas.

It offers a buffet breakfast with various regional products and homemade pastries in the La Poma restaurant with impressive views of Las Ramblas where you can also taste Mediterranean food.

The Royal Ramblas Hotel is ideally located with access to all public transport and a 5-minute walk from the elegant Passeig de Gràcia, where you will find numerous restaurants and exclusive shops. The old town is within walking distance, as well as the Mercat de la Boqueria and the MACBA. The beach is 20 minutes away.

The Royal Ramblas Barcelona's tour desk offers useful information about the city and car rental services. It also manages the airport transfer service.

name: Permar Barceloneta
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Set in Barcelona, 500 metres from Somorrostro Beach and 500 metres from Sant Miquel Beach, Permar Barceloneta offers air conditioning. Popular points of interest nearby include Cathedral of Barcelona, Plaça Reial and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Barceloneta Beach is 300 metres away.

The apartment has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Santa Maria del Mar, Picasso Museum and Port Olimpic. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Permar Barceloneta.

name: La Casa de Antonio Boutique Rooms
description:
Featuring free WiFi, La Casa de Antonio Boutique Rooms is located in Barcelona. This guest house is set a 7-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and 94 metres from Universitat Metro Station.

This guest house has a Modernist décor and offers air-conditioned rooms in the centre of Barcelona. Each room comes with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and tiled floors, and the private bathroom includes a bath or shower, hairdryer, and free toiletries.

There is a tour desk available to all guests, and the property can arrange a shuttle to the airport for an extra charge.

You can find several restaurants, bars, and a grocery shop within a 5-minute walk of La Casa de Antonio Boutique Rooms. Plaza Espanya and the famous Montjuic Fountain are 2 metro stops from the property, and Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia is 2.7 km away.

name: Flat Eixample Napoles/Apartment
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 65m²
description:
Modernist flat close to the Sagrada Familia offers accommodation in Barcelona. The air-conditioned unit is 500 metres from Sagrada Familia.

The kitchen is equipped with a toaster. A TV is offered.

Casa Batllo is 1.1 km from Modernist flat close to the Sagrada Familia, while La Pedrera is 1.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Modernist flat close to the Sagrada Familia.

name: Mr. Serrano Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Boasting air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, Mr. Serrano Apartments is set in Barcelona. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is soundproof and is situated 400 metres from La Pedrera.

The 2-bedroom apartment is fitted with a living room with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with slippers. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Sightseeing tours are available close to the property. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Mr. Serrano Apartments include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Cozy nest
description:
Cozy nest features accommodation within 1.2 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with an oven, a microwave and a fridge. The property has garden and inner courtyard views, and is 2.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach. The accommodation offers a lift and a shared kitchen for guests.

All units are fitted with a stovetop, kitchenware, a coffee machine, a bath, slippers and a desk. There is a seating and a dining area in all units. The units have a shared bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Santa Maria del Mar, Plaça Catalunya and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Cozy nest.

name: Stay U-nique Apartments Est
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Located in Barcelona, 2.3 km from Sant Sebastian Beach and 1 km from the centre, Stay U-nique Apartments Est provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a terrace. It is situated 2.3 km from Sant Miquel Beach and features a lift. The apartment features family rooms.

Each unit is equipped with a balcony, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a seating area, a TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Est.

name: Gracia8
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
Set in Barcelona, 800 metres from La Pedrera and 1.3 km from Casa Batllo, Gracia8 offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. This sustainable apartment is located 1.6 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.4 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana.

The spacious apartment comes with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with quiet street views. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Plaça Catalunya and Sagrada Familia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Gracia8.

name: Via Augusta
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 106m²
description:
Situated in Barcelona, 2.5 km from Camp Nou and 2.8 km from Sants Railway Station, Via Augusta offers air conditioning. It is set 3.6 km from La Pedrera and offers a lift. The apartment also features free WiFi, free private parking and facilities for disabled guests.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, a TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bath. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Park Güell is 3.7 km from the apartment, while Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 3.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Via Augusta.

name: Stay Barcelona Sant Antoni
description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.8 km from Passeig de Gracia, Stay Barcelona Sant Antoni features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property has city views and is 1.2 km from Boqueria Market and 1.9 km from Tivoli Theatre. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.7 km from Plaça Catalunya.

This apartment features 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, a TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Portal de l'Angel, Montjuïc and Cathedral of Barcelona. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Stay Barcelona Sant Antoni.

name: 2 bedroom Duplex apartment with balcony 4-3
description:
2 bedroom Duplex apartment with balcony 4-3 is set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 2 km from Casa Batllo, 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia and 2.6 km from Plaça Catalunya. It is situated 1.2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sants Railway Station is 1.1 km away.

The spacious apartment has a patio, 2 bedrooms, a living room and a well-equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave. A TV is available. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.7 km from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from 2 bedroom Duplex apartment with balcony 4-3.

name: Kimpton Vividora Hotel, an IHG Hotel
description:
The Kimpton Vividora Hotel, an IHG Hotel is located in the Gothic Quarter of Barcelona, ​​a short walk from the Plaça Catalunya metro station and in the Portal del Angel shopping district and 10 minutes from the Paseo de Gracia shopping area. This elegantly designed property features a Mediterranean restaurant, a cafeteria, a terrace with a bar and a rooftop pool.

All rooms feature contemporary décor. All have a yoga mat, tea and coffee making facilities, smart TV, minibar and exclusive bathrobe.In addition, the hotel offers the Forgot it? We got it! Which makes available to its guests a whole series of amenities and accessories that will further improve their stay.

The gastronomic space of the Kimpton Vividora Hotel, an IHG chain hotel, has a rooftop terrace with magnificent views of the city, pool, sun loungers, cocktails and snacks, Terraza de Vivi. The Fauna restaurant located on the first floor offers Mediterranean cuisine with Catalan roots in a room reminiscent of a typical Eixample apartment. Got Coffee & Cocktails overlooks the street and serves locally sourced coffee, wine and signature cocktails. This gastronomic space is a place where guests feel at home. Every day from 6pm the free Social Wine Hour is offered to all guests with an open bar of local wines.

This pet-friendly hotel is close to attractions such as Barcelona Cathedral, Plaza de Catalunya and the Palau de la Música Catalana. Barcelona-El Prat Airport, located 15 km away, is the closest.

Our clients say that this part of Barcelona is their favorite, according to independent comments.

name: Tendency Apartments 7
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Situated in Barcelona’s Eixample District, 600 metres from Diagonal Metro Station, Tendency Apartments 7 offers accommodation with air conditioning, heating, and free WiFi.

The apartments include a living area with a flat-screen TV and sofa. Each has a kitchen, complete with an oven, dishwasher, and washing machine.

Some apartments feature a private balcony or a furnished terrace. Each apartment has a private bathroom with a bath or a shower, and towels and bed linen are provided.

Given its central location, the property is within walking distance of a number of shops and restaurants, as well as many of Barcelona’s sights. You can reach both Sagrada Familia and Plaza Cataluña Square within 20 minutes on foot. Paseo de Gracia Boulevard, with Gaudi’s building and designer boutiques, is 500 metres away.

name: Stay U-nique Apartments Rambla Catalunya
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Rambla Catalunya offers air-conditioned apartments in Barcelona with 1 or 2 bedrooms. They are all around 400 metres from Passeig de Gracia Station and 500 metres from La Pedrera. Free WiFi access is available.

Each apartment has a living room with a flat-screen satellite TV. There is a full kitchen with a washing machine, fridge, microwave and coffee maker. The private bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are provided. Some apartments have a balcony.

Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas are a 5-minute walk from the apartments. An airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge.

name: Traditional rooms in Eixample
description:
Situated conveniently in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Traditional rooms in Eixample is set 2.9 km from Somorrostro Beach, 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia and 600 metres from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is around less than 1 km from La Pedrera, a 13-minute walk from Portal de l'Angel and 1.3 km from Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is less than 1 km from the city centre and 2.9 km from Barceloneta Beach.

At the hostel, all rooms are equipped with a shared bathroom with a shower.

Popular points of interest near Traditional rooms in Eixample include Casa Batllo, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Amazing sunset views in the Mediterranean Apart/
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 85m²
description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace, Amazing sunset views in the Mediterranean Apart/ is located in Barcelona. Complimentary WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The property is non-smoking and is set less than 1 km from Forum Beach.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a hot tub. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Platja del Litoral is 1.5 km from the apartment, while Llevant is 1.6 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 18 km from Amazing sunset views in the Mediterranean Apart/.

name: Nice room By Eixample
description:
Located in Barcelona, within less than 1 km of Casa Batllo and a 15-minute walk of Passeig de Gracia, Nice room By Eixample provides accommodation with free WiFi throughout the property. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as Portal de l'Angel, Sagrada Familia, and Plaça Catalunya. The property is 1.4 km from the city centre and 500 metres from La Pedrera.

At the hostel, every room is equipped with a shared bathroom with a shower.

Popular points of interest near Nice room By Eixample include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Grupotel Gravina
description:
Housed in an attractive 19th-century building, Grupotel Gravina is located just off Plaza Catalunya, Barcelona’s main square, 5 minutes' walk from Las Ramblas. It offers 24-hour reception and modern rooms with free WiFi and satellite TV.

The Hotel Gravina is just 5 minutes’ walk from the MACBA Modern Art Gallery and 15 minutes from Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló. Catalunya Metro Station, located 100 metres from the hotel, connects you with the rest of the city.

The air-conditioned rooms at Grupotel Gravina feature modern furniture and some have parquet floors. They are equipped with a work desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

The hotel has a smart bar where you can get a snack or a drink. There are numerous restaurants in the surrounding streets.

name: Sonder Paseo de Gracia
description:
Well situated in the centre of Barcelona, Sonder Paseo de Gracia offers free WiFi and a restaurant. Built in 2022, this 5-star hotel is within 200 metres of Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 200 metres of Casa Batllo. The property is non-smoking and is set 300 metres from Passeig de Gracia.

The units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a coffee machine, a bath or shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Guest rooms feature a private bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Plaça Catalunya, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Sonder Paseo de Gracia.

name: Stay Barcelona Vila de Gracia
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Stay Barcelona Vila de Gracia features a patio and is located in Barcelona, within just 1.2 km of Casa Batllo and 1.6 km of Passeig de Gracia. The property is set 2.1 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 2.2 km from Portal de l'Angel and 1.8 km from Sagrada Familia. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and La Pedrera is 700 metres away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Stay Barcelona Vila de Gracia.

name: chic&basic Reding
description:
Situated 100 metres from Universitat Metro Station, this boutique hotel offers stylish rooms with free tea and coffee making facilities. Plaza Catalunya is just 400 metres away.

Each air-conditioned room at chic&basic Reding has flat-screen satellite TV and a safe. Rooms come with a minibar, a trouser press and a modern bathroom with a hairdryer, a magnifying mirror and toiletries.

chic&basic Reding has a business centre with a computer and printer. The hotel has free internet connection points. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide visitor information and help to arrange restaurant reservations or car rental.

chic&basic Reding is a 5-minute walk from the famous Las Ramblas. Direct buses to Barcelona Airport stop just 450 metres away, in Plaza Catalunya.

name: Sweet Inn - Carrer Fira
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 80m²
description:
Sweet Inn - Carrer Fira features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, 1.3 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, 2.2 km from Casa Batllo and 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sants Railway Station is 800 metres away.

Each unit comes with a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with bath and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Plaça Catalunya is 2.6 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Sweet Inn - Carrer Fira.

name: Autèntic Barcelona Monumental
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 80m²
description:
Autèntic Barcelona Monumental is located 10 minutes' walk from Barcelona's Glòries Shopping Centre and 100 metres from La Monumental Bullring. It offers modern apartments with free WiFi and a balcony.

The apartments at Autèntic Monumental feature large bedrooms with wardrobes. Each one has a lounge with sofas and a flat-screen TV. The well equipped kitchens include a hob, oven and microwave, as well as a washing machine.

In 5 minutes you can walk to the Encants flea market, and more modern shopping options are available at Glòries Shopping Centre. Located 150 metres away, Monumental Metro Station connects you with the rest of the city with ease. Private parking is available on request, for an extra cost.

name: Lovely & bright Bogatell beach apartment
description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 1.4 km from Bogatell Beach, Lovely & bright Bogatell beach apartment offers air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. With city views, this accommodation provides a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.5 km from Somorrostro Beach.

This apartment is fitted with 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom equipped with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Port Olimpic, Picasso Museum and Santa Maria del Mar. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Lovely & bright Bogatell beach apartment.

name: Spot Smart Nomad
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Spot Smart Nomad is located in central Barcelona, 450 metres from Plaza Espanya and 100 metres from the Fira Exhibition Centre. It offers spacious and modern apartments with a private patio.

Located in Plaza Espanya is Las Arenas Shopping Centre, a converted bullring. You can also find the Magic Fountain at Montjüic, the Joan Miró Foundation and the National Museum of Catalunya. Many restaurants, bars and shops can be found in the surrounding streets.

Spot Smart Nomad feature stylish, white décor. Each unit has a separate lounge area with a flat-screen TV. All suites are equipped with a safe, fridge and tea and coffee-making facilities.

The property serves a daily breakfast on request which includes fresh fruit. There is a bright lounge with sofas where you can relax.

Spot Smart Nomad is 1 minute’s walk from Rocafort Metro Station, taking you to Plaza Catalunya in less than 5 minutes. From there you can walk to Gaudí's Casa Batlló and La Pedrera within 10 minutes. Airport buses leave from Plaza Espanya, and you can walk to Sants Train Station in 15 minutes.

name: By La Pedrera - Diagonal Rooms
description:
Well located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, By La Pedrera - Diagonal Rooms is located 200 metres from La Pedrera, less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia and a 9-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is close to Cathedral of Barcelona, Plaça Catalunya and Sagrada Familia. The property is 1.1 km from the city centre and 500 metres from Casa Batllo.

With a shared bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hostel also offer free WiFi. Guest rooms at By La Pedrera - Diagonal Rooms include air conditioning and a wardrobe.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Tivoli Theatre and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from By La Pedrera - Diagonal Rooms.

name: Weflating City Center
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
These stylish apartments and rooms are located in the chic Eixample district of central Barcelona, just 350 metres from the famous Passeig de Gracia Boulevard and Metro Station. They offer a plasma TV and free Wi-Fi.

The air-conditioned Weflating City Center are spacious, bright and offer two or three bedrooms. The modern kitchen includes a washing machine, oven and a dishwasher.

There are several bars, restaurants and shops within 5 minutes- walk of the apartments, and many of the city’s most popular monuments can be reached easily by foot.

Gaudi’s La Pedrera and La Rambla are both just 10 minutes’ walk away. The Barceloneta area with its beach can be reached by metro in around 10 minutes.

Direct buses to El Prat Airport run from outside El Corte Ingles department store on Plaza Catalunya Square, 600 metres away. Various buses, trains and metros also run from here.

name: Hostal Sans
description:
Set on Plaza de Sants, Hostal Sans is a 5-minute walk from Sants Railway Station and just over 1 km from Plaza de Espanya. It offers rooms with TVs, and a 24-hour reception.

Each simply decorated room at Hostal Sans has air conditioning and heating.

Free WiFi is available in public areas, where there are vending machines. Restaurants, bars and cafés can be found in the surrounding Sants district.

Las Ramblas and Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter can be reached in just 10 minutes by Metro. The nearest beaches are a 30-minute bus journey away.

name: Studio Hostel
description:
Studio Hostel is set in the residential district of Sarrià, 50 metres from Reina Elisenda Metro Station. It offers free Wi-Fi, free breakfast, a roof terrace and rooms with private bathrooms.

Rooms at the Studio are brightly decorated. Each has heating and a desk.

The Albergue has a communal lounge with a TV and there is also a reading area. There are vending machines in the reception and guests can make use of the fridge, microwave and kettle in the shared area.

Set just off Passeig de la Bonanova, the hostel is within 10 minutes’ walk of a selection of restaurants, cafés and bars. The popular Gràcia district is just 5 train stops away.

Staff at the Studio’s 24-hour reception can provide information on Barcelona’s many tourist attractions. The city centre is 20 minutes from Reina Elisenda Station, and free on-street parking is available nearby.

name: Stay Barcelona Gracia Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 65m²
description:
Centrally situated, these 2 modern décor apartments are located in the Gracia District, 5 minutes by public transport from the Ramblas or the Plaza de Catalunya Square.

Stay Barcelona Gracia Apartments features 1 luxury apartment with capacity for up to 4 people, and a 2-bedroom apartment which can accommodate up to 4 people.

Both apartments offer free Wi-Fi and air conditioning. They come with a comfortable living room, sofa and a flat-screen satellite TV. There is also a well-equipped kitchen and a private bathroom.

The area has numerous bars and restaurants as well as shops and supermarkets. The nearest metro stations are Fontana, Diagonal and Verdaguer.

name: Teatro Miro Apartment
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 58m²
description:
Teatro Miro Apartment features a balcony and is located in Barcelona, within just 1.6 km of Palau Sant Jordi and 1.5 km of Montjuïc. The property is around 2.8 km from Sants Railway Station, 3.1 km from Passeig de Gracia and 3.1 km from Plaça Catalunya. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is less than 1 km away.

The apartment comes with 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer and free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Boqueria Market is 1.8 km from Teatro Miro Apartment, while Portal de l'Angel is 3.7 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

name: Renaissance Barcelona Hotel
description:
Renaissance Barcelona Hotel is located in the heart of the city, steps away from Passeig de Gràcia, main shopping boulevard, countless bars and restaurants, landmarks and cultural attractions.

The stylish rooms at the Renaissance Barcelona Hotel have been imaginatively designed to offer a standalone destination, perfect for kicking back and recharging after a day exploring Barcelona.

Guest rooms feature a unique stylish Gaudí-inspired décor, parquet floors, luxury bed linens and marbled bathrooms with exclusive toiletries.

The hotel’s stylish Rumbo Bar & Eatery offers Mediterranean dishes using local products. The bar serves signature cocktails, wines and local craft beer. The rooftop, Goja Rooftop is the go-to place to seize the moment, socialize, enjoy delicious Mediterranean food, inventive cocktails and great conversation.

Staff at reception can help you to book tickets for show and guided tours, as well as providing information about what to see and do in Barcelona.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are both within a 10-minute walk of the Renaissance Barcelona Hotel

name: Enjoybcn Gaudi Apartments
description:
Enjoybcn Sagrada Familia Apartments offers a rooftop chill-out terrace with views of the Sagrada Família, situated just 100 metres away. Each stylish air-conditioned apartment has free Wi-Fi and a modern kitchenette.

Each Enjoybcn apartment has bright, contemporary décor. There is a lounge with a flat-screen TV and DVD player, and kitchenettes feature a ceramic hob, oven, microwave and dishwasher.

There is a wide range of pavement cafés, restaurants and fast-food outlets on Gaudí Avenue. Souvenir shops and grocery stores can also be found within a 5-minute walk.

Enjoybcn Sagrada Familia Apartments is 100 metres from Sagrada Família Metro Station, and Barcelona city centre is just 5 minutes away by Metro. Local bus services and tour buses also stop nearby.

name: Ronda Sant Pere - Private City Center 1-Bedroom Suite
description:
Situated in Barcelona, 2.3 km from Barceloneta Beach and 2.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach, Ronda Sant Pere - Private City Center 1-Bedroom Suite offers air conditioning. It is located 500 metres from Palau de la Musica Catalana and provides a lift. The property is 2.3 km from Somorrostro Beach, and within 600 metres of the city centre.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment features a TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and oven. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Portal de l'Angel and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Ronda Sant Pere - Private City Center 1-Bedroom Suite.

name: Tibidabo Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²
description:
These apartments with free Wi-Fi are located in Vall d’Hebron, in the hills above Barcelona. Penitents and Vall d'Hebron Metro Stations are both less than 10 minutes' walk away. By direct metro you can reach La Rambla in 15 minutes.

The Tibidabo Apartments are set within an old villa with a spacious garden and terrace.

The location is convenient for access by car, with the Ronda de Dalt (B20 Ring Road) 200 metres away. Barcelona Airport is 15 minutes' drive away and there is free street parking around the apartments. The CosmoCaixa Science Museum and the Vall d’Hebron Hospital are a short drive away.

The Tibidabo Apartments are at the bottom of Mount Tibidabo, in the Sierra de Collserola. Tibidabo is famous for the beautiful Sagrat Cor Church, amusement park and spectacular views over Barcelona.

name: Sensation Sagrada Familia
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Within 2 minutes’ walk of Gaudí’s Sagrada Família, these bright modern apartments feature a shared rooftop sun terrace and a small outdoor swimming pool with views of the city’s famous Basilica.

Sensation Sagrada Familia apartments feature a balcony and a living room with parquet floors and floor-to-ceiling windows. The modern kitchen is equipped with a hob, oven, coffee maker and dishwasher.

All Sensation Sagrada Familia apartments have free Wi-Fi. There is also a gym and sauna in the same building which can be used free of charge.

There are several cafés, bars and restaurants on the tree-lined Avinguda Gaudí Avenue, just 250 metres away. There are plenty of shops and supermarkets within walking distance, including Mercat Sagrada Família food market, 5 minutes’ walk away.

Sagrada Família metro station, with lines 2 and 5, is just 1 minute walk from the apartments. Line 2 will take visitors to the city centre in 15 minutes. The number 92 bus goes to Gaudí’s Parc Güell, and Barcelona's El Prat Airport is a 30-minute drive away.

name: Stay U-nique Apartments Sagrada Familia III
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Sagrada Familia III features a balcony and is located in Barcelona, within just 300 metres of Sagrada Familia and 1.8 km of Casa Batllo. The property is set 3 km from Somorrostro Beach, 1.7 km from La Pedrera and 2.3 km from Passeig de Gracia. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.7 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2 km from the apartment, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Sagrada Familia III.

name: ibis Styles Barcelona Centre
description:
Ideally set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, ibis Styles Barcelona Centre is situated less than 1 km from Casa Batllo, a 15-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia and 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Featuring a bar, the 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is 1.3 km from the city centre and 500 metres from La Pedrera.

All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. At ibis Styles Barcelona Centre the rooms come with bed linen and towels.

With staff speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish, non-stop advice is available at the reception.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sagrada Familia, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from ibis Styles Barcelona Centre.

name: ABAL554 - Azotea exclusiva del centro de la ciudad
description:
Right in the heart of Barcelona, situated within a short distance of Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia, ABAL554 - Azotea exclusiva del centro de la ciudad offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as kitchenware and coffee machine. With city views, this accommodation features a terrace. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with streaming services and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, a microwave, a washing machine, a toaster and a fridge. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Plaça Catalunya, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Boqueria Market. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from ABAL554 - Azotea exclusiva del centro de la ciudad.

name: 43APAR469- Super Centric Apartment in Barcelona -
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Set in Barcelona, 2.5 km from Passeig de Gracia and 2 km from Plaça Catalunya, 43APAR469- Super Centric Apartment in Barcelona - offers air conditioning. It is situated 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 700 metres away.
