The apartment has 1 bedroom, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a toaster, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sants Railway Station, Boqueria Market and Palau Sant Jordi. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from 43APAR469- Super Centric Apartment in Barcelona -.

name: BUHO Boutique Rooms
description:
Set just 500 metres from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas,  BUHO Boutique Barcelona offers charming, air-conditioned rooms, individually decorated with antique furniture. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property.

Rooms feature artwork and large windows, as well as a flat-screen TV, DVD player and DVDs. The private bathrooms include a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have access to a pretty, shared terrace.

BUHO Boutique Barcelona also has a TV lounge. The guest house is surrounded by restaurants and bars.

Tourist information can be provided by staff, and both Barcelona Cathedral and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló are less than 10 minutes’ walk away.

Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya and luggage storage is offered at the property.

name: Sagrada Familia Gaudi
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 80m²
description:
Situated in Barcelona, 3 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 600 metres from Sagrada Familia, Sagrada Familia Gaudi features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is located 2 km from La Pedrera, 3 km from Passeig de Gracia and 3.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.6 km from Casa Batllo.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 3.4 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 3.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Sagrada Familia Gaudi.

name: Urgel habitaciones
description:
Well set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Urgel habitaciones is set 1.5 km from La Pedrera, 1.9 km from Casa Batllo and 2.5 km from Passeig de Gracia. It is located 1.6 km from Sants Railway Station and provides a shared kitchen. Plaça Catalunya is 2.6 km from the bed and breakfast and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.6 km away.

The units in the bed and breakfast are fitted with a kettle. With a shared bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also provide guests with free WiFi, while selected rooms include a balcony. At the bed and breakfast, all units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Dining options are available close to the bed and breakfast.

Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 2.7 km from Urgel habitaciones, while Boqueria Market is 3.1 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Barcelona City Centre Hostal
description:
The hostel’s privileged position in the heart of the Eixample district allows you to easily walk through Barcelona´s cultural heart, with streets such as La Rambla and Passeig de Gracia in the local area.

Once you have returned from a day’s sightseeing you will find drinks and snacks available on site. Breakfast is served daily.

name: Casagrand Luxury Suites
description_short: Entire apartment • 4 bedrooms • 3 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 200m²
description:
Situated 5-minute walk from Paseo de Gracia and 550 metres from Gaudi’s La Pedrera, Casagrand Luxury Suites offers apartments with free access to a rooftop terrace with a pool and a sauna.

All soundproofed apartments includes, a pillow menu and turndown service. They all have a flat-screen satellite TV in all bedrooms and in the living-dining room; and a bathroom including a bathrobe and free Molton Brown toiletries. Some apartments have a private terrace. There is free WiFi available throughout.

Guests have access to an on-site 24-hour gym and the staff at the reception will provide services and suggestions about surroundings.

A selection of restaurants, cafes and bars can be found in Rambla de Catalunya Boulevard, 200 metres away.

You can reach the Sagrada Familia within 30-minute walk, while the closest metro station is Diagonal Metro Station, 350 metres away.

name: Stay U-nique Apartments Taulat
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
Set in Barcelona, 800 metres from Nova Icaria Beach and 800 metres from Bogatell Beach, Stay U-nique Apartments Taulat offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property has mountain and city views, and is less than 1 km from Mar Bella Beach. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.6 km from Somorrostro Beach.

The spacious apartment with a terrace and sea views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Barceloneta Beach is 2.3 km from the apartment, while Port Olimpic is 1.6 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Taulat.

description_short: Entire holiday home • 4 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 35m²
description:
Situated in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, Casa familiar con piscina has a terrace and pool views. Boasting mountain views, a garden and a private pool, this holiday home also comes with free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 30 km from Sagrada Familia.

The air-conditioned holiday home consists of 4 separate bedrooms, 2 bathrooms with a hair dryer, a seating area, and a living room. Towels and bed linen are available in the holiday home. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Barbecue facilities are provided.

La Pedrera is 32 km from the holiday home, while Casa Batllo is 32 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 47 km from Casa familiar con piscina.

description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:

The spacious apartment with a terrace and sea views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

description_short: Entire holiday home • 4 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 35m²
description:
Situated in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, Casa familiar con piscina has a terrace and pool views. Boasting mountain views, a garden and a private pool, this holiday home also comes with free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 30 km from Sagrada Familia.

description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 28m²
description:
Ideally located in the Sants-Montjuïc district of Barcelona, Stay U-nique Apartments Torre d'En Damians II is set less than 1 km from Sants Railway Station, 2.7 km from Passeig de Gracia and 2.7 km from Palau Sant Jordi. The property is located 2.8 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 3.1 km from Plaça Catalunya and 3.2 km from Casa Batllo. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is less than 1 km away.

Each unit has a terrace, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a seating area, a TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine. At the apartment complex, units come with bed linen and towels.

Camp Nou is 3.3 km from the apartment, while Boqueria Market is 3.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Torre d'En Damians II.

name: Bright & Breezy
description:
Set in Barcelona, less than 1 km from La Pedrera and a 16-minute walk from Casa Batllo, Bright & Breezy offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is situated 1.7 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.8 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 3 bedrooms, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a toaster. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sagrada Familia, Tivoli Theatre and Park Güell. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Bright & Breezy.

name: Mandarin Oriental, Barcelona
description:
Set on Barcelona’s fashionable Passeig de Gràcia, the luxurious Mandarin Oriental, Barcelona is within 5 minutes’ walk of Gaudi’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. Plaça Catalunya is just a 10-minute walk away. The hotel features a spa, rooftop pool, indoor pool, fitness centre, wonderful city views, and 24-hour room service.

The spacious rooms feature bright, minimalist design. They include a home theatre, a seating area, large flat-screen TV, CD and DVD player. Bathrooms have large bathtubs or showers, and include Acqua di Parma free toiletries, a bathrobe and slippers.

Additionally, you can dine al fresco in the Mimosa garden, and discover Terrat, the rooftop terrace, where guests can enjoy cocktails and Peruvian food. Banker's bar is also serves cocktails and tapas.

Mandarin Oriental spa offers a wide range of treatments. Spa access is free and includes the indoor pool, hot tub, Hammam and 24-hour gym. The spa also features suites for couples. Headphones, towels and chilled drinks are provided for the gym.

There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Parking is available nearby for an extra charge.

name: Luxury Loft with A Pool
description:
Luxury Loft with A Pool has a balcony and is set in Barcelona, within just less than 1 km of Bogatell Beach and a 14-minute walk of Nova Mar Bella Beach. The property is around 2.5 km from Port Olimpic, 3.2 km from Sagrada Familia and 3.3 km from Santa Maria del Mar. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Mar Bella Beach is 800 metres away.

Providing access to a terrace, this air-conditioned apartment comes with 1 separate bedroom and a fully equipped kitchen. A flat-screen TV is offered. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Picasso Museum is 3.9 km from the apartment, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 3.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Luxury Loft with A Pool.

name: Girona 108
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 110m²
description:
The modern, air-conditioned Girona 108 apartment comes with free Wi-Fi and a private balcony. Located 300 metres from Girona Metro Station, it is 15 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya Square.

Featuring a simple, modern décor, the bright apartment includes a living-dining area with a flat-screen TV and sofa bed. The kitchen is equipped with a microwave, oven, dishwasher and washer-dryer.

A wide range of restaurants, shops and bars can be found in the streets surrounding Girona 108. Passeig de Gracia Boulevard is just 500 metres away and offers many designer fashion shops.

Girona Metro Station connects directly with Barcelona Beach and the Gothic Quarter. Airport trains leave from Passeig de Gracia Station.

name: Ibis Barcelona Centro (Sagrada Familia)
description:
Located in Barcelona, 2.7 km from Somorrostro Beach, Ibis Barcelona Centro (Sagrada Familia) provides accommodation with a bar, private parking and a shared lounge. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features family rooms.

All units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. At the hotel every room is fitted with a private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is available daily at Ibis Centro.

Reservations made with breakfast included are not going to include the breakfast for the kids of 11 years old or under, this service will have an extra cost per kid and per night, the cost is the 50% of an adult.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sagrada Familia, La Pedrera and Casa Batllo. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Ibis Barcelona Centro (Sagrada Familia).

name: B&B Boutique Ca La Maria
description_short: Private suite
description:
Set next to Rambla Catalunya Street, Ca La Maria Barcelona is centrally located in Barcelona. The bed & breakfast offers rooms in a stylish apartment with free Wi-Fi and air conditioning.

Featuring high ceilings and modern décor, each room has a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom comes with a shower and some of them also include a bathtub.

Guests have access to a large wooden sun terrace, including a garden and a covered area with a dining table. There is also a spacious shared lounge. A breakfast buffet is available, as well as a bar where guests can get drinks and snacks.

Gaudi’s Pedrera Building is only 5 minutes’ walk from the bed & breakfast. There is a large variety of bars and restaurants in the area. Guests can find Diagonal Metro Station 300 metres from the property and Plaça Catalunya is 2 metro stops away.

name: Boat Hotel Barcelona
description_short: Mobile home • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 30m²
description:
With quiet street views, Boat Hotel Barcelona is situated in Barcelona and has a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk, bar and garden. This beachfront property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The boat has family rooms.

The boat provides guests with a terrace, sea views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and a fridge, and a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. Kitchenware is also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the boat, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available.

Popular points of interest near the boat include Forum Beach, Platja del Litoral and Llevant. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 19 km from Boat Hotel Barcelona.

name: Bcn Centric Rooms
description:
Ideally situated in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, Bcn Centric Rooms is situated 3 km from Sant Miquel Beach, 600 metres from Passeig de Gracia and 500 metres from Plaça Catalunya. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 2.9 km from Sant Sebastian Beach, and within 500 metres of the city centre.

At the hostel the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near Bcn Centric Rooms include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Boqueria Market and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

name: Port V Apart centrico con estilo 21
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
Boasting air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, Port V Apart centrico con estilo 21 is situated in Barcelona. It is set 1.5 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 3 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment features a TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and oven. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Santa Maria del Mar, Plaça Catalunya and Boqueria Market. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Port V Apart centrico con estilo 21.

name: Mambo Tango
description:
Mambo Tango is a backpackers’ hostel located in Barcelona’s Poble Sec district, just 100 metres from Parallel Metro Station. It offers free daily activities and free Wi-Fi access.

Mambo Tango Hostel offers colourful dormitories and private rooms, all with air conditioning, heating and individual lockers.

You can prepare meals in the Mambo Tango’s shared kitchen, or enjoy a film in the TV lounge. The hotel’s free activities include photo exhibitions, music classes and city walks.

Staff can provide information on Barcelona’s many attractions, as well as help with ticket reservations and discounts. The property also organizes daily guided walking tours and night tours to bars and nightclubs. The famous Gaudí houses are within 15 minutes’ walk of the hostel.

Situated at the foot of Montjuïc Hill, the hostel is an ideal base for visiting Montjuïc Castle and the Magic Fountains. The lively Raval district is just a 5-minute walk away.

name: Aparthotel Rambla108
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 27m²
description:
Apartments Ramblas108 offers modern apartments situated right on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, in the heart of the city centre. Each air-conditioned apartment has free WiFi and most have a private balcony overlooking Las Ramblas.

The stylish Apartments Ramblas108 apartments have a living area with an LCD TV and a well-equipped kitchen area with a microwave, coffee maker and some have a washing machine. Bed linen and towels are provided.

Apartments Ramblas108 is set on the edge of the Gothic Quarter, just opposite the vibrant Boqueria Market and Liceu Metro Station. Buses to Barcelona Airport stop in Plaça Catalunya Square, a 3-minute walk away.

name: Vale Beach
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 105m²
description:
Located in Barcelona, 700 metres from Nova Mar Bella Beach and less than 1 km from Mar Bella Beach, Vale Beach offers air conditioning. Among the facilities at this property are private check-in and check-out and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set less than 1 km from Llevant.

Featuring a Blu-ray player, the spacious apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, a living room, a dining area, 1 bedroom, and 1 bathroom with a bath. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. Additional in-room amenities include wine or champagne.

Port Olimpic is 2.8 km from the apartment, while Santa Maria del Mar is 3.7 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 15 km from Vale Beach, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Sweet Inn - Callao
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 54m²
description:
Sweet Inn - Callao features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Barcelona, 700 metres from Sants Railway Station, 1.1 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 2.8 km from Casa Batllo. The property has city views and is 3.2 km from Passeig de Gracia and 3.2 km from Camp Nou. Featuring a private entrance, the apartment allows guests to maintain their privacy.

Each unit comes with a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with bath and slippers. Free WiFi is available to all guests, while some rooms will provide you with a terrace. At the apartment complex, all units include bed linen and towels.

Plaça Catalunya is 3.3 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 3.3 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 10 km from Sweet Inn - Callao, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Tendency Apartments 6
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Situated in central Barcelona, a 2-minute walk from Girona Metro Station, Tendency Apartments 6 offers accommodation with free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and heating. Sagrada Familia Cathedral is a 17-minute walk away.

All apartments have a living area with a flat-screen TV, DVD player, and dining table. The private kitchen is equipped with a hob, microwave, and fridge. Kitchenware is provided in all apartments and some of them have a washing machine and dishwasher.

The apartments include modern furnishings and many of them have a small balcony with views of the city. Each apartment has a private bathroom with a bathtub or a shower, and towels and bed linen are provided. A cot is available upon request.

There are bars and restaurant within a 10-minute walk of the apartments, and a 24-hour grocery shop is just around the corner. Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, famous for its high-end boutiques and Gaudì’s buildings, can be reached in 7 minutes on foot.

name: Grupotel Gran Via 678
description:
The stylish Gran Via 678 is situated 700 metres from Plaza Catalunya in central Barcelona and features an outdoor pool with a sun terrace. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.

Modern rooms at this design hotel include satellite TV and a minibar. The private bathroom is complete with a hairdryer.

Grupotel Gran Via 678 offers a restaurant which serves Mediterranean and international cuisine. Guests can enjoy meals on the terrace.

Urquinaona Metro Station is 400 metres away while the Arc de Triomf monument is less than 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel.

name: numa I Lustre Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:

The air-conditioned apartment includes a seating area with sofa and flat-screen TV. The kitchen is equipped with a stove, oven and microwave. The bathroom comes with a shower.

Barceloneta and its port are 1 km from the property. Sagrada Familia and Camp Nou Stadium are 2.5 km and 6 km away. numa I Lustre Apartments is 15 km from Barcelona El Prat Airport.

name: Hostal LK Barcelona
description:
Just 500 metres from Barcelona’s AVE Train Station, Sants Estació, Hostal LK Barcelona offers 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi. Espanya, Hostafrancs and Tarragona Metro Stations are within 5 minutes’ walk.

Chic, modern rooms feature wooden floors and air conditioning. They are also heated and have flat-screen  TV and a work desk. The private bathroom comes with toiletries.

The property has a fridge, microwaves and kettle which guests can use.

Luggage storage is offered at the LK Barcelona. Just 3 minutes’ walk away is Plaza Espanya, with Las Arenas Shopping Centre, the Magic Fountain and Airport Bus stop.

name: Valencia 455
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 80m²
description:

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 3 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.3 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Valencia 455.

name: SAGRADA FAMILIA VIEWS Nos preocupa su seguridad
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 kitchen • 75m²
description:

Fitted with wooden floors, each apartment includes heating. The kitchen is equipped with a toaster, microwave and a hob. A washing machine is also available.

Featuring simple décor, the bedrooms have a wardrobe and the private bathrooms have a shower. Bed linen and towels are provided.

Sagrada Familia Metro Station is about 500 metres from the properties. The area offers a wide variety of restaurants and bars.

Plaza Catalunya Square and Las Ramblas are within 2.5 km away. Buses run regularly between Plaza Catalunya Square and Barcelona Airport.

name: Apartment Poble Nou
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 61m²
description:
Located in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Nova Icaria Beach and a 14-minute walk from Mar Bella Beach, Apartment Poble Nou offers air conditioning. The apartment, set in a building dating from 1940, is 1.6 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.1 km from Barceloneta Beach. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Bogatell Beach is less than 1 km away.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and quiet street views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a shower. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Port Olimpic is 1.6 km from the apartment, while Santa Maria del Mar is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Apartment Poble Nou.

name: Casp Green House
description:
Situated in the centre of Barcelona, Casp Green House features air-conditioning. Plaza Catalunya is a 10-minute walk from the house.

The bedrooms have a safe and a private bathroom with free toiletries and hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are provided. Some rooms come with city view.

Passeig de Gracia shopping street is 650 meters from the property. Arco del Triunfo is an 8-minute walk away. Urquinaona metro station is within 4 minutes’ walk.

RECEPTION and KEY COLLECTION are in situated at street Via Laietana 71, 2º, which is just 7 min walk.

name: La Maison de Barcelone
description:
Offering free WiFi and garden views, La Maison de Barcelone is an accommodation located in the centre of Barcelona, just 600 metres from Casa Batllo and less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia. The property features city views and is less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and a 3-minute walk from La Pedrera. Staff on-site can arrange a shuttle service.

The guest house will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath. At the guest house, every unit has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Plaça Catalunya, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 13 km from La Maison de Barcelone, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Pere Serafi 2 bedroom apartment
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:

The property is around 1.8 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 1.9 km from Park Güell and 2.7 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The apartment features 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, a washing machine and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Tivoli Theatre is 2.7 km from Pere Serafi 2 bedroom apartment, while Sagrada Familia is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

name: Stay U-nique Apartments Villarroel
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Villarroel has a balcony and is situated in Barcelona, within just 1.5 km of Passeig de Gracia and 1.6 km of Plaça Catalunya. It is set 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Casa Batllo is 1.2 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Sants Railway Station and Boqueria Market. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Villarroel.

name: Gracia15
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
Situated in Barcelona, 800 metres from La Pedrera and 1.3 km from Casa Batllo, Gracia15 features air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. This sustainable apartment is located 1.6 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.3 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana.

The spacious apartment features 2 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and oven, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Plaça Catalunya and Sagrada Familia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Gracia15.

name: Boutique Hotel H10 Montcada
description:
Boutique Hotel H10 Montcada has fantastic views of Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter and the sea from its roof terrace and hot tub. It offers modern rooms with free Wi-Fi.

The air-conditioned rooms at Boutique Hotel H10 Montcada feature parquet floors and natural light. Each one comes with a minibar, a free safe, and a flat-screen TV with international satellite channels.

The hotel’s stylish restaurant serves a daily buffet breakfast. There are also 2 bars, including the Sunset Bar located on the roof terrace. Room service is also available.

The attentive staff at the 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. Bicycle and car rental services can also be arranged.

Barcelona's main tourist attractions such as the Cathedral, the Ramblas and the Picasso Museum are within walking distance of the hotel.

Boutique Hotel H10 Montcada is just 3 minutes’ walk from the Palau de la Música Catalana, a spectacular Modernist auditorium and UNESCO World Heritage Site. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, 5 minutes’ walk away.

name: Click&Flat Stylish Torrijos
description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.2 km from La Pedrera and 1.7 km from Casa Batllo, Click&Flat Stylish Torrijos features spacious air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is around 2.6 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 2.6 km from Tivoli Theatre and 2.7 km from Portal de l'Angel. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.2 km from Passeig de Gracia.

This apartment features 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Sagrada Familia and Park Güell. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Click&Flat Stylish Torrijos.

name: Eco Boutique Hostal Grau
description:
This family-run, eco-friendly hotel is within 200 metres of Las Ramblas and Plaza Catalunya. All rooms are made of natural, organic materials and painted with PVC-free paint.

All rooms at Hostal Grau have a private bathroom with free toiletries made from natural sources such as lavender. Some rooms have a balcony; while others face a vertical garden.

The hotel also has one OFF room with a reduction of electromagnetic radiation; and the whole building boasts environmentally friendly design, energy efficient lighting and a water recycling system, as well as using renewable or clean energy.

As well as free natural teas and infusions, are available from the on-site lounge.

The MACBA Modern Art Museum is just 350 metres from the guest house, and Port Vell Harbour is a 15-minute walk away. Direct buses to Barcelona Airport stop in nearby Plaza Universitat.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Santa Maria del Mar, Plaça Catalunya and Boqueria Market. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Casa Vaganto.

name: Fashion House
description:

Rooms at the Fashion House feature high ceilings and traditional décor.  All come with air conditioning and heating. The studios have a private bathroom, and bedrooms share a bathroom with just one other room.

Other facilities at Fashion House include a communal living room and a large terrace, where there are complimentary coffee and tea, common fridge, microwave, kettle and cold drinks vending machine. The hotel is situated close to many restaurants, bars and cafés.

Fashion House is just 550 metres from Passeig de Gràcia. It offers easy access to the Gothic Quarter and Born districts.

name: Palau de la Musica Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 80m²
description:
Set in a 19th-century building beside the enchanting Palau de la Música building, these chic and spacious apartments offer fashionable accommodation in the city’s historic heart.

Spend your Barcelona city break in style with a stay at Palau de la Musica Apartments. The interior of each apartment comes with tiled and parquet floors to complement the stylish design.

Prepare your own meals in the apartment’s well-equipped kitchen. Other great amenities feature music equipment, satellite TV and air conditioning for the warmer months.

As soon as you walk out of your apartment you will find yourself in the fashionable, central district of El Born – full of chic bars, restaurants and boutiques. The Gothic Quarter and La Rambla are also just a short walk away.

Set in a 19th century Catalan building with a stained glass from Antoni Blanch i Rigalt, the guesthouse is very handily located. It is surrounded by shops, bars, restaurants as well as supermarkets. A car and bicycle rental services are available on site.

You can walk to the Ramblas and to Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard within 10 minutes. You will also have easy access to Barceloneta Beach and to the Borne District.

The closest metro station is Urquinaona, just 40 metres from the property. There is an airport shuttle just 500 metres away. You can reach Estació del Nord Bus Station within a 10-minute walk.

The air-conditioned apartment is composed of 2 separate bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is available. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Santa Maria del Mar, Picasso Museum and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from 017 New of love 3 1.

name: BarcelonaForRent Sant Pau Barcelona Suites
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 60m²
description:
Just a 5-minute walk from the beautiful Hospital Sant Pau, these air-conditioned apartments offer free Wi-Fi and a kitchen with an oven, toaster and washer-dryer. Alfons X Metro Station is 400 metres away.

Each apartment at BarcelonaForRent Sant Pau Barcelona Suites features a spacious king bedroom and a living-dining area with a sofa bed, a TV and DVD player. The modern bathroom includes a shower and hairdryer.

BarcelonaForRent Sant Pau Barcelona Suites are located in a quiet residential area, a 10-minute walk from famous Sagrada Familia. Avinguda Gaudi, an avenue lined with pavement cafés and restaurants, is just 400 metres away.

Alfons X Station offers easy access to Passeig de Gràcia, the Gothic Quarter and Barceloneta Beach. Nearby Sant Pau-Dos de Maig Metro Station provides direct links to Sagrada Familia and Camp Nou Stadium.

name: Praktik Èssens
description:
Boasting a terrace, Praktik Èssens is located in Barcelona and is 300 metres from Passeig de Gracia. The property is set 300 metres from Casa Batllo and 350 metres from Tivoli Theatre. The accommodation features free WiFi and an outdoor terrace, tea and coffee with free pastries corner and happy hour every day from 19:00 hours to 20:00 hours (free wines and snacks).

The rooms in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom, while certain rooms at Praktik Èssens also feature a seating area. All rooms have a desk.

Speaking English and Spanish, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the reception.

Plaça Catalunya is 500 metres from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Praktik Èssens.

name: Céntrico apartamento
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Céntrico apartamento has a balcony and is situated in Barcelona, within just less than 1 km of Casa Batllo and a 15-minute walk of Passeig de Gracia. It is located 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and La Pedrera is 400 metres away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a kettle, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Tivoli Theatre and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Céntrico apartamento.

name: Ant Hostel Barcelona
description:
Located opposite Parc de la Ciutadella Park in central Barcelona, Ant Hostel Barcelona offers a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi throughout. Arc de Triomf Metro Station is 500 metres away.

Rooms at this hostel feature air conditioning and parquet floors. The private bathrooms come with a bath or shower. Guests can make use of the shared kitchen.

Ant Hostel Barcelona also offers luggage storage as well as lockers for check-in and check-out are chargeable

Barcelona's Born Neighborhood and its many bars and restaurants are in the surrounding streets.

Picasso Museum is a 10-minute walk away and Barceloneta Beach is 2 km from Ant Hostel Barcelona. Plaza Catalunya, with direct buses to Barcelona Airport, is 20 minutes’ walk, while Estación del Nord, with direct buses to Girona-Costa Brava Airport, is just 500 metres' walk.

name: El Palauet Royal Suites
description_short: Private suite • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 150m²
description:
Located in a Modernist building, El Palauet Royal Suites features a rooftop spa with spectacular city views. It offers elegant, modern suites with free Wi-Fi.

El Palauet Royal Suites’s spacious suites include 2 bedrooms with private bathrooms, a spacious living room and a fully-equipped kitchen including a hob, microwave, small fridge and a dishwasher. Some include a balcony. All suites come with 2 bottles of water and a platter of apples, replenished every day, as well as a 380 ml bottle of Spanish wine and Wallpaper guide to Barcelona.

This luxury hotel delivers breakfast to the rooms. Main restaurants and bars can be found on Barcelona’s elegant Passeig de Gràcia Avenue, where it intersects with Diagonal Avenue.

El Palauet Royal Suites offers a personal assistant service. A shuttle service is available at an additional cost and guests can rent cars at the hotel.

name: Chic & Basic Zoo
description:
Chic & Basic Zoo is located in El Born, now one of the most fashionable and cosmopolitan districts of central Barcelona. On one side is the Gothic Quarter, to the other is Ciutadella Park, and the port is a few minutes away.

From the hotel, you can easily get to the historic city centre, the Gothic Quarter (Barrio Gótico) where the Cathedral, Santa Maria del Mar, Plaza Sant Jaume and Santa Anna are located.

The hotel is also very close to the zoo, the Ciutadella Park, beaches and the Olympic Port. In the neighborhood you will also find nightlife, bars, restaurants (the area of El Born is where you´ll find the most typical ‘tapas’) and museums, such as the Picasso Museum.

name: Arc House Gracia
description:
Located in Barcelona and within 600 metres of La Pedrera, Arc House Gracia features a shared lounge, non-smoking rooms, and free WiFi. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.7 km from Tivoli Theatre, 2 km from Sagrada Familia and 1.8 km from Plaça Catalunya. The accommodation provides a shared kitchen and a tour desk for guests.

Featuring a shared bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, certain rooms at the hostel also offer a city view.

Popular points of interest near Arc House Gracia include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

name: DB Nice apartment Sagrada Familia
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
Set in Barcelona, 3.4 km from La Pedrera and 3.5 km from Casa Batllo, DB Nice apartment Sagrada Familia offers air conditioning. The property is around 3.9 km from Passeig de Gracia, 4 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 4.3 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 1.2 km away.

The spacious apartment features 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a toaster, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with an a bath or shower. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Tivoli Theatre is 4.3 km from the apartment, while Picasso Museum is 4.4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from DB Nice apartment Sagrada Familia.

name: Modern and bright apartment in Eixample 5-2
description:
Modern and bright apartment in Eixample 5-2 is set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 2 km from Casa Batllo, 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia and 2.6 km from Plaça Catalunya. It is located 1.2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sants Railway Station is 1.1 km away.

The spacious apartment features a patio, 2 bedrooms, a living room and a well-equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave. A TV is provided. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.7 km from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Modern and bright apartment in Eixample 5-2.

name: Sweet Inn - Carrer Bailen
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 68m²
description:
Sweet Inn - Carrer Bailen provides accommodation within 1.1 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Each room has a balcony with views of the city.

At the apartment complex, all units are equipped with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units are equipped with a seating area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Casa Batllo. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Sweet Inn - Carrer Bailen.

name: Exclusive 2 bedroom apartment in the city center
description:
Boasting air-conditioned accommodation with a patio, Exclusive 2 bedroom apartment in the city center is situated in Barcelona. It is set 1 km from La Pedrera and offers a lift. The property is 1.2 km from the city centre and less than 1 km from Casa Batllo.

With free WiFi, this 2-bedroom apartment features a TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and fridge. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Exclusive 2 bedroom apartment in the city center.

name: Rosello 2
description:
Set in Barcelona, near Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Rosello 2 features free WiFi. The property is located 1.9 km from Portal de l'Angel, 2.1 km from Cathedral of Barcelona and 1.7 km from Plaça Catalunya. The property is 1.4 km from the city centre and 500 metres from La Pedrera.

Towels and bed linen are featured in the bed and breakfast. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Sagrada Familia, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Rosello 2.

name: Hostal Martinval
description:
Set 5 minutes’ walk from the avenues of Diagonal and Passeig de Gracia, this guest house is located in the central Eixample neighbourhood of Barcelona. Verdaguer metro station is 350 metres away.

Hostal Martinval offers both apartments or modern rooms, most of which have a private bathroom. All rooms have a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi, while some of them have a balcony.

The Martinval also features a luggage storage. There is a wide offer of restaurants and bars in the surrounding area.

This accommodation is well connected to public transport and within walking distance from Barcelona’s most important buildings. La Pedrera and Casa Batlló are 10 minutes’ walk, and Sagrada Familia Temple is about the same distance.

name: Barcelona City Rooms
description:
Barcelona City Rooms is located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, just 5 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s iconic Sagrada Família.

The rooms at Barcelona City Rooms feature tiled floors. Each one comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Bed linen and towels are included.

Barcelona City Rooms is located opposite a supermarket.

The spectacular Hospital Sant Pau is a 10-minute walk away. Sagrada Família Metro Station connects you with the city centre in 5 minutes.

name: AB Poble Sec Apartment
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
AB Poble Sec Apartment has a terrace and is situated in Barcelona, within just 1.7 km of Palau Sant Jordi and 1.7 km of Boqueria Market. This sustainable apartment is located 2.6 km from Sants Railway Station and 2.9 km from Passeig de Gracia. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is less than 1 km away.

The 2-bedroom apartment features a living room with a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 2 bathrooms with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Plaça Catalunya is 2.9 km from the apartment, while Montjuïc is 1.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from AB Poble Sec Apartment.

name: AB Marina Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 2 bathrooms • 60m²
description:
Offering views of Ágbar Tower in Barcelona, Apartment Barcelona Marina is a self-catering accommodation located 42 metres from Monumental Bullring and 7 minutes' walk from Sagrada Familia. Free WiFi access is available.

The property is situated between two of Barcelona's main avenues, Diagonal and Gran Vía de les Corts Catalanes. L'Auditori music venue, The National Theatre of Catalunya and Les Glories Square are within a 10-minute walk away. There is free luggage storage.

The air-conditioned apartment at the Barcelona Marina features modern décor and parquet floors.

There is a living room with a sofa and a flat-screen TV, a dining area and a fully equipped kitchen. The private bathroom has a shower and a hairdryer. The apartment has a dishwasher and a washing machine, and bed linen and towels are provided. There is a cot and a high chair in the apartment.

Barcelona El Prat Airport can be reached in 20 minutes by car.

name: ApartEasy - Family 4-Bedroom Apartment
description_short: Entire apartment • 4 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 90m²
description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.6 km from Passeig de Gracia, ApartEasy - Family 4-Bedroom Apartment offers air conditioning. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Sightseeing tours are available within easy reach.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Sants Railway Station and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from ApartEasy - Family 4-Bedroom Apartment.

name: The Hotel 592 - Adults Only
description:
Just metres from Universitat Metro in Barcelona, the adults-only The Hotel 592 offers a restaurant and colourful modern rooms with a balcony. WiFi is free throughout.

All air conditioned, rooms here come with a flat-screen TV and parquet floors. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Plaça Catalunya is 500 metres from The Hotel 592. La Pedrera can be reached on foot in 15 minutes.

name: Ideal Youth Hostel
description_short: Shared dormitory room
description:
Offering a roof terrace with chill-out area, Ideal Youth Hostel is located 50 metres from Las Ramblas in Barcelona.

Some rooms have a private bathroom. Extras include a desk, bed linen and a fan.

At Ideal Youth Hostel you will find a 24-hour front desk. Other facilities offered include a shared lounge, a games room and a tour desk. Computers are available for use free of charge.

The hostel is 800 metres from Plaça Catalunya, and Liceu Metro Station is a 2-minute walk away. You can walk to Barceloneta Beach in 25 minutes.

name: Hotel Pulitzer Barcelona
description:
This design hotel is right next to Plaza Catalunya in the centre of Barcelona. It has a rooftop garden terrace and offers free high-speed WiFi.

Set in a 19th-Century building, the hotel features modern, elegant décor. Its rooms include free tea and coffee, air conditioning, heating, and flat-screen satellite TV. The private bathrooms include luxury cosmetics. Some rooms have a private balcony.

A varied buffet breakfast with zero-kilometre and homemade products is served. Gluten-free breakfasts can be requested.

Hotel Pulitzer Barcelona has a gastronomic restaurant with a terrace, lobby bar and library. Around 100 live music sessions take place on the terrace throughout the year.

The 24-hour reception offers services such as bike and scooter rental, massages and personal training or yoga sessions.

The Hotel Pulitzer Barcelona has a Biosphere Responsible Tourism certificate.

name: Abba Rambla Hotel
description:
Abba Rambla Hotel is set in the Raval District, 500 metres from Las Ramblas and Liceu Metro Station. It offers free Wi-Fi and a sun terrace.

The modern, air-conditioned rooms at Abba Rambla feature satellite TV, a safe and minibar. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. Some rooms have a balcony with views.

There is a café-bar, where guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Room service and a pizza delivery option are available.

There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a bicycle or car from the tour desk. Parking can be reserved near the hotel for an additional charge.  Attractions including La Boqueria Market and the MACBA Museum are 5 minutes’ walk away.

name: HOSTAL BEDMATES
description:
Attractively set in the Sants-Montjuïc district of Barcelona, HOSTAL BEDMATES is situated 2.9 km from Sant Miquel Beach, 2.9 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.9 km from Barceloneta Beach. This 2-star hotel offers a concierge service and a tour desk. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at HOSTAL BEDMATES have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms are equipped with a terrace. At the accommodation rooms come with bed linen and towels.

HOSTAL BEDMATES offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Santa Maria del Mar and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from HOSTAL BEDMATES.

name: Sagrada Familia View Apartment
description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.6 km from La Pedrera and 2.7 km from Casa Batllo, Sagrada Familia View Apartment offers air conditioning. It is located 3.1 km from Passeig de Gracia and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 1.1 km away.

This apartment has 4 bedrooms, a kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a shower. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Park Güell is 1.8 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 3.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Sagrada Familia View Apartment.

name: Jie Apartment
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 106m²
description:
Offering a shared lounge and quiet street view, Jie Apartment is situated in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Forum Beach and a 16-minute walk from Platja del Litoral. This beachfront property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The accommodation provides a lift and a shared kitchen for guests.

The spacious apartment with a terrace and city views has 3 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a hot tub. The air-conditioned apartment also features a seating area, washing machine and 2 bathrooms with a bidet and a bath. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Llevant is 1.6 km from the apartment, while Platja de la Mora is 2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from Jie Apartment.

name: Les Corts Exclusive Apartments by Olala Homes
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
Featuring free WiFi, Les Corts Exclusive Apartments is located in Barcelona. Set in the neighbourhood of Les Corts, this property offers apartments with a private terrace with views of the city.

These air-conditioned apartments have a living space with a double sofa bed, flat-screen TV, and dining table, while the kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, coffee machine, fridge, and microwave. The terrace includes outdoor furniture. Bed linen and towels are provided, and a washing machine is available.

You can find several restaurants, bars, and grocery shops within a 5-minute walk of Les Corts Exclusive Apartments. Plaça del Centre Metro Station is 400 metres from the property, and Plaza Catalunya is 7 metro stops away.

name: Lovely wooden boat in Port forum, with AC and two bikes.
description_short: Mobile home • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 27m²
description:
Featuring city views, Lovely wooden boat in Port forum, with AC and two bikes. Offers accommodation with a terrace, around 1.4 km from Platja del Litoral. The property is set 1.6 km from Llevant, 5.5 km from Port Olimpic and 5.7 km from Sagrada Familia. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Forum Beach is 400 metres away.

The air-conditioned boat consists of 1 separate bedroom, 1 bathroom and a living room. Towels and bed linen are featured in the boat. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Santa Maria del Mar is 6.3 km from the boat, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 6.7 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 18 km from Lovely wooden boat in Port forum, with AC and two bikes..

name: Diagonal 1
description:
Diagonal 1 is set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, less than 1 km from Sagrada Familia, a 14-minute walk from Casa Batllo and 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia. The property is located 2.3 km from Portal de l'Angel, 2.5 km from Cathedral of Barcelona and 1.8 km from Plaça Catalunya. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and La Pedrera is 1 km away.

Towels and bed linen are featured in the bed and breakfast. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Diagonal 1.

name: Key Sagrada Familia - Carrer Del Clot
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 10m²
description:
Key Sagrada Familia - Carrer Del Clot is situated in the Sant Andreu district of Barcelona, 2.9 km from Mar Bella Beach, 2.9 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach and 2.9 km from Llevant. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Casa Batllo is 3.6 km from the apartment and Passeig de Gracia is 4 km away.

The apartment consists of 3 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a kettle, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer.

Sagrada Familia is 2 km from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 3.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 16 km from Key Sagrada Familia - Carrer Del Clot, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Parc Güell 2 1
description:
Parc Güell 2 1 is situated in the Gràcia district of Barcelona, 4.1 km from La Pedrera, 4.3 km from Casa Batllo and 4.5 km from Sagrada Familia. The property is around 4.7 km from Passeig de Gracia, 4.8 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 5.1 km from Plaça Catalunya. The property is non-smoking and is located 600 metres from Park Güell.

With free WiFi, this 2-bedroom apartment provides a TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 5.4 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 5.4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Parc Güell 2 1.

name: Hotel Midmost by Majestic Hotel Group
description:
Located in the heart of Barcelona, Hotel Midmost by Majestic Hotel Group is a few steps from the famous Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter. This stylish hotel features a roof terrace with a pool (not climatized) and views over the city.

The Hotel Midmost by Majestic Hotel Group has elegant interiors with all modern comforts. Relax in a sunny en suite bedroom, decorated in soothing soft colours and with air conditioning, free WiFi, satellite TV and a Nespresso coffee machine.

Treat yourself to a delicious meal in the hotel’s restaurant, or step outside to sample the huge range of regional and international foods in one of Barcelona’s many restaurants.

Take a stroll up the impressive Passeig de Gracia to visit the famous Modernista creations of Gaudi, or visit the colourful Ramblas and the mouthwatering food stalls of the Boqueria market.

name: BacHome Terrace B&B
description:
BacHome Terrace B&B is located in central Barcelona, 500 metres from Plaza Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia. This modern bed and breakfast has a spacious decked terrace with sofas and offers free coffee and tea 24h.

The air-conditioned rooms at BacHome Terrace B&B feature modern décor and free WiFi. Each one comes with a desk, a private bathroom and views of the street or the terrace area. Their bathrooms include a hairdryer and free toiletries.

BacHome Terrace B&B. Located 500 metres away, Portal de l’Àngel Street is full of shops, and there are numerous charming cafes and restaurants in the Gothic Quarter, 5 minutes’ walk away. The beautiful Palau de la Música Auditorium is also 400 metres away.

Located 150 metres away, Urquinaona Metro Station connects you with the rest of the city with ease. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, 7 minutes’ walk away.

name: Diagonal Apartments by Olala Homes
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Well set in the Les Corts district of Barcelona, Diagonal Apartments by Olala Homes is a sustainable apartment located 2.4 km from Camp Nou and 2.6 km from La Pedrera. The property invites guests to reconnect with nature and encourages them to make eco-friendly travel choices. The property is around 2.8 km from Casa Batllo, 2.9 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 3.2 km from Passeig de Gracia. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sants Railway Station is 1.5 km away.

At the apartment complex, all units have air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a shower and free toiletries. An oven, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 3.3 km from the apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is 3.6 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Diagonal Apartments by Olala Homes.

name: Apartamentos Barcelona - Iberia
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Located 1.2 km from Sants Railway Station, Apartamentos Barcelona - Iberia offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a dining area, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.6 km from the apartment, while Camp Nou is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from Apartamentos Barcelona - Iberia.

name: TOC Hostel Barcelona
description:
Set in the heart of Barcelona, just 700 metres from Plaza Catalunya Square, TOC Hostel Barcelona offers an outdoor pool and a terrace.

The property offers private and shared rooms with air conditioning and heating. Some rooms have a flat-screen TV and some have a private bathroom. There is a shared TV area, kitchen and games room for guests to make use of.

TOC Hostel Barcelona also offers tourist information of the area and a ticket service. You will also find many bars, restaurants and supermarkets in the surrounding streets.

Metro Universtitat is a 2-minute walk from the property and a 25-minute metro ride will take you to Barceloneta Beach. Sagrada Familia is 10 minutes’ metro ride away.

name: Alcam Galileu
description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Sants Railway Station and 1.6 km from Camp Nou, Alcam Galileu offers air conditioning. The property is around 3.9 km from La Pedrera, 4 km from Casa Batllo and 4.3 km from Passeig de Gracia. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.6 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic.

The apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with an oven, a microwave, a washing machine, a fridge and a stovetop.

Plaça Catalunya is 4.4 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 4.4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Alcam Galileu.

name: Eixample12
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 90m²
description:
Located in Barcelona, 2.4 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 2.7 km from Bogatell Beach, Eixample12 provides air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. This sustainable apartment is located 3 km from Somorrostro Beach and 700 metres from Sagrada Familia. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2 km from Casa Batllo.

The spacious apartment is equipped with 3 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and oven, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

La Pedrera is 2.1 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Eixample12.

name: Click&Flat Rizal
description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Casa Batllo and 3.1 km from Park Güell, Click&Flat Rizal offers air conditioning. The property is situated 3.1 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 3.2 km from Sagrada Familia and 3.2 km from Portal de l'Angel. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and La Pedrera is 600 metres away.

This apartment is fitted with 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Click&Flat Rizal.

name: Barcelona Central Apartments
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 30m²
description:
Set in Barcelona, 2.7 km from Barceloneta Beach and less than 1 km from the centre, Barcelona Central Apartments offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a shared lounge. The chic rooms at the Praktik Rambla feature a minimalist design and come with air conditioning. They also include free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom, decorated with striking green tiles.

The hotel offers a terrace with comfortable sofas where guests can relax. From June to September, free fruit juice is served on the terrace from 16:00 to 20:00 every day.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 200 metres away from the Praktik Rambla. Barcelona’s famous Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are a 5-minute walk away. The hotel is surrounded by restaurants, bars and shops.
